1.content: So when exactly in the course of the story shall we start off?
1.title: Setting

11.content: How long before the story?
11.title: Timeline choice

choices: He finds a large watermelon left by someone
114.content: He had come from a long line of gluttonous rats. His own father and mother were *VERY* gluttonous and were very fat. Templeton and his seven brothers and sisters liked to snuggle in thier parents' big fat bellies, for they were nice, soft and warm. Templeton's fondest dream was to be the world's fattest rat...and he wasn't doing a very good job at it for the moment. That's because Zuckerman's Farm had no pigs, and therefore, no slop. Templeton lived on what little food he could steal from Zuckerman's kitchen...though he was nearly caught once. At that time, Templeton didn't know who Charlotte was...he saw that there was a spider living in the doorway to the barn, but the spider hardly spoke to him (and neither did most of the animals on the farm, for that matter). Templeton once found a whole apple on the ground and ate all of it (leaving behind the core) , and that was his largest meal to date...and that had been about a week ago or so. Templeton's dream about becoming the world's fattest rat was only known to Templeton himself. Once, he had dreamed about getting so huge and fat, that he was the size of a barn. There was a junk yard half a mile down the road where Templeton could find his food. In fact, he was in the junkyard right now, with early evening coming on.
114.title: Templeton's Dream

1141.content:
And there it was, waiting alone, glinting in the sunlight, as if waiting for him. Templeton's mouth began to water, as he gazed at the lone watermelon. He approached it slowly, as if expecting it to be guarded by something. But after checking his surroundings, and sensing no danger, the rat waited no time in digging into his newfound feast.

He knawed through the outer shell, and began devouring the juicy fruit from the inside. As he finished the inside, he began to eat the much tougher exterior. Templeton gorged upon the large fruit, and made sure he had eaten every last piece of the melon. It wasn't long before the whole melon had been devoured, and Templeton lay bloated and contently among a pile of trash. He licked his sticky paws, and belched, letting the meal settle. He grinned, looking down at his grossly distended belly, and began to massage his engorged mass.

"What a meal" he said, moaning, enjoying the feeling of being so full. He lay there for a while, enjoying the moment, the stuffed feeling he had in his belly, and yet, he knew he could handle much more. He was not maxed out yet, and he felt ready to eat ten watermelons if the chance ever came. But during his daydreaming, Templeton was interrupted by...
1141.title: A watermelon feast

choices: There's a big pile of food on the edge of the junkyard
There's no more food in the junkyard
11411.content:
"Excuse me"

The voice interupted Templeton's daydreaming, and he looked around to see another rat about three feet away. The newcomer was female and skinny, just the opposite of Templeton. Templeton got to his feet. "I've never saw you before" said Templeton to the stranger.

"My name is Charlene and I'm new to ther area" said the female rat. "I just found this junkyard earlier today"

"This junkyard is a rat's paradise" said Templeton, patting his pot belly.

Charlene looked unconvinced. "Clearly, you haven't been at a fair"

Templeton had heard of fairs; full of humans and noise. Not really his cup of tea, to be honest. Templeton liked to be a loner and the quiet. Anyway, the nearest fairgrounds was a good 20 miles from the Zuckerman farm. Templeton had been all over the county, moving from place to place, never staying very long, He was probably going to move out of the Zuckerman farm in a couple of weeks.

"And I suppose you have?" asked Templeton.

"Oh, yes" said Charlene. "humans leave behind lots of food at fairs. Enough food to feed an army of rats"

"Really?" asked Templeton.

"Yep" said Charlene. "I'm a big eater, even though it doesn't show"

"I'm a big eater, too" said Templeton. "Just ate a watermelon someone left behind"

"I can see that" said Charlene.

"This junkyard is a good place to look for food" said Templeton. "though, not enough food for my liking"

"Well, there's a county fair every fall" said Charlene. "maybe you could go to the fair and have all the food you could eat"

"Maybe" said Templeton, just imagining how fat he could get at a fair with enough food to feed an army of rats. His mouth began to water just by thinking about it.

"I'm here to eat" said Charlene. "I don't suppose you found more food here"

Templeton sniffed the air for more food in the junkyard.
11411.title: Charlene

11412.content:
Templeton knew his meal had been superficial. He knew after a bit of rest, his distended belly would disappear, as watermelon, although being an ample supply of food, was not likly to help him gain any weight, other then the initial bloating. With this knowledge, Templeton continued to massage the tightly pact belly of his, claws gently scratching his bloated sloshy belly. He closed his eyes, entering a state of food stuffed euphoria, which was however interrupted by a twitching of whiskers, which led Templeton to slowly open his eyes. What he saw would neither please him, or soothe him.

He saw the fluffy face of a hungery cat.

Templeton gulped, realizing he was in quite a comprimising situation. So he did the only thing he really could in such a situation; he ran. The cat pounced at him, and Templeton ducked out of the way just in time. Normally, Templeton was quite agile, and cats would quickly give up the chase, but he soon found out his gorged stomach would cause him some difficulty. He ran passed junk heaps, not daring to look back, and as the cats shadow began to loom over him, he knew it was all over unless he found another escape.

So he looked all around him, hoping for something, anything. Then he finally saw what he hoped would be a feasable escape. A pile of garbage appeared in front of him, in which there was a hole, big enough for a fat rat to squeeze into but small enough to escape his unwanted friend. So he took his chances and leaped into the hole, legs scrambling to help fit his bloated end through. He managed to pull himself into the pile just as the cat leaped up again to grab him, but to no avail. The cat hissed at him, but Templeton did his best to ignore it and crawl further inside. It was in here that Templeton found something he didn't expect.
11412.title: A narrow escape

114121.content:
Templeton had come upon what was once a meal from a fast food restaurant. Inside a paper bag was a half-eaten cheeseburger with everything that had become grimy from being left in the garbage. There were also three cartons of curly fries, and what must have once been a milkshake, now melted into chocolate milk.

Templeton stared at it. Then, he hobbled and jiggled over towards the bag, and he managed to chew through it with his teeth. When he picked up the half of burger, he found it to be about as big as him. He sunk his teeth into it. It was juicy from being soaked in grime. He began gobbling it down as fast as he could.

Once that was down, Templeton held up one of the cartons of stale fries, and they slid down and into his mouth, and he managed to swallow them whole. He did the same with the other cartons as well, and soon, he was feeling much more full than before.

Then Templeton struggled over towards the cup with the milk in it. He found a straw and placed it inside. He began to guzzle the milk straight down his throat and into his stomach. He could hear it gurgle now, and it was stretching out a bit more. It took a couple of minutes to complete it, but finally, he got the warm, almost sour, liquid into his gut.

Letting out a sigh of relief and satisfaction, Templeton collapsed onto his back, and his stomach rolled back over his face, and then it settled back into place. Belching loudly, Templeton pat it gently, listening to his gut gurgle.

Then he smelled something else...
114121.title: Rat-in-the-Box

1141211.content:
Templeton could smell it. Something delicous was very near. Falling over onto his fours, his indulgent belly caressing the ground, Templeton made his way near the delectible scent, at least as fast as his bloated body would allow. Templeton soon found himself at the foot of something truely amazing; a pile of half eaten goodies.

A small basket of fruit, an unopened pack of hotdogs, some moldy cheese, a few old looking pieces of bread and box containing some unwanted Chinese take out. What a day it was for Templeton. He rubbed his hand's together in anticipation, and without further delay began to gorge himself on these treats.

First the fruit. He gobbled it down without halt. Next the bread, and after that the cheese. Templeton belched, his comicly bloated stomach groaned a sloshed, unwanting to take in any more. Templeton grinned, as he gnawed open the six pack of hotdogs. Lying back on some trash, Templeton eat the hotdogs casually, saverouing them as if the most delicous treat he'd ever had.

Nonetheless, soon they too vanished into his gullet, and Templeton moaned in pleasure. Never in his life had he been so stuffed, and yet more food lay right before him. His belly bulged infront of him, his arms only able to reach halfway around it. But he wouldn't let the food go to waste.

Belching, Templeton wobbled over to the last of the food, slurping down noodles one by one, until at last his feast came to an end. He grinned, and belched again and again, but Templeton felt no pain from being so full, only the pleasure's of the feast. And Templeton being the true glutton he was only wanted more. If given the chance he would eat like this nonstop, but alas, he had never had the chance.

Massaging his engorged belly, Templeton closed his eyes, stomach churning in discomfort of having so much food.
1141211.title: More more more!

11412111.content:
The fat and bloated rat emptied his stomach of gas with a healthy belch, finally he managed to drift off to sleep, stomach pulsating as it digested. It wasn't long until he sloshed from side to side, groaning and moaning in his sleep, the fat lump was dreaming again.

Templeton looked around, then looked at his middle, it was back to normal, but he'd just eaten...he shook his head as he noticed now that he was surrounded by foods, more hot dogs, watermelons, sandwiches, grapes...and they all appeared to be moving of their own accord. Rolling, wobbling, turning themselves closer. And not only that, but growing each time! Each item swelling, plumping, getting larger than before...the rat blinked and shook his head, drool beginning to form. And as if the food knew his desire, it flew into the air and above his head, first the grapes pulled themselves from their vine and swelled to the size of oranges before shoving themselves down Templeton's awaiting gullet. "Delightful!" He gulped down another. "Stupendous!" And another. Soon his belly had distended over two feet from the engorged grapes, Templeton belched louder than he'd ever had before, covering his mouth in shock.

He looked up and soon the thick hot dogs flew into his face, somehow this seemed familiar to him, all too familiar, he opened his mouth with glee and the ripe dogs worked into his body, his mouth distending as if he was a snake, gobbling and allowing himself to distend into a sausage shape. The watermelon rolled ominously over to it's new home, Templeton looking up over his snout and opened wide. An unseen force shoving the enormous fruit into the rat's body. Templeton groaned and accepted the bounty, he felt lumpier than before, and as his body adjusted itself as if by magic, immediately digesting the foods. Before Templeton had time to think, thick layers of fat began to swell on his face, limbs, and middle. Even his scraggily tail had thickened to the size of the previously eaten hot dogs. He looked, almost horrified at the oozing bulk hanging from his frame, he could not move, and he could barely believe how far ahead his flabby belly hung before him.

Back in the cool air, away from his dream world the tubby rat wobbled and groaned. His feet kicking as he gripped his swollen belly in discomfort, eyes squeezed shut, mumbling to himself.
11412111.title: The Dream

114121112.content:
Templeton woke up with a start. He was sweating as though he'd just had a 'Nam dream.

He looked around. He was back in the dump. He looked at his stomach. It had grown slightly smaller after giving it time to digest, but it was still rather swollen.

Sighing with relief, he rolled over onto all fours. His stomach sloshed slightly and slightly grazed the ground. Templeton decided he'd better get going. He checked outside and saw that the cat had gone. He decided he'd better head for home. He managed to squeeze himself out of the tight squeeze of garbage and he waddled slowly out of the dump...

A few minutes later, Templeton felt slightly hungrier. Deciding that he needed to eat something, he sniffed the air. He managed to catch the scent of something cool and sweet. He began to shuffle his fat body over towards the road. He could see a small truck parked there. He could see it. It was an ice cream truck.

Ice cream seemed perfect right now, and he scurried as quickly as he could over towards the truck. He managed to reach it and climb up onto the rear bumper. Then, he managed to squeeze under the door and into the truck.
114121112.title: Get a Move On

choices: Risk being caught, and most likely die (Stay :(
Screw humanity, I want to live (Run)
1141211121.content:
The inside of the ice cream truck was colder than Templeton had expected. But thankfully, his soft swollen belly provided him the warmth he needed so he wouldn't have to freeze. But the amount of cold was different as well as the layout of the back of the truck. It wasn't just any ice cream truck, but a storage truck, which was possibly taking its shipment to a grocery store or ice cream shop until the driver stopped for some unknown reason.

Now this shipment had a new destination, thought the rat. My stomach. He rubbed his soft and less swollen belly with excitement and set off to work. He started at the top of the stack of boxes so he could work his way down. The added girth from overeating he was so anxious to obtain, would definitely make climbing an arduous task.

Using his fangs he bit through the tape of the sealed packaging to unlock a treasure trove of Klondike ice cream sandwiches. The rat lounged at the corner of the box, taking a relaxing position as he knew he would enjoy this immensely. He unwrapped the first and a second with his tail quickly. While his tail unwrapped the foil covering with lightning speed his greedy little paws stuffed as much of the sandwich as he could into his mouth. He grunted in pleasure as a large chunk slid down his gullet. And within three bites the first sandwich vanished and found a new home within the rats belly which growled with joy.

Within a few minutes he had consumed about twenty five ice cream sandwiches, with the corpulence around his large stomach now doubling in size. Still lounging with his legs relaxing lifeless at his sides, he couldn‘t help but giggle in euphoria; his belly wobbling some. His stomachs digestive acid had turned the once solid blocks of ice cream he swallowed into a melted chilling liquid. Templeton paused momentarily from his gorging to savor his newly obtained girth. Pressing pleasurably upon his burbling and robust abdomen, he allowed the cold contents to jiggle and slosh around; like a furry pile of gelatin. But why should it stop there. He still had this box and the others to go. Humans were fat enough as it is, just look at Zuckerman and his wife. If anything Templeton was being quite the humanitarian.

His righteous act to help humanity further added to his delight. Unwrapping more of the sandwiches, he was determined to finish what he had started. Gorging, filling his fat face with more and more until the box now laid empty. He had to move from his lounging position in order to eat the sandwiches he sat atop of which were partially destroyed from his immense weight and melted from the warmth of his engorged back. But he didn’t mind, he licked up what remains of melted vanilla there were. Now in the center of the box he groaned with delight at all the ice cream he just ate. He laid flat on his body with the immense tub of fat from his stomach shaping into his back, lifting his behind in the air and sending a roll of fat onto his head. With what strength he had in his chubby arms, he attempted to stand up, but the weight was too much.

“Boy,” he said aloud, extending a paw to pat his now rounder back. “I certainly know how to pack it all.” His back jiggle and sloshed with mirth. Using his tail as counter weight, he began to shift himself back and fourth, back and fourth. His fat shifted with him, until it dragged the fat rats body backwards. He tilted his head back as well to aid himself to stand. Finally, as he got back up to his two foot paws, he took stock of his newfound bulk. A large furry stomach which he couldn’t even wrap his arms around now laid in front of him; relaxing on the ground and burbling contently. He patted it in delight and waddled his way to the boxes edge while using his excess weight to tip it over.

Lucky for Templeton, as he pressed his stomach against the box the single wall of cardboard fell down. Which allowed him to remain in his upright position, allowing his body to relax and inspect which box to open next. So many boxes left to gorge off of, but which one was to come next. As was his plan, he climbed down gently with the tip of his foot paws touching the box. He was managing his girth real well.

What lies inside this box, he thought, vats of chocolate or strawberry ice cream. Or possibly some vanilla fudge bars. He couldn’t wait to find out. But suddenly a memory came back to him. The dream he had of all the food. Though he was quite delighted to over indulge himself without end. The fact of being immobilized in the dream frightened him, and what’s worse, it was a dream. This is real life, as heavenly as it was to realize his dream at becoming the fattest rat in the world was, there are predators to think about. What about that cat in the junkyard? He was barely able to escape him, and he wasn’t even near the size he was now. If he would try now, doom would most definitely be spelled clearly for him.

He was left with an enormously difficult decision. “What should I do? What can I do? Eat and die by predators or this human who might discover me and I’ll be too fat to escape? Or take what stomach I have out of benevolence to humanity, and run to eat another day?”
1141211121.title: Eating in a Winter Wonderland

11412111211.content:
Not wasting another moment, he hefted his bulk to the back of the truck to not be discovered. If he were to possibly die (in the safety of an iron vehicle), he would go out doing what he loved. Tearing through a nearby box, he found four rows of pitchers filled with Vanilla ice-cream.

“Goody,” he cheered, “an excellent parting gift.” If it were to be so. Still outside the box, he removed the lid and took a hard bite. Still solid frozen, he added pressure to take a huge chunk out of the pitcher. Feeling the cold moist treat slither down his warm throat, his body wobbled as he giggled, and finally, the chunk made a *glopping* sound as it bounced in the pit of his stomach. Continuing the procedure, he took more and more bites, reveling in the cold goodness. As soon as he finished, he moved on to the next one, and the next one, and the next one. His stomach, becoming more fuller, rounder, and larger; along with his expanding rump. With his bulbous stomach keeping him hunched over, he saw a place within the box he could relax, and so, jumped inside and landing with a loud squelch; the shivery contents bouncing around.

It was a tighter fit than he thought; being squeezed between the box and the ice-cream. But no matter. Leaning over as best he could, he carried another pitcher over, resting it on his cold, round, burbling belly which called for further appeasing. While chowing down on the sweet, he placed a paw across his cold belly. His small digits scratching across such a numb-wide surface tickled him from his footpaws down to his chubby face. The digestive acids in his stomach have done a good job in melting the ice into a melted creamy coating, which served as a soft layer of fat under Templeton’s fur. With each large swallow, his paw would slowly rise as another slab of ice-cream found its home within his cavernous stomach. And strangely, he was able to feel it glorp within him.

After ten minutes of voracious gorging, Templeton hefted his body up the side of the box, a humongous gray orb of shivering blubber. With gallon upon gallon now refuse in his large belly, Templeton couldn’t stop shivering; causing his body to slosh every second. He somewhat regretted his decision, but didn’t think of it for long after hauling half his body up the box, and using his small legs to pull the other half up.

Dragging himself to the next box, he opened it and found stack upon stack of Crunch Ice-cream Bars. Templeton literally fell for the bars, crushing a few with his massive liquid like belly, which persistently gurgled and bubbled. Quickly, he devoured the bars two at a time, not even bothering to chew. As he stuffed his face, and relaxed on his soft back, more fat started to develop under the large valley of fur. Being the messy little pig he was, some of the ice cream landed atop of his stomach, and soon melted from the now warm heat. Finishing the two bars, he gave his burbling swell a congratulatory pat to adapting to the cold. Like a bear getting ready for hibernation; only the rat would eat more than sleep. Continuing his treatment, his belly grew more sticky and icky with each trickle of ice-cream landing on it. Which made it harder to rub and appreciate, but still a beloved sight to behold and appreciate.

When he finished he went to another box, and another, until he came across the coup de grace! A box, with the largest ice-cream cake his twinkling eyes ever did see. It looked so beautiful, so delicious, and so fluffy in his gaze. Then, looking below him, he saw something similar, his unbelievably over gorged stomach. It was just a mountain of soft fur and fat. Spilling gelatinously to his sides, and forming an arch at the front. Being a canister of liquid ice cream and adipose, his mirthful pat caused vibrations to ripple throughout his body. Cheerful about the pleasure that coursed through him, he didn’t laugh aloud because of being too busy catching his breath. The untold amount of sweets he ate had pilled up from his now packed stomach--all the way up to his chest which now too started to expand (or form fat around the rib cage). His wide frame kept his paws from reaching at his chest fur to try and stroke some of the rising ice cream back down to his stomach. Now with this marvelous delicacy in front of him, he feared he would either throw up, or, not be able to get out of the box. The ice cream filled him like water, and so he was unable to belch for more room.

“Well,” he groaned, daintily patting his belly with what his paws could reach. “This is it, one last morsel to enjoy.” His stomach groaned furiously, as if disapproving the proposal to stop.

"Hey, I'd like to go on, but you need time to rest, so this is it!"

Pulling his body with all his might and kicking with one footpaw still touching the ground, he was able to get to the edge of the box and reach to take off the lid. But suddenly, due to his shifting weight, all the melted gorge that rested upon his back, slowly shifted up to his chest like a water bottle being tipped over with the cap still on. Noticing this, Templeton panicked and tried moving backwards, but it was too late. Inch by inch Templeton slid into the box. His titanic mass, as big and wide as an obese Welsh Corgi, started to rest upon the plastic cake covering. It was no contest of which would win, the cakes plastic shield or the wide, round, blob like belly. Within seconds, Templeton descended lower and lower, his plump cheeks grazing the side of the box, and the sounds of plastic snapping ringing in his ears. As pathetic as it was, Templeton held back tears. Upset that what could’ve been the final meal he would ever feast on in his life, was now crushed by his monstrous swell.

"Why, why did you do it," he moaned sadly, slapping at his bulbous mass as if spanking a child. But this only gave him small pangs of pleasure as his indigested gorge sloshed and slopped around; massaging his insides soothingly.

He had grown too corpulent to care about his size anymore, but now, he would lie in this box, allowing his strength to return.

“Johanson, get your butt out of the truck and help me unload these.”

Templeton’s ears perked up at the sound of the voice. Humans! “This is it, I’m done for,” he sadly mused, tears now streaking down his face, and squeezing his furry massive bulk one last time. He didn't see the point in climbing out. Where would he run to? If he could indeed run? “Goodbye world, and goodbye mountain’s of food I haven’t eaten yet."

“Yeah, this is the place. Get the cakes.”

Closing his eyes, Templeton awaited the inevitable.

“C’mon, hurry up we got a tight schedule here.”

*Shut!*

There was a brief moment of silence that seemed to last forever, but Templeton felt no pain from any type of attack, nor heard the humans reaction to a giant rat inside a box; only a shutting noise. Opening his eyes, Templeton’s surroundings were pitch black, and looking up, he noticed the box was covered. Wiping away tears, his clogged heart slowing slowed down its pace.

“Were they actually too busy to notice me,” said the rat. Perhaps he’d be able to get away with his catatonic ice-cream binge after all. And then, his massive body nearly leapt with excitement at the next thing one of the humans asked.

“Is this shipment going to a grocery store or ice cream parlor?
11412111211.title: Too Corpulent to Care

choices: He is found by the staff.
114121112111.content:
"Grocery store," the voice replied. "It's the one on Elm Street. Get a move on, will ya?"

"Alright, alright, I'm going."

Templeton felt his heart do a backflip as he realized what this meant. He knew that a grocery store was the home of every possible piece of food food in the world. So many options, choices and decisions to be made swam threw his head, making him very excited. Resolving to get some sleep, he quickly pulled the box shut around himself and set about dozing off. He snored softly as he felt the truck drive along the freeway.

Hours seemed to slip past like sand, and soon, Templeton was slowly regaining conciousness. He yawned and stretched a bit, and reached down to rub is belly. He looked down and was rather startled to find that his once monstrous belly had shrunken in size. He looked himself over and found that he'd digested most of the previous day's gorge and the fat had spread out all over his body. His legs had a great degree more blubber on them, and his face jiggled whenever he looked around.

And he felt hungry. After stretching his stomach to the almost imaginable limits, it was empty again, and he needed to stuff himself again. He heard it growl with anticipation. He stroked it soothingly. "Now, now," he said with a sickly grin. "You'll soon be full again. I'll see to it you get so full I'll need extra suspension to move you around."

His stomach growled with excitment.

Templeton listened carefully to the outside world through the cardboard. He could hear nothing so far. No sounds of workers. No sounds of trucks coming and going. No movement whatsoever. He decided to take a chance. He pushed hard against the flaps on the box and saw the most peculiar sight when they gave way.

It was a ceiling. He wasn't sure if he'd been expecting that. A ceiling meant that he was inside a building. There were long steel girders holding the ceiling up, and long pipes running along the top. Curious, he reached up along the edges and pulled himself up to see what was out there. His eyes widened at the sight of it all.

It was a grocery store all right. He was in the back of the building, but he could see all the various aisles of food. There were aisles with produce. There were aisles with cookies. There were aisles with chips. Long rows of drinks from milk to sodas to juice all lined the refridgerated walls.

Templeton stared in pure ecstacy. "I don't know where to start. An embarrassment of riches awaits me! This is it! Time for my ultimate feast!"

And with a new energy he'd never felt before, the bulky rat tore out of the box and headed for the first aisle his instincts told him to go to. There was an entire row of various types of potato chips. He ripped open a bag and shovelled the chips down his throat and into his waiting stomach. He tore into bag aafter bag until they got too salty and his tongue got a weird feeling. So he next ran to the beverages and pulled out a huge bottle of cola. He struggled with the top for a moment before he to open it and tip it forwards. He put his mouth on the top and poured the sugary contents down into his stomach. He elt himself swelling up in all directions as it filled him, and by the time he was finsihed, he was very large indeed.

But he wasn't done yet. He'd barely begun. He waddled and stumbled towards the cookie aisle. He ripeed open the packages of chocolate chips and shortbreads and poured them all in a pile, and he began shovelling them down his gullet, feeling himself get larger and lalrger.

And when he got tired of cookies, he took to the produce. He ate apples, carrots, corn cobs, potatoes and even downed most of a watermellon.

Then he saw the bakery just calling to him. He felt his energy levels spike once again, and he waddled and stumbled over towards it. He found huge birthday cakes lining the area, put in boxes to be kept fresh. He ripped open the boxes and dove into the sheet cake, shovelling the bread and icing into his mouth and swallowing huge amounts. He ate several cakes in rapid succession, feeling himself grow more stuffed with sugar by the moment.

Then he found one of the icing containers. He grinned and held the nozzle up to his mouth and promptly squirted a huge burst of green frosting into his mouth. Now he was *really* wound up on sugar, and he downed the whole thing, plus three more.

It went on like this for several hours. Every time he tired of one area, he'd go back and get another.

And soon, it was getting late.

Templeton examined his surroundings. He'd polished off nearly half the store's contents. He let out a belch of the most intense satisfaction.

And then he looked at the size of his stomach. It was even bigger than before. He looked like he had swallowed a bowling ball.

"Phew...," he sighed. "Think that'll satisfy you for now?"

His stomach just responded by struggling to digest his binge. It wobbled and shivered. He moaned softly from the pleasure of it all.

"I need to rest. Come on, let's go find some place to hold up until night falls again."

Easier said than done. The gorged rat found he couldn't really move all that well. It wasn't until he manged to roll over onto his stomach that he found he could pull himself forward with his claws and spent the next fiffteen minutes struggling to climb back into his box. He pulled the flaps shut over himself and dozed off.

He expected this store would not be open for much longer if he kept this up.
114121112111.title: Grocery Store

choices: Templeton continues to glut the next night, hungrier than ever!
A scientist find Templeton who wants to study and help him eat and fatten!
1141211121111.content:
That early morning he was lulled to sleep by the rhythmic sounds of his own digestion. Deep gurgles echoed through his huge belly and rang beautifully in his ears. He knew every sloshing churn added up to another layer of fat to wrap his body, and it was never many churns before he felt himself grow a little softer. Every couple minutes, his noisy belly became more comfortable to sleep on.

The next day was a national holiday, and as such, the store never opened. No one knew about the destruction of the previous night. As a result, that evening Templeton still found himself alone, save for his rumbling stomach. His gut had managed to digest everything, and it certainly showed. His arms had grown thick and a couple chins now rested heavily on his chest, which would be best described as an extension of his growling gut. His cheeks had rounded out, and his legs... Well, they'd been overwhelmed not just by their own fat, but by the adipose of his lower belly. Templeton's tail had grown thick, but even it was beginning to be overtaken by the rest of his body. It was only a matter of time. To his belly, though, time was everything. His intestines clenched and whined, and stomach acids swirled to entice Templeton to eat.

The rat didn't need convincing.

Shifting his belly around, he finally managed to tumble from his box. His belly spilled across the linoleum like dropped jello. Templeton kicked his legs, but to no avail. He couldn't move that much dead weight. After a few more tries, he moved himself a little, but he was burning more calories than he was consuming. Digestion had left him immobile, since everything now sagged. He gut became more and more demanding with increasingly loud rumbles. Finally, he felt his own stomach shift inside. Perhaps there was some strange combinations of foods that caused what happened next. Maybe hormones packed into foods had caused something, or maybe it was preservatives. No one would ever know, but his belly groaned and began to ooze forward. Templeton blinked as his own stomach began to move him forward. Laughing, he smacked is belly, causing it to jiggle more. "You really can handle anything! Stomach, lead me to what you want to eat first! What a glut this will be!"

Templeton slid along the floor, grumbling away and turned a corner. The rat's eyes widened as a huge section of the store he didn't know was there opened up. A large deli was there, as well as the frozen foods section. The fudge at the candy shop section made his mouth water as his gut wobbled over. He made his way to candied apples, devoured caramels, gorged on truffles and glutted on peanut brittle. Oh how his belly loved the sheets of fudge, rumbling continuously for more. All the while, the sounds of hunger were joined by the sounds of overindulgence. While on the third sheet of fudge, his belly glopped and bubbled, churning loudly as he headed towards indigestion. After the fifth sheet, his gurgling gut glorped its way over to the deli.

Unsliced cured hams were in the refrigerators along with roast beef, turkey, chicken, tuna and egg salad. Each one slowly made its way into his moaning gut. Pot roasts would have made for a fantastic pot belly, had his belly in fact been smaller. It had long ago surpassed that title. With each new sandwich he found, a new series of burbles squeezed its way from his stuffed stomach. Indeed, he was huge, and the noises from his belly simply confirmed this. Now hiccuping, Templeton would occasionally take a break from his glorious gluttony to rub his grumbling gut, stimulating digestion so that he could glut even more. "Hic...HILP!!! You doing okay there? Hic... HILP!!! You're feeling pretty stuffed. HIIILP!!!" Even his belly groaned at the amount it was being fed, but it didn't want the binge to end. It let out a low, low rumble that lasted for a long minute. Templeton smiled.

Eventually, his belly moved him away from the deli, both wanting to swell with something else. In the frozen food section Templeton found where much of the ice cream from the truck had gone, or at least what hadn't gone to his middle. Before him was a massive selection of ice cream delicacies, ranging from bars to cakes, just like before. At the mere sight of it, Templeton's belly shook with a massive rumble, simultaneously gurgling with every shake. The hiccuping rat swung doors open, pulling out anything he could and gorging himself on the contents inside. After the first dozen cartons, his stomach began to slosh loudly with the melted ice cream. The sloshes added up as he enjoyed tubs of the stuff and burbled with a few ice cream cakes. Templeton was intoxicated by his own binge.

After a while, the rat went back to the main part of the store to continue the cycles from last night. All the while, his gut groaned even more, wobbling continuously as it shifted its work around. After downing several gallons of milk to wash down his gorge, he belched and massaged his sloshing swell. The moans and groans were intense. "HIIILP!!! Satisfied yet?" His belly twisted around, trying its best to growl, but it was so stuffed it couldn't manage more than loud gurgles. Templeton grinned at his paunch's perseverance. "We'd better hole up for the night. Hic... HILP!!! Can't wait to see what we look like in the morning." His belly whined, but finally slid its way towards a back door. All the while, however, the glutton still reached for what food he could, adding to his obesity.

The blob of a rat gurgled and sloshed through the door, finding an old dumpster that had partially fallen apart. A huge hole was in the side of it, perfect for his bloated body to squish and ooze through. Inside was a little bit of rotten food, the perfect way to top off his binge. The dumpster was roomy, which meant he had plenty of room to grow. Templeton settled in, once again feeling the sloshes of digestion underneath him. He jiggled and moaned happily, slowly rubbing his gut firmly and causing it to glorp and bubble. As he drifted off to sleep, he could feel himself fattening up.
1141211121111.title: A Paunch's Perseverance

choices: Templeton heads back to his trash heap.
Templeton throws caution to the wind and goes for the fridge.
11412111211111.content:
Hours had passed in and out of Templeton's last glut, and Templeton took pleasure in his sleep, his scratchy paws pressed affectionately against his massive gut. He awoken at times only to hear his belly plop and bubble as his orb of fat slowly tightened around him, though no amount of digestion could return elasticity to the rat's once taut form. In just two days, he'd managed to triple in size, but the rat knew his days of glutting were limited. Sure, there was the trash heap, but that was nothing compared to this. And then there was the cat! Sure, humans posed an undeniable threat, but so long as he went on unseen, he could do as he wished.

The previous night had left him exhausted and pitted within the trash can. The humans had yet to clean up the store over the three day weekend, and though his feast was coming to a full stop, it wasn't over yet! Despite his exhaustion, the rat was energized with hunger. He awoke to loud gurgles and demands from his stretched, bloated paunch, and as night was about to fall, he had the whole evening to glut.

"More, you say?" He asked his indulgent paunch, pressing his claws into the all-consuming fat. His short arms, who had converted to flap from the weekend's glutting, struggled to flap at the extensive belly in front of him, a massive appendage just yearning to be extended. "Well, since you put it that way, I am feeling rather peckish!"

With that, the rat slid from his comfortable position, slinking from the trash heap and on to the cool grocery store floor. Against his better judgment, he tried to stand, so much so that he waved and flapped his fattened up arms like a bird taking flight. Gravity got the best of him and he raced a foot in front of him, attempting to balance the unruly paunch. But the rat had nearly doubled in size from just night before, and though the weight on his rump was sizable and he'd widened to accommodate, nothing could compare to his wide stomach and its reach. Templeton spilled forward on to a cushion of rolls - his own massive swell. He gave it an affectionate pat and commanded it just as before, and to little surprise, it began to move. There was mobility in that old rat, yet. "Very well, Stomach. Lead the way. You know what to do."

Though the rat had consumed much of the store over the course of two days, several sections of the store beckoned his return, from the sweet, succulent pastries to the bottomless array of cookies and shortbread. And then of course there was that pot roast, left untouched from nights' past. Before Templeton could have any say in it though, his belly led him toward a shelf of homemade jams. The rat gave his belly a pat of approval and maneuvered to pull one of the jars off the lowest shelf. It glided on to the linoleum floor, and with a pop, Templeton freed the lid from the container.

With zero hint of decorum, the rat began shoveling mounds of sweet and fresh strawberry jam into his gullet, his claws delightfully sticky from the experience. And oh, it was rich! He could still taste the strawberries as they slid down his eager throat, some whole from within the jar. His belly jiggled like a plate of jello as he consumed the jam in seconds, gurgling with excitement for more. He softened its pleas and reached for a blueberry jar, and before long, the rat had consumed three more jars. He slapped his now widened gut with pleasure and belched, thoroughly hyped up on all the natural sugars contained. With that, he allowed the groaning mass to lead him to his next destination.

He turned a corner, and awaiting him was a decadent array of candies, sweets, gummies, and more, each within their own plastic containers just waiting to be devoured. And devoured they would be. Making all sorts of clatter, Templeton leaned against the containers with his rump, dumping the contents of the bottom row on to the floor of the store. Hardly spoiled for choice, he began shoveling the decadent chocolates down his throat, from chocolate turtles to various flavored truffles and confectioneries. He devoured dozens, at one point cramming the contents down his anxious gullet. Thoroughly buzzed from the sugar, the rat slunk his way down the aisle to the breads in euphoric delight, consuming a cinnamon roll in one fell swallow. The flaky, doughy substance added considerable weight to his bottomless stomach, but he carried on, shoveling in one more before consuming two boxes of doughnut holes, several danish pastries, and a full box of slightly hardened - but no less delightful - assorted donuts, glazed to delight.

High on sugar and inching toward indigestion, the rat's stomach rippled and sloshed under it's master's corpulent appetite. In any other circumstance, Templeton would have been stretched to his limit already, but the weekend's glut had stretched him to grander proportions than ever before. And the further Templeton stretched, the more he simply had to consume. And so he carried on, letting his belly turn back into the soft drinks aisle. Reaching up to grab a bottle without discretion, he fell back against the floor in a glop of blubber. Managing to turn back on to his belly, he twisted the cap from the floor with his teeth, and much to his delight, the spray of cola gushed straight into his mouth. As the momentum of the spray weakened, he began to gulp it down into his widening frame, the cola burning down his throat. Templeton's small legs separated to support his ever-widening frame as he distended from front to back, so much so that as he finished consuming the cola, he bounced slightly atop his belly like a water balloon overflowing with its contents.

The rat recessed for a moment, hugging his arms to himself as his stomach growled like an aggravated feline. "Now... HILP... now..." He coaxed it, rubbing little parts of in slow, smooth, if not coaxing circles. "I... HILP... know you want... HILP..." He groaned and shifted forward, his mass of flesh and body moving as fluidly as a wave from underneath him. "... More... HILP." His stomach groaned in protest, but Templeton took it to mean something else as he pushed his towering appendage forward.

As he made the journey to the next feast, he grabbed at a bag of chips, consuming the contents in handfuls, before he moved on to vats of ketchup and mayonnaise. He sampled his palette with crackers and various cheeses, each kept under wraps in layers of plastic, which Templeton painstakingly peeled away with his claws and teeth. Some he swallowed whole, while others demanded big, gratifying bites. He took pleasure in all of it, but preferred the creamiest of cheese, which slid down his throat like warm milk. This bided him more time, allowing his unrelenting mass of adipose to digest, if only for a few minutes. Too bottom heavy to climb produce fixtures, he settled for ground level foods, grabbing at tubs of coleslaw, potato salad, bags of marshmallows, sugared cereals, and whatever else he could get his bloated paws on.

Hours must have passed in the rat's trek to consume everything in sight, and though he could easily be confused for a small dog by that point, there was one feat he'd yet to conquer: that pot roast, glazed and rotisserie'd to perfection. On any other day, the rat could consume an entire pot roast and feast for a week, but that night, there was no end to his incredible hunger. Templeton knew that the treck to the fridge could take ages at this rate, but with morning fast approaching, he didn't have much time to deliberate.
11412111211111.title: The next night

choices: Templeton takes a nap and gorges when he wakes up.
114121112111112.content:
His Titanic-sized swell, gurgling and incapacitated with the gorge of its master, simply growled and popped in defeat, slinking toward the vast, towering refrigerator. This was a feast, after all, and with hours still to spare, a feast would take no prisoners! Templeton strained to open the door amidst his sagging, unmerciful glut and useless arms. The door swung open, hitting him straight back in the rear, but Templeton paid little mind, for right in front of him laid the Holy Grail of glutting: his gloriously unconsumed, fully cooked pot roast.

Delirious and intoxicated with food, the rat scooped up only a small fraction of his belly from underneath his paws, and with several pushes and some effort, he hoisted himself into the refrigerator. His nearly spherical form slid back toward the floor against the cool, white interior plastic, but he hoisted himself again with a gasp and a groan. By then, he'd worked up quite an appetite! The wave of fat glopped over his widened rat frame as he used the pot roast for support, but inevitably, both Templeton and the pot roast fell from the fridge and back on to the floor.

The fall was cushioned by Templeton's sprawling fat, but had pushed his stomach in a different direction, causing the contents to swish and slop with every movement. The glorious pot roast, glazed with a thick crackled layer of baked honey, was soon freed from its cooking net with Templeton's able teeth, and within seconds, the glut began chewing into the cold but juicy meat. Candies and pastries were fine, but here was sustenance! He felt like a king. The King of Rats, hah hah! He rubbed his belly ever more, consuming the pot roast that would once tower him in size. He rolled in all sorts of different positions as he ripped off bits of meat, stuffing them euphorically down his throat. At the size of a small Jack Russell, Templeton was utterly immobile and living the dream. Surely he was the most fortunate rat in all the land!

Only an hour, if that, had passed, yet Templeton had consumed the whole roast down to just bone. He somehow knew at the back of his mind that morning was approaching, though the store was pitch black. His monumental belly, spilling on to the floor and jiggling erratically, was the size of a bowling ball, dwarfing Templeton's tiny little arms and legs to just appendages. He hadn't a clue how he was supposed to get back to his dumpster, but he'd have to try! The massive swell groaned without coaxing, and Templeton massaged it loyally. "You... HILP... have been good, Stom... HILP... ach. Most... HILP... mmm, loyal." It groaned from underneath him with heaping signs of indigestion, but he just gave it a pat and coaxed it to move. It burbled and squelched and he let out a grunt, and there was no denying it at this rate. Templeton had gorged himself to immobility, and the pot roast, now just bone and grizzle, hadn't helped any. But oh, had it been worth it. "So I see we have... HILP... a problem. Very... HILP... well."

He struggled to turn his head, his neck a thing of the past with the fat pushed straight up to his ratty shoulders. From just a couple feet away, he spotted a row of cupboards, which should be sufficient for the night. If he hid in the corner and kept quiet, surely he wouldn't be noticed. And so the rat, heaving with breath and dragging his massive rolls of fat beneath him at a snail's pace, journeyed to the cupboard. Without the lure of food, he was somehow less anxious, but a rat had to do what a rat had to do. With a heavy grunt, he pushed the door open with his teeth, before he slunk his way in at ground level. It was an arduous task, but the rat managed it.

Much to surprise, when he entered the cupboard, he couldn't help but notice the familiar smell of rich cheeses, coleslaws, that glorious egg salad, and so much more! He got a chill, and not just from the delight of his new find, but because he had in fact found an overflow refrigerator which reached further back than Templeton could have anticipated. His belly rippled and groaned in protest, which Templeton took to mean something else in his ratty little mind. "You... HILP, just don't quit, do ya? HILP."

But even Templeton had to admit that if he consumed another bite, he'd surely burst. But then, he had found a safe place where he could gorge and be unseen, and with the amount of food in this fridge alone, he could gorge for a week! The rat scratched at his stretched, leniant fur. Morning hadn't fallen quite yet, and he did promise to gorge all night. But then, he was exhausted from hours of gorging, and surely with his heart racing, he would digest that much faster.
114121112111112.title: A roast awaits.

choices: It's the next night. Templeton retreats to the trash.
He's spotted by one of the store employees
1141211121111122.content:
How could Templeton truly resist the binge after such leavings awaited him? So long as he hid at the furthest point in the fridge, no human was bound to find him, and if so, what a glorious way to go!

Pressing his claws against his walloping swell, he pressed on, going by nose as he reached for food in the dark. The gurgles and swirls coming from his stomach broke the silence, and no matter what Templeton did, the acids in his stomach went into overdrive as he reached his second bout of hunger. No amount of food could sustain the glutenous rat, and with so much more room to spread out and so much food at his disposal, the world was his oyster! He certainly had room to grow within that fridge, and grow ever more he would.

Reaching blindly, he grabbed a whole plastic container of coleslaw, a massive vat that could feed a whole family reunion. He shoveled it in bite by bite, eventually sliding inside the whole vat and devouring the contents whole. He belched voraciously, his belly glorping and growling, before he rolled the container aside and reached for the egg salad. Struck with indigestion, the rat's corpulence shook with both hunger and pain, and the rat answered its pleas, sliding head first into the egg salad and shoving it down his gullet with his fatty arms. Templeton grinned like a fool in a catatonic state, feeling his belly stretching ever more, his rump rising even higher in the air. His ratty tail fattened and yet felt stubby in relation to his massive shape, and he rolled back and forward on his back like a seesaw, grinning as he hugged his Titanic-sized paunch. He nuzzled at it with his rounded, obese cheeks, causing ripples throughout his body which quivered and squelched and moaned ever more.

"You... HILP... certain... HILP... ly can handle... HILP..." He drummed his hands against the excessive paunch, lying flat on his back despite the waves of fat swirling underneath him, pushing against his arteries and impossibly stretched belly. ".... Nnnf, anything... HILP." Screaming for relief, his stomach gurgled and growled, his fur stretched to capacity as the rat's stubbed legs and tail spread out from underneath him. An orb in shape, Templeton was a true butterball. Yet somehow, the hunger switch had been switched on inside of him, and with so much more food at his disposal, how could he deny himself... nay, his hunger, an own entity in and of itself? There was no question that within the last few days, Templeton's love of eating had crossed the line into need. And with an appetite so very passionate, exceptional, and greedy, Templeton had reached newfound tolerances of food intake.

The rat heaved and rolled on to his side, his belly sloshing about loudly. He used an arm to crawl further into the fridge, his perceptive nose leading him toward the various cheeses stacked above and around him. He breathed a sigh of relief to find they were wrapped in paper instead of the pesky, flavorless plastic. Not even bothering to unwrap a wheel, he bit straight into the paper, devouring chunks of it away before he bit into a soft brie, sharp with flavor and cool to the tongue. He inched toward the wheel as he crammed the cheese in handfuls down his eager gullet. The wheel disappeared in minutes, and when he'd devoured one of them, he went for another... and another... and another, until he'd consumed a dozen, no problems asked. His ever-widening paunch only swirled and expanded to invite each wheel in, and when he'd finished cheeses, he moved on to produce. Awaiting him were several full stems of grapes, which he popped and shoved into his mouth quickly, barely giving himself time to swallow between each one. It was a miracle the rat didn't choke as they passed through his throat and into his gargantuan swell. He gave his stomach another affectionate, loyal pat as it growled. "Oh listen-HILP-to you... HILP. If our family could... HILP... see us... HILP..." He gave it a slow massage, heaving between breaths but not deterred. "N... now... HILP, mmm."

The rat's belly, now ten or so inches in front of him, quivered at his master's tenacity, but it was clear from the rat's bottomless pit of a stomach that indigestion was simply an occupational hazard. Filled to the literal brim with so many delightful palettes of food, how could Templeton possibly differentiate one gastric response from another? The swirls and pangs from within Templeton massaged against his atrophic arteries and the undigested food of the night, lulling the rat into an all-consuming hunger, as his mind blindly confused the cyclone of internal acids for cries of hunger, rather than cries for help. Maybe it was hormones from the preservatives, an internal imbalance, or just the rat's complete loss of reality, but nothing could stop him, not until he'd had his fill of everything.

And so he would. With a complete lack of conscience, the ravenous rodent devoured the remains of the fridge, from custards to yogurts to cases of guacamole and sour cream. Plastic strawberry containers lined the back side, and he ripped each one open with abandonment, lying on his back as the fruit pummeled down his throat covetously. And just when the rat should have had his fill and called it a night, there it was in front of him, a sight to behold in the midst of dozens of empty containers: a gorgeous cherry pie, glazed with a thick layer of sugar and topped with a rich, calorific glob of whipped cream, five inches high. Without forethought, Templeton pummeled into the pie, now twice the size of the pan it occupied. He grabbed at the sugary delight in chunks, pushing and cramming it down his swollen and raw gullet until the pie was a thing of the past. Covered in whipped cream, the rat licked the excess off his paws and took in the sweet scents of his filthy mat of fur; badges for all he'd consumed over the course of the weekend, and especially that epic night.

His stomach gurgled and glorped ever more, and feeling short of breath, Templeton relaxed back into the pie pan, his expanse of fat spilling out left, right, above, below, and everywhere. The fridge hadn't been as roomier as he remembered. If anything, it had shrunk. Intoxicated with sugar and indigestion, he reached for an odd jar of curdled milk and tipped it toward his mouth to wet his palette. The sour liquid filled him up to in-explainable proportions, his head and limbs and fattened tail small in comparison to his now orb-like figure. His gut, stretched in every direction and nearly as wide as it was high, gurgled in defeat, and giving in to its fatigue, he hiccuped uncontrollably.

He gave his belly a few congratulatory pats, which had now merged with his chest, neck, and even back fat to become one spherical figure. The rat ravished in his new figure, if you could even call it that. He simply couldn't be bigger, yet somehow he'd managed, and what a proud rat he was. Despite his portly proportions, he could imagine himself even bigger, the size of a house cat... or even a cocker spaniel. And Templeton certainly had the appetite for it. Oh, a rat could dream, couldn't he?

Templeton sighed, taking in the pressing feeling against his lungs and arteries and fellow limbs as they negotiated around the various layers of fat accumulated throughout the night. Any more and Templeton's arms and legs surely would have disappeared from within his greedy bloat. He hiccuped again and rolled on this side, his stupendously vast abdomen glopping and groaning for a whole minute. He let out a loud belch and gave his paunch another tender rub. It would take him months, even years, for this to dissipate, and Templeton would surely be immobile (in the usual sense) for quite some time. But what glorious immobility it would be! If only his vast amount of brothers and sisters could truly see him in his full circumference - a true glut to be admired... worshiped, even! Even still, he had come from a long line of gluts, his own parents comparable in size to him for as long as young Templeton could remember.

With these happy thoughts in mind, Templeton lured himself off to sleep, dreaming of his newfound infamy and the many gluts to come. He felt his stomach acids cyclone within him as he dreamed, and despite his massive glut, his paunch began to tighten, but not respectfully. When the rat awoke...
1141211121111122.title: Bigger and better.

choices: Obstain from hunger to free himself out of the hole.
Eat more! This is a rat's paradise!
11412111211111221.content:
Templeton had slept like a baby the better part of fifteen hours, his overwhelming girth serving as the single best pillow and mattress a rat could ever ask for. Despite the cold fridge, his tower of fat kept him as snug and warm, and thankfully, no human had thought to check the fridges for a slumbering, overfed rat - or a whole team of rodents, for that matter. Needless to say, the staff of the grocery store had been in for a rude awakening when they arrived the next morning. The rat had managed to pummel through 2/5th of the store's inventory in just over one weekend, and each pastry, pie, roll, loaf, chip, produce, ham, chicken, roast, coleslaw, salad, condiment, chocolate, confectionery, and sweet had been crammed within his cavernous swell of a fat and adipose. A large army of rats could have accomplished what Templeton had in just hours, and no glut had been more astonishing than Templeton's last.

Still massaging at his enormous paunch even while dreaming, the rat felt his legs begin to stretch from his body as he woke for the day. He blinked and yawned, smiling in a drunk stupor as his body sloshed in salutation. "Morning, yourself. Or evening, I should say. Let's take a look at you." He gave his paunch a few loving pats and marveled at its still excessive size. His fat had greatly spread across his body throughout the day as he slept, giving him far more proportion but little mobility, still. Rolls formed from his shoulders to the middle of his back, and from there and down, his wide rump and fatty tail were maxed out with fat. His stubby legs grew out of portly thighs, and what once was his chest conformed with his great belly, which had slightly tightened and rounded around him. Fully digested, he'd filled out to a truly spherical figure both front and back, and considerably wide, he sprawled out in each direction at least six inches. He wouldn't be able to stand on his legs even if he tried.

Still, the rat was elated. Hunched back in that pie pan, he leaned forward enough to press his claws against his paunch, and with a grin, he jiggled the mass from underneath him. He reveled and quivered in the wave of rolls that appeared. His whole body rolled with the movement as he had become a massive blob of flab, quivering and glopping and whirring even then. Fully digested, Templeton's stomach acids begged for more sustenance, but the fatty rat knew, despite his indulgence, that if he got any bigger, he'd never be able to leave the super market. He could pig out temporarily, but soon he would outgrow the fridge and maybe even the dumpster (sure, a rat could dream), and then he would surely be found. He had found a good home, but there were plenty of other stores and markets and dumps. And then there was a fair, which Avory's goose had insisted was a veritable smorgasbord.

Templeton's overflowing paunch grumbled at Templeton's lack of consuming, and to sate it, he grabbed at a few of the grapes he hadn't consumed from the night before and plopped them into his mouth, chewing them slowly. His stomach flexed and relaxed, before it bellowed for more, moaning on for a full minute. How hard the rat tried to think past the hunger as he rolled back on to his aching stomach, pushing himself back toward the fridge door. He huffed and puffed and for a minute thought he'd overdone it, but the thoughts dashed from his mind a second later. He pushed at the fridge door and landed back on to the floor with a glop like a bowl of jello. More uncomfortable than his size was his relentless hunger, which thunderously announced itself as Templeton began to push himself across the floor, arms first.

"For pete's sake, Stomach! You just can't quit, can you? You really can handle anything." And in a most ratty way, he grinned devilishly, slapping the side of his stomach, which crackled under his touch and reverberated. Well, one last morsel wouldn't hurt, really. With each glop and glorp along the way, the rat finally grabbed at a bag of whooping pies, which he emptied from the box and shoveled into his mouth with his tail, wrapper and all. Soon, his stomach acids switched from pangs of hunger to sounds of indigestion. Templeton sprawled out on his back, engulfed by his tower of blubber which had managed to expand more in just moments. "HILP... better?" Just to be sure, Templeton grabbed at a box of fig newtons and tore it open, but instead of plopping them in one-by-one, he emptied the cookies down his gullet in one fell swoop, both claws in his mouth cramming them down.

His belly seemed to quake and adapt to their new additions, which added a sizable amount of weight to his gargantuan appendage. The stomach acids were appeased for now, and so he rolled back on to his belly and began the trek back to the bin. The rat seemed to expand within minutes, and if his journey had been perilous before, it felt even worse then. Templeton spoke up again, struggling to move across the linoleom floor which squeaked from underneath him. "Geez... HILP... we didn't even eat that much there... HILP... did we, Stomach?" It gurgled again and he got another pang of hunger, which he attempted to ignore. "We're almost... there... HILP..."

But his corpulence only gurgled louder from beneath him as he dragged it along further. It had become a cycle. With so much effort to move his stomach, his hunger grew. Yet as his hunger grew, it took more effort to drag himself along. Not seeming to realize this correlation, the rat grabbed for anything he could get his furry claws on with abandonment. Tthis time, it was a jumbo size bag of potato chips, which even managed dwarfed him in size - but just barely. He ripped the bag open and crawled inside, shoving all the contents down his maw at an accelerated rate. He felt a "plop" in his stomach as he finished it off and he pushed the bag away from him, shaking off the crumbs. He licked at his cheesy and salty claws for a few moments before he carried on then, almost to the back door.

"Just a few more... HILP... feet, Stomach," he assured it, giving it a slight rub as he crawled along, though he knew the only way to please it would be to stuff it with pies, custards, seasoned meats, fizzy colas, and so much more. Templeton's mouth began to water as he thought of all the possibilities, and along the way to the back door, he acknowledged his stomach's persistent demands and gave into a miniature feast (miniature for the rat). Barely stopping to breathe, the rat indulged in a half dozen cheeses, small tubs of coleslaw, potato salad, egg salad, four wrapped and pre-made six inch subs, and, finally - the piece de resistance - a half-gallon of milk.

By the time Templeton had made it to the back doors, he had blown up even larger than his size the night before. His belly dragged below him a foot back and he slowed ever more with his expansion as his paunch rolled and see-sawed across the floor. By some miracle, he was able to push himself through the doors and back toward his dumpster. He made his way back to the hole in the side to climb back in, and surveying it with a bit of suspicion, he attempted to crawl through it. Perhaps he'd overestimated the size of it, or he simply thought he could pop through the other side. Either way, it had been a long shot. His head made it in all right, but his obesity lodged mid-way and became stuck through the hole. Try as he might, he couldn't push past it or pull himself back out, and so the rat hung tightly from the hole like a fish on a line. "What unbearable.. HILP... luck! You okay back there, Stomach?"

He wiggled his legs and felt his paunch gurgle in response. To make matters worse, mounds of trash had been emptied into the bin from the past weekend, teasing at Templeton's nostrils as he met his second bout of hunger. Surely if he ate another bite, he'd never escape the grips of the bin and choke, eventually being found by the humans. But on the other hand, he'd die in ecstasy, and what greater way for a rat to go? And then there was the possibility of digesting his glut and roaming free in the morning, which would allow Templeton to have his cake and eat it, too. Templeton was left with one two choices, and miraculously, he was stumped. What WAS a rat to do?
11412111211111221.title: Making his way back to the dumpster

choices: *he slept well all night and hungers for an even bigger and extra large feast
*a human child See's him and adopted him as her really large pet (more weight)
114121112111112212.content:
*throwing all caution aside he ate all the food in the store, then he started gorging on the trash in the dumpster, bag after bag vanished into his mouth and into his ever growing mammoth size belly and he is growing even fatter, Templeton could feel it and it drove him wild in ecstasy and he loves his new ginormous fat body, he knew the store people are in for a shock at the entire store empty of food but more so at the sight of the gigantic rat that ate it all in just a week and he now admired the thought of getting so much attention*

*Soon Templeton emptied a whole another grocery store even bigger than the last of food and he's even fatter than ever and fell into the deepest sleep of his life*
114121112111112212.title: Eat more! This is a rat's paradise!

114121112112.content:
Templeton's ears perked up. He crossed his fingers.

"Don't you ever pay attention? It's going to the parlor. Let's go already."

Templeton's heart skipped a beat. An ice cream parlor! They were literally delivering him to the most perfect supply of chilled treats he could possible hope for! This was it: his chance to eat without constraint. His chance to become the largest rat there ever was. In his excitement, he completely forgot just how scared he was moments ago. All he could think of now was ice cream... an entire shop full of the stuff! He couldn't wait to see how much of the tasty treat he could fit in his belly; the mere thought made his stomach grumble with impatience... or maybe fullness, Templeton honestly couldn't tell. Either way, he now had some time to digest before arriving at his ice cream heaven. Laying back and using his engorged belly as a make-shift comforter, he drifted off to sleep.

---

Hours passed, and Templeton awoke to darkness. He listened carefully for any sounds but heard only the whirring of some appliances. Peeking out of the top of the box he was still within, he found himself in none other than the parlor... and it was night time! The place was obviously closed: all the lights were off and there wasn't a person to be seen. Templeton crawled out of the box and landed with a THUD on his newly fattened butt. Looking at himself, he noticed he had plumped up nicely... his belly pressed firmly into the ground when on all fours and stood out proud and firm when on his back paws, forming a round orb of a gut that was almost completely spherical and barely sagged. He had grown a double chin, his cheeks had chubbed up, and even his paws and tail were now thicker. Looking behind him, his rear now consisted of two very distinct cheeks, each of which were about half the size of his gut. "Woah... heh. Well, it's certainly a good start..." he said, then looked around his current location and took in his surroundings.

He was currently standing on the counter where customers would order. Beside him was an ice cream fridge, though it was empty for the night. The front of the shop was mostly window, and the lamp post directly outside the shop was the only source of light that barely illuminated the shop. Behind him were a series of soft-serve ice cream machines, three in total. Beside them was a prep station filled with all sorts of goodies: sprinkles, candies and even some sort of liquid chocolate topping. There were a couple of tables surrounded by chairs at the front of the building, and the walls were decorated with a multitude of pictures depicting people enjoying the parlor's ice cream. The most curious thing Templeton noticed, though, was the fact that he was placed in the front of the shop instead of in the walk-in fridge behind the counter. Looking down behind the counter, he noticed a new shipment of ice cream on the floor... dozens of tubs! He hopped down and took a better look.

Each of the tubs was 5 gallons and stood taller than Templeton could reach. Climbing a nearby stool, he opened one and found the contents completely melted. "What the... were they too lazy to put the new shipment in the fridge?" he wondered. Speaking of fridge, he jumped off the chair and looked inside by standing on one of the nearby ice cream tubs and pulling the large door open. It took all his strength, but when it was accomplished he was met with a... well, disappointing sight: The walk-in was mostly empty. It was lined with shelves that, supposedly, should have been stocked with the now liquid-filled tubs that were left in the front of the shop. All that remained were five tubs, sitting on the floor near one of the racks. There were some other boxes laying on the counter beside the one Templeton exited from, but he recognized them as the boxes he emptied while still in the truck.

"Hmmm..." Templeton muttered to himself, "Ice cream is ice cream... but I was hoping for more of the actual cold stuff..." Looking down at his plump body, he thought of where to start...
114121112112.title: The Parlor

choices: ... left the freezer, there's more gorging to be had.
... passed out, looks like he reached his limit.
1141211121121.content:
Templeton walked into the fridge. It had it's own light that stayed on as long as the door was open, so Templeton could see very well in here, unlike in the front of the shop where everything was dark. He approached the five tubs. They were identical to the ones out front, and they were all unopened. Templeton licked his lips as his stomach grumbled at him. "I agree, stomach..." he said while patting it, causing it to bounce and wobble like a rubber ball, "...let's get started."

He began by ripping the lid off of the closest one: a brand new tub of chocolate ice cream. It was tough removing the lid, but by positioning himself on the shelf above it and pulling hard he managed to get it open. Templeton's mouth watered as he dug in, using his paw as a makeshift scoop for a few minutes before becoming impatient and diving into the tub head-first. After tunneling his way to the bottom and surrounding himself in the delicious substance, his eating became ravenous. The ice cream tasted amazing, and Templeton could only think about how this was just the first tub... about just how much more of the sweet snack had been gifted to him. The better part of an hour passed as the contents of the tub disappeared, only to be replaced by the rat's sloshing body. It pressed against all sides of the tub by the time he was done. The melted contents of the container sloshed within him as he rocked back and forth, knocking the tub over and allowing himself to escape the plastic cylinder. Pulling himself out, his gut surged to its full size, no longer constrained by the size of the tub. Templeton regarded himself. He was now completely coated in the chocolate-flavored substance. The cold that both covered and filled him made him shiver, causing his entire body to undulate in waves. The first five gallons had bloated him even larger than his binge in the truck; He was now 95% stomach, and he was finding it difficult to prevent his limbs from getting lost in the blobby appendage. He belched and hiccuped as he walked, and despite movement being quite difficult he climbed back onto the shelf. With some difficulty, he managed to get the vanilla tub open despite his sloshy gut being an obstacle. "Ohhhh... *uurrp* ..one... *HILP-urp* ...down..." he muttered, continuing despite the fullness that was already hitting him.

Templeton attempted to tackle the vanilla tub in the same way he ate the chocolate, but found that his method of tunneling was no longer possible. His body had bloated so much that he would need to eat his way downwards, consuming all the way to the rim of the tub. He dove head first into the ice cream, his relatively tiny legs and tail sticking up in the air while a large portion of his gut hung off the side of the tub and formed a muffin-top over the rim. His progress downward was sped up thanks to his body heat; it melted the ice cream into a sort of slurry that made it easier for Templeton to consume. After 15 minutes and half of the tub Templeton had run into a problem though: he was stuck. At this point he was basically upside-down, hanging from his own gut above the tub's remaining contents. His gut had blown up to the point of being wedged completely into the container's opening, forming a sort of dome-shaped cap on top of the tub whose top reached two feet above the opening and sagged around the container's entire rim by about a foot. Templeton squirmed and fidgeted, trying to loose himself to reach the remaining half of the now melted ice cream, but he was wedged in completely. His belly gurgled impatiently, wanting the rest of the tub. "Urrrr- *urrrp* ...uh... let's try- *HIC* -this..." He rocked back and forth until the container fell over and allowed the vanilla-flavored liquid to submerge his head. Gulping furiously, he managed to finish the entire remaining 2.5 gallons in under a minute. His final gulp was punctuated with a loud SNAP as the container burst outward from Templetons inflated girth. The rat panted; he felt like he was drowning in a sea of himself. No matter where he looked all he could see was his own body, sloshing an rippling thanks to its liquid contents... "Heh heh he- *uuuorp-HIC* ...heh... *gurgle-HIC-HIC-URRRP* ...I can't w- *buurrp-HIC-urrrp* ...wait to see how b- *glorble-buuuooorpp* ...big all this makes m-me..."

Luckily, Templeton didn't have to move much to reach the tub of strawberry. There was no way he was going to be able to get on the shelf anymore, so instead he used his weight to knock over the third tub and open it from the floor. Finding a position to eat from was starting to become difficult, but Templeton managed to get himself into a pose where his head and front paws could be used to tunnel into the container while his ridiculous gut took up space behind him. The progress was slower than the vanilla container since he couldn't melt the substance with his body this time, but after only slightly more than a half hour he reached the end of the strawberry tub. Because of his position with his stomach flowing out behind him, he was able to pull himself through and consume the entire tub with no issues caused by his belly. If someone where to see him now they would have been met with a very strange sight: a tub laying sideways with something large moving inside, and a bulbous furred sack with the appearence of a bean-bag chair flowing out of the container's mouth, completely filling the hole and shaking as the thing moved inside. "*UUUuurp-gurgle-HIC* ...oooooohhh- *HIC* -maaan..." he muttered to himself as he struggled to reverse his was out of the container, "I - *GLLLUuuurp* don't kn-kno- *HIC* -know how long... *OOorrp-HIC-ooorp* ...I c-can keep thi- *BUUUurrp* -s up... *OOOUURP*" Movement was starting to become a real obstacle now, and Templeton had to make use of various tactics to pull, move and maneuver his way to the next tub. His fear of becoming immobile had been completely forgotten, and it was almost as if his stomach was starting to take control over his body instead of his head.

The fourth container was filled with some sort of rainbow ice cream - Templeton was too fixated on his gorging to bother reading whatever name they decided to use. The massive rat found that by rolling onto his stomach he was now a bit higher up than the shelf he had used to open the first two containers. Positioning himself properly was quite the struggle, but eventually he managed to get into his fourth container and resume his eating. He dug his way downward and, like with the vanilla tub, became stuck around the half way point, his body clogging the entrance and the oddly-flavored ice cream mostly melted out of his reach. Once again, Templeton formed a living cap on the tub - though a much larger one this time. The top of his huge gut was four feet above the tub's entrance and stretched past the rim of the container just as much, forming a waterfall of fat that dipped all the way to the floor. Someone from the outside wouldn't be able to see the ice-cream tub at all, just an undulating mass of fur.
