Templeton planned on rocking the container over again, but as soon as he fidgeted the entire tub broke under his weight and he came crashing down. The melted ice cream splashed everywhere, and Templeton rolled himself out from under his own gut. "Moooo- *HIC* -ooore... *UUUorRRP* ...I want- *UUURRRP-HIC-gurgle-OOORP* -m-more..."

The final container in the freezer was odd - Templeton knocked it over and opened it from the side as to not repeat the events of the previous tub. Inside was a very thick chocolate ice cream loaded with what appeared to be cookie dough, peanut butter and chucks of chocolate. Templeton dug into the tub with more vigor than ever before. It was almost as if the rich ice cream awoke something in him, and he found himself less aware of what he was doing and more focused on consuming. The tub seemed to disappear almost instantly and after crawling back out of the tub, Templeton....
1141211121121.title: Five Tubs

choices: He wakes up with everything digested, ready for an even greater feast.
11412111211211.content:
The next events seemed to pass without any input from Templeton himself; he was now so lost in his binge that he was barely aware of what he was doing, only that he would keep going until his belly was satisfied. Loud grumbling and sloshing noises erupted from the mass as he moved out of the fridge and into the main shop where the liquid tubs were. How he was still moving with how big his gut was, and how he managed to get himself into a position where he was able to begin pouring the liquid tubs down his own throat he didn't know - his body was performing the gorging automatically now.

Tub after tub disappeared into his increasingly gelatinous gut. His gluttony urged him forward, screaming to make sure he filled his stomach ever fuller. His limbs started to be overtaken by the rest of his body - sucked into his overwhelming stomach... but as long as his mouth and front paws were still free, he would continue. So as hours passed and tubs were emptied Templeton grew and swelled, allowing his body to control him while occasionally muttering "M-more..." in between tubs and belches.

The final tub being poured into his mouth was the last straw - Templeton's stomach finally overtook him completely. His stomach sloshed loudly before rolling over the entirety of his body - including his head and front paws - leaving Templeton a massive sloshing blob. Having consumed more than five bathtubs' worth of ice cream, Templeton had finally reached his limit. His gut towered over him, it's curve cresting at the same height as the nearby counter where customers were served - and its length and width were both greater than its height. Templeton's tiny body was under it all, and he was completely lost in the greatest torrent of belches he had ever encountered. "*BYOOOOOOO-HIC-UUURRRPPPP* ...Ahhh... *HIC-UUURRRRRROOORRRRUUPPP-HIC-HIC* ...I... *UUUUOOORRP-gurgle-OOOORRPPP* ...ca- *UUUUURRRRPPP-HIP-UUUUUUOOOOOOORRPP* ...can't... *HIIIIIIC-HIIIC-UUUUUURPPP* ...w- *burble-UUUURP-HIC-HIC-HIC-UUUUOOORP* ...w-wait... *UUUOOORRRUP-HIC-gurgle-URP* ...t-to eat... *HIC-UUOORP-HIC-UUUURRRP-HIC-OOOORP* ...e-even... *borp-OOOORP-HIC-URRRPP* ...mooooooore... *gurgle-UURRP-HIC-borble* ...ooohhh-OOOOORP..." He mumbled to himself and fantasized about an even bigger feast as he pressed himself into his monumental over-filled stomach. His gut jiggled and trembled at every sound that exited his mouth thanks to its liquid contents. He closed his eyes and drifted off into a deep food coma, noises continuing to erupt from him even as he slept.
11412111211211.title: Autopilot

114121112112111.content:
"Mmmmmm... *URRRRRPP* Wha...!" Templeton's eyes shot open with a belch and was overcome with confusion. Looking upward, Templeton saw a clear blue sky obstructed by trees. "Uhhh... *OOURP* ...wasn't I... *URP* ...uhh...in a building when I fell asleep?" He also had the feeling he was being watched... leaning upward as best he could, he looked around to the best of his ability. "Is... *UURRUP* ...someone there? *HIC*"

Templeton's heart practically stopped when he saw a tubby red fox emerge from a nearby bush, staring at him as it approached. Trying to get up and bolt, Templeton found that he was completely immobile. Alarms went off in his head: how could he have let this happen? He knew the risk of predators if he let himself get too fat, but he let it happen anyway. He got so lost in his feast that he let his gluttony consume him... and now he was going to pay the price.

"Hey," the fox said as Templeton thrashed in an attempt to stand, "Calm down. I'm gonna help you."

Templeton stopped and stared at the fox for a moment. Still scared, but interested he asked "Why would you help me?"

The fox licked his lips. "Because then you'll help me... alright hear me out. I watched you last night through the parlor windows. I saw you demolish that shop's entire stock, and I'm the one who dragged you out of there so you wouldn't get caught. It's crazy... you were huge. You still are huge! Basically I want to help you get even bigger."

Templeton raised an eyebrow. "You want t-to *URRP-HIC* help me eat more? *OOOURRPPP* Why?"

The fox paused. "...because I want to eat you... but I want to see how fat I can make you first."

Templeton's heart sank. "What? *HIC* Eat me? Why- *OORUP* -why would I agr- *UUUORP* ..agree to this? *HIC* I can... *BUURP* ...feed myself!"

The fox laughed. "If you don't agree I'll just eat you now. Seriously, look at yourself."

Templeton did as he was told and observed his body. His previous meal had mostly digested, leaving him with a body that was composed of more fat than rat. Laying on his back, his front paws and head were now free but his back paws and tail were still buried - only now it was under a mountainous series of fat rolls instead of a massive ice cream-filled stomach. Even if Templeton re-positioned himself in an attempt to free his lower limbs, his rear was now large enough to hide his tail from view and his paws were completely enveloped in fat. Even his front paws - although visible - were not exactly usable thanks to the amount of adipose surrounding them. His head had been plumped up considerably as well, with tubby cheeks that were as big as oranges and a series of chins that transitioned well into his new tremendous gut. Said gut's overall size had shrunk since he fell asleep - digestion and all - but it still loomed a couple of feet over him at its thickest roll and took up all immediate space to his left and right. At the top of his gut - not that he could see - was a navel deep enough that his old skinny body could take refuge in it... a fact that was especially alarming considering his navel was normally not visible at all. Simply put - Templeton wasn't going anywhere. Lugging around what was, essentially, a big sack full of ice cream with his old body was one thing... but now he could barely move his body at all, with his paws being rendered completely useless thanks to the fat that had swallowed them. "Ummmm... huh. *URRP* ...yeah I guess I didn't expect my... *URRUP* ...eating to have this big of a... *ORP* ...uh...an effect."

"Listen..." the fox said, "I don't need to do this. Really it's a service to you. I fatten you up until you reach your limit... then I'll eat you. We both get to be happy. Right?"

Tenpleton sighed. "I don't have much of a choice, so... fine. But I warn you, I'm not sure if my gut even has a limit."

"We'll see..." the fox said, "I'm going to push you to an abandoned warehouse I know of on the outskirts of town. People never visit, so I can fatten you without any pesky humans stumbling upon us. I'm Red, by the way..."

"*OOOUUURP* ...Templeton."

Red grunted in acknowledgment as he began to push Templetons mass further away from town.
114121112112111.title: Red

choices: Days pass, and Templeton's stomach finally can't take anymore.
1141211121121111.content:
By the time they reached the warehouse it was night time; the warehouse was quite out of the way and hidden deep in a wooded area. Templeton had finally finished digesting, resulting in a new layer of fat on his body and a stomach that occasionally grumbled, wondering why it had stopped being filled. The building was quite large, with it's roof being three stories high, its width being larger and it's length being twice of that. Red opened the door and rolled Templeton in, giving Templeton a good look of the building. His eyes widened and mouth dropped when he saw the inside. It was completely crammed full of food of every kind: sugary treats, piles of meat, vats of milk and everything in between. "What the- where did all this food come from?"

"It's all mine. I stole some... found some... I dunno. I've built up a collection over time."

"Why don't you just eat this stuff? Why do you want to eat me?" Templeton exclaimed.

"I prefer my meals alive. I'm a hunter, not a scavenger who will eat anything like you rats. I collect this stuff because... well, you're not the first one I've brought here. I always bring my prey here to fatten before I eat them."

"That's... interesting." Templeton didn't know what else to say.

"Most don't last long before their stomachs give out but... seeing how big you got last night. You were bigger than any animal I've ever fattened... I once stuffed a wolf and couldn't get him to that size. I'm... very interested to see how far I can take you."

"Hmm..." Again, Templeton could not think of anything better.

"Well, lets start then." exclaimed Red, clapping his paws together.

"R-right now? After all that travel?" Templeton was starting to lose faith in his belly's power and wanted to delay the beginning of his end, but his stomach had confidence to spare. At Templeton's objection, it let loose with a loud rumble, an obvious cry for food.

"Sorry, I agree with your stomach," said Red as he pushed a keg that was bigger than the both of them combined over to Templeton. "Don't worry, we'll start with something familiar." With surprising strength, he lifted the huge keg and brought the hole on the top up to Templeton's mouth. "Bottoms up!"

With no other choice, Templeton opened up and allowed the liquid from the keg to flow into his mouth - it was more melted ice cream! Once he began to gulp the sweet substance down, his fears and worries began to leave and his stomach started taking over again. Having Red feeding him allowed Templeton to eat at a much quicker rate, and it took less time to consume the entire keg than it did for him to drink one of the 5 gallon tubs on his own. After the first keg, Templeton had already swelled visibly. His full stomach pushed his belly out, smoothing his fat rolls into a more of a ball shape.

"Hey - a whole keg!" Red laughed, "Believe it or not, most don't even make it that far."

"*gurgle-HIC-UUURRPPP* ...mmm- *ORP* Th- *glorp-OOURP* ...th-that's nothing... *HIC-UUUOOORP*" Templeton replied, his stomach's cockiness getting the better of him, "*UUURUP* It's g-gonna... *HIC-BUUURP* ...take a l- *UUURP* ..lot m-more than that to- *UUURUP-HIC-HIIILP-gurgle-HIC-OOORRRRP...*" He trailed off, unable to finish his sentence.

Red wasted no time, grabbing a second keg. Then a third. A fourth. Templeton couldn't see where he was pulling them from, but he happily gulped down all that Red offered, his stomach holding up beautifully.

It didn't end until the tenth keg. With the last bit of the keg emptied out Templeton's stomach made a large gurgling noise and sloshed over his head, overwhelming him just like at the end of his ice cream binge. "*BUUUUUOOOOORRRUUPPPP-HIC-HIC-HIC-HIIIIIOOOORP-HIC-gurgle-OOORP* Y- *URRRRUORRRUP-HIC-burble-HIC-HIC-BUUURP-BEEEEELLLLOOOOUUUPP* ...yo- *BEEEEELLLLUUUPP-UUUURP-BUUURRRUPP-HIC-HIIIIC-BELLLLLLURP* ...you... *OOOOOUUURP*" Templeton tried to speak between the belches but was unable. Thanks to Red's assistance Templeton was able to push his stomach further than he ever would have been able to on his own. His stomach seemed to by responding to the amount of liquid that was being pumped into it with faster digestion - part of his current gorge was already digested and spread across his body in the form of an new wave of fat. His gut was taller than most humans, pushed so high thanks to a combination of blubber and over-filled stomach, and it covered almost 80 square feet of floor space. "Hey, this is what I wanted to see." Red said as he leaned into Templeton's gut, his arm sinking in up to his elbow. "...but why stop here? You have me now, right?"

"*BUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRROOOPPPP* ...wh-*EEEEEUUUUUUUUURRRPPP*-wha?-*BUUUURRRRUPP-HIC-HIC*" was the only response Templeton could make.

Red keeled down and grabbed the section of fat that had hidden Templeton's head from view. With a loud grunt, Red lifted the section of belly up off the ground. He then moved a couple of the empty kegs under the shelf of stomach, propping it up and exposing Templeton's head once more. "There. Now you can keep eating. Don't worry, as long as I'm here I'll make sure you'll keep getting more until you're satisfied..." He laughed as he turned and grabbed another keg.

So the binge continued. Red must have run out of kegs, because he started stuffing Templeton with all kinds of other foods. Templeton slurped down long ropes of sausages, tore into entire cakes, swallowed fruits whole... it was the longest amount of time Templeton ever spent eating, and he was enjoying every minute of it.

By morning Templeton had swollen to an insane size that was several times larger than when Red placed the kegs under him - in fact, those kegs where now bending a little under the new weight they were trying to support. Templeton didn't bother trying to speak - at this point his mouth was emitting a continuous string of burps, hiccups and gurgles that made any attempts at speech impossible. Templeton marveled at his size. He had no idea his stomach was capable of stretching this much - and the only reason it wasn't stretching even further is because Red was too tired to continue. "...whew!" he said "See? I told you I'd help you." He turned toward the warehouse's entrance and started to walk away. "I'm going to bed. I suggest you sleep too, digest all that stuff. And be ready tomorrow. I'm going to make today look like you were on a diet, heh heh heh..." Templeton's mind exploded with excitement at the thought, and his belches increased in intensity. With the constant quaking of his belly, the kegs finally gave out and were crushed under his belly's weight. Head hidden by his belly once again, he fell into another food coma.

---

"RISE AND SHINE!" Templeton was startled awake the next morning by Red. He was surprised to see his head was free again. This time, though, it wasn't free because of digestion: Red had constructed some sort of support system with some thick wooden beams to hold Templeton's immensity back. "Sorry I took so long," Red said, "I needed to restock a bit..." He gestured toward some new, surprisingly large piles of food. Templeton's eyes widened. "Heh... alright let's start then." Red chuckled, noticing Templeton's excitement. Grabbing some of the new food, another feeding session began.

During this new binge, Templeton thought back to his dream... his dream of various food items feeding themselves to him... his dream of growing larger and larger, out of control and into immobility. He realized how similar his current situation was to that dream - with Red feeding him massive quantities of food, his seemingly accelerated digestion, and his current size being far from mobile. He used to be terrified by the dream, but now he wondered why. Eating was always his favorite pass time and he had already far surpassed his goal of becoming the largest rat in the world... if ending his life early was the price for being the greatest glutton who ever existed, maybe that price isn't so bad. After all, what good would living a longer life be if he didn't enjoy it? Who knows, maybe his stomach really didn't have a limit...
1141211121121111.title: The Feeding Begins

choices: Yes, Templeton says he can hold more.
11412111211211112.content:
Their system went on for weeks. Each day Red seemed to improve his food finding capabilities, because each day he brought an even bigger glut. Templeton was consistently stuffed to such a degree that his stomach was never empty and he was in a constant state of digestion. Every day was spent eating... and eating... and eating... while his body pushed upward and outward. After one week, Templeton had grown so fat that his eyes where forced shut with blubber and his paws had disappeared completely into his thick flab. After another, Templeton's stomach and mouth noises were so loud they rumbled the ground and shook the factory walls. After a third, Red's support beams finally met their match and succumbed to the weight of Templeton's immensity. It took several days for Red to construct newer, stronger ones. In that entire span, binging paused but Templeton still had so much in his stomach that, even after those several days, his stomach was still not empty. Red still made up for the break with an extra large meal that lasted more than an entire day.

After a month, Red seemed to perfect his food-stealing abilities. They celebrated the end of the first month with a week-long feeding session that left Templeton several times larger than when the week started. Templeton had no idea where he was getting all this stuff, but stopped caring about everything other than eating weeks ago. After another month, He felt the left and right-most sides of his body press into the warehouse walls. Another month and the farthest part of his gut reached the back wall. It took less than an additional month for the top of his belly to reach the ceiling.

"*BUUUUURRRRRRUUUUUPPPP-OOOORRRRRRRUUUUOOOOOOPPPP-HIC-HIC-HIC-IIIIIUU UUUURRRRROOO-gurgle-OOOOOOUUUURRRRRROOOP-BUUUUUUUURRRRUUUOOP-rumble-UUUUUUURRRRR RUUUP-HIC-HIIIIIC-HIIIIIC-OOOOUUUUUUUURRRP* ...ce... *BEEEEEEEEOOOUURP-HIIIIC-HIC-HIC-BUUUUUUURRRUP-blorgle-UUUUUURRUUUUPPP-HIC-UU UUUURRRROOOORRRPPP-HIC-HIC* ...cei... *HIC-HIC-HIC-UUUUOOOORRRP-HIIIC-HIIIIIIIC-BUUUUUUUURRRRRROOOOPP-HIC-UUURRRRRO OORP* ...ling... *UUUUURRRRRRUUUUURRRP*" Templeton managed to express the occasion between earth-rumbling belches. He hadn't spoke in weeks, but he felt the new landmark needed to be expressed. Red laughed. "Oh yeah? That's quite an accomplishment. How about we celebrate?"

It took Red a week to prepare, Templeton slept pretty much the entire time. His stomach still wasn't empty by the end of the week, and his belly had actually grown more rather than shrank despite the week-long fast. "You ready to finish this place off?" Red asked when the feast was ready. "*UUURP-HIC-UOORP* ...yeah... I'm... *OOOURP-gurgle-HIIIC-BUUURUP* ...ready." Even after a week of constant gas release, speaking was still difficult. "Let's... *HIC-HIIIIIC-HIIC* ...go." After a week of prep, the feast finally restarted. Red fed with such enthusiasm that Templeton thought he might finally overwhelm his gut. It wound up not being an issue of course, Templeton's stomach kept up with the intake perfectly. Large vats of tasty liquids, pounds upon pounds of meat, enough sugar for multiple schools-worth of children... all of it was crammed into Templeton at such a fast rate that it probably would have taken him weeks to eat what he was now eating in seconds. After a week, his belly went from simply touching the walls and ceiling to pressing into them. Templeton was sure that they would bust soon, but it seemed they were tougher than he thought. Several more weeks passed without the binge ending and pressure only mounted. His gut pressed so tightly into the builing's walls and ceiling that he was beginning to wonder if maybe his gut had met its match. After a couple months though, the ceiling finally gave way. Templeton let out a groan as his belly burst the roof off and surged to its true hight. The pressure exherted by his belly was so great that it sprung the roof upward into the air after blowing it to peices. His gut then formed a masive dome, stretching meters above where the roof used to be and rolling down the sides of the building. Templeton was brought back to his ice cream binge months ago - how it had felt like an accomplishment to outgrow a tub of ice cream... now he was doing the same to buildings. The feast continued though. It didn't end until one more week later when the walls of the factory crumbled, sending Templeton's gut crashing down to the ground. The impact shaked the earth. Red stood back and looked at his work. Templeton was monolithic. His belly arced so much higher than the trees that it almost seemed guaranteed to a human would see it at some point. His belly had actually managed to knock down more than a few trees when it freed itself from the factory walls - he took up a lot more space now that the factory wasn't holding him back. In fact he seemed to be about twice as big as the factory.

Templeton meanwhile was in bliss. His gut smashing against the ground was the best belly massage he had ever recieved. The impact caused his entire mass to shake, sending tidal waves of fat across his belly. His mouth was stuck open, a constant sound erupting from it that was a strange mixture of hiccups, belches, gurgles and moans. It only just occured to Templeton what a surreal turn his life had taken... going from a starving rat to a literal mountain of a rodent so quickly. If he had seen himself those few months ago, he probably would have been horrified... but now he couldn't be happier with how things turned out.

Red approached Templeton's head. "Well, from the looks of things, I'd say my side of this deal is done. There's no way you're going to be able to fit anything else in this body." He patted the front of Templeton's gut, prompting an especially large belch to erupt from the rat's mouth. "I don't know how, but I think it's time for my meal to begin..."
"BYOOOORRRUUUHgurgleHICBUUURRROOoohhhooOORPUURRRHICsloshOOORUUPMMMmmr rrRRUUUURRRPPP-w-HIILPblorpBEEEEEELLLCHUURRRRROOoooooohhoOORRRRRRPHIIIICU UUURRRRROOOORRRRRPP-wait- BUUUUUURRRRUUURRRPPPHIIIILPmmmmUUUUURRRRUPPPPburbleHIIICBEEELLLLLCHUUUURRRP{/ b}..." Templeton managed to stammer out with difficulty.

"...What? Wait?" Red raised an eyebrow. "You really think you can take more? Seriously? Even after outgrowing my warehouse?"
11412111211211112.title: The Feeding Continues

114121112112111121.content:
"blooorrruuuUUUUURRRRRUUUuuupppp-HILP-OOOOOOUUUUUURRRRRRP-ssssssss ssoooo-BLLLAAAARRRUUUUUUUgurgleUUUURRRRAAAP-HILP-HIC-HIC-HIIIIIIC-HILLP-UUUUU RRRRRRRRP-ffffffffuuuuuullll-blorpUUUUUUUUUUuuuuuooooooohhhhhhooooOOOOORR RRP-HIIOOOOoooooOOOORPPP-b-b-buuuuUUUUUUUUUURRRRRP-buut-OOOOOOORRRRRUUUUU RRROOOOOOORRRRPPP-w-want-uuuuUUUUUUUOOOORRHIIIIIIILP-HIC-HIIIIIIIILLLLLOO OOORRRUUUURRRP-mmmmmoooooooOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPP..." Templeton failed to speak, but the confirmation was unneeded. Red could tell he could take even more. He stared at Templeton in silence for a few moments. "Alright, this is perfect.", he said, "I'll be back in a week. I need to make some preparations."

Alone, Templeton suddenly noticed the feeling of rain hitting the top of his belly. He had spent more than half a year eating in the factory and it was now the beginning of spring. It was actually quite cold, but his massive body provided him with more than enough heat. The rain felt soothing as it pelted his over-sized gut; he couldn't move his arms to rub his stomach anymore because of the amount of fat that surrounded them, but the rain hitting his belly made for a great alternative.

"SoooooooooooOOOOOOOOOORRRR-HIIIC-gurgle-muuuuuuuuuuUUUUURRRUU UUUOOORRP-HILP-HIIIIIC-mmmm-mmmuuuuuuch-blorgle-HIIIIIILP-BUUUUUUUURRRRRO OORRUUUP-f-fffffffoooooood-UUUUURRRRRRRRP-UUUURRRRROOORP-UUUUURRRRUUUUUPP -sssssssoooooo-HIIIIIC-HIIIIILLP-HIIIIIIIIIIIC-BEEEEEEEELLLLCH-sssss- ssssstuuuuuffffff-HHHUURPP-HHHIC BUUUUUURRRRP-ed..."

Templeton's stomach ached with fullness. He had a lot of fat on his body, but the majority of his mass came from all the food he had managed to cram into that insatiable organ. His stomach currently held more than 10,000 cubic meters worth of cake, ice cream, steak, burgers, hot dogs, pork, eggs, watermelons... name it, it was inside him.

"I-HHHUUUUUURRRRROOOOORRRUUUUURRRUUUUUPP-BUUUURRRRPPPP-OOOOOOORRRgroo oaanoooOOOOOOORRRP-III d-dessss-HHHHUUURRROOORRRRPblorpUUUUUUUURP-HIIILP-HIIIIC-OOOOORRRRRRRRP-t -t-troooooooooOOOORRP-troyed-HHHHIIIIIOOOOooooOOOOOORRRUUURRRRP-th e b-BBBBBBBBUUURURRRRROOOORRRPP-HIIIILP-HIIIIC-HIC-HIC-HIIIIIIIIIIIC-b-buu{ b}uuUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRPPPP-build-OOOOOOOOOORRRRP-ing..."

In his mind, Templeton went over how large the factory was... It was impossible for him to know his current size by any accurate measure, but Templeton really didn't need a more specific measurement than "big enough to destroy a building". Templeton heard the supports Red built creaking. It probably wouldn't be long before they gave out and his head was buried under his own body again.

"I'mmmmmmMMMMMMMMMMMOOOOOORRRRRUUUURRRPPP-HIIIILP-ssssssoooo{ b}ooooOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRIIIICCgurgleHIIIIILPPP-huuuuuuuuUUIIIC-uuuuuge. ..HILLLP...sssssoooooOOOOOOOOOOORRRRPPP-HIIILP-OOOOORRRRP-HIIIIIIC -fffaaaaaaaaaaaat-HIIILP-OOORRRROOooooooOOOORRRRP-sssssssssssssssssssssoo ooooooooooooooooooooOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRPPP-HILP-HIC-HILP-HIIIIC-HIIIIIL P-HIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIILLLLLP-BBEEEEEEELCH-FAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAATT-{b }BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRP..."

Templeton guessed at his current weight. He remembered Red mentioning on their second day together that he already weighed more than an elephant. Imagine that! A rat that ate so much he weighed multiple tons, and that was months ago! How many tons did he weigh now? 100? 1,000? No, Templeton thought, that's too low... I must be at least 5,000...

"HIIIRPP-I-OOOOOOOOORRRRUUUUUURRRRP-I c-caaaaaaOOOOOOOORRRRPP-HIIIIIILP-caaan't-HHHHHHHILLP-HIIIC-OOOORR RRP-UUUUUUUUUUUUURP-w-w-wait-OOOOOOORRRRUUUURRRP-HHHIIIILLP-HIIIIIIC- t-t-to-HHHHHHHIIIIIIIILLLP-HIIC-BEEEEEEELLLLLLLOOOOOOOORRRRRP-HIC-eeeeeea t-t-t-OOOOOOOOOOOORRRUuuuuuuuUUUUURRRRRP-HIIIILP-ev-v-ven-HHHHHIIIIIII IIIUUUUUUUURRRRRRRP-mooooooooooOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORP..."

Unable to do anything else, Templeton slept while he digested. Fat packed onto his body in such large quantities that you could actually see his body change as he he grew increasingly more obese. Wide, meaty rolls would suddenly appear and grow, causing his body to lose what little form it had and become more gelatinous. The new fat appearing caused his entire mass to shake, making his belly wobble and bounce as it bloated further. His limbs and tail were sucked deeper and deeper into his body and more fat added itself onto Templeton's face, swelling it so it lost it's recognizability and became more blob-like to match the rest of his body. Pools of water began forming in various spots on his belly while rivers formed in the trenches between his numerous fat rolls. His belly-button filled up to hold more than 10,000 gallons of rain water before it overflowed and began rolling down his gut. Just as he thought, Red's supports broke and his head was hidden from the world thanks to his overwhelming blubber. At first it was only a couple feet of fat that separated his head from the outside, but as he continued to digest and fatten over the week that distance grew to to 5 feet... 10 feet... 30 feet... 40... 50... 60...

Surprisingly, no one ever noticed the over-sized rat. Humans just didn't seem to come to this area of the forest and animals were kept away by the frightening Earth-rumbling sounds of his digestion going into overdrive and digesting its backlog of food. By the end of the week his stomach had been emptied, and almost immediately started to groan in hunger. Red returned to Templeton while he was still in his food coma. The rat's snores were laced with hiccups, and every exhale he made was instead a long belch that shuddered the earth.
114121112112111121.title: Digesting It All

choices: Caught! Is this the end of our hero? Possibly!
Run Rat! RUN! That is, if he still can...
11412111212.content:
The more Templeton thought about it the more escaping with his life sounded pleasing to him. After all as the saying goes, he who runs away lives to eat another day! Asuming of course the bloated rat manages to survive the flood of calories coursing through his viens.

Leaning back onto his hind legs and picking up his rather massive stomach Templeton begins to waddle out of the icecream truck. He pauses twice to rest and regain his breath. As tired as he is the rat is actually gratefull he didn't stay behind and gorge himself to death.

The rat makes a bit of a plopping noise as he lands outside the vehical. He stretches and yawns, tired and in need of a good nap to digest the gorging he has had. With a grunt of effort he picks up his bluberous belly once again and begins to slowly, pain stakingly waddle away.

No sooner than he rounds around the ice cream truck the rat comes face to face with a fox.

Lured here by the scent of tasty ice cream goodies this urban red fox has come practically nose to nose with Templeton. The fox is young but has obviously seen better days. His red fur is a mangy mess of knots and tangles. His belly is gaunt and his ribs are showing under his skin.

And Templeton is quite possibly the fattest, juiciest rat he has ever seen.

Templeton squeaks in fear, falling backward in panic. The normally agile beast then struggles to pick himself back up thanks to all the weight that practically pins him to the ground.

The fox stares at the rat in a mixture of shock. Once it passes though he licks his chops and begins to move forward.
11412111212.title: Running into some trouble.

114121112121.content:
The rat taps his claws against his chin. Turned into an un movable blob of ratty flesh by his own gluttonous greed the rat is left with little options. He can't possibly fight the fox, nor can he run from it. That leaves one option.

Talk his way out of it.

The rat gulps, offering his best smile, "H-hey there buddy! C-can I call you Buddy? Of course I can. Now I know what you are thinking, what is a tasty morsal like me doing out here in the road. But before you go sinking your teeth into me just hear me out, ok? You see...you see...um...I am a special rat! Yes! I can grant you three wishes and- "

Before the rat could finish the fox lunged forward biting down at the rat. It's teeth cut through the rat like hot knives to butter. Templeton squeaks in fear as the fox bites again, begining his grizzly feast, starting with the rats fattened belly...

...

Half an hour later the fox leans back on his haunches. He belches up a ratty skull then pats at his now swollen stomach. Licking his chops the fox lazily picks himself up trotting back to his den, "Tasted just like ice cream..."

THE END.
114121112121.title: Caught! Is this the end of our hero? Possibly!

choices: Templeton manages to sneak into someone's pickup truck and gets a ride.
114121112122.content:
Templeton sized up the situation. It wasn't completely hopeless. The young fox did not look very strong. Between super-skinny and super-stuffed, they might be evenly matched. Throwing a quick glance to his right, he saw the path through which he had come, and he immediately began calculating mentally how to get to safety. There had to be something.

Time to burn some calories, he though ruefully.

Shooting the fox one last winning smile, the fat rat turned and ran for his life, waddling unsteadily, but managing to maintain a decent speed on his hind legs. The fox gave chase.

The chase was harrowing, but Templeton was still crafty. He ran around many trees and zigzagged as much as he could around various rocks and fallen branches. The fox did its best to keep up, but the rat was surprisingly light on his feet. Every time he thought he had his prey, the rat would suddenly swerve around something, slowing it down.

They were both running out of breath after about a minute, both of them woefully out of shape, and one was going to give up soon.

Finally, Templeton spied a tree with a hollow section that looked to be just wide enough for him to get through, even with a gallon of ice cream sloshing around inside of him. Taking his chance, he dove towards it, wedging himself into the hole. He stuck fast about halfway through. He didn't waste time cursing his gluttony. He furiously began to try shifting himself through. He could see the hole on the other side was slightly larger, and all he had to do was force himself through this one so he could escape.

But he heard the footsteps of the fox coming closer and closer. With a frustrated shriek, the rat thrust himself forwards with one last desperate attempt, and just as he could smell the fox's hot breath on his backside, he popped free and flew through the other hole, just as a pair of jaws entered the hole and wedged in themselves. The poor fox had wedged his whole snout in and couldn't get out.

Templeton didn't linger to mock or humiliate his predator. He knew that the fox would be able to free itself in due time. He kept running, leaving the other animal behind. He didn't stop, even though his tiny rodent heart was pounding. He must've covered a quarter of a mile, but he soon made it to a desolate road at the end of the woods, and he saw a town in the distance. Panting heavily, he reckoned the fox wouldn't try to follow him through there. If he just kept to the backstreets and alleyways, he'd be able to sneak around until he found his way back to the Zuckerman's farm.
114121112122.title: Run Rat! RUN! That is, if he still can...

choices: Templeton is found and is captured
Templeton goes unnoticed and he escapes
1141211121222.content:
It was definitely going to be a long waddle into town, and Templeton knew it was going to take a long time to find his way back to the farm. He gasped for breath as he made his way towards the mass of buildings. He knew he could find a way in if he could just keep going. The ice cream was bubbling uncomfortably from a greatly disturbed digestion. He was having trouble concentrating from how ill he was beginning to feel.

Then he heard the sound of an automobile coming up the road from behind him. He skittered off the road and watched as the large dirty red pickup truck rattled by, and it came to a stop at the nearby intersection. Realizing it was heading in the same direction as the town, Templeton got an idea. He waddled forward as fast as he could, and he managed to grab onto the rear bumper just as it was rolling away. Yelping in surprise at the sudden movement, the fat rat heaved himself up onto the bumper and struggled up the slippery tail end of the cargo hold. He struggled until he finally found a foothold and pulled himself up and over the back end of the door, and he landed in the hold with a thud.

Relieved to see the buildings coming past, he knew he was well and away from the fox now. Leaning against the door, he patted his stomach and got some rest, hoping to settle his meal.

It was another fifteen minutes before the truck finally reached its destination. To the rat's surprise, it wasn't a shop of some sort, but a house. It was a rather nice-looking neighborhood with many homes lining either side of the street. It was nothing like the farm. Everything was really close together rather than scattered all over the place. The rat couldn't help but be impressed.

He heard the sound of the truck's doors opening and closing, and Templeton realized he would have to hide before he was found. Having lost some of his girth with all the exercise he'd been getting lately, the fat rat found it a bit easier to move around, and he staggered forwards towards the back of the truck, hoping to hide behind some of the debris. He heard footsteps coming in his direction, and closed his eyes and hoped that whatever happened, it would be over soon.
1141211121222.title: Templeton manages to sneak into someone's p...

choices: The girl sneaks Templeton upstairs successfully
She's caught by her parents and Templeton is forced to escape
11412111212221.content:
The footsteps crunched nearer and nearer on the gravel driveway, making the rat cower with fear. He tried to pull old bottles and trash over himself, but he was too big now. His belly was gurgling, upset at once again being interrupted from its digestion, and it began to create a great big ball of gas. He prayed his body not to do it, but it was too late. He struggled to hold it back, but it came up, and he couldn't stop it.

"HEEEYOOOOP!!

The belch he let out startled him. He wasn't sure where it came from. His tummy felt better, but the rest of him wasn't. The person leaned against the truck, making it tilt slightly, and he was surprised to find the cherubic face of a young girl peering down inquisitively at him. He was frozen with fear. She didn't look frightened, so she wasn't about to run away. She didn't look angry, so maybe she wasn't going to hurt him either. Still, he would rather not have to deal with a kid right now. He wanted to run, but he was cornered.

"Wow...," she said quietly. "I've never seen a rat as big as you before..."

Templeton ignored the compliment as best as he could. He had to plan an escape.

"Are you lost? Do you not have a home, little guy?" she asked in a sweet tone. "Would you like some help? I could sneak you into the house and give you my old pet hamster's cage, and you could be my new pet rat!"

Templeton was horrified. Living in a cage with only a little girl to look after him? It would be hell. How was he going to get out of this one? Her hands were already reaching out to him! He was planning to use his long ugly teeth to bite her when she added:

"And I'll give you all the food you can eat!"

Templeton's eyes widened. All the food he could eat? Was she serious? He retracted his fangs and allowed himself to be picked up. Maybe this wouldn't be so bad after all. Maybe he should give her a chance.

"Just have to sneak you past Mom and Dad. They wouldn't like a rat in the house."
11412111212221.title: Templeton is found and is captured

choices: She starts loading him up with snacks
114121112122211.content:
The girl brought Templeton into her bedroom. The tubby rat was too dazed to move from his meal, and he was content to just let it digest for a while. He found himself being set down on the bed, and he laid out against the pillow, letting his gut stretch out in front of him.

The girl proceeded to remove a fairly large cage from the closet and set it up in the corner. She filled the bottom with shredded paper and removed a large metal wheel from it. She set down the cage on the bed.

“Come on, boy,” she said gently. “You can stay in here.”

Templeton sneered at the cage, unimpressed. He didn’t like the concept of being locked up. He stayed put.

For a moment, the girl didn’t seem to know what to do. Then, she smiled and went under her bed, pulling out a box of cookies. She dropped a few inside the cage, right where the rat could see them.

Feeling his stomach protest with unexpected hunger, Templeton’s eyes were blazing as he rolled over onto his stomach and headed straight for the sweets. He hefted himself up and into the cage, and he proceeded to munch away at the cookies, dimly aware of the door closing behind him. He gorged away until they were all gone, and he rolled over onto his back to let his stomach finish digesting in peace.

The girl smiled. “Wow, you like to eat a lot, don’t you?” she said happily. “I’ll be sure to bring you lots of food.”

Templeton smiled at the suggestion. He was starting to like this girl. He snuggled into the paper and let his drowsiness overtake him at last.
114121112122211.title: The girl sneaks Templeton upstairs successfully

choices: Templeton sneaks out at night for more to eat.
Templeton enjoys his new life for several days
1141211121222111.content:
The next morning, Templeton awoke to find himself still in the cage. He rolled around until he was sitting up straight. His stomach was flabby but smaller than when it had been stuffed. He felt hunger calling out to him, and he was determined to see to it he was fed.

The girl entered the room. She was in her pajamas, and she was holding a bowl of oatmeal that smelled like honey and sugar. “I can’t stand oatmeal! It’s so bland! I hate it! Why won’t mom give me cereal or ham or something?”

Templeton simply blinked in response, surprised by the outburst. Humans were certainly fickle creatures.

The girl set the bowl down on her desk, and she proceeded to open the door on the cage, allowing the fat rat to crawl out. He stretched his muscles before heading in the direction of the bowl. He smelled it carefully. Just the smell alone was pleasant and warm. Shrugging to himself, he proceeded to eat and slurp away at it, practically inhaling the meal set before him.

The girl watched in fascination. “Wow…,” she murmured. “You don’t care about taste, do you?”

Templeton smirked between gulps. It was all about being full. His stomach began to swell bigger as he finished it off, and soon, it was so big around that his hind legs didn’t touch the ground. He let out a hefty belch, pleased at being fed.

The girl couldn’t help but laugh as she took the bowl away. “This gets me out of breakfast,” she said with a smile. “I’m going out to play. I’ll see you later, rat!” And with that, she left the room and closed the door.

Templeton belched again, trying to relieve the gas he had built up. Pleased with himself, he staggered back onto his hind legs and staggered along with a loud slosh as he headed back to the cage. His stomach hung so low that it pushed against the bottom of the hatchway, and he ended up toppling over, landing in the shredded paper flat on his face. Pulling the door shut with his tail, he rolled over, pulled the paper over him and promptly fell asleep.

By the time he had woken up, the girl was back, now working at her desk, writing on a piece of homework. He rolled over onto his back and checked on his belly, which was still rather round, but it had shrunk down to the point he could walk normally again.

Hearing the shredded paper crinkling, she looked up and smiled. “I’m doing homework now,” she said. “Lunch will be later. I’ll split my sandwich with you if like.”

Templeton smiled beatifically. He was starting to like this kid. He leaned back and got comfy, falling once again into a deep sleep.

When he next awoke, he found there was half a cheese sandwich sitting out for him, and the cage door was open for him. He eagerly hefted himself out of the cage and onto the desk. He proceeded to messily devour the sandwich, gulping it down as much as he could. It didn’t take long to finish, and he stood to his full height, taking a moment to appreciate how swollen his stomach was before waddling back to the cage.

“To think children used to annoy me,” he thought to himself. “This could be the start of a beautiful friendship.”

He rested in silence for two hours, letting his meal digest, and before long, the little girl came back inside. “Mom’s making pot roast for dinner tonight,” she informed him pleasantly. “If there’s any left over, I’ll be sure to bring it up for you.”

Templeton’s mouth watered with excitement.

The girl noticed the empty plate. “Wow! You ate the whole thing already? You sure love to eat, don’t you?”

Templeton merely patted his stomach in reply, causing the girl to giggle. “How much can you even eat?” she asked. “Wait – I’ll be right back.” She ran out of the room.
Templeton sat up, entertaining the idea that she was going to bring him more food. He felt certain he could fit in a little more. He struggled until he was all the way on his rear.

She returned a minute later with some fruit. “Here,” she said quickly. “Mom says she won’t buy more candy and cookies until I eat more healthy food. If you ate it for me, she’ll think I ate it, and she’ll buy us more candy and cookies!”

Templeton couldn’t refute that logic, and he was grateful for whatever was set in front of him. This included an apple, a banana and some grapes that looked very succulent. Licking his chops, the rat eagerly moved forward. She opened the cage and let him out.

The rat made short order of the grapes, ripping them off the stem, juggling them briefly before letting them all fall into his mouth and into his stomach, catapulting it out further. Then he raced around the apple, gnawing at it until it was all the way down to the core. Then, to finish off, he pushed the banana off the desk, letting it land on the floor, and then he jumped off the desk and landed on one end, causing the banana to erupt from the peel, flip through the air and landed straight down his throat, causing his stomach to instantly expand two twice its previous size.

The girl stared at the overstuffed rat in amazement. “Wow!” she cheered, jumping up and down and clapping excitedly. “You did all that so fast! I may never have to eat icky healthy food again!”

Templeton merely belched in response, collapsing onto his back. His stomach proceeded to roll on top of him.

Giggling at the silly display, the girl picked up the bloated rodent and carried him back to the cage. Too sleepy to care where he was, Templeton snuggled up in the corner of the cage and promptly fell asleep.

That evening, his belly had shrunk back down as it had digested his earlier meal, and when he awoke he heard footsteps coming upstairs. He looked towards the door and saw the girl walk in carrying a plate full of food, causing his heart to leap with joy.

“I managed to sneak away some of the leftovers,” the girl whispered. “We’ve got pot roast, mashed potatoes and green beans. Are you still hungry?”

Templeton immediately threw himself against the cage in a hungered frenzy, nodding in the affirmative.

Laughing at the sight, the girl opened the cage once more. Templeton stumbled out and landed face first in the mashed potatoes, which he immediately began to gobble down with all his might. He finished them, and then he slurped down the green beans, and then he proceeded to munch on the pot roast. They were small pieces, but he was just grateful to have anything to shove down his throat.

“Wow…,” the girl said, now in awe. “You’ve got quite an appetite. I hope your little rat tummy doesn’t explode.”

Templeton ignored her and finished off the roast. He let out a hefty belch before rolling on to his back and patting his stomach sleepily.
1141211121222111.title: Flash Forward to Morning

choices: She starts feeding the extra junk food to Templeton
11412111212221112.content:
The days continued to roll by, and Templeton lived life to the fullest, even from the limitations of a little girl’s bedroom.

Every time the little girl had something for dinner she didn’t like, she would sneak it upstairs for Templeton, and the rat would eat it right up. It was only table scraps, but she found other ways to keep him full. She gave him the fruits and vegetables that her mother was hoping her daughter would eat, and Templeton would devour those as well. This led the mother to the belief that her daughter was finally eating a well-balanced diet, and thus, she began to buy snack foods again. The little girl certainly made use of those.

Consequently, as the days rolled by, eventually turning into months, the little girl began to put on weight herself. As she was feeding Templeton all her healthy food, she was pretty much solely getting by on junk food – cake, ice cream, potato chips and soda pop. The calories went right to her belly.

This finally occurred to her one day when she attempted to button up her overalls and found that the buckles didn’t quite reach anymore, as they were stretched all the way around her bulging tummy. Struggling, she finally managed to connect them, but they were on very tight, and they were clearly straining.

“I’m getting fat,” she moaned to Templeton one morning. “What am I going to do?”

Templeton wasn’t exactly up for being sympathetic. He’d been eating regularly for months now, and he was enjoying every minute of it. He’d grown wider himself, and his stomach was so big around his hind legs almost never touched the ground. However, he’d managed to find a way of walking upright, which improved his overall speed immensely.

The little girl sighed sadly as she left the room, pondering what to do.
11412111212221112.title: Templeton enjoys his new life for several days

choices: The girl starts to lose weight
It's no good. She's addicted to snacking now
114121112122211121.content:
That night, Templeton was asleep in his cage when the door opened, and he was surprised to see the little girl walking in with an armload of goodies. She laid out two cartons of chocolate ice cream and two bags of chips, setting them out for the rat to see.

“I’m getting too fat,” she explained. “So I’ll need you to eat some of this stuff for me. I need to lose weight before mom stops buying them altogether.”

Templeton stared at the goodies that lay before him. She opened the door to the cage and grinned. She opened the lid on one of the ice cream cartons, and after waddling some distance over to it, he climbed on top and proceeded to devour it, slurping and chomping at it, enjoying every calorific mouthful.

The little girl watched with sadness, disappointed she couldn’t have any. She decided it was too depressing for her to watch, so she walked away.

Templeton ignored her and continued his binge. He ate and ate with all his might, devouring the entire pint of ice cream, and by the time he was finished, the carton was empty, and his belly was huge, not to mention chilly. He burped with satisfaction before turning towards the next one. He ripped open the top and began to gorge away.

By the time the little girl decided to come back, she found both cartons empty, and a very stuffed Templeton was munching lazily away on chips. She could only stare in stunned silence at how big he was. His stomach was roughly the size of a watermelon, and his tiny little body was apparently stuck on to the side of it, practically pinned underneath it.

There was no way he would fit in the cage now.

“Where are we going to put you now?” she worried out loud. “We need to put you somewhere for the night.”

Templeton merely belched in response.

The little girl pulled a shirt out of her dresser that she knew would be too small for her now. She made it into a small nest and slipped it into her closet. She then picked up the bloated rat and carried him and his bag of chips over to it, setting him down inside.

“There you go,” she said. “Hopefully, I’ll lose weight after this, and you’ll still have plenty to eat.”

Templeton smirked. With the kid on a diet, he would be getting quite a bit more to eat. He stuffed another bunch of chips down his throat and snuggled up in the shirt.
114121112122211121.title: She starts feeding the extra junk food to Templ...

choices: Templeton sneaks out in the middle of the night
Templeton is too big to get through cage door.
1141211121222111211.content:
The days carried on. Templeton had never eaten better.

The little girl was feeding him three times a day. Every time she felt something was too fattening for her, she would sneak it up to Templeton to make sure it got eaten instead of wasted, and Templeton was definitely not wasteful.

One day, as he was taking a stroll around the room, trying to make sure his muscles didn’t simply waste away into nothing, he heard a lot of commotion downstairs. It sounded like there were a lot of people down there, and he was disturbed by how noisy it was getting. There was laughter and singing and cheering going on, much to his irritation. Annoyed with the noise, he dove into the very back of the closet and took a nap.

He woke up hours later, and he crawled out into the open to find the little girl wearing an outfit he’d never seen on her before. She noticed him in the mirror and turned to show it off.

“Look, rat! All new clothes, and they fit! I had my birthday party today, and all my clothes are bigger now! My tummy has room now!”

Templeton could only stare in despair. If her clothes fit, that meant she would stop dieting, and all the rich calorific food she’d been giving him would be devoured by her. Still, he reasoned, it would only be temporary. If she kept eating, she’d outgrow these clothes as well, and she’d have to give him more food again.

Still, he was very hungry after having not eaten all day.

“If you’re hungry, there’s loads of leftovers,” she said brightly. “Lots of cake and ice cream you could have. Plus the remnants from dinner.”

Templeton’s ears perked up. The remnants of a birthday meal were right downstairs. Tonight would be a good night.
1141211121222111211.title: The girl starts to lose weight

choices: He wakes up the next morning
11412111212221112111.content:
Late that night, Templeton snuck out of the closet and looked around. He saw that the girl was sound asleep in her bed, snoring softly.

Grinning eagerly, he snuck over to the door and saw that it was slightly open. Hefting himself over, he pushed against the door and staggered outside. He had put on a great deal of weight over the months he’d lived here, and he was going to make sure he got plenty to eat before the girl started dieting again.

Of course, the biggest problem was getting down the stairs. He found it was a long way down. Sighing heavily to himself, he proceeded to crawl down as carefully as he could, letting his weight pull him down to the next one. It took a very long time. He staggered all the way down, trying not to hurt himself in the process.
Fifteen minutes later, he found himself at the bottom, and there was an open door into the kitchen. Grinning with anticipation, he proceeded to waddle inside.

First stop was the trash can. He looked up and could smell the putridness waiting inside for him. He climbed up the side of a hutch and pulled open the lid once it was next to him. He found the remnants of chicken, hamburgers, steamed vegetables and various half-eaten sweets.

“Oh, how beautiful!” he swooned. “And it’s mine! All mine!”

With a clumsy leap, he dove into the trashcan, shoveling all the rotting food into his mouth, experiencing a richness and flavor that fresh food had been missing. Humans were so wasteful. He would be making sure none of this went to waste.

It took hours for him to finish it all, but long last, the trashcan’s contents were reduced to old napkins and plastic cutlery. It took him at least ten minutes to heft himself out of the can, and he flipped the lid shut with his tail as he slid down the hutch to the floor. With a stomach the size of orange – which was pretty big on a rat – he waddled away.

Next stop was the ice box. He pulled it open with relative ease before climbing inside. He found the pitcher of punch, which was nearly empty. He managed to tip the pitcher over enough so that most of it could flow into his mouth. He chugged it until the last drop was inside his gut, which sloshed and churned loudly.

Pleased with himself, and proceeded to gorge himself on devilled eggs and mixed vegetables, mostly carrots and celery sticks. He finished up and climbed down, now the size of cantaloupe. He struggled over down to the floor and pushed the door shut.

He found the table, and he climbed up a chair to reach the top. He was rewarded for his hard work by finding the remaining slices of cake. Licking his lips at the sugary confection, he peeled back the plastic wrapping and opened it up, finding it to be just a tad stale.

“My favorite,” he said with a smile. And he proceeded to gorge himself as much as he could.
11412111212221112111.title: Templeton sneaks out in the middle of the night

choices: It's the girl. She rescues him.
It's one of the parents. They freak out.
114121112122211121112.content:
Morning was coming. The sun was peeking up over the horizon.

The cake was gone, and a bloated rat with a stomach the size of a basketball lay on his back, breathing heavily. He couldn’t move. The cake had done it. Even though there hadn’t been much left over, it was still enough to keep him dangerously overstuffed. He was pretty much pinned to the table, and he had had no choice but to fall asleep where he was.

However, the sunlight shining on him got into his eyes, and he woke up, blinking and squinting.

The previous night returned to his memory, and with a hefty grunt, he struggled to get up. He didn’t have much time to get up and go before the family woke up. He pushed and struggled, ignoring the pleasurable sounds of the contents of his stomach sloshing and gurgling. Realizing he had probably gone too far now, he hoisted himself up and made it to a sitting position. His stomach stretched out ahead and towered over him.

With a sick groan, Templeton proceeded to reverse his way towards the chair, dragging his monstrous gut across the table. He made it to the edge, and when he went to jump, he found his body dangling off the side of the table while his full stomach remained where it was too heavy to move. He flailed helplessly for a moment before he pushed against the edge of the table with his hind legs, pushing as hard as he could. After three good grunts, he managed to reverse all the way off, and he landed flat on his back, with his stomach nearly crushing and smothering him.

He managed to get upright again, and he reversed his way off the table and onto the floor, once again pinned by his gut.

He sized up his stomach, realizing he had gone too far. There was no chance of him making it up the stairs now. He knew the humans would be coming any moment. What could he do?”

With no real options, he struggled into a hiding place. He wedged himself under a hassock in the living room, and it was a tight fit. His gigantic stomach was crammed inside.

After only a few minutes, he heard footsteps coming downstairs that were too heavy to be the girl. He heard a woman’s voice in the kitchen, reacting with surprise that the remnants of the cake were gone, and the she noticed that the punch had been consumed as well. Moments later, another pair of footsteps came down, indicating the father had arrived as well.

Templeton listened to the conversation in the next room as they went about their business.

When he woke up again, it hadn’t been very long. He listened carefully to the noise outside, and he could definitely hear footsteps.

Suddenly, his stomach gurgled, and he felt something moving inside. Realizing it was gas, he let out a huge belch before he could stifle it. Covering his mouth in horror, he realized that someone else was coming. He closed his eyes tightly in anticipation.
114121112122211121112.title: He wakes up the next morning

choices: She tries to keep hiding him, but she limits his diet
She realizes how impractical this is getting and tries to get rid of him.
1141211121222111211121.content:
The hassock tilted upwards, revealing the ceiling, and Templeton found himself staring up into the eyes of the girl, who stared at him in shock.

“Oh my gosh!” she said in a hushed voice. “There you are! Come on! We need to get you away from here!”

She immediately reached over and picked him up, which was quite a struggle. She grabbed him around his surprisingly firm belly, hefting him into her arms. Making sure her parents weren't nearby, she turned and made her way all the way up the stairs and back into her room.

Templeton was unmoved by her worry. If anything, he found it amusing. She was so determined to look after him that she was overlooking common sense, which would entail getting rid of him. He just pat his sloshing belly as much as he could playfully.

She set him down in the closet again, staring at him in shock.

“What have you done to yourself? Did you eat everything? Mom thinks I ate the cake and drank all the punch! How did you get so fat on all that?”

Templeton simply smirked sleepily. He let out a thunderous belch before rolling over and going to sleep, pleased that his splurge had been so fruitful. He went into a calorific slumber, allowing all the food to turn into blubber..

The little girl could only stare in horror. How was she going to keep such a gluttonous rat a secret?
1141211121222111211121.title: It's the girl. She rescues him.

choices: Templeton tries to find her house
Templeton tries to find some shelter
11412111212221112111212.content:
A few days after the party incident, the little girl put her plan into action. She put together a large meal while her mother was out in the garden and tucked it all into a woven picnic basket. Taking a deep breath, she summoned all her courage and went to the closet to pull out the cage that held Templeton.

"Come on, little guy!" she said as fake-cheerfully as she could. "We're going on a picnic outside!"

Templeton lay on the floor of the cage, awkwardly peering up over his enormously flabby belly. Pushing the fat aside, he got a better look at her eyes, seeing the childish enthusiasm that irritated him so. At first, he wanted no part of it, especially as she wasn't hear to give him food. But then, he saw the picnic basket, and he could smell salami and turkey and mustard and mayo and potato chips and... all sorts of goodies! Immediately, he rolled over and put his face to the cage wall, hoping he looked somewhat endearing as he drooled eagerly.

"I thought you'd like that!" the girl smiled. "Come on! While mom and dad aren't looking!"

She grabbed the cage's handle and snuck downstairs, trying to keep herself balanced as the fat rat's weight nearly sent her toppling to the side. She tiptoed down the stairs and hid behind the couch briefly.

Hearing the backdoor open, she popped up just high enough so her mom could see her as she came back in, done with whatever gardening she'd been doing.

"I'm going outside to play, Mom!" she said, hurriedly walking to the backdoor.

Her mom barely glanced at her as she got herself a glass of water. "Okay, sweetie. Get some exercise. But don't go too far."

"I won't!"

She slipped out the door and shut it with her foot. She scurried off into the woods behind the house going as far as she could until it was just out of sight. Satisfied, she set down the cage and laid out a red-and-white checkered blanket. Then, she opened up the cage, allowing the obese rat to waddle his way out.

Templeton took in the surrounding area. So many trees surrounded. Not unlike the woods he'd been lost in months ago on the day he met her. Something resembling dread began to fill his mind, but then, the smell of sandwiches overwhelmed him, and he was back in picnic mode.

The girl pulled out a huge turkey sandwich, thick with cheese, mustard and mayo. "Okay, here you go!" she said cheerfully.

Templeton licked his lips and dove right in, ripping it from her hands as he greedily devoured it. He didn't care what it was as long as it was more food for his stomach. It was roughly the same size as him, but that didn't stop his desire. Once he'd finished, he was sad it was over.

But then, he could still smell it. And it wasn't just the crumbs in his fur. He looked up, and there she was, holding an identical sandwich. Blinking in confusion, he looked past her and saw, in the basket, were several sandwiches.

Barely able to contain his glee, Templeton took the sandwich and proceeded to gulp it down in a similar fashion. He ate the whole thing in thirty seconds, and then he took the next one. Then, he took the next one.

There turned out to be seven sandwiches overall, and it still wasn't enough. He practically swooned when she handed him a huge bag of potato chips. Licking his lips, he didn't even wait for her to open the bag. He simply bit through it was his sharp teeth and dove inside, crunching away for a solid ten minutes. The bag slowly began to split across the front as he grew larger from his feast. By the time he finished, the bag was completely split, and he was sitting with a dazed expression in the middle of it.

"Want anything else?" she asked, still smiling that cheerful smile.

Templeton's eyes blinked out of sync before he nodded dumbly.

She responded with a large bottle of soda pop. She twisted off the cap and held it out. He lazily opened his mouth and let her pour the entire contents into his stomach. It churned and gurgled from its new load as it swelled like a water balloon. He gently rubbed it as it swelled beneath him, doubling in size.

Then, she gave him three more.

He didn't know what he had done to deserve such a feast, but he didn't care. As long as the child was willing to supply him with treats, that's all that mattered.

By the time the fourth bottle was emptied, he sloshed and bobbed up and down like a buoy on the waves, his stomach making delightful sloshing sounds. He was so incredibly stuffed, he was certain he couldn't eat another bite and settled in for a very long nap.

"Dessert?" she asked.

Templeton's eyes sprang open. Was she serious??

She presented him with an entire chocolate pie.

The rat's stomach gurgled in protest. He really shouldn't. He mustn't.

He looked at it a little longer.

Oh, what the hell? he thought, and he grabbed the pie tin out of her hands.

Rolling over so he was on top of his stomach instead of under it, he rolled himself over and plunged face first into the pie, slurping it up and devouring the fudge-filling and the delectable crust. He let out moans of ecstasy he hadn't known himself capable. Who knew such joy and decadent pleasure ever existed?!

At last, after five long minutes, the entire pie was gone. Even the crumbs. He licked the entire pan clean, and then rolled himself back until he was on his large rear. He looked like he'd swallowed a fairly large pumpkin. His little front legs stuck out comically as his feast rendered him immobile. He had a stupid grin on his face, covered in chocolate that he attempted to lick off. His enormous belly groaned mournfully, but it was music to his ratly ears.

Mmmmmm, it hurts so good! he thought blissfully. What a feast! Ohhhhhh, I can't move a muscle! This is everything I ever wanted! To be so gloriously STUFFED and BLOATED!

She began to approach him again, and he felt a mixture of joy and fear all at once.

NO! he practically whimpered. No more! I can't resist! I'll surely die right here and now if I eat one more glorious smidgen of food! Unnnnngh, this is the most heavenly hell I've ever suffered!

But then, she simply rolled him off the blanket and gently laid him against a tree so he could rest. She began to tenderly rub his engorged abdomen, humming cheerfully as she soothed his gorge.

Templeton's eyes rolled up in his head as he felt great pleasure. So soothing. Just what he needed. Just what he needed.

"I didn't think you could do it," the little girl said quietly. "I hope you're happy. Mom will want to know why all that food is missing..." She paused, and her smile turned sad. "But I think it'll be worth the punishment."

Templeton was only half-listening. He didn't care for her reasoning. He just wanted to enjoy being so enormous.

She continued. "I imagine you won't be able to move for a long time, not with this great big tummy of yours. I hope you're comfy, cuz you'll be here a while."

Something in her tone set off an alarm bell in his head, but it didn't last. He was too stupidly food drunk to focus on anything but being fat and happy.

"Get some sleep," she whispered. "Sleep off all that food."

At last, she said something smart. The fat rat let out a hiccup, a belch, and then he let his eyelids fall, and he went into a deep slumber.


~~~~~~~~~~

When he came to, it was dark. He was still where he was, still as fat as before. He slapped his belly as much as he could and found it to be still jam-packed, but it had clearly been long enough to get a decent chunk of the meal digested. Feeling some mobility returning in this hind legs, he got himself moving.

Then, the events that led to this returned to his memory, and something occurred to him.

The girl was gone. The basket, the blanket, the cage -- they were all gone.

Templeton began to realize -- the gravy train was well and truly over.
11412111212221112111212.title: The girl takes him on a picnic

choices: He starts pushing things that he can climb up
He tries to find another way inside
114121112122211121112121.content:
She can't just leave me here! Templeton thought angrily. She takes me into her home, fattens me so gloriously, and then just leaves me for dead?! I'm not about to let that buffet go so easily!

It took a few tries, but he was so furious at being abandoned that he rolled himself over until he was sitting on his considerable rump. He got his hind legs touching the ground and then lifted himself up. He teetered awkwardly from side to side like a ship at sea before his belly finally caused him to surge forward with its increased gravity. Unable to resist, he stumbled through the woods. It was a very long walk, but he was determined. He'd make his way back into that house. He'd eat them dry. Ruin their kitchen in the process. That would teach her to abandon him like that.

If he ever got there, of course.

It was difficult to find his way in the dark. He kept tripping over twigs, which required him to get up and regain his balance. The novelty of being so large was, ironically, wearing thin. Still, he reasoned, it would be worth it just to destroy that kitchen and eat everything up. That fantasy of stuffing his fat face with all their food, ripping open the fridge and eating the entire contents, raiding their pantry to mere crumbs, it was just the motivation he needed to waddle awkwardly the several hundred meters towards the house.

Soon, it loomed into view. He licked his lips greedily. The lights weren't on, so they'd all gone to bed, clearly. Heaving and hauling, he made his way to the door. He was just about to go inside when he remembered something very important that was crucial to his plan.

He was too short to open the door.
114121112122211121112121.title: Templeton tries to find her house

1141211121222111211121211.content:
Templeton thought to himself. There had to be a way up to that doorknob. His eyes scanned the yard. Was there anything he could make use of?

Then, he spotted a tall metal trash can. Taking a chance, he waddled over and tapped against the side with his paw. The hollow metal clang told him it was empty. Although briefly disappointed he couldn't raid it for a snack, he pushed that thought aside as he thought about the fresh feast that awaited him inside. He crawled his way over and pushed against it. It was difficult to move, even empty, as it stuck against the rough concrete of the back porch. With a hefty grunt, he slammed his massive self into it. He could do it. Using his enormous body as a bulldozer, he slammed up against it and pushed. He was rewarded with the satisfying sound of the trash can scraping loudly against the concrete. Smiling eagerly to himself, he continued to push, not really caring just how much noise pushing this can was making.

At last, he arrived at the door. A cursory glance up showed him that it was just tall enough. The only problem was that it was far too smooth for him to climb up. Not a single foothold. Sighing with frustration, he looked around again. There had to be something else.

There was an old wooden step ladder lying on its side by the house. Taking a chance, he waddled over and gave it a push across the patio until he finally got it next to the trashcan. Working hard, he managed to set it up, pulling the legs apart and lining it up. It was just high enough that he could reach a metal handle on the trash can.

He was exhausted and out of breath, but for once, he didn't care. The feast that awaited him was worth all this wretched exercise. Grinning to himself, he heaved his fatness up the three steps of the step ladder, then used said ladder to prop the trash can as he hauled himself on top of the lid. Panting triumphantly, he found the doorknob finally within reach. Just needed to turn it, open the door, climb down and start eating.

One problem -- the knob wouldn't turn. It was locked.

Of course, it was. It was probably nearly midnight.

Templeton hissed with disbelief, which was quickly followed by a squeak of fury as he furiously took his frustrations out on the doorknob, jiggling it so hard that he jiggled just the same, making the trash can rattle loudly.

After a while, his anger was spent, and he took a moment to catch his breath, sitting pathetically on the trash can. There had to be another way in.

Then, the light behind the door came on, and the door opened.

Templeton barely had time to react before he came face-to-face with the girl's mother, who, after taking a moment to register what she was seeing, let out a terrified scream. The rat jumped but was too tired from his exertions to do much at the moment but back away to the edge of the can. The mom suddenly reared back and gave the trash can a solid kick, sending it flying backwards across the back porch, carrying the poor rat with it. It crashed on it's side on the far side of the yard, and he landed flat on his flabby back.

He'd just barely gotten himself out from under his flab when he heard a man's voice.

"What's going on?! What's wrong?!"

"There's a big fat woodchuck out there! It was trying to get in!"

Templeton gulped and realized he had to make a break for it. Ignoring his protesting muscles, he ran across the backyard and into the woods behind the house, seemingly unencumbered by his extra weight. It was amazing what fear could really do for him in times of crisis. He darted into the woods and listened as the voices of anger and fear faded into the distance, hoping they wouldn't follow him.

Once certain that they weren't, he stumbled to a stop behind a big rock and tried to catch his breath.

Suddenly, payback didn't seem all that worth it.

He wasn't sure how long he sat there, but then, he heard a twig snap, and he turned around just in time to witness a familiar set of sharp teeth smiling at him.

It was the fox.

"Well, well, well...," the fox grinned. "What have we here?"

Templeton let out a small terrified squeak.
1141211121222111211121211.title: He starts pushing things that he can climb up

11412111212221112111212111.content:
A few foxes hung out in the woods the following morning, just lazing about.

"Where's Jeff?" asked one.

"Haven't seen him since yesterday," said another, dozing contently.

"Oh, you know what he's like," said the third. "Always out looking for a meal. Boy only knows how to think with his stomach."

Then, off in the distance, they heard a hefty hiccup rip through the woods. They all looked up in alarm.

Then, a moment later, another fox appeared with a dazed yet content look on his face. He let out another hiccup. "I'm back," he said simply.

The fox finished rounding the corner, and to their astonishment, his stomach was so huge and full that it dragged on the ground, almost lifting his hind legs up. He practically had to drag himself into the clearing.

"Jeff?!" one of the foxes cried, absolutely amazed. "What happened to you?!"

Jeff just grinned sloppily as his stomach sloshed beneath him. "What a night!" he roared orgasmically. "Never have I seen such a creature! So well ripened, seasoned with the fat of excess and a lifetime of greed... Oh, he was rich, my friends! Ri-i-i-i-i-ich!" He belched again, and then threw himself in a corner, his huge belly swaying like jelly.

The other foxes surrounded him, impressed.

"Look at this gut! How is it even holding all that?!"

Jeff patted his belly and slumped drunkenly. "My stomach can handle anything."

"But... what was it?!"

"A great big rat."

"No! A rat filled you up that much?! It must've been huge!"

"Enormous! Horribly obese! I probably put him out of his misery!" Jeff crowed triumphantly. "Little bugger gave me some trouble months ago, and I thought he was fat then! But nope! He somehow grew five times bigger!" He paused to belch again. "And oh man, let me tell you, revenge is sweet."

The other foxes shook their heads fondly.

"Gotta hand it to you," they said. "You finally found your feast."

The fox patted his belly again. "I'll say I did. This has been a night!" He got himself nice and comfy as he regaled them with the tail of the fat rat. "First of all, let me tell you -- at first glance, I thought he was a woodchuck..."
11412111212221112111212111.title: A foxy feast!

1141211121222111211121212.content:
Seeing as the knob was far too high for him to even reach, Templeton began making plans. There had to be another way in. He spotted a window not far from the door. Maybe he could make use of it. Looking around, he spotted a disused step-ladder. It wasn't easy to maneuver it in his bloated state, but he was so determined, he didn't care how much work it took. So what if he lost a few calories along the way? He'd make them up once he was inside.

After a few clumsy attempts, he finally got it set up correctly. He awkwardly made his way up the steps and towards the window. He saw it was already open a crack - no doubt due to the warm summer weather. Grinning eagerly, he forced it the rest of the way open. Once certain it was now high enough for him to fit through, he heaved himself up onto the windowsill and peered inside.

The kitchen was empty. No signs of life. He could hear heavy snoring coming from upstairs. Careful not to make too much noise, he climbed onto the end table beneath the window and gently lowered himself to the floor.

Excellent, he thought to himself. Now let's see... Time for the meal of the century!

Heaving himself over to the fridge, he pulled it open and was immediately bathed in the bright light. After his eyes adjusted, his mouth fell open in amazement. It was jam-packed full of food and drink, and it was all for him.

Without missing a beat, he climbed up and started eating everything he could find. Heads of lettuce, carrots, raw hotdogs, salami, turkey, hunks of cheese, anything he could get his greedy little paws on. He guzzled down a half-gallon of milk, a quart of orange juice and several shots of coffee creamer. He sucked down the ketchup, mustard, barbecue sauce and even the horseradish. He ate seven eggs raw, ate up some leftover green beans with cold pot roast, and then finished with a few pickles.

Of course, by now, on top of his insane gorge earlier that day, Templeton was now twice as huge. He barely even fit in the fridge at this point, but he didn't care. He simply worked his way down until he couldn't hold on anymore and landed with a hefty thump on the floor.

Unnnnnnnnngh, he thought, rubbing as much of his stomach as he could. There's just so much more... I could leave now, probably... but I want more... and I have access to more... More, more more moremoremoremore... Ohhhh, I could burst. I could explode right here. But it'd be so glorious...

He looked around and saw the pantry beckoning to him.

Curse my gluttony, he thought gleefully.

He was so enormous at this point that it took nearly fifteen minutes to heave himself to the pantry, but he did it. He didn't even care that he hadn't closed the fridge door behind him. His greed narrowed his focus to simply finding more things to eat. He found crackers, peanut butter, cookies, pretzels -- entire bags of them -- and he ate them. His stomach wailed in protest, but he was so blinded by rage and gluttony that his mind forced him not to notice. He'd show that little girl. Nobody abandons him and gets away with it.
