He would eat every last morsel in this house. And when they went out to buy more, he'd eat that, too. He'd do nothing but fatten himself up until he died. That was a good death. Death by gluttony. He'd never accept going any other way.

And all the while, as he fantasized of his endless feasts, his stomach grew and grew. Bigger and rounder and larger and fatter. The more he loaded into it, the more it filled the small room.

At last, after another hour of gorging, the pantry was empty.

Templeton finally felt himself go calm. His stomach stretched so far in front of him that he couldn't see. His vision blurred from exhaustion as all his efforts finally began to catch up with him. His breath was slow and heavy -- so much work just taking in oxygen. He swore he could hear his stomach creaking like an overfilled balloon, ready to burst.

Phew! he gasped. I was beginning to think I'd never get full...

Then, he heard footsteps.

He snapped out of his drunken stupor and realized someone was coming. No, it was too soon. He hadn't had a chance to escape yet! He tried to heave himself towards the exit.

Then, he realized he was now too big to fit through the exit. In fact, he was so dangerously full that his stomach could touch not only the doorway, bulging through it slightly, but also two of the other walls. He'd stuffed himself so utterly huge that the couldn't possibly escape.

He heard a gasp and a shout. He wondered who it was. But then, he sadly reckoned, it really didn't matter.

As the shadow fell over him, and the shocked eyes locked with his, he thought one last time.

Curse my gluttony.
1141211121222111211121212.title: He raids the kitchen

114121112122211121112122.content:
Despite his fury at being abandoned, Templeton knew he was in no fit state to go back to the house. He was far too bloated to get there. The best thing he could do right now was get himself somewhere safe. He was so gloriously fat, there was no way a predator would be able to resist trying to catch him. He needed to find somewhere safe. Heaving himself away from the tree, he began to look around.

Of course, he was now so large that there was no way he could fit in the normal places he would hide. Plus, he'd just spent the last few months living in someone's house. His survival skills were a tad rusty. He knew getting himself completely hidden from view was important. Something with a roof and walls. Maybe some rocks somewhere.

Unfortunately, he couldn't find anything at the moment. This was made all the more difficult by the fact that it was dark. Maybe he should've headed back towards the town. Could've hidden in a trash can or something.

Then, somewhere in the dark, he heard a twig snap. His head snapped in the direction of the sound, and his eyes scoured the dark.

He saw nothing.

Swallowing heavily, he resumed his awkward waddle through the woods. Not much moonlight through the trees - maybe he'd be all right. He kept his ears open for anymore sounds, but none came.

That didn't mean it couldn't feel someone's eyes on him.

Looking back over his mound of a shoulder, he realized he'd covered some considerable ground. He wasn't even sure which was the town was. He thought he'd been walking in a straight line, but that didn't seem too likely now. He'd had to move himself around quite a few trees. Maybe he should turn around anyway. Unless that just gave away to his predator that he was lost.

Then, he heard movement behind him. Swallowing down his nerves, he waddled slowly forwards, hoping maybe his assailant hadn't noticed his fear.

Now he heard a scurrying sound ahead of him. He froze in place, not sure what to make of it.

The scurrying circled him, and then was joined by more scurrying. So there was more than one.

Templeton whimpered as his eyes darted around. Maybe there was an escape somewhere.

But alas, they were closing in on him. He was all set to try digging a tunnel in the ground when he heard a reedy voice somewhere behind him.

"CHARGE!!!"

He heard several scurrying footsteps rustle through the leaves and grass, and his enemies swarmed him, tackling him to the ground.

Templeton screamed in terror as he went tumbling to the ground and was rolled over. He waited for the end, hoping he wouldn't go out crying.

But the end never came.

He slowly opened his eyes, and when they adjusted, he found himself looking into the stunned eyes of a female rat.

"Huh," she said. "Whaddya know?" She looked back at the several other rats that surrounded him. "Ted, you were right! It is a rat!"

Templeton blinked fearfully. "... What?"

She smiled mischievously. "Sorry. Most of us thought you were a young woodchuck. Who are you?"
114121112122211121112122.title: Templeton tries to find some shelter

1141211121222111211121221.content:
Templeton stared into the eyes of the rat that sat atop his stomach. She smiled amiably at him, but there was something in her eyes that told him to be wary. After a brief consideration, he finally decided to take a chance. "Name's Templeton," he said, and he left it at that.

"Nice to meet you, Templeton," the female rat said. "I'm Tierney, and this is my mischief."

"Mischief?"

"Sure! A group of rats is called a 'mischief'. Not to mention we're a bunch of mischievous scallywags."

Templeton looked among the rats that surrounded him. There must've been at least thirty of him, all looking at him with various expressions. Some looked curious, some looked cheerful, and others looked suspicious. It all felt a bit off-putting. He hadn't had to deal with other rats in years. All those years living on the farm had kept him away from socializing. Antagonizing the barnyard animals always seemed more than enough.

"So!" Tierney said cheerfully. "What brings you out here?"

Templeton swallowed before speaking. "Just... looking for some shelter."

Tierney chuckled. "Well, ya got yer work cut out for ya!" she said, playfully slapping the obese rat's belly. The resulting ripples tossed her around briefly as if she were a ship at sea. "Whoooo!" she exclaimed as she got her sea legs. "You got yerself quite a cargo in here, boy!"

Another rat - a male one - came sniffing up to him suspiciously. "Just how did a rat get to be as big as you?" he demanded.

Templeton shrank back from the rat. In his current state, there was no chance of him defending himself should a fight break out.

Tierney swatted the other rat away. "Barnaby, back off," she scolded. "You want answers from this big guy, ya gotta play nice."

Barnaby hissed before retreating back into the group.

"But as he was saying," she continued, sliding down Templeton's stomach to get level with him. "You got yerself some impressive heft there. Must've been feastin' for quite some time to get this big."

Templeton couldn't help but feel flattered that his fat was being admired. "What, this?" he asked, smugly patting as much of his stomach as he could reach. "This is just the end result of a day long gorge."

For once, Tierney looked a little surprised. "You... you got this big in a day?" she asked.

"Possibly less," he replied. "Had the most satisfying picnic just earlier. Lost track of time, but it couldn't have been more than a couple hours."

Some of the rats began to chatter, some with interest and some with suspicion.

Barnaby spoke up again. "And just how did you come by this great feast?" he demanded.

"Oh, I enjoyed a great meal ticket for the last few months. A little girl in one of the houses over there kept me as a pet for a while. Sadly, she was... ill-equipped for sustaining my great appetite. I make it a point to eat my fill and then some," he smiled.

Barnaby scoffed. "Bah! I don't believe a word of it. What self-respecting rat would allow himself to be kept as a pet?"

Templeton sneered in his direction. "A self-respecting rat who enjoys a hearty gorge whenever he can," he replied. His expression turned sad. "Of course, now she's abandoned me. Stuffed me to the gills, and left me for dead."

Tierney tutted and patted his belly. "Such a shame," she sympathized. "Looks like you're stuck out here, then -- in more ways than one!"

Templeton looked at her. "I don't suppose you could help me out?" he asked innocently. "Given my current situation, I could do with some assistance."

Tierney smiled slyly. "I suppose we could assist you," she replied. "What do you require?"
1141211121222111211121221.title: Templeton tells them everything

choices: Tierney wants to know Templeton's plan
11412111212221112111212211.content:
"First and foremost," Templeton said calmly. "I need shelter. There's not much to be done at night. Too many predators, and I'm, as you can see, in no fit state to run and hide on my own. Know of anywhere that could give me some cover."

Tierney grinned, taking a moment to admire his girth. "I think we know a place that could cover you," she replied easily. "But we'll need to move fast."

"Who says we're moving?" demanded Barnaby. "What's to gain from saving this overstuffed creature?!"

The murmuring amongst the rats told Templeton he would need to do better than simply start issuing commands. He cleared his throat and waved his paws for silence.

"Get me some shelter for the foreseeable future," he said, "and I'll show you a place where you can eat to your heart's content."

That got their attention. The murmuring turned from irate to curious.

Tierney looked at him intently. "No fooling?"

"None whatsoever," Templeton grinned. "Just get me someplace secure and we'll start plans tomorrow."

She grinned in return. "Y'know, I'm starting to think we did the right thing not eating you."

His smile faltered. "Er... thanks."

Tierney whistled to the others. "Okay, troops!" she called out. "Let's get a shift on!"

The swarm of rats all got on his left side. He felt their tiny little paws push against his flab. His belly gurgled as they began to push him, rolling him along like a giant bowling ball. Templeton went 'round and 'round, feeling his contents shifting within him, making all kinds of gurgling noises as he gently bounced over twigs and rocks. Definitely not his preferred way of travel.

"Doing all right there, big fella?" Tierney asked from somewhere near his head.

"Doing -- oof! -- just -- ugh! -- fine!" he grunted over every bump. "Oof!"

There were too many course corrections to count, and the fat rat felt each and every one of them. He did his best not to complain, knowing he needed to stay in their good graces, but his earlier gorge kept swirling around inside of him.

"Is it much further?" Templeton grumbled.

"Almost!" said Tierney. "Just gotta... oh."

"Oh? What 'oh'?"

"Just remembered."

"What?"

Suddenly, Templeton felt his momentum increasing. He briefly thought that maybe they were speeding up because they were under attack. Then, he felt the pressure of their sharp little paws slacken.

"It's at the bottom of a hill!" Tierney's increasingly distant voice shouted.

Templeton found himself going faster and faster, bouncing off sticks and pebbles, spinning around until he bowled forwards. He bounced off a bigger rock and went flying through the air. He came face-to-face with the opening to a large hole in the ground. With a yelp, he gently bounced off the ground, and then went sailing neatly into the hole, like a cork into a bottle.

Then, he came to an abrupt stop.

Templeton closed his eyes for a moment, trying settle himself after rolling around too fast. Once the dizziness faded, he opened his eyes again and blinked to adjust to the darkness inside. It looked like, despite the smallish opening, to be some kind of underground cave. He could see a few smaller caverns with a big open space in the middle. It definitely looked ideal.

If he could just force himself the rest of the way in.

Then, he heard several scurrying footsteps behind him.

"Oh good! You found it!" said Tierney triumphantly. "Okay, everyone! One good push! Heave!"

Templeton suddenly felt a lot of pressure behind him, and after a few painful seconds, he popped through the entrance and rolled into the middle of the cave.

The rest of the rats scurried around him.

"There you go!" Tierney said cheerfully. "Safe and sound from all sides!"

"Yeah," said another rat, pushing her aside. "Now what was that about food?"

The other rats all tittered eagerly, all asking about food frantically.

Templeton chuckled, despite his awkward angle. He forced himself into a sitting position, his stomach sticking for out in front of him. "Okay, settle down," he said calmly. "It's at the same place I got this gut from. You probably know about the houses on the edge of the woods."

Barnaby snorted. "Filthy humans moving in," he grumbled. "What would we want with them?"

"Their food, for one thing."

"You think we haven't tried?! Do you know how many rats who've never come back from their foolhardy quests?!"

Templeton rolled his eyes. "Yeah, well, they probably didn't live inside one of those houses as a pet for months on end, did they?"

"So you know how the house works?" Tierney asked.

"Oh sure, know it backwards and forwards. I know when they leave for work, when the kid goes to school, when they go to the store... How to get in and out..."

The other rats all tittered at that. Clearly, he had some takers.

"And you're willing to show us how to get in?" Barnaby asked doubtfully.

Templeton smirked. "Mayyyyyyyybe," he said slyly.

Tierney began to smile as well. "Guess you need some time to think it over," she decided. She addressed the rest of the mischief. "Okay, boys and girls. I'll stand guard over His Nibbles, here. Barnaby, take charge of the hunt. With any luck, we'll be hunting quite a bit less after tonight."

Barnaby glared. "You're giving them hope," he growled quietly.

"Damn right," she replied evenly.

The other rat still wasn't happy, but he still turned and led the other rats out of their home.

Soon, Templeton and Tierney were alone together.
11412111212221112111212211.title: Templeton needs shelter

choices: Templeton talks the rats into following his plan
114121112122211121112122111.content:
Templeton peered down at Tierney curiously. As far as rats went, she wasn't unattractive. He wasn't sure about the way she eyed him, though. That mischievous glint in her eye meant something. Would she be a friend or a foe?

She sidled up to him. "Gosh, you're big," she murmured. "Hate to think how we're ever going to keep you full. Be a shame if you had to go a bit hungry for a while."

Templeton eyed her suspiciously. "Is that so? I wouldn't advise that."

"Why? What're you gonna do? Roll on top of me?"

Templeton attempted to roll towards her, but he was still too full, not to mention sleepy. "Not worth the effort," he said at last.

She smirked. "That's it," she chuckled, patting his belly. "No need to burn too many calories. Now then!" She clambered up on top of his gut and laid down to look him in the eye. "Gonna tell me what this plan of yours is?"

Templeton blinked, startled by her proximity and her directness. "Er..."

"You do have a plan, don't you?" she smiled cheekily.

Did he? Templeton didn't feel sure. His mind raced -- how was he going to get all these rats fed? Somehow, all of them raiding that one house felt extremely stupid. Sure, it would get rid of some of them, but the remaining rats might take issue with that. Then, of course, he remembered all the other houses that stood on that block. Maybe he could swing that somehow.

He began to smile. "Of course, I have a plan," he told her.

Tierney smiled back, putting her head down on her paws and listening.

Templeton cleared his throat. "Now then... how many rats are in your little group?"

"Thirty, altogether."

"Hmmmm... and how many houses around here?"

"Quite a few. Maybe... fifteen? Sixteen?"

Templeton nodded, the plan taking shape. "I think... rather than just take down that one house, we should work on taking down the whole block."

"Ooooh, ambitious!" she said, growing excited. "How do we do that?"

"Well, thirty rats divided into teams across fifteen or sixteen houses... I daresay we can figure something out. Groups of two or three, depending on how far we want to spread out. But I think we could definitely manage it."

"Manage what, exactly?"

"Free food. Loads of it, in those houses. In our pairs or groups or whatever, we work together and steal 'em blind. If we play this well, we'll eat like kings for the rest of our ratly lives."

Tierney took a moment to wipe some drool from her mouth. "Go on..."

"Each team takes a house, and for the first week or so, they simply study it. They can live on scraps in their trash in the meantime, but they need to observe the usual goings-on within their assigned house. When they go to work, when they go to bed, when they eat, what they eat, etc. Once we know their schedules and habits, those teams then move into the house and set up a sort of residency."

"Residency?"

"A hiding place from natural predators, but inside the house."

"Ah..."

"So they'll know the habits and schedules, they'll be able to sneak about and get food whenever they want."

Tierney nodded thoughtfully. "Very clever," she said, patting his belly. "Not bad, big guy. You might be invaluable to us yet."

Templeton grinned. He kinda liked her patting his stomach. "Let's hope so. Your older friend didn't seem too keen on me."

Tierney snorted. "Barnaby's been trying to take charge since my dad died, but my pop raised me well. He'll do as I say. Especially considering the rest of the mischief will want in on the plan once they hear about it."

"Excellent. Then when they return from their little hunt, we can give them the details. When are they due back?"

"Oh, not for a while, I should imagine," she smiled, getting herself comfortable atop Templeton's belly, giving it another rub. "Hope you're sitting comfortably."

Templeton's eyebrows rose, and then he gave her a sleazy smile.
114121112122211121112122111.title: Tierney wants to know Templeton's plan

choices: This isn't right... I should have a proper diet.
This isn't so bad... Maybe I could enjoy this...
114121112122211122.content:
Even as the young girl was struggling to handle her new weight, Templeton was enjoying every pound of fat added to his frame. But what he loved the most was the amount of food he was given. Even if it was healthy fruits and veggies, it would still plump him up. And as the weeks rolled by, his frame fattened up even more. The girl's mother began to feel suspicious about her weight, so she doubled the healthy foods and tried to limit her fatty snacks. But she didn't catch on that the healthy food would go to Templeton, which wasn't an issue with him. Every apple, every carrot, every grape, every beet, every fruit and vegetable would be devoured by him and his figure would still bloat like a balloon. And the young girl would still get her snacks; cupcakes, licorice, cookies, chocolates, soda, sour tarts, etc. She snacked on and on as the weeks went by. At times, the sugar rushes she had would make her seem more active. But in the end, it would be inevitable.

The following month, the little girl found that the straps of her overalls would barely reach her shoulders, which didn't seem to matter since her wider frame and growing belly made it impossible to fit. When she looked at herself in the mirror, she noticed what the endless snacking had led to; Her belly was bigger than before, round and noticeably large. Her legs were thickening up, nearly rubbing together. Her arms were just as thick and would wobble as she moved them. Her face was plumping up, as her cheeks were round and big while her neck was forming a double chin. She was huge.

She looked at a nearby picture of her at the carnival last year. She was definitely skinny then. But she looked at herself and noticed immediately how fat she has become. Part of her wanted to cry, as tears were forming in her eyes. But the other part of her was still enjoying this new lifestyle of snacking, even if it added more to her weight. She rubbed her bloated belly, then looked at the cage where Templeton was napping in. He was obviously larger and was in pure bliss of his gluttony. She wondered why he enjoyed eating so much and why he had no problems with his weight. She looked at her belly, then back at his, still pondering.

She walked over to Templeton's cage and looked at him with curiosity. "Are you actually enjoying yourself," she asked. All Templeton could do was smile at her, grinning as wide as he could lazily. She looked at herself in the mirror again and patted her belly, watching it jiggle. She then thought...
114121112122211122.title: Chubby Curiosity

choices: Templeton finds Nothing and goes home.
Templeton finds nothing and searches somewhere else.
1142.content:
Templeton quickly rushed behind a car fender as he spotted two big mean looking crows perching on top of a nice looking hotrod. The one to the left seemed to have been eating what looked like a small mouse. Templeton kept to the shadows, not wanting to be seen or heard by the two ravenous birds.

“Great,” he sighed, “just what I need when I want a bite to eat.” His rather thin stomach growled with anticipation. He then punched it. “I know your hungry, just shut up and let me think.” He kept his dark eyes looking at the birds, waiting to see if they would take off and fly away just as he wanted them to. There didn’t seem to be a point in going back to the farm for food, since there were no pigs to provide any like in the past. But these birds wouldn’t leave.

So the rat crept through pipes and used trash cans to circle around them in his quest for food. Sniffing the air he couldn’t find much of anything because of the carcass of the dead mouse staining the other perfumes of vittles with its own rotten blood dry stench. He found a crumb here and a crust there, and other little morsels, but none being enough to help him reach a state of fullness. Being the gluttonous rat he was Templeton would rather eat to the point of bursting than to the point of contentment, no matter how much his stomach complained. But he found nothing, it was a disappointing time at the junkyard. So his stomach complained some more.

“Don’t blame me for these scraps! It’s not like there’s some magical place where there’s a never ending supply of food! This is the best we got!”

To Templeton’s dismay his outburst had alerted the birds, who now flew over head and glided toward him. “Aww great, see what you made me do!”

The first crow swooped down but missed as Templeton quickly ducked and made a run for it. Ducking and weaving through garbage and keeping an eye out for the crows. His rat heart raced at the thought of being someone else’s lunch, he wouldn’t have it. After much running he managed to jump right into a broken down cars muffler. The birds flew down and began searching for him under the car, one even flew back up into the sky to catch a glimpse of him. But to no avail. They gave up their search for the rat and took to the skies. Abandoning their hopes at looking for him.

As soon as he heard their wings flutter away, Templeton came out of his hiding place and gave a sigh of relief. “Whoo, gave them the slip. Sure was in a bit of a pickle there.” At the sound of food his stomach acted up again. This time retorting with small bits of hunger pain. Templeton softly clenched his stomach and was about to hit it. Until a garbage truck came from it’s pickup routine. It emptied its contents like a waterfall to form a new pile of trash.

Templeton patted his thin stomach approvingly. “This just might be it.” He said as he ran over to the newly formed pile.
1142.title: The Birds

11421.content:
As soon as he leapt into the trash heap he dug in anticipation at this new smell which tickled his whiskers and stomach in anticipation. It wasn’t a dead mouse, but something that made him want to salivate. After digging through much filth he spotted a bag which he torn open with his fangs. Within it were two half eaten cheeseburgers, some fries and plenty of ketchup bags.

“Finally! Something good!” The loud grumbling of his stomach even surprised him, “your right, less talk, more eat.” Templeton wanted to save the best for last, since he believed he wouldn’t find another meal like this in a junkyard. He started with the fries first, and then the burgers. He didn’t even bother pouring some ketchup on any of them, he just quickly tore them open and drained the contents rapidly, then went to work on the fries. Each on he swallowed whole to reach a certain level of fullness which he liked. Then came the twin delicacies. Each bite of the twin burgers warmly massaged his insides with each drooling scrumptious bite. The crunching of pickles and onions sent vibrations to his belly which had grown slightly in size. The burgers where bigger than he thought. Obviously whoever ordered them must have had a small appetite since they were far from finished.

A shame, thought Templeton, that humans would make such delicacies go to waste. As he finished the last of the meat patty he licked whatever grease was left from his paws and placed them on his belly. It had grown rather plump from the big meal, and his stomach was satisfied. Because of ingesting his meals in in the largest portions without much chewing it allowed him to become full faster. It was a shame for Templeton, that he had to force himself to become full. As he breathed his plump belly went in and out like a door opening and closing. He patted it softly and ran his paws across his round frame which pleasured his portly shape.

“Wouldn’t it be grand if I could always eat like this? Not just stop once I’m content but until I’m full, and even go beyond that. Wouldn’t that be swell?” He asked his belly softly. It gurgled with a pinch of pain that made Templeton wince a little.

He slapped his stomach rather hard, “C’mon, even you can’t say no to that after all the fuss from earlier. Think about it, a place where there’s glorious food by the pawfuls. A place where a rat can truly be a rat. Despite the fact that you’ll hurt. I told you this before, you can handle anything. Moldy cheese, spoiled milk, rotten eggs. You where made to handle anything. And once I take you to this place your gunna thank me. I just need to find it.”

His stomach gave a silent gurgle in agreement. “Now that’s better. So, I’ll just leave this up to you. Should we go home or look for something else?”
11421.title: Saturated Salvation

choices: He goes out on his own, abandoning Charlotte and Wilbur
His conscious gets the best of him and he looks for a word
He finds food first before finding the word
13.content:
Ever since he had lived, Templeton had waited for the moment where he could binge with no limits. It seemed the time had finally come for him, as the fair had been promised to hold seemingly endless amounts of food to eat. And it was through this persuasion that led him to the place he was now; in the miserarble crate of that obnoxious pig, Wilbur.

Templeton looked out the bars of the crate, to see that his patients had finally paid off. He could see and smell the food everywhere, people were eating and Templeton was fully awair of what awaited him...when he finally got the chance. As the crate decended, and Wilbur was released, Templeton crawled out and was just about to make his way towards the main event. But that pitifull spider had quickly reminded him of his purpose for being here in the first place, to find a word for her.

He was sick of it. Templeton, being the mostly selfish rat he was, was getting all to tired of being bossed around. When asked this one last time for a word, he had early promised to make it happen. And perhaps it would. As Templeton set out on his journey, he thought about it for a little while, and realized he could simply set out here and never return. The only cost of which would be the burden of remembrence that he had broken his oath. He snickered at this thought, and looked out at the food filled landscape before him. His mouth watered, and he decided what to do.
13.title: To break an oath

choices: Look for a word to bring back
Continue to gorge and forget about the word
131.content:
Being meters away from the gorging of a lifetime, the temptation was too much for Templeton to handle. Hiding and spying might have been one of his hobbies back on the farm, but eating was his true passion of passions. He warned her didn’t he, he wouldn’t spend all his time running errands. Never had he received a single thank you for his favors, never a congratulatory pat, nothing. The ingrates would be getting what they deserved. His stomach gave a loud rumble, as if urging him to stop standing around and get to the task at paw already. Giving one last devilish grin back at the pen, Templeton locked away his guilt (if temporary), and set off for what was to be the pinnacle of his ratty life.

Templeton waited for awhile so that the crowds would disappear. After the fair grounds were empty of danger and distraction, Templeton set off to work. His thrill began at the hotdog stands. Easily climbing the carts he spotted a treasure trove of hotdogs and buns; along with ketchup, mustard, onions and tomatoes. Quickly, he shoved everything within the cart, and jumped in; eating everything by the pawfuls. Over 10 bags of hotdogs and buns were devoured in minutes, and out came a bloated rat with a look of satisfaction on his face.

Licking his whiskers for drips of grim, he waddled off to more stands. Cotton candy, funnel cakes, ice cream, lemonade, soda, mounds of food were shoved into his ever expanding stomach. The more he ate, the more difficult it began to climb onto the stands for the food.

With the strenuous task of climbing tiring him out, Templeton waddled toward the leg of a table and rest his now larger back against it. Allowing his legs to drop down, they were nearly lost under his bloated bellies visage. Groaning and bubbling, the rat patted his glorious swell contently, causing it to slosh and gurgle in his wake.

“Oh, this is the life,” the rat sighed, squeezing the soft flesh and fur, “no more orders, no more worries, why didn’t I come here sooner.”

Noticing an unfinished pretzel near him, he pulled it closer with his tail and rested it on his plump belly with a slosh. Casually taking his time in savoring it, looking around to see what his next course of action would be. Although this was the most he had ever eaten in his life, his belly could’ve been satisfied a lot more. It would become a personal goal that he’d consume as much as he could without stop. Suddenly it hit him. THE TABLE! He was under what could be a dinner for a family of ten.

Struggling to climb up the leg and onto the counter, Templeton drooled in amazement. Burgers, fries, cake, more ice cream and hotdogs, and a stack of chicken sandwiches, all seemingly untouched by human hands. Giving his belly a hard slap, which sloshed furiously in excitement, he ran as quick as his bloated body could take him to the feast before him. Chunks of meat and bread were ripped off each burger, bouncing the rats belly with every mouthful. While on the last burger, Templeton stuffed as much fries down his throat as he could; even resorting to shoving his paws down his throat just to get the food down. He winced as he swallowed, then exhaled as the pain passed. When the burgers and fries were finished he worked on the ice cream and hotdogs. His belly gurgled ominously toward the task before him, but with a few reassuring words and patting, he continued. Quickly, Templeton slid hotdog after hotdog down his throat, not even bothering to chew. The more he did this, the more his continuously growing belly started to groan and glop at the continuous amount of food being fed. His pudgy waist began growing larger than his legs, which made it hard to stand upright. Grabbing the bucket of ice cream, he stuck his head within it; sucking up the melted contents like a vacuum. Sticky strawberry, vanilla, and chocolate made his fur messy as he pigged out. When the contents where done, he attempted to stand upright. His now enormous, cavernous belly of indigested gorge, wobbled around like jello. His round behind, unable to contend with his over gorged mass, caused him to run forward in an attempt to gain balance. Thankfully, while giggling due to his clumsy size, his mouth was wide open to receive a large mound of cake. Closing his mouth and swallowing, he continued glutting down the cool frosting and strawberry filling. Quickly, the cake was done, leaving Templeton to lay on his enormous body. Letting out a hiccup, the rat felt woozy and felt at his stomach. Now the size of a bowling ball, he giggled further at how little he was able to touch. But within the soft mass he was able to feel all the hotdogs and solid objects he had glutted. But it wasn’t over yet. There was still the chicken sandwiches. Bloated beyond comprehension, he spotted the plate not too far from him. Licking his lips, he did the arduous task of crawling forward; his ever groaning belly, sloshing along the way. Letting out a long breath, the long travel was finally over. Giving his belly a few more inspirational pats, the undulating fat gave him the go ahead. And so, as fast as his paws would allow him, he ate and ate and ate. Growing evermore fatter. With a few more sandwiches to go, he pondered if eating lying on his back would be easier than eating lying on his belly. Not thinking it made any difference, Templeton rolled on his back. His belly burbling and sloshing loudly, until he did a complete 180. Due to his titanic size, his stomach sloshed on top of him like a loved one wanting to cuddle. Smiling at his large bellies yearn for attention, he pushed it away ever slowly, and continued, until he was finished within half an hour.

Templeton, a monstrous gray orb, laid on the plate, too engorged to move. What had been a gorging of a lifetime now caused him a slight amount of grief, if not pleasure. Letting out a anguished moan, he placed his small paws on the blubbery ball of adipose tissue.

“Hic…HILP!! Never have I dreamed of…hic…HILP!! Getting so full. The goose was right…hic…HILP!! But my stomach feels like its gunna explode.”

Suddenly, he felt something shake at the pit of his belly. His fat jiggled about as all the nights contents began bubbling and churning. Templeton gave a few soothing pats and rubs; hopping it would stop the churning. But it didn’t, it just grew louder. Finally, whatever had been churning went up to his chest, then to his throat. From fear of regurgitating, he held his mouth. But the force was too much.

*BURP*

The expel of gas immediately calmed him down. But not only that, it freed up space in his stomach, and with space left, there must be food to fill it. Or, now that he had enjoyed himself, perhaps he could return to Wilbur and Charlotte with a word. Of course, much time had already passed, and Charlotte wouldn’t be too happy with him taking so long; let alone his feeding taking priority over the pigs life. Decisions decisions.
131.title: He goes out on his own, abandoning Charlotte an...

choices: Take a nap and eat in the morning or later on
1311.content:
Having splurged himself as he pleased, Templeton decided to complete his original task. Not that he cared about the spider and pig now that he had a seemingly endless utopia of food to feast on, he would miss his rattie home back on the farm; and who could forget those humble slops, which nourished him for a long time. It would also give him a chance to show off his glorious transformation. That he, Templeton, had returned twice, nay, thrice the rat he left as. Everyone will be in awe over his blubbery visage.

Shaking his massive swell happily, he attempted to stand up. But with each attempt, his burbling, over gorged corpulence would quickly push him back down.

“C’mon now,” he huffed, “work with me. There’s still much more out there to glut.”

As if understanding him, all his nights gluttony sloshed and rolled Templeton forward. Then, on the brink of tipping over, his body became balanced, his tiny footpaws still miraculously touching the floor, and allowing him to move. Jiggling his blubbery frame with delight, he resumed with his quest for food, and a word.

* * * * *

Throughout the fair grounds, delicious treats were in plentiful supply. While looking for the word, Templeton had consumed two donuts, a bag of chips, a slice of cheese, a box of curly fries, and half a cup of soda; growing all the more fatter, and loving every new inch. It was becoming apparent that he was doing more eating than word searching, and pondered on how to improve his searching efforts.

Resting against a trash can, he rested a paw on the soft, furry tub of lard that was his belly, and scratched his chin. Having continuously gorge himself without stop, his belly growled and sloshed louder than his thinking.

“Now, what would be a good place to look for a word?” While he said this, his brain asked something different. What was a good place to look for more food? Hah, thinking, a pointless waste of time. His all consuming stomach would do all the thinking for him.

“So, where do you think I should go,” he asked his globe like belly, giggling as he sloshed around his feast with every playful slap. It was more food then he could think of, all rolling around in a massive cavern of blubber and digestive liquid.

The groaning gray balloon spoke in a language Templeton could actually understand.

“To the vegetable judging stand it is.”

His belly, growling in excitement, sloshed loudly as he pulled himself forward, and as he dragged his bulk across the fairgrounds.

Thankfully, the fruit and vegetable judging section wasn’t too far off, so the task of moving didn’t deplete much of the rats precious calories. What did however, was climbing the stand. Determined and with enough motivation to fill his stomach 10 times over, he managed to hoist himself up, thanks to his claws and the long table cloth hanging down to him. It was miraculously enough to sustain his weight-without him pulling it off. There truly must’ve been something up there heavier than him.

And there certainly was. There in front of his eyes was the largest squash, pumpkin, and potatoes Templeton had ever seen; truly deserving of first prize. Plus, there were boxes with writing conveniently placed within paw reach. Using both paws to shake his abundant amount of belly, he thanked his body for helping him find the way, and got straight to repaying it.

He began with the potatoes, each one about the size of his bloated belly when he first began the night’s feast after abandoning Charlotte and Wilbur. Grabbing the first one in the basket, he took a massive chomp. As the juicy succulent chunks of the spud slithered down his throat one by one, he squinted his eyes; oblivious to the fact that each massive swallow was a little more than his throat could handle. But he muscled his way through the pain, the satisfying sound of every chunk glopping and bouncing in the pit of his titanic belly. When he couldn’t reach for another potato, he climbed into the basket, then truly let himself go. His waist and abdomen growing with every slurp, every content swallow.

When he was finished, he climbed out, a gray obese ball of fur and fat, with a sloppy grin slapped on his face. As his grotesquely large belly lightly grazed the table top, his large body erupted in a symphony of sloshing and squelches. Hiccupping loudly from his victory, he continued his gorging. His plump arm muscles straining to drag his massive girth.

Once he moved up to the squash, he took a large bite. It was soft, squishy, and filling, just like his belly. Suddenly, he stuffed his head within the hole he made, and attempted to eat it from the inside out. All ready at the brink of fullness, he was shocked at how much his monumentally enormous gut could hold. While mouthful after glorious mouthful was shoved down his throat, he thought about all he’d eaten. It must’ve been enough to feed a family for a week, maybe longer. He was truly proud of his gluttonous achievement; this was what he lived for. Being an enormously fat greedy rat couldn’t of been better.

After unbelievably feasting the inside of the giant squash, he finished off the outside in a similar fashion. Licking the flavor from his lips, and holding in a massive hiccup, he swallowed the last of the remaining fruit, and looked to his belly. Slowly, the largest most pleasurable grin he ever had formed across his face. It was so much, and felt like too much for him to handle. So tight, round, and incredibly big. His stomach now seemed to make up 91% of his body; his arms, legs, tail and head making up 1.5% each. His arms, large and flabby, unable to feel any bone when he squeezed them. His legs, lost under his incredible burbling gut. His head, physically merging with the other 91% of his body. His tail, forgotten and probably would never be seen again. And then, his vociferously groaning belly, the epitome of over eating. The tank of lard swayed to and fro hypnotically, sloshing with the slightest movement; all of it pure glorious fat. Lifting up his arms, Templeton allowed them to slap the squishy part of his body that used to be his chest, which was now part of his gigantic stomach.

Sending a jiggling wave throughout his body, the rat’s entire stomach began to collapse like an avalanche. With too much fat for his small paws to push back, the weight of his belly crushed him for a moment, then toppled him backwards; continuing to happen again, and again, and again. Until his fat back pressed against something, sending all the fat in front of him to smother against his muzzle. Making him smile from feeling all the warm fluffy adipose.

Straining his head to look behind him, he found it was the pumpkin that stopped him. Then, looking back to his blob like groaning swell, he shook it with his paws, which slowly sent undulating waves pleasurably coursing throughout his plump body.

“You planned this out didn’t you,” he asked his gut, which loudly gurgled in response. “This is the hic…HILP!!! Final thing for tonight. I hic…HILP!!! Want to show off to the pig and the hic…HILP!!! Spider.” Understanding, his stomach caused him to erupt in a gaseous belch. Then, he took the first bite.

The pumpkin being as big as it was, took a lot of eating. So much eating not even Templeton was up to finishing it off. But it was fine, he got the word he was looking for from one of the boxes which read, “come to humble hanks! We’ve got the largest crops around.” Humble, a good word, one the spider would probably like. But, that’s if he could get back to her.

Having been much more eating than he thought, the gargantuan rat was only able to finish off half of it. Still, he relaxed with his back against it, allowing his glorious achievement to flow like jello. He spent about 10 minutes, stroking and squeezing his large mound of fat. It was no question now that he would literally burst if he would take one more bite. The pain excited him, but also saddened him. Only because he was now reduced to rubbing his claws across such a plentiful amount of belly, and was afraid that the slightest slap would cause it to rupture. He was even afraid to snuggle it with his muzzle lest he explode it. Everything, so tight and tense. He didn’t know what to do. He had already grown to ungodly proportions, and now he currently could eat. It was as if he purpose for coming had now left him. But at least he has the word. Now comes the decision for what to do.

Should he take the word back and be scolded for his feasting and coursing. Should he take a nap and sleep if off. Or, should he take the bold risk and finish the pumpkin, regardless of the consequences. With his stomach now resting and out of commission, making his own choice seemed hard. Rubbing as much of his body as he could, he made his decision…..
1311.title: Look for a word to bring back

choices: Rest and glut the next night
Forget about Resting and glut right now
13111.content:
Looking at the pumpkin, then to his quivering, bubbling tub of lard, Templeton decided to return the word after all. Caressing the thick ball of fur and fat, he moaned with pleasure. Over filled--over stuffed more than his simple mind could think about, the best thing he thought of (or his stomach rather) was to rest back at the pen and allow his stomach to digest the ungodly amount of food resting safely inside him.

Attempting to roll over, Templeton huffed and puffed to move himself into a crawling position. Unfortunately, his waist was so large and stomach so big that he was only able to stay in a lying down position. Placing both paws on his mountainous belly, he began shaking and sloshing it around, the food bubbling and churning all over his cramped organs. Much of the fat around his plump chest remained in a state of stasis. Gathering momentum, his belly slowly shifted to his side; causing the obese rat to giggle as his indigested gorge massaged his insides, until he was slightly lifted off the ground. Using both arms and one footpaw on the ground, leaving the other to dangle weightlessly off the ground, he pulled himself. Grunting and kicking his body across the table. Then landing with a deafening squelch that popped his ears. Waiting a few seconds to gather himself, he pressed onwards with word in mouth while grinning of his accomplishment and sighing in ecstasy at having glutted so much. With every slosh, his grin would grow wider and wider.

* * * * *

As time past, daylight still a long time from coming, Templeton slowly grew accustomed to his tremendous weight. Dragging his way across the fair was more exercise than he was used to, which burn plenty of calories and digested food quicker. Needless to say, with a little more room in his belly, he waddled off here and there for more food. Corndogs, cotton candy, funnel cakes, popcorn, pie, and chicken legs were continuously devoured by the insatiable rat; growing a bit fatter as time progressed. Most of the added weight went straight to his rump, which helped to tip him over into a standing position. And miraculously, Templeton was able to walk on his virtually non existent legs. Helping him to get to the pen faster and easier.

With his body jiggling, bouncing, and sloshing loudly along the way, he ran his paws across as much of his wide, blubbery frame as he could before he took his nap.

Reaching the plank of the pen, his chubby face peeked over with dazed drunken eyes and a crooked grin. “Hic…HILP!!! I’m back.”

The pig and spider weren’t the least bit happy he was. Charlotte’s many eyes glared at each glared at him with a fiery hatred that would make any other rat cringe. But not Templeton, who was too fat to care.

“Where have you been! Has it not occurred to you that Wilbur’s life is at stake, and yours!”

Pfft, not anymore, thought the rat, typical nagging Charlotte.

In an attempt to lift himself over the board, the woodwork gave a loud snap under the rat’s weight. Sending him face first to the ground and revealing his over filled, obese figure which jiggled furiously.

Both the pig and spider gasped, but Charlotte was the only one who spoke. “Are you kidding me! Is this what you’ve been up to all night!”

Templeton dragged his bloated body to the nearby crate. “I could’ve Hic…HILP!!! stayed out longer you know, and neer Hic…HILP!!! Come back.”

Shocked to have realized such a thing, the spider pursued Templeton. “You fat, selfish, arrogant, sphere of adipose! Your too bloated to understand your own words. You’re a disgusting sight. So, tell me. If you could’ve abandon us, what gave you the audacity to come back?”

Once in a comfortable position with his back to the wooden corner, Templeton slapped both paws on his globe like belly; most of it sliding to his muzzle, which he then nuzzled his fat body with. Grinning through barely opened eyes, the fat rat slid the cut out cardboard across his belly; a pleasuring sensation flowing through him as soft fat ran past his digits.

Noticing the cardboard, Charlotte swung over to the gray mountain, causing an earthquake of giggles to ripple through the rats body as she landed. As she crawled down further, she read out the words, and with her numerous eyes looked at the euphoric rat in surprise.

“You actually came back with a word?”

Templeton didn’t open his eyes. “Hic…HILP!!! Your welcome, Hic!”

Charlotte said nothing more, just the way the rat wanted it. With his large back resting peacefully in the corner, he patted his belly one more time. The sickening sloshing and burbling like music to his ears. And then, he drifted into a deep slumber. Dreaming of reliving this glorious night all over again.
13111.title: Take the word back

131111.content:
Night had fallen once again, bringing with it an empty food loaded fair once more. Stirring from his slumber at last, Templeton sniffed out all the delectable goodies from the pen. Wobbling his fat around to free his legs, he then stretched his limbs for the night ahead. The over abundance of calories the previous night had converted into soft fat throughout Templeton’s body. Giving himself a few smacks to his belly, he rolled over and out the pen, eager to resume his glutting once more.

“Those two wont be seeing me for awhile,” whispered Templeton to a sleeping Charlotte and Wilbur. “Wont they be surprised by how much I’d change.”

Not wasting another moment waiting, Templeton pulled himself over the wooden plank of the gate, landing with a squelch, and waddled into the food loaded fairway. Finding small pile after small pile, he stuffed himself continuingly, patting his hefty belly once finishing one. Then pulling himself onto a table, he found many ingredients used to make a sandwich. Opening the bag of bread, he slapped the first slice on the floor and proceeded to pile it high with meat, mayonnaise, lettuce, tomato, and cheese. Not bothering to use the peanut butter or jelly jars, he just glutted both down, adding to the plush sloshing goodness of his belly. Using as much ingredients as he could and eating the leftovers, Templeton took his first munch of the massive meal towering him. More than delicious, he continued his relentless glutting, until he sat by himself, patting a massive belly spilled across the table in front of him.

Waddling over to a nearby trash can, he landed inside with a squelch, and in under thirty minutes knocked it over, with all of it’s previous occupants sloshing and glorping within his cavernous swell. Doing the same with two more trash cans and disposing of the piles of food sitting atop of the tables, the voracious rat bloated further to his delight. So much that he had to transition from walking to pulling himself as his belly lifted him higher off the ground, neutralizing his legs. Being of no consequence to him, he gradually swallowed whole a hotdog soaked to the brim in grim and topped with mustard, then afterwards finished the mustard jar.

The fair, where a rat can be a rat without any worry or danger. The only consequence being, that by the end of the day (or month for that matter) mobility might not be feasible. It was a goal Templeton planned on reaching, becoming fatter than any rodent living. Slowing down due to his weight however, the rat found a pile of cups, wrappers, and discarded trays and pans to rest against, all the while stuffing himself with further sustenance.

Wolfing down a slice of pizza, he gave a hefty smack to his titanic sloshing, burbling stomach. “*Hic* If I knew a fair were this bountiful *Hic*, I would’ve came here a long time ago.” Wolfing down another slice, he grabbed a small box of juice and quaffed down the rich grape flavored drink. “I think the goose *Hic* always knew about this place, and only *Hic* told me about it so I’d come with *Hic* Charlotte and Wilbur.”

Pulling himself slightly forward, he lifted a pan of funnel cake, rested it on his belly, and funneled as much as his mouth could hold, finishing it in no time flat, ready to grab the next thing to glut. “*Hic* No one cares about ‘ol Templeton *Hic* do they. Except you,” he held a hefty portion of pie eye level, “You care about me don’t you?”

“*Hic* Yes Templeton,” said the rat making his voice a higher pitch, “I appreciate *Hic* you.”

The rat smiled his sloppy smile, and kissed the pie, “I appreciate you too.” Without warning, he violently shoved the slab of pie into his mouth, stuffing his paws down his throat to get it all down. Jiggling his rippling stomach, Templeton laughed. “Now you could appreciate me with all the others, ahahaha.” Templeton, the gruesome glutton, the merciless muncher. To him, nothing edible on the planet was safe from his maw.

Finishing what was left around him, he rolled onto his fantastically over gorged mass and proceeded toward further gluttony. Making melon rinds out of melons and cans out of cantaloupes, he mused as to where some significant eating can be had. Already overfull and overfed many times over, the fair experience was a limited one, and he wanted to milk it for all the food it had. Speaking of which, he disposed of a few warm milkshakes scattered besides cheese burgers and French fries. The salty snacks forced him to guzzle down a few cups of soda, as well as take a bottle of ketchup to go with the fries.

About two hours passed and Templeton was still glutting himself with absolute abandon. Pulling his continuously bloating body around proceeded to grow more difficult, but with resilience Templeton fought on. The gorging had greatly slowed down compared to earlier in the night, but only because Templeton’s body limited him, not due to the rat’s tiring. Having surpassed the capacity of fullness, Templeton psychologically remained hungry. So long as there was another morsel to feed him, it’d be crammed within his gigantic sloshing blob like swell.

Finishing the remains of a watermelon for the third time that night, he rolled his back onto three bananas stuck together. His tremendous weight catapulted each rich fruit into the air, and shifting his blubbery mass skillfully about, he caught each one in his mouth with a sickening squelch, adding more weight to his stomach. He became a mere appendage to it, head, limbs and tail all at his belly’s mercy. And truthfully, Templeton couldn’t be happier.

Moaning in pleasure, Templeton stroked as much as his lard filled expanse of fur allowed him to. “So…much…food *Hic*. Don’t…know…*Hic* if-I-can…glut…any…more.” Testing this theory, he grabbed at a nearby sausage and shoved it down his blubbery cheeks; his neck no longer present, but fusing with his vociferously sloshing, gurgling mid section. “Well…maybe I *Hic* can…still…glut some, hehehe *Hic*.”

He might’ve, but it would be a matter of whether he could still drag himself with so much food already fattening him to an obscene extent. Still, the thought of further gorging delighted him, as it was his dream to be the fattest rat in the world. “I can…do *Hic* this. My *Hic* stomach…can handle…anything.” After each glorious hiccup, he reveled in the amount his stomach sloshed and undulated about. Soon letting out an extra loud hiccup, a tsunami of fat and indigested gorge attempted to swallow the rat whole, just as he’d done to so much that night. Unable to fight against the squishy sloshing onslaught, he went with the wave of fat as it rolled him further and further backwards.

Once the rolling stopped, he was upright once more, back resting against something moist, soft, and aromatic. Turning with more loud sloshing, a sloppy grin formed across his face as he came in contact with an extra large cheese burger. “*Hic*Ooooooh,” he moaned, as his stomach protested and fiercely churned to his pleasure, “Fate *Hic*…wishes me…to continue *Hic* glutting.”

With gluttonous zeal, he attempted to polish off the large burger. With each grimy mouthful he had to forcefully shove down his throat, he continued growing in girth, making him that much more eager to continue gorging himself. The greasy satisfaction aroused his sense of smell, which after finishing half of the burger, helped him to spot five more. Moaning further in pleasure, he ate the remainder. Rubbing and patting all he could wrap his paws around, he looked at the remaining five lustfully. Pondering whether he should continue with his glut, or return home and wait for the next night.
131111.title: Mirthful Moaning and Stupendous Sloshing

choices: go back to more???(Go back to wilbur and charlotte)
1311111.content:
Releasing a loud hiccup. The enormously bloated rat woozily pulled his way to the five remaining burgers. Moaning and grunting, his massively overfull stomach was almost unbearable to lug around with his flabby frail arms. Reaching the burgers, he then covetously pulled each toward him. Disregarding his belly’s protesting, he ate the burgers in chunks. The gooey cheese and meat, coupled with the juices of tomato, pickles and lettuce traversed into his gut with a glop. The gorging grew quite difficult, to the point where he shoved his own paws into his mouth. Gasping upon swallowing each chunky, he finished the first burger. “Oooooh….one *Hic* down…four…to go.”

Glutting the remaining burgers proved difficult by the mouthful, especially while his blob of a stomach lay flat on the table. Thinking it would help, he rolled onto his back so his stomach would distend upward. Not adding pressure to it helped out slightly, but only for awhile. As it continued to grow, the burgers began distributing themselves more to Templeton’s upper body and waist. With each passing second, his arms lifted a little more with each mouthful, as his expanding belly continued pushing his body outward. Thinking only about finishing these burgers, he was oblivious to the change, until cramming down the last mouthful of the fifth burger.

Belching to make room, Templeton groaned. Much of the fat from his bosom pushing against his chin, he rubbed his sloshing corpulent landscape. “Ooooh…so…much…food. *Hic* Can…hardly…move…” As much as it bummed him, Templeton felt little feeling in his legs, as his excess obesity pinned him down. “*Hic* This can’t…be…it, oooh.” Though getting as fat as he currently was delighted him more than anything, he was expecting to become fatter before reaching immobility. Rather flustered and unsatisfied, the rat frowned, clutching as much of his body as he could and wobbling it about; hoping the copious sloshing would cheer him up.

Oddly however, they had a different effect, one that formed an idea in the rat’s mind which only thought of where to go to eat next. Jiggling it more furiously, his frown turned to that of determination. “*Hic* No. I’m…not finished. So long *Hic*…as I…can move…I’m…not…immobile.”

Still clutching his stomach (with his claws even) he pushed it forward, and pulled it back in a waving motion. Little by little, he felt his back slightly lift off the table. “It’s *Hic* working.” Pushing and pulling with more effort, he kept the rhythm; his stomach sloshing over him, then pulling him forward. As he was lifted high enough off the table, he strained to move forward, even grabbing his belly so he wouldn’t fall backward. Pulling himself enough, he was finally able to sit up again, only, surrounded by his own fat every angle he turned. Thankfully he had enough back blubber and rump to keep him from falling backward, unless he leaned. Patting his corpulent mass, he giggled as the vibrations sloshed his gorge around. Legs now free from the blubbery embrace of his lower body, he attempted to walk. Slowly but surely, his tiny legs were able to move him forward while his belly dragged on the table. Nearing the edge, he purposely fell into a large trash can where further eating awaited him. Landing with a loud squelch, he feasted upon all he saw. Knocking over the can a few minutes later, he clutched his belly as he rolled uncontrollably for a few inches, stopping with his face in the dirt. Giving a loud belch to the sky, he wobbled his gut around. Still moaning as it bloated further.

“Must…find…more…food…oooohhh.”

===

Dragging himself throughout the fair grounds, he limited his eating only to what was ground level, which was still quite a lot, especially when he could pull table cloths with his massive weight, and showering whatever food might’ve been on the table directly to him. Doing so with three, he managed to eat some apple pie, scraps of cheese, lettuce, tomato, and bologna, a box of crackers, and a banana which only added more strain on his belly. Admittedly, the rat contemplated stopping and to rest up for another day, but by some nature, the slightest second he wasn’t eating made him want to eat more. Whether it was his stomach that was at his mercy or vise versa, he wouldn’t stop until one of them were satiated.

Finding a half eaten watermelon, he hugged it with his body, then biting a hole within it, he proceeded to swallow the entire thing whole, vacuuming up the inside, then disposing of the rind. Glutting the whole thing and rubbing his belly, he moved onto a basket of candy apples. Biting in huge chunks, the apple’s juices tenderly trickled down his tongue, swathing his taste buds in a sweet decadent pleasure. Mad with gluttony, the entire basket was depleted in minutes, leaving an enormous rat to sit in awe of his titanic visage.

Feeling thirsty, he searched for the nearest drink he could find. Remnants of sour milkshakes and nearly finished sodas only did so much for him. Searching for that hefty gallon of sour milk or tank of juice to quaff was his main priority, until finally he found something of the like. Neither juice nor milk, a pitcher of yellow liquid bubbled within the confines of an ice cream stand. A peculiar place for one such drink to be, but Templeton didn’t complain.

Waddling over, he threw open the door, groggily climbed up the first step of the stand and went over to the pitcher. Thankfully, his gargantuan gut added some significant height to his frame, which allowed the rat to lean in and guzzle down the yellow liquid with ease. The sour tangy flavor warmed his throat and insides, causing his monstrous belly to churn. Unwittingly to the rat’s delight the yellow concoction was none other than beer, which made his already struggling coordination that much more disastrous. Thrown into a drunken stupor, he tried gathering his balance as he woozily attempted to go up to the second level, where the ice cream was.

“*Hic* Come here little ice cream. *Hic* It’s time to…belly…in my get*Hic*, hehehe.”

Failing to be able to pull himself up to the ice cream, he managed to come up with a plan despite his drunkenness. Moving the pitcher out of the way, he went all the way to one edge of the cart, and with a hiccup, ran toward the other end, teetering on the very brink of collapsed. Hitting the other side of the cart with a massive squelch and gurgle, the wheels on his end tilted and eventually tipped the cart over, landing with a resounding smash coupled with sloshing.

“*Hic* That’ll do stomach. That’ll *Hic* do. Pulling himself out, he made his way to the ice cream. There were three massive buckets, almost as big as him, filled with chocolate, strawberry, and vanilla. Starting with the strawberry, he popped open the lid, sampled the creamy desert, and found it was smooth and savory to the mouth, not frozen in the slightest.

“You’re so *Hic* sweet. My stomach can be sweet too *Hic* once you get to know it. Which you *Hic* will now that I’ve got you, hehehe *Hic*.” Wasting not another moment, he gradually gorged himself on the creamy desert with a woozy drunken grin slapped across his chubby cheeks. Having gotten drunk, the limitations his stomach formally felt now seemed non existent, as mouthful after exuberant mouthful continued to bloat the rats already unbelievably fat body to further proportions. Reveling in the burbles and groans his stomach produced, through larger mouthfuls he’d give it a heavy smack with a paw, sinking it within a few layers of soft squishy goodness. Licking every last trace of ice cream from the bucket he moved onto the second, and the third, finishing them in a likewise fashion.

By the time he finished, he leaned the blubbery wall of corpulence that was his back, against the tipped over cart. Finding a few small boxes of ice cream sandwiches, he place them on his wide table of a belly. Ripping each open and shoveling them into his mouth while purposely shaking his continuously sloshing countenance.

“*Hic* I can’t believe how much I’ve *Hic* eaten. So much *Hic* food consumed in one *Hic* night. Everything…so veritable *Hic* so rich. There’s *Hic*, nothing…my stomach can’t handle. This *Hic*, smorgasbord of a fair…really is *Hic* a paradise, where a rat can…glut…glut…*Hic*…glut…”

After each glut, he would fervently stuffed an ice cream sandwich whole down his gullet. The vast wealth of his corpulent tissue jiggled and sloshed in bliss. Swollen to the size of two pumpkins, the rat finished off his remaining gorge. Nestling into his swollen body, he marveled at the accomplishment he had made within two days. So big, so rich, so abundant. Never has a rat felt greater joy than what he was experiencing. His hedonistic lifestyle had reached it’s pinnacle, and still, there was room for more.

“*Hic* Stomach…you have been good to me. After all the *Hic* time we’ve known each other, I’ve held you *Hic* with the highest expectations. Which…is why *Hic* I’m gunna…let…you chose what to do next. Are we gunna eat *Hic* Charlotte and Wilbur, or are we gunna *Hic* go back to…more…hehe…*Hic*? You’re…you’re so fat…I hope you know *Hic* that…hehe…stomach, you…fat…stomach *Hic* you.”
1311111.title: Not immobile yet

13111111.content:
As simple as it would have been to just keep gorging himself on the fairway, he knew that would never be enough. He needed something a bit heartier, and more satisfying.

And he had a bone to pick with a couple of his "friends" from Zuckerman's farm.

With an excited shiver, he began dragging himself back towards Wilbur's pen. Thanks to his relentless gorge, he was quite a bit larger than he had been when they arrived, and his stomach ached for a challenge. He'd swallow the dumb spider first, of course, and then he'd swallow Wilbur himself, without even bothering to chew. They'd beg for him to release them, and he'd ignore their shouts while his satisfied belly slowly digested them both.

He moaned with ecstasy just from thinking about it.

It took him the better part of the day to drag himself across the fair, and he was forced to nap during most of the daylight hours. While he slept, his belly digested the most of the previous night's binge, increasing his size further and making him all the more ravenously hungry.

He arrived at the pen just after the sun went down. Wilbur and Charlotte were talking quietly, with Charlotte resting on Wilbur's snout. They were in the perfect position for Templeton to gobble them both up in one go. But no, he thought- he'd still eat the spider first.

He poked his head through the slats of the fence and announced himself with a sour belch. It only reminded him how empty his stomach was.

"To be honest, we weren't expecting you to come back," Charlotte sniffed. Templeton ignored her as he hauled his massive bulk over the fence and collapsed into the pen. His fat hid his smirk at Charlotte and Wilbur's gasps of surprise and revulsion. He was easily as big as Wilbur now, and soon, he'd be even bigger.

"Miss me?" he slurred, as he dragged himself towards them. As he moved, what little food was left in his belly sloshed from side to side. The pig and the spider had no idea what danger they were in as they both made disparaging remarks about his ample waistline.

"The word worked," said Wilbur. "So what made you come back this time?" Templeton was now nose-to-nose with him. Charlotte's delectable, furry little body was millimeters away.

"Goodbye, Charlotte," he said huskily. And before she could ask what that meant, he'd stretched his neck forward, opened his mouth wide, and grabbed her.

"What are you doing!?" Wilbur shouted, as Templeton swallowed with a noisy gulp. Charlotte's eight legs tickled his throat all the way down, but she was so small that he couldn't even feel it when she dropped into his cavernous gut. His stomach rumbled irritably, desperate for something bigger. Templeton smiled lazily as Wilbur moved to attack him.

"Goodbye, my humble Wilbur!" he crowed. He opened his mouth even wider and caught Wilbur's snout between his teeth. Once he had a good hold, he began to swallow ravenously, sucking Wilbur's head in first and then his shoulders and front legs. Templeton's front legs clutched his belly as it exploded in size, while his back legs kicked impotently at the air. His eyes rolled back into his head as he continued to swallow, devouring Wilbur whole in a matter of minutes. Once most of the pig's body was pressed into his gut, his struggles shifted Templeton's center of gravity, swinging him into a more or less upright position. Wilbur's hind legs kicked feebly straight up into nothing but air. Aided by gravity, Templeton barely had to swallow at all as Wilbur's legs slid down into his belly with the rest of him.

His stomach closed over the huge load with a noisy squelch.

Stunned by the size of the gorge, Templeton sat completely still, as if by moving or taking any more than the shallowest of breaths, his stomach might explode. He hadn't eaten anything that was alive, or nearly as large, so the shudder of Wilbur's breathing and heartbeat made his stomach still in confusion. It was several minutes before Templeton dared to give his stomach a tentative pat. His stomach, swollen and taut as it was, was incredibly sensitive, and it shuddered at the touch.

"I did it," he finally whispered. His belly quivered. "I did it!" he said, more loudly. He was so full that he couldn't even move, so stuffed that he couldn't even feel the pain of fullness anymore, and he didn't care. He sat right in the middle of Wilbur's pen, swollen to bursting, bragging to the world that he was the first ever rat to swallow a whole pig and live to tell the tale.

Some panicked, barely audible noises bled out from his middle. Either Wilbur or Charlotte was trying to talk to him. He laughed with delight that they were completely muffled by his stomach and his bulging fat.

"You want me to let you out?" he slurred, rubbing his belly. "Too bad." Finally sated after days of gorging himself, he belched deeply, allowing himself to enjoy Wilbur's taste.

"Mmm," he told his stomach as he belched again and relished the sweet flavor. "That buttermilk bath really does work."

That seemed to be the last indignity for Wilbur, because suddenly there was a large bump inside Templeton's stomach, and he was knocked off balance, rolling to one side. He giggled as he rolled helplessly for a few feet, his chubby and useless arms and legs flailing in the air, before he ended up on his back, his gut swaying proudly. Wilbur did it again, and he rolled to the other side of the pen before crashing with an enormous hiccup.

"Stop- hic- it," he laughed. "You're- hic- making me- hiiiicc- hiccup."

The third time, Templeton ended up propped in a corner, the perfect place to sleep off his enormous meal. Luckily for him, Wilbur was tiring out, and his movements were getting sluggish. He was running out of air. Clutching his belly tightly with both paws, Templeton let out one more satisfied belch, and groaned with delight as Wilbur slowed to a halt. Templeton's stomach gurgled richly, and digestion began to take hold. As the rest of the food in his stomach sloshed around Wilbur's unbelievably heavy body, Templeton felt over-stuffed, over-sated, and most of all, unbearably sleepy.

He rested his head and paws on his belly and fell into the deepest sleep of his life.

Early the next morning, he was awakened by some human voices. His belly had softened somewhat, but he was still incredibly bloated. He pricked up one ear lazily and listened to what they were saying.

"Hey, over here! I want to see Zuckerman's famous pig!"
13111111.title: eat wilbur and charlotte???(Eat more)

choices: Eat the Rind!!! Go on glutting!!!
Don't eat the Rind!!! Start to go home!
131112.content:
As Templeton drifted off into overglutted slumber, a large gurgle from his gigantic stomach woke him. He looked at his massive swell and asked: “Hic…HILP! You ready to go already?” His stomach grumbled and gurgled and Templeton, despite his massively swollen state, started to salivate at the thought of further feasting and glutting. Hiccuping happily, Templeton patted his belly eagerly and slowly started to work himself over onto his stomach. Amid a symphony of sloshing and bubbling, Templeton slowly teetered on his tiny feet and finally held his balance. Taking one laborious step at a time, the incredibly massive amount of food Templeton had already ingested sloshed and glorped inside his bulging stomach. Making it to where he entered only a few minutes previously, Templeton hiccupped and stared with awestruck eagerness at the fields of trash and rotting goodies. Charlotte called to him: “Where do you think you’re going?” Templeton turned, hefted as much of his massively overgorged gut, hiccupped loudly and replied: “Hic…HILP!! Where do you Think? Hic…HILP!! I did my duty…I’m going to enjoy myself…HILP..What feasting and glutting awaits me…Hic…HILP!!” Templeton leaned back so far that he crashed onto his rump with a deafening squelch and glop and woozily fell silent. Charlotte reprimanded: “Look at yourself, you’re gigantic, how can you possibly think of going out again?” Templeton lazily hiccupped and replied: “Hic…HILP!!! My stomach can handle anything…HILP!!”, slapping his stomach at every syllable and rejoicing in the sickening squelches it made at every slap. He grinned sloppily at Charlotte and amidst deafening bubbling, Templeton heaved himself over onto his fat belly and slowly dragged himself off to continue his glut. The last Charlotte heard was a chomp, the bubbling of Templeton’s overfilled belly, and an incredibly rich and exuberant hiccup followed by “This will…HILP!! Be a night to remember!!”
And indeed, right outside of Wilbur’s pen, Templeton had found a large chicken leg that someone had apparently dropped while looking at Wilbur. He eagerly tore into it and stripped the bone bare quickly. He looked at the bone, hesitated for a second, then took the bone and began to shove it down his throat. Wincing from the pain, he swallowed massively and the bone entered his gigantic belly with a gurgle and Templeton hiccupped loudly and happily and dragged himself to other pieces of food that were strewn across the fair. Determined to overgorge himself many times over, Templeton devoured hot dogs, hamburgers, made apple cores out of apples, funneled funnel cakes into his stomach, and drank a large cup of warm milkshake. Finally Templeton arrived at the snack fairway and paused to rest. His already gigantic belly had bloated out larger and larger and Templeton couldn’t be happier. “HIC…HIC…HILP!!! What feasting and glutting, a real gorge…HIC…HIC…HILP!!! I’m not done yet!! HIC…HILP!!” Templeton joyfully slapped his massive gut which bubbled and sloshed. Templeton, driven insane by gluttony, started to gather all the food he could find into a massive pile. This undertaking proved harder than expected, not only because of Templeton’s massive size, but also because the temptation often proved too much and Templeton often glutted himself on the food before he could add it to his pile.
Having gathered a truly impressive mound of fattening, rotting goodies of all kinds, Templeton hiccupped richly and, teetering dangerously on his feet, obeyed the will of his hugely overglutted stomach and dove into the pile and started to gorge and glut with complete abandon. The pile steadily and speedily shrank until it had completely disappeared into Templeton, who, stunned at his accomplishment, rolled out of the ruins of his gluttony, grinning stupidly at his own size. His fantastically overgorged, overfed and overglutted stomach was a sight to behold. All the indigested mass of eating sloshed, bubbled and glopped sickeningly as Templeton rolled uncontrollably toward a large table. He hit it square at the center of his massive globe-like stomach with a cacophony of bubbling. Templeton drunkenly looked up at the table and greedily shook his overflowing stomach. “HIC…HIC…HIC…HILP!!! What gorging and glutting…HIC…HIC…HIC…HILP!!! This fair is a rat’s paradise…HIC…HIC…HILP!!” Templeton grabbed the tablecloth with his forepaws and tried to pull himself up onto the table, but his hugely grown belly stayed put and the tablecloth began to move downward. Giggling at his own weight, Templeton hiccupped and allowed himself to drop back down onto his stomach with a deafening squelch. Woozily recovering, Templeton looked up and saw a whole variety of goodies teetering on the edge of the tablecloth. Not waiting another second, Templeton hiccupped eagerly, patted his belly happily, which burbled an oversated reply and then tugged on the tablecloth. Food came raining down straight toward his mouth and Templeton only had to shift around to reach it. Donut holes, bananas, hot dogs, and more and more glutting material dove into his mouth and splashed into his obscenely fat stomach which bloated larger and bubbled even more.
Finally, after gorging on an entire table’s worth of food, Templeton woozily looked around for more gorging. Incredibly, he hazily saw another large pile of rotting food, not far from where he lay, pinned under the massive product of his uncontrolled gluttony. He hiccupped massively and richly and eagerly wheeled back onto his overinflated gut. Straining with all his might, Templeton managed to drag his huge, sloshing belly, his hind legs kicking helplessly in the air. As he was making it, Templeton lost no opportunity to gorge himself on smaller amounts of food that lay between him and his next target. All these ‘little’ amounts were happily and blithely crammed into his cavernous stomach. At long last, Templeton arrived at the pile and discovered with great delight that not only was this latest pile very large, but that there were more of a similar size nearby. Salivating, Templeton eagerly began his glut, finishing off one pile after the other with fantastic rapidity, gorging his fantastically, massively overfilled stomach to even more incredible proportions. Hiccupping and belching richly at his most recent glut, Templeton drunkenly staggered to more piles until his stomach became so incredibly large and overfilled that after a final gorge, Templeton could not support his massively overstuffed frame on his tiny feet and crashed with a giant squelch. Templeton grinned sloppily and carelessly smacked his titanic stomach. The massive amount of food slowly pushed him down and nearly crushed him with its bubbling, gurgling contents. He happily fought against the oncoming tsunami of swollen stomach and gratefully managed to roll toward new feats of glutting.
Templeton then bumped against something moist, and turning his head, he was stupefied to find a huge, half watermelon right before his eyes. He gulped amazedly and then: “HIC…HIC…HIC…HILP!! What a Night!! HILP!!! This will DEFINITELY be a glut…HILP!!! To remember!! HILP!!!” Without further ado, he began eating into the watermelon with massive bites until he all but disappeared into the massive fruit.
