Viewed from the outside, an observer could only see the rind shuddering and hear incredible bubbling and massive, rich hiccups and the occasional belch. At long last, Templeton lay within the rind, having completely consumed the entire inside of the watermelon. Woozy and drunkenly swollen already, this recent gorge only made things much worse. He hiccupped uncontrollably and often, happily grinning at the sickening cacophony of sloshing indigestion. Templeton slapped his stomach: “HIC HILP!! My stomach can handle anything! HIILPPP!!!!!” and bit into the rind of the watermelon, pausing to wonder if he should dispose of the rind as well as the inside.
131112.title: Forget about Resting and glut right now

choices: Go see Wilbur and Charlotte in all his swollen glory
1311121.content:
Templeton hiccupped, shrugged and began to attack the rind of the watermelon with gluttonous zeal. Though it was very bitter and foul tasting, Templeton was too woozy and food-drunk to know the difference. He only wanted more to shove into his over gorged gut. Soon, the entire rind had disappeared into Templeton’s massive stomach. He hiccupped massively and richly and slapped his huge, bulging, stomach which bubbled an overfilled reply. Having stuffed and glutted himself to an obscene extent, Templeton still somehow felt a need for further eating and was as determined as ever to overfill his stomach to absolute incapacity. However, the sun was just beginning to rise, and Templeton felt that he should at least try to begin to work his way to Wilbur’s pen.
Belching richly, he heaved himself onto his stomach and very slowly began to drag himself in the pen’s direction. However, there was a vast amount of eating to be had between there and the pen, and Templeton took full advantage of it. A substantial trickle of food passed his lips and continued to bloat him out even farther as he moved until he spied a fallen trash can. Wanting to investigate, he approached and was yet again awestruck by the huge amount of rotten, thrown away food and other garbage that was packed inside and spilled across the fairway. As he dragged himself toward the motherlode of goodies, he stuffed all and sundry into his massive belly. Half eaten bananas, cookies, forgotten cupcakes, hamburgers, stale hamburger buns, rotten fruit, squishy vegetables, all of these and more found new incredibly cramped accommodations on Templeton’s gargantuan stomach. He hiccupped, delirious with joy, when he arrived at the entrance to the trash can: “HIC…HIC…HIC…HILP!!! So much Food…HILP!!! So…HIC…RICH…HILP!!! NEVER Have I…HIC…HIC…HILP!!! Seen such fantastic…HIC…eating…HILP!!!” His belly groaned and gurgled with strain and overfeeding, but Templeton rolled himself with his mouth facing the can, and rolled into his newest feast. All the feasts of this most fantastic night were dwarfed by the size and ecstasy that Templeton felt within this trash can. Literally everything was sopping with grease and oozing with overripe seasoning. Templeton couldn’t get enough into his gullet fast enough, even eating the paper wrappings of the food as if they weren’t there at all.
A good half hour passed, the trash can reechoing with Templeton’s moans of enjoyment, his incredibly rich hiccups and overstuffed belches, and most of all, the incredible noise of his vastly overfilled stomach. Finally, having polished off a good ¾ of the massive amount of food in there, a gigantically overfed slowly rolled his way out of the trash can and plopped sickeningly onto the ground. Templeton couldn’t believe how much he had eaten, his stomach was so titanically stuffed it boggled even his wildest dreams. He contentedly hiccupped and plopped his hands onto his mass of a stomach. His gorge bubbled, burbled, sloshed and glorped around with the least movement. “HILP!!! HILP!!!! What a veratible…HILP!! Smorgasbord..HIC…HIC…HILP!!! What a…HIC HILP!! Night…HILP!!! What gorging and…HIC…HIC…HIC HIC HILP…feasting…a real HIC…HILP!!! Glut!!!” Templeton, somehow rolled over to another pile of food and downed that easily. “This is where…HIC HILP!!! A rat can glut…glut…HILP…glut…glut…glut…glut…HIC…GLUT!!!…GLUT!!!! HILP” After each ‘glut’ Templeton had found another large pile of food to overfill his massive stomach with, making him fatter and fatter. Templeton, by now, had reached the pen, and morning had just begun. He drunkenly grinned, slapped his truly titanic belly, and looked forward to showing off his night’s work.
1311121.title: Eat the Rind!!! Go on glutting!!!

choices: Glut and then sleep all day
Stay in the pen and go out later
13111211.content:
Templeton slowly sloshed his way toward the gate of the pen, still stupefied by the incredible amount of food he had gorged upon, especially this last frenzy of overeating…”HIC…HIC…HILP!!! What feasting and gorging…HILP!!! I shall…HIC…HIC…HILP!!! Do this again…HIC HILP…next night…HILP!!!” Finally reaching the gate, he struggled to lift his head over the lower bar. Charlotte and Wilbur were in the corner looking at something. Templeton wiggled his lower body and his titanic stomach sloshed and glorped loudly, catching their attention. Sloppily grinning Templeton hiccupped: “HIC HILP!! I’m BACCKK”. Charlotte and Wilbur seemed much less annoyed with him now. Templeton struggled greatly to heave himself over the bar, feeling his fantastically overfilled belly slosh beneath him. Another resounding crack followed by a sickening squelch and glop announced Templeton’s vastly increased weight even from earler in the night. His stomach slammed into the ground and sloshed over his head for a second, glorping, bubbling and burbling all the while. Templeton woozily let himself further down: “HIC HILP!!! What a Nightttt..HIC! NEVER, HILP!! Have I sheen HILP!! Such LEAVINGSH…HIC…HIC…HILP!!! A real glut…HILP!!! I musta eaten…HIC…HILP…enough to…HILP!!! Fill 30…HIC HILP..people…HIC HILP!!! Templeton gathered himself and then started to ever so slowly drag himself toward Wilbur and Charlotte, his hind legs kicking helplessly in the air and his belly sloshing loudly with every pause between drags. “HIC…HILP!! EVERYTHING was HIC well ripened…HILP!!! Sheasoned with the HIC passing of…HILP!! Time an’ the heat HIC…HIC…of the day…HILP!!” Templeton made it to Wilbur’s front leg and with his titanic bulging stomach sloshing and glopping like an overfilled water balloon, turned himself over into a reclining position and cried in ecstasy: “HIC oh it was rich my friends..RII-ACHH…HIC HIC HILP!!!!” Templeton grinned woozily and nestled his back into Wilbur’s leg, his belly bobbling and sloshing back and forth sickeningly.
Wilbur and Charlotte remained stupefied for a moment, staring in wonder at the fat rat’s gargantuan stomach and the cacophony of sounds that reechoed from it. Charlotte broke the silence: “I didn’t think it was possible for you to get any bigger than before, but this is obscene. You should be ashamed of yourself, It’d serve you right if you got an acute attack of severe indigestion!” Templeton hiccupped happily and slapped his stomach multiple times: “Oh pleash…HIC…my stomach can handle anything…HIC HIC HILP!!!” His stomach heaved and sloshed in reply and Templeton’s hands fell limply off his massive bulging gut in a catatonic, self satisfied stupor. Wilbur piped up: “Templeton, if you weren’t so dopey, you’d notice that Charlotte’s made an egg sac!” Templeton blearily opened his eyes and tried to lift his head above the massive swell of his belly to see the egg sac. His stomach bubbled and sloshed at the increased effort, but try as he might, Templeton’s belly was simply too massive to look over. After a struggle Templeton collapsed back down upon Wilbur’s leg with a slosh and said: HIC….HILP!!! Hooray for Scharlotte…HILP!!!” and patted his vociferous stomach proudly. Wilbur contined: “For your information , there are 514 eggs in that peachy little sac!” Templeton hiccupped, slapped his giant belly and woozily snickered: “There’s a lot more than that in this ‘peachy little sac’ I can tell you that! HIC HIC HIC HILP!!! This HAS been a night…HIC HILP!!!” He then attempted to roll over onto his stomach again. Three times he tried and finally after a third time he sloshed upright and his stomach ballooned out as he landed with a sickening glop. “HIC…now excuse me…HILP!” and dragged himself toward the crate. Even though he was so obscenely bloated, a small voice in Templeton’s mind urged him to go out and continue eating. He even spied a simply massive mound of food that he could hide and glut on while the day progressed. Giggling drunkenly, he hiccupped and reached the crate’s wall, where he threw himself against it, stomach prone yet again, and began to slap it and slosh it around with delight: “HIC…HILP!!! What glutting…What feasting…HIC HIC…What gorging…HILP!!! My…HIC…Stomach can handle…HILP…ANYTHING…this will…BLECH…HILP!! Be a day to remember!!!” Charlotte stared stupefied as the titanic rat contemplated further eating.
13111211.title: Go see Wilbur and Charlotte in all his swollen ...

131112111.content:
Templeton licked his chops, hiccupped richly and patted his gigantic stomach greedily. He then eagerly struggled over onto his bloated, churning belly and started to drag himself to the massive pile. Glorping and gurgling with every heave, Templeton’s belly was slowly dragged out of the pen and into the early morning sunlight. For Templeton, it was incredibly hard work to pull his gigantically bloated body toward this next feast, but somehow he made it, and with the first contented bite, Templeton considered it ALL worth the effort. Burying his head into the pile of rotting food, Templeton used his forepaws to shovel more and more into his already overburdened stomach, even stuffing both paws into his mouth to ram his glutting down. The food landed inside Templeton’s gut no longer with sickening splashes but with obviously overstuffed, burbles, glorps and bubbling. Ignoring his gut’s protestations, Templeton slowly dragged himself into the pile so that he completely disappeared. The last Charlotte and Wilbur heard of Templeton was an incredible squelch and glop, followed by a massive hiccup. Indeed, Templeton had found a simply massive banana at the center of the huge pile and proceeded to shove it whole down his gullet. It slammed into his gigantically bloated belly and pushed it much further than before. Templeton lay in the center of his pile absolutely stunned. He woozily grinned and gingerly placed his tiny forepaws on his overfilled stomach which groaned and gurgled with strain at accommodating such a gigantic addition. For a few minutes, surrounded by food, Templeton was stunned into dazed inaction by the sheer size of what he had ingested. He hiccupped richly and uncontrollably and often and grinned crookedly in between. However, surrounded as he was with food, Templeton quickly recovered and snickering at his seemingly infinite capacity and the massive amount of further gorging, began glutting himself again with even more reckless abandon. An hour passed and he had not even made a dent in the huge pile, but he definitely had eaten gargantuan amounts, as his titanically overfilled, overburdened and overstuffed stomach, which continued to expand out farther and farther to accommodate its master’s feckless gluttony readily attested. Templeton now lay there, crushed by the weight of his gluttony, in a self satisfied catatonic stupor, belching and hiccupping massively and richly, but his tiny forepaws a flurry of action, grabbing all and sundry and cramming it into his open maw.

All of a sudden, Templeton’s food surrounded world turned upside down and he tumbled with it into empty space, his big fat bloated belly leading the way, crazily sloshing and gurgling. Incredibly, even in this moment of seeming danger, Templeton, though keeping his forepaws protectively around as much of his titanic gut as he could grasp, was still engrossed in glutting, grabbing numerous chunks of tumbling food in his mouth and blithely continued his feasting. Templeton landed heavily on his incredible stomach within a large heap of food with a “GLORCH-gurgle”. Woozily recovering, Templeton ate his way up to the top of the pile and peeked his head out. His pile of food must have been loaded into a trash can, as Templeton stared directly at the wall of a barrel. Not believing his fantastic good fortune, Templeton hiccupped happily and jiggled his massively bloated lower body in jubilation. Without wasting another moment, Templeton, salivating and giggling with anticipation richly hiccupped and cried: ‘HIC HIC HIC HIC HILP!!! Oh thishhh will…HILP!! Be…HIC HIC…RI-ACHHH…HILP!!!!’and eagerly dove into the trash again, his mouth wide open to begin glutting the instant he landed. His titanic stomach groaned, churned and bloated larger as Templeton dove into the richest, oldest, most rotten bottom of the trash can and started his eager feasting....

As Evening spread its cool darkness over the fairground, a small head peeked over the lip of the trash can to savor the refreshing air, only to spew a gigantically rich and woozy hiccup and shatter the otherwise serene silence. Templeton had spent the last 12 hours alternating between napping and eating, but mostly eating. The humans had busily refilled his trash can with vast amounts of discarded trash and half-eaten foot, which Templeton had eagerly and happily glutted on. Now, with the humans leaving the fair, Templeton woozily struggled to focus his eyes on the fairway before him, strewn with even greater piles of trash and delectable pleasure. His eyes glinted greedily and he hiccupped readily: ‘ooof…HILP!!!...tha gooshhh was right…HIC HILP!! Thishh fair ishh a…HILP!!! Rat’s Paradischhh HIC HIC HILP!!! What feasting and glutting awaits…HIC HILP!!! Thishhh will be a night to REMEMBER…HIC HIC HILP!!!’ With that, Templeton allowed himself to drop back down the considerable distance into the treasure of trash that he had temporarily abandoned. He landed with an explosion of sloshes so rich and indulgent that even the food-crazy Templeton paused momentarily to survey how much larger his belly had bloated out through his day of eating. Food seemed to be stuffed in every part of Templeton, swelling all of him to a large size, but nowhere was this obscene bloating more noticeable by far was in his titanic, bulging stomach. Templeton doubted that he could drag himself around once he was through, but, snickering at the thought, He was sure he’d find a way to continue eating.

Not losing another moment, Templeton, hiccupping eagerly, dove greedily into the vast sea of food, trash, and wrappers. He crammed food into his mouth with fantastic rapidity, gasping for air between the nearly continuous stream of food through his mouth, only broken by fantastically rich hiccups and contented belches. His vast stomach squelched and burbled deafeningly, which the woozy Templeton mistook for calls for even more frantic eating, which he was happy to oblige. Despite the can’s vast size, Templeton soon enough was moaning with pleasure at the bottom of a mountain of soggy wrappers, every last morsel crammed into his gratuitously swollen body. Nearly crushed beneath his gigantic stomach, Templeton happily slapped its wide girth and hiccupped greedily and started to rock back and forth, reveling in the overstuffed sloshes that exploded from his bulging stomach, which soon began to bounce and heave to and fro and soon enough the trash can tipped over and a bubbling, woozy, drunken Templeton rolled out and onto the food-loaded fairway.....
131112111.title: Glut and then sleep all day

1311121112.content:
As he plopped out of the lid of the can, the wide expanse of Templeton’s abdomen pressed onto the warm fair soil and formed around his back. Ever so slowly the bubbling mass of his insatiable gluttony rolled onto the back of his head with grotesque burbling and sloshing, which was music to the rats ears. It was indeed the feasting of a lifetime, with consequences only a rat would indulge in. Templeton had gorged himself to an incredibly obscene state that not even Charlotte and Wilber would believe how much he had grown over the course of one day. It thrilled the rat’s mind, producing tremendous anxiety in sharing his latest and greatest accomplishment to both his friends. Truly, his goal to of eaten until made immobile in this heavenly place, will be soon realized.

His belly, warped in a continuously rocking state, constantly gurgled as all of it’s pleasing contents shifted into comfortable positions within Templeton’s incredible bulbous mass. He rested momentarily, allowing the shifting tide of lard from his back to soothingly massage his insides like someone giving him a backrub. Purposely, he even slightly shook himself to continue the pleasuring process; which only took a slight tremble. Content in his current position, he patted the sides of his belly with both paws, producing liquid like glorps and bubbling gas which exited the rat’s body through an appetizing belch.

“Oooh, this is the life.” The moaned, half opening his eyes and grinning at seeing the marvelous food loaded fairway. What he had gorged on the previous night looked to be fully restocked, with interest even. A monstrous gurgle erupted from the deep pit of the rats stomach, which made him softly stroke the plush squishy surface with great relish. “Do you still have some fight left in you?”

His stomach groaned in response. Giving in a couple of hefty pats, Templeton’s body began sloshing vigorously from head to tail, resuming his constant jiggling state. Adding to this, he rocked his body back and forth, and once getting enough momentum dragged himself forward using the force of his body. It worked well enough for the time being, until even his towering fat is too much to handle.

Slowly but surely Templeton continue shoveling food down his gullet to his hearts content. The already limited space caused some slight discomfort as new arrivals struggled for room, but the rat forced more down needlessly. Each morsel that passed through his lips was a wondrous delicacy; everything rotten, soaping with grease or mold, or just a hefty portion he had to push down his throat just to get it through. The constant consumption even at his enormous state continued to be just as delectable as the first night, if not more so with enough food in his belly to feed a group of people.

After consuming what seemed like an untold amount of hot dogs, corn dogs, candy apples, fries, sour milkshakes, and a jar of pickles, Templeton further fleshed out. But more importantly, his stomach, once gelatinous in movement, now began growing rather firm to the touch. Giving himself a few experimental slaps, his bubbling belly danced for a bit but only for a brief moment. Finding a nearby uneaten hotdog, he quickly grabbed it, rolled over onto his back resting against the leg of a table, and quickly shoved it down his gapping maw. There was a sharp pain on the way down even the rat couldn’t shake off and by the time it went down, Templeton could literally feel it in his pudgy chest. But more importantly, he felt his body grow tighter as it grew outward.

“That’s strange,” said the rat, daintily rubbing his smooth blubbery visage, “Am I finally getting full?” The thought of it slightly disappointed him, but when looking over just how enlarged he had become throughout this entire ordeal, it was quickly rubbed off. Squeezing at his bulk, he patted it some more. “Never have I dreamed at becoming so incredibly fat. All that food, all that gorging, it was all worth it in the end.” Softly, his stomach gurgled in compliance. “You really are a stomach that can handle anything.”

Giving constant praise to his stomach and the accomplishment of his obese state, irony began to twist in Templeton’s mind. He was won over by the fact he was growing full, but the glory of his stomach’s resilience had suddenly peaked his arousal. “Even if I’m getting full, I’m sure you could handle more am I right?” With a loud glorp, Templeton received his answer. “Then lets continue my belly of a thousand stomachs.”...................
1311121112.title: Hunger Pains

13111211121.content:
Jiggling it about, Templeton set off once again to finish his treatment. In his area there wasn’t much to be found: a bag of popcorn, cotton candy, liquorish, churros, nothing to completely satisfy him. He kept on the lookout for that one meal that’ll truly quench his gluttonous appetite, and then, he found it. On top of a table was a large assortment of goodies he knew would be more than enough: 2 buckets of chicken, 3 boxes of pizza, a large bowl of sausage links, 2 two liter cokes, and an enormous chocolate cake sitting in the middle. Wasting no time, he climbed up a convenient step ladder. It was good to once again use his legs for once which helped tremendously despite his enormous belly getting in the way a bit. But once he reached the top, he proceeded with his binge starting with the chicken.

Quickly and skillfully he tore the meat from the bone, swallowing in large portions. The sharp pain continued striking with each gulp, but he did his best to ignore it. It became more bearable with the continuing flow of food; perhaps something in his chest was dislodged? But his expanding stomach remained getting tighter and tighter, as well as wider. As he finished the two buckets, his unyielding girth was distributed somewhat to his back, allowing him to crane his head back and roll to a standing position. His titanic burbling belly bloated out beyond comprehension. Patting his triumphant treasure, he noticed that what once throbbed about upon the impact of his paw, now only slightly trembled. What also once was a symphony of sloshing turned into a thick squelch. It must’ve been the firmness upon reaching his full capacity.

Now upright, Templeton moved from side to side in order to free his legs from underneath his plump robust waistline. Walking was still difficult, but proved simpler than before with his newer more plumper backside. Continuing his binge he moved onto the bowl of sausage links. He moved beside it, grabbed a single sausage connected to the ones around the bowl, placed it in his mouth, and swallowed. Like a vacuum, the entire link quickly slithered down the rats throat in a meaty train of goodness. Quickly, his belly began bloating out further, even causing Templeton some discomfort at the rate it grew, and the tighter it became. But he just kept eating, for better or worse. The savoring the juicy grease grazing his throat, until the whole thing was finished. Grunting as the last sausage entered his stomach, he let out a loud hiccup, which dangerously teetered him on his feet. Regaining his balance, he then set his eyes on the three boxes of pizza. Suddenly, his over gorged abdomen groaned at the thought of it’s master’s intentions. The movement was forceful the rat nearly fell forward as ripples ran through his body.

“What, had enough already?” Placing his paws on his stomach he felt the various shapes of his gorge fatuously trying to shift around in his cramped body, causing it to violently churn. He looked to his massive stomach, then to the food, then to his stomach. The incessant groans pleaded for a break, causing Templeton to bow his head in sympathy at his stomach’s hard work. Giving it a short rub, its contents tenderly sloshed around. “I’m sorry,” he spoke softly.

Then, without warning, the rat pushed on, against his own weight, to get to the pizza boxes. Quickly, he threw the lid open, and dived into his latest gorge. Devoid of thought of his stomach’s limit, he shoved as much of the cheesy treats as he could into his mouth; taking large chunks down the hatch. His blithe smile masked the sharp pain that would come with each mouthful, as his belly grew rounder and tighter. Not wasting a moment, he continued onto the second box, then the third. Grinning and practically laughing at his disobedience to his own body.

Not resting, he moved onto the soft drinks. Taller than him, but not very far, he gnawed off the caps, leaned back, and allowed the liquid to flow inside him. Powerless to his own insatiable binging, he gave a loud sigh as he finished the bottle off. A tsunami of fat then rolled onto him, too much for him to push away. The momentum caused him to flip over back onto his feet. Having consumed so much liquid, Templeton felt he was about to explode any minute, but relentless and determined, he would finish his meal even if that were the case. “You take orders from me,” he spoke to his stomach, out of breath and grinning.

Disposing the soda the same as the first, his rich hiccups had returned, causing him to clutch his middle as the sharp pain came. At this point, with each hiccup, the rat swore he could feel some of his nourishment wanting to come back out; possibly his body fighting back against it’s owner’s greed. Struggling, he moved to the final ingredient in his appetizing pot of a belly, the cake. Perfectly untouched by some miracle, he crawled toward it, using the same method before he started. The sheer size of it intimidated him, but without avail, he took his first chunk within his paws. Savoring the sight of the delectable pastry, he opened wide, stuffed it in his mouth, and swallowed the most relishing swallow he ever had. The sugary goodness was so great he moaned in pleasure. But before he could take his next bite, something happened.

The sharp pain that plagued him shot in his abdomen, causing him great discomfort. It was like a stomach cramp, only Templeton had never had one before so this was more frightening. The intense pain caused him to squint and even wobble in place. Helpless, the rat rolled around, his entire body loudly sloshing in the process. Oblivious to his own movements, his monster of a belly had accidentally rolled onto the pastry. And as soon as it came, it was finished. The pain slowly began to recede, leaving Templeton lying down with his otherworldly belly towering in front of him. His huffing and puffing, the rat’s large grin was all but gone, leaving with it a look of defeat. The cramp proved too much to handle, and now, with his paws gently stroking the frosting off his messy fur, he sighed in relief.

“Okay…lets…go back…then…” There was no reply from his belly, only silence, and the nodding from each breath he took.
13111211121.title: Hunger Pains 2

131112111212.content:
As much as he wanted to retreat to the safety of Wilbur's pen, Templeton was forced to deal with the indisputable fact that he was completely unable to move. His stomach was stretched taut, hard as a rock, and unbearably heavy, as if he'd just swallowed a whole bowling ball, or some other weighty, inorganic object. The food was packed in so tightly that he couldn't even feel the different foods in his belly anymore. He was just one big, heavy, immobile lump of rat.

He'd gorged himself to his absolute limit.

Templeton tilted his head back, opened his mouth, and belched richly, breaking the silence of the dark fairgrounds. His belly shook with relief at the decrease in pressure. Templeton reclined against the empty pizza boxes, picked clean by none other than himself mere minutes before, and looked out over the fairgrounds.

The next table over was also stacked high with pizza and soda, and what looked to be a half-eaten bucket of chicken wings. Beyond there, he could see a closed ice cream stand, a stack of watermelons, and the setup for a hot dog eating contest. There was a stand for barbecue pulled pork, and one for lemonade. None of that was even to mention the trash cans that he knew were piled high with rotting delicacies, or the leftovers that littered the ground. His own body was still coated with cake and frosting that he couldn't even bear the thought of licking off himself.

He could smell it. There was still food everywhere.

"I must've- hiiiiic," he slurred, unable to speak without his belly throwing in its two cents. "Hic. I ate enough to gorge-" on the word gorge, his own gorge shifted and he belched- "a thousand rats. Hic. And it's like I was never- hic- here- hic- at- hic- all. Uuuuuuuurp." With each hiccup and belch, he patted his stomach, as if to reward it for a job well done.

"Hic. Can't eat another bite." He belched loudly. "That'll do, stomach. Hiiic." As if spurred on by his praise, his gut, formerly silenced by an overdose of heavy, satisfying food, let out a loud groan. It was finally ready to digest.

Templeton dropped off into bloated sleep almost immediately.

He awoke only briefly, when the sun was rising, to woozily roll himself off the top of the table and into hiding underneath it. As soon as he was back in the dark, Templeton was back into full sleep, snoring the day away while his belly attacked his meal. Locked in a deep, dreamless sleep, he was completely oblivious to the comings and goings of humans all around him. By the time he awoke again, darkness had fallen, and he was alone. He yawned widely.

"I guess it's time to go back to the pig and spider," he said wistfully. "At least I'll have something to show off." He moved to pat what was until recently a massively swollen stomach, his trophy of greed.

It was gone.

Templeton was a skinny rat again. In fact, his insides were gnawing with hunger.

"What!?" he gasped, and he patted himself all over, as if maybe his glorious bulk was just hiding from him. Did he dream it all? Was he still on Zuckerman's farm? No, he was definitely at the fair. He even still had some frosting on his fur. He licked some of it up experimentally, and his stomach growled its appreciation.

"What happened?" he moaned, and he tried to stand up. He lost his balance and fell. That was when he realized something was off.

He was taller.

Not substantially taller, just an inch or so, though that made all the difference to a rat. His body had bulked up to match, though he was painfully thin, just like he'd been before Wilbur had moved into his pen. Surviving on miserable scraps at Zuckerman's, Templeton had never grown to be a particularly large rat, not like the enormous bucks he'd seen patrolling the junkyard. Finally gifted with enough calories to launch an ambitious self-improvement project, his body had apparently funneled every ounce of fat he'd packed on into an overdue growth spurt.

It wasn't enough energy, though, apparently. Templeton's shrunken belly was desperate for a new influx of food. The fair was rich and abundant, covered with the leftovers of a second day of festivities, as if the humans were deliberately trying to indulge him. Wilbur and Charlotte completely forgotten, he licked his lips and rubbed his empty stomach.

"Ready for seconds?"
131112111212.title: Growth spurt

choices: Templeton assembles a mountain of food
1311121112121.content:
Templeton scurried up the side of the table with an agility he'd forgotten he had- and hopefully, would soon forget again. As luck would have it, another pizza party had happened here while he was asleep. Pizza boxes were stacked high, dripping with grease, begging for Templeton to tear them open and devour whatever was inside. He climbed on top of the stack and opened the top box.

Empty!

The fair had never denied him before. His hunger intensified. He shoved the first box aside and looked in the second one. It was empty, too. But he could smell that he was getting closer to his prize. The third box had one half-eaten slice left. Templeton gulped it down in less than a second. And starting with the fourth box-

Whole pizzas.

With a triumphant whoop, Templeton dove into the first course of his second gorge. This time, his body was ready for him, and he swallowed huge chunks of pizza, barely bothering to chew. When the first one was gone, rather than break his rhythm, Templeton chewed straight through the box to the next one, swallowing greasy cardboard along with bread and cheese. His tail disappeared into the pile of pizza boxes as he burrowed downwards, recklessly stuffing his face. And when he'd finally finished the last one, grease dripping out of his mouth and onto his filthy fur, he paused to take stock of how his new body was holding up.

His stomach bulged outwards only slightly, serving only to make him look less painfully skinny.

More importantly, he was still ravenously hungry.

"Guess I can hold more now, huh?" he laughed, patting his stomach approvingly. In no time, he was onto his next stop, an overturned bucket of fried chicken, left behind by some charitable human. Then he scampered away, leaving a pile of bones. On one table, he found a tray of biscuits and packets of butter that melted all over his face and chest when he tried to swallow them whole. Some moldy hot dog buns combined with some stale mustard for a particularly pungent taste. He scaled the lemonade stand for a quick drink, then ran over to where he'd seen the melons displayed. Only pieces were left, but he gulped them down easily. And when no more food was immediately apparent, he dove gracefully into a large trash can, and gobbled up every disgusting partially-consumed piece of food that had been tossed in and mashed together over the course of the day.

None of it was enough.

Templeton burped when he'd finished, but it was quiet and tame- nothing compared to his gorge of the night before. No matter how much food he ate, his stomach stayed more or less the same size. He swelled up with each new intake, but just as quickly shrank back down. His stomach's base size was growing, but far too slowly for his taste. On the one hand, he liked the idea that his belly had adapted to compensate for his massive appetite. As long as he kept a steady pace, he could eat forever- well, forever to a rat- and never have to stop. On the other hand, however, he'd enjoyed having prominent evidence of his gluttony. Eating for the sake of eating was wonderful, but he missed his fatty belly.

"There has to be a way to get you to fatten up," he said, rubbing his belly. Well, really, the solution was clear.

All he had to do was eat more, and more quickly, than his stomach could digest.

Templeton was a true glutton, and the mere thought of out-eating his own stomach was enough to drive him into action. A dumpster was sitting behind the food stands, waiting to take in the surplus garbage from the surrounding area. The fair's maintenance crew clearly hadn't been too active that day, and the dumpster was overflowing.

Well, luckily, Templeton was ready to take in surplus garbage from the dumpster.

He dove into the trash, mouth agape, and swallowed a whole strawberry without bothering to chew. The stack of pizzas was merely a practice run. Nearly everything in the dumpster was edible, or edible enough for Templeton's greed. Like before, he ate straight downwards, digging wildly even as a steady stream of rotten goodies passed through his lips and into his stomach. His only slightly bloated middle disappeared into the mountain of trash, followed by his back legs, and finally, by his slender tail. After a few minutes, the tunnel he'd made collapsed behind him, burying him under a mountain of rotten food waste.

If he'd been willing to stop eating for even a second, Templeton would have grinned with delight. Now all he had to do was eat his way back out.

Aided by gravity, Templeton opened his mouth wide and allowed the food to flow into him, like a drain at the bottom of a swimming pool. He still had to guide each greasy, rotten, delectable morsel into his mouth, but he barely had to chew or swallow- he'd consumed so much that his mouth and throat had given up, content to serve as nothing more than a dumpster-to-stomach gateway. As planned, his stomach swelled impressively, and Templeton wasn't sure if the pressure on the inside or the outside of his belly was more intense.

More, his primitive brain begged as he inhaled pound after pound of trash, barely distinguishing what was edible and what was not. More! MORE!

An observer would have been treated to a curious sight. Here was a dumpster, slowly emptying itself, in the middle of the night. Before the bottom of the dumpster became visible, however, a fat rat's head and shoulders poked out of the mess. And before Templeton could finish swallowing what was in his mouth-

"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP."

His belch was so massive it was painful, and louder than what any human could produce. The flavor was toxic- a product of whatever disgusting concoction had resulted from packing a mountain of garbage into one rat's belly. He tried to keep eating, he really did, but his stomach had already signaled that it was ready for a break, and he was barely able to eat enough more to get himself dug out of the mess. He collapsed onto what was left of the trash pile, the contents of his enormous belly sloshing about inside of him, accompanied by his own stomach's rich groans.

"That- hiiiic- that really hit the spot," Templeton slurred. He belched again, so forcefully that his distended stomach lifted off the ground ever-so-slighty before noisily dropping back to the dumpster floor. "Hic. Can't believe I can eat- hic- so- hiiiic- so much in one go now. My stomach can handle- hiiiic- anything. UUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRP." Even as he relished his bloated, bulging state, however, Templeton knew that digestion had already taken hold. He'd have to eat more soon if he didn't want to risk shrinking back to normal size.

"Well. Urp. What to do," he wondered allowed, drumming his fingers on his enormous stomach. "Should we go on dumpster diving? Hic. Or should we take a breather, and pull together a real gorge?"
1311121112121.title: Ready for seconds!

choices: He sleeps and digests... and grows again...
He's eaten a lot... but he wants more...
13111211121212.content:
While scavenging inside a dumpster was fun, he wanted to really enjoy his glut. He wanted to savor the food he ate, fresh or rotten. And while his belly was getting large and round, he wanted to test his new size ans see how far he could go...

"Time for a real smorgasbord," he said as he licked his lips with anticipation, "I need to make a whole mountain of food!"

Wasting no time, he heaved his belly up as best as he could and began to work on his mountain of food plan...

He scavenged as much as he could find in the fair and the gluttonous rodent was in great luck. From the ground, he found caramel apples that were half eaten, pieces of popcorn still inside the bags, banana peels with piece of bananas stuck inside, apple cores starting to rot, grapes turning into raisins, and then some.

From the tables and the benches, he found pizzas that were half-eaten or just down to the crusts, cakes that were either half-eaten or nothing but crumbs and icing, pie tins with the pie and filling still inside, chicken that were almost to the bones, burgers and hotdogs that were either down to a small fraction or had only a big bite on them, and that was only a fraction of the bounty...

With his gluttony fueling his anticipation, he went to work. Grabbing everything he can with his claws and moving them as close together as his belly will allow him. The food he found would start as a small pile, but gradually got bigger and taller with every food item he could find.

And just before he could continue his masterpiece, a particular scent had caught his attention. The scent was sugary sweet... and smelled like it was deep fried...

He looked around and saw a food stand with two words that caught his attention: FUNNEL CAKE. Just the mere mention of the snack got his belly to growl in hunger despite it already looking enormous...

He made his way into the stand and found numerous bits of funnel cake all around, as well as a big bag of powdered sugar. He grabbed numerous bits of funnel cake, as well as fresh funnel cake that was left around the stand, and shoved it in the bag of sugar, then dragged it towards his pile outside.

Templeton had been carrying a large weight on his abdomen and around his shoulder, struggling to make his way back to his mountain of food.

"Ohhh, this is going to be a great glut for me," he said as he heaved himself, "Just a little further..."

Despite his low center of gravity slowing him down, he managed to bring his sugary treasure towards his mountain and began to dump it all onto it, making the mess more appealing for a rat with a large appetite.

And soon, with all that was said and done, the mountain of food was complete. Scraps and pieces of junk food had formed into a five foot mountain of a rat's feast.

Templeton slowly and carefully climbed up the pile, making sure his belly wasn't going to cause the pile to break apart. After a few close calls, he made it on top of the pile and licked his lips eagerly.

"This is a meal fit for a king," he said with pride," And I will eat like one tonight!"

With that, the chunky rat began munching his way down the mountain, eating every bit of food that he painstakingly gathered, as his belly began to take it all in and pack it away that was noticeably visible.

Every crumb was munched away by Templeton, as his appetite was in control, while his belly did what was told and took in more food, grumbling in agony. But that hardly stopped him. He wanted more... And he was going to get more...

Halfway there, his belly was looking larger, almost as if he swallowed a grapefruit. But that size would only increase as he continued to glut like he never glut before. He paused slightly to savor the taste and make a few HICCUPS in the process.

As he neared the bottom, his belly was growing wider to accommodate the rest of the food, looking like he swallowed an over-inflated basketball and feeling just as tight. But his gluttony was far from over...

Soon, he began licking crumbs and powdered sugar off of his fur and his belly, which looked mountainous to him but looked more like a swollen beach ball. He pat it with pride as he demolished the mountain of food, leaving himself in a drunken haze of gluttony.

"This was a >hlp!< night to remember...," he slurred, "A rat can really enjoy >hlp!< the finer moments in life."

Templeton rose from his stupor and made his way under the nearest gazebo, resting on a newspaper that was under it. He laid back and let his belly stick up high into the air, as it gurgled and groaned from his glut. He placed his hands as much as he could on his enormous gut, rubbing it gently.

"You did well >hlp!<, stomach," he cooed, smiling from ear to ear.
13111211121212.title: A Mountain Worth Climbing... and EATING!

choices: The fairgrounds has so much... But is it enough?
A figure is watching over him...
131112111212121.content:
Just like before, Templeton felt a pain within his chest and belly, as it seemed he tested his limits nearly at the point where he could burst open like a water balloon.

"Alright, you >hlp!< win," he said as he clutched his enormous body, "No more >hlp!< gluts tonight..."

Slowly, the pain began to reside, almost as if it registered what he had said. Sighing in relief, Templeton gently rubbed his enormous gut and slowly fell asleep...

As the sun rose, the fair was open to the public once again, as crowds poured in for the usual activities. And with their fun came food. Lots of food prepared and lost of it being thrown away either in cans, dumpsters, or just tossed all over the fairgrounds.

And from underneath a nearby gazebo, lies the insatiable rat Templeton, resting from his late night glut. Though unbeknownst to him, his belly's mass had been shrinking away after his meal...

Although most of his belly had digested the meal, it hardly shrank away into nothing, as resulted in him having a prominent paunch, which jiggled slightly. The rest of his body fattened up just as much, as his arms and legs began to look chunky, his figure looked wider, and his face looked chubbier with a double chin forming.

But during his fattening process also came the increase of his height. His body creaked slightly as he slowly grew taller, inch by inch, as he grew slightly bigger than the newspaper he was resting on. In comparison, he looked slightly bigger than a ferret or a weasel.

Soon, the crowds began to disperse as night came. And when the crowds go away, the rat will come out to play...

Templeton slowly woke up from his morning slumber, then began to rise up... and up and up until his head hit the top underlay of the gazebo.

"OUCH!"

He rubbed his head from the pain, then began to notice his new figure, looking taller and fatter than before. He looked down to see his new furry pot belly, sticking out about an inch from him. He held it and jiggled it slightly, enjoying the feeling.

"Well, this is certainly a big surprise," he said with pride as he hoisted his belly and dropped it, watching it jiggle.

He then made his way out of the gazebo, the hole looking smaller now thanks to his taller and fatter figure. After a slight squeeze, he managed to walk out to see how his new taller perspective had changed. It was strange at first, but he felt good... In fact, he felt really good...

His new height made him feel like a whole new rat. Between his new fat figure and his new taller stature, he figured it was worth every moment, no matter how big he became...

"But this is only the beginning," he said with confidence while rubbing his belly, "This rat is going to glut and glut again... and then he's gonna grow and grow again..."
131112111212121.title: One Big Rodent...

choices: He wants first dibs on Wilbur's meals.
He wants to remain at the fair and eat for the rest of his life.
131112112.content:
Although Templeton reckoned he could fit more food into his stomach, which continued to gurgle and bubble beneath him, he was also exhausted. He was bleary-eyed and dizzy from a long night of feasting, and now he felt a little disoriented. Plus, the sun was coming up, and that meant people would be coming back. It was probably in his best interest to let the fair fill up with people again and let them spill their calorie-laden treats for him to munch on that night. He'd have more energy after getting some sleep. He heaved himself with a great struggle yet with great delight as well, dragging himself all the way into the crate where he could sleep it off. It took him about a minute to drag himself all the way to the back and out of sight, and he rolled over onto his back with a great exertion of energy. He stretched and a yawned, and he put his arms lovingly around as much of his gut as he could. He felt his eyelids droop heavily, and soon, he was off to sleep.

And he dreamed of the fair. He dreamed of eating and stuffing and binging and drinking... He dreamed of cramming and slurping and belching and eating again... Oh, if only he could remain with this wonderful fair. Such a beautiful place. He could travel with them. He could "clean up" after them. Whatever the humans spilled, he'd make it his life's mission to eat it all up. Give the cleaning people some time off. He'd make a killing. Just to stuff himself silly and then have a nice place to sleep afterwards appealed to him greatly.

And then he was rudely awakened out of his dreams as he was suddenly flying through the air and landing with a loud gurgle on his back. His stomach rolled over his face, and he was forced to push it back to keep from suffocating. He felt rather dizzy from his recent flight, and he checked himself over to see if he was hurt. He certainly wasn't. His new flab had kept him safe.

And now Wilbur was staring down at him. He looked serious.

Templeton yawned. What a bore.

"Templeton, pay attentinon!" Wilbur ordered.

"What kind of monkeyshine is this?" the rat grumbled, patting his stomach protectively.

"Templeton, Charlotte doesn't have a long time to live! She can't come home with us, and my only wish is that you get her eggsac for me. You're the only one who can reach it."

Needless to say, Templeton was a little surprised by the request. Charlotte dying? He knew spiders didn't live long, but goodness... It was all a bit sudden. And the pig wanted to rescue her egg sac? How tediously noble of him. And now he wanted the rat to reach it for him? Well, Templeton wasn't really in the mood for a climb. But to save Charlotte's children... A part of doing this good deed appealed to him. And then he grinned widely as he realized his could use this good deed to his advantage. He yawned and patted his bloated stomach sleepily.

"So...it's old Templeton to the rescue again, is it?" he asked patronizingly.

"Templeton, hurry up!" Wilbur wailed, rather thoughtlessly, the rat noted. But then again, the pig was an emotional one...

"So it's 'hurry up, Templeton', is it?" he sneered. "And just what thanks do I get for all this work?"

Wilbur looked at a loss. He didn't know what to offer, it seemed.

Templeton grinned. Time to leverage.
131112112.title: Stay in the pen and go out later

1311121122.content:
“Well, could you answer that,” said Templeton with a sly grin. It was a rather rewarding blow, especially after Wilbur’s dopey comment about him. Seeing the pig dumbfounded at his retort was almost as rich and filling as all he had glutted on…almost. His belly wobbling as he let out a mirthful giggle, the rat crossed his arms and laid his head down. “Well, I suppose I could get the egg sac for you, if you make me an offer.”

Stricken at the rat’s greed, the pig let out a loud s snort which caught Templeton’s attention. Suddenly, and large hoof stomped right beside his body, causing him to slightly recoil in fright, sending his massive gut throbbing and sloshing about.

“Now you listen you fat, greedy, despicable rat,” shouted Wilbur with animosity in his eyes, and a tear sliding down his snout. The helpless rat watched him wide eyed over his gut, paws resting on top of it for comfort. “I’m not leaving this place without those eggs, and so help me if you don’t get your blubbery butt up there you’ll never stuff another scrap of food down your throat again!”

Trembling at the pigs rage, the engorged rat tried keeping his blubbery visage still to keep it from sloshing and jiggling about. “W-what are you gunna do?”

Without warning, the pig shoved his snout up to the defenseless rodent’s face, with his scowling dagger like eyes piercing any sense of pride the rat once had. “Get…up there…now!”

“Okay,” Templeton squeaked, “whatever you say.”

Slowly, Wilbur retracted his fearsome glare, but still stared at Templeton with malicious intent. Not wasting a moment, Templeton tried moving his enormous, over stuffed, over gorged body as quick as he could. The fear he suffered was a little more than his clogged rattie heart could handle; and all thoughts of using this demented swine for his own gain were thrown out the window.

This didn’t go at all like I thought it would, thought Templeton. Never in his time of knowing Wilbur did he think he would ever snap like this. He was always the kind compassionate hog who would save part of his breakfast for him, or even let him help himself when Lurvy came by with slops. The terrific, radiant, humbled pig everyone thought him to be. Well, everyone has their dark side at times.

Finally reaching the top of the beam and onto the rafters, Templeton was out of breath and collapsed. The sides of his stomach merely melted off the rafter edges as he tried regaining composure. The egg sac and the tiring body of the once nagging spider lay across from him, all the way on the other side of the pen. Having endured the arduous climb, his limbs felt on fire. But his task wasn’t done yet.

“HURRY UP,” shouted the malicious swine.

Pathetically dragging his frame across the rafter, he made his way across. Grunting and gurgling, huffing and puffing, the exercise was proving unbearable on the rat’s body. His stomach began lagging behind, and puffed in and out due to the rat’s laborious breathing. Nothing would please him more than to put all this energy he spent into cramming pastries down his gullet. Finally, reaching the egg sac, he grabbed it with his teeth, tossed it in Wilbur’s direction, and plopped his head onto the hard wooden plank. Panting with exhaustion, Templeton didn’t bother to see if Wilbur picked up the egg sac or not. But judging by the pig not saying a word, the egg sac must’ve been fine. Still though, a thank you would’ve been appreciated for his tremendous toil. But no, not a single word was said.

Suddenly, the rumbling motor of a truck and some voices were heard approaching the pen. Templeton’s guess was Zuckerman came to take Wilbur home. The annoying voices of the Arable children soon confirmed it. Next was the shutting of a crate, closing of a truck bed door, and the rumbling motor growing more faint by the second. As quick as they came, they were gone, not noticing the over gorged rat plopped lazily on the pen rafters.

===

Time had quickly passed while Templeton was passed out. The toll of fetching the egg sac proved more than his fat frame could handle. Letting out a prolonged yawn and stretching his limbs, he took notice of his surroundings, sloshing as he shifted his massive body. The pig and his pen were no longer present. His hunch was Zuckerman finally took him back to the farm, leaving good ol Templeton behind. Better so, the rat wouldn’t want to be anywhere near him after this incident. So that just left Templeton, a dead Charlotte currently being feasted on by ants, and the food loaded fairway…which he will remain stuck with…forever.

“I’m stuck here…forever!” The thought struck his mind not as a shock, but as a blessing. Night after night, for who knows how long it’ll last, Templeton would be able to pleasure himself on endless gorging just as he’d done these couple of days. Who needs slops when there were a large variety of goodies at his disposal. The selection caused his mouth to water, and finally free of any choice to come back, he would be able to glut himself more than he had already.

His stomach growled for nourishment, and eager to appease it, he crawled down the beam, landing with a loud glorp as his belly bounced, and climbed over the bar of the pen gate, moving toward the fairgrounds, lifting his stomach and jiggling it with pride.

“This will be a night to remember!”
1311121122.title: "Night's" to remember

choices: There's a female rat in this dumpster.
He wakes up even fatter and ready to eat again.
13111211221.content:
Waddling and huffing, Templeton spent the entire night stuffing his stomach back to the brim. He felt as though he hadn't eaten in days. He found the remnants of old cheeseburgers, french fries, and onion rings. He downed sour milkshakes and flat watery sodas. He found huge chunks of moldy cheese and rancid lettuce. He chowed down on apple pies and old bags of salty buttery popcorn, followed by a few discarded sandwiches. He ate everything and anything he could get his grubby little paws on.

"If only that selfish pig could see me now...," he muttered to himself between handfuls of grub. "Greedy and gluttonous, eh? If he thinks I was bad before, wait 'til he sees me after a week of this! Or a month of this! Maybe even two months, if I last that long!"

It was no secret to the rat that there was simply no way he could keep this up for years. At the rate he was going, he'd die the size of a beaver. But he would die happy. Fat and happy. Fat and happy and unable to move. He'd see to it. His grand finale. He'd go out on a big fat high note.

He then found a picnic table with a blanket draped over it. Smelling edible goodness upon it, he climbed and struggled and made it all the way to the top. He took a moment to get his breath back, and then he proceeded to gobble up forgotten cookies and neglected slices of cake. Then he spied a large pitcher of lemonade that made his mouth water, and he realized how thirsty he was. He quickly grabbed a couple of straws, jammed them together and stuck them into the pitcher, and he slurped with all his might, draining the pitcher.

The first thing he realized was that he was not drinking lemonade. He wasn't sure what this was, but it gave his frantic mind a nice soothing feeling. He chugged it all, and soon the pitcher was empty, save for the ice. He hiccupped, watching the fair spin around him. He stumbled on his hind legs, not aware of where he was going. He waddled and tripped over his own tail, sending him rolling on his stomach until he sailed clear off the table, and he found himself flying through the air.

He landed with a squelch in front of something that almost moved him to tears. He staggered upright to stare up at what lay before him – a seven layer cake, coated in vanilla frosting, and possibly several times his size.

“Ohhhh…,” he moaned with anticipation. “I’m going to need someone to carry me around at this rate…”

With an impish grin, Templeton charged at the cake, and he started to stuff it down his throat. He chomped and munched and stuffed and gorged. He swallowed chunks that were as big as his head. He could feel his stomach stretching outwards, all around him. It was becoming larger than his legs. He was reaching madly, eating way too fast.

“Must…have…more… Must…getter…bigger…fatter…MORE!!”

It took a very long time, but at last, the cake was gone.

And in its place was a very, very, very full rat.

Templeton moaned with pain and pleasure. “Ohhh… I shouldn’t have… So good… So much pain… Must…move… Must find…more…”

His stomach was about the size of a basketball, and it felt as heavy as a bowling ball. Templeton struggled and pushed with his front legs to get himself upright again. He managed to lean against a wall, and now he could at least see over his stomach again.

“I should probably be making tracks,” he sighed. “If I get going now, I might be able to find a new hiding place before sun up.”

But then he saw something next to him that he’d overlooked in his single-minded pursuit of cake.

A freezer, and it was full of ice cream sandwiches.

Templeton held back a belch and stared at it uncertainly. He shifted his weight and found that he could move, albeit incredibly slowly.

Should he? Shouldn’t he? Was it going too far?

A few minutes later, he realized he’d somehow already eaten two of these things, so he shrugged and kept up, enjoying the pain in his stomach.

Half an hour later, he’d eaten approximately thirty of those ice cream sandwiches, and his stomach was now not only huge, but chilly as well.

He looked around, and after hefting his bulk he spotted a hot dog vendor. Liking the looks of it, he struggled onto to the freezer, pushing the top shut. Once he was sitting on it, it suddenly sprung open and catapulted him towards the open vault on top of the stand. He went down head-first, and he promptly stuck fast, unable to continue inside. It didn’t matter – there were plenty of warm hotdogs, just waiting to be feasted upon. He reached down into the pile and began to cram them into his stomach.

After fifteen minutes of this, he heard a sound. It was like metal bending. It WAS metal bending. He let out a yelp as his growing weight finally proved too much for the edges around his hole, and it finally gave, allowing him to fall into what was left of the hotdogs, and he swallowed six whole in one go in the process.

“Ohhh…,” he groaned. “Too much… Far too much… MORE!”

He spent an entire hour at that hotdog stand, just binging himself silly on hotdogs. And when those were gone, he grabbed the buns and ate them too. He took the packages of mustard and ketchup and ate those as well. He swilled it all down with a gallon of soda. He let out a huge belch.

He knew he couldn’t climb out, so he spotted a side door. He rolled against it a few times, and after a minute, his bulk proved just enough to break the lock, and he spilled out on the ground, rounder than ever.

He patted his aching stomach. “Okay… That’s enough… Time to find a place to hide…”

Balancing himself on his spindly hind legs, Templeton waddled forwards, holding up as much of his stomach as he could, trying not to trip over it. He was still loopy from that not-lemonade, so he staggered this way and that, feeling strangely light on his feet.

Finally, he found a dumpster that looked ideal. Looking at it sleepily, he headed over towards it, scooping up a half-eaten chocolate donut on the way, and he swallowed it whole. He struggled and pushed a few things aside, but at last, he was inside the dumpster.

And there was even more rotten food in here as well.

Templeton sighed. “Forget that stupid pig. I’m in paradise!”

And he stuffed himself with whatever was in reach, and it wasn’t long before he fell asleep, listening to his poor belly struggle to digest its latest onslaught.
13111211221.title: Eat you heart out (aka glut)

choices: he goes into a coma, and wakes up when the fair comes back
131112112212.content:
the fair had left him, the rides were gone, the performers vanished.
but they had left behind a ratty feast.
there were three whole cakes in there, abit mouldy but otherwise fine. he ate gallons of cheese, of produce, of snadwiches, and then he ate the very last tomato.
it was gone. a magnificent feast, all vanished and, well not vanished.
it was inside his trembling girth, he looked with glee into the vast sea of grumbling fat. it was good he had been left, there was no way he could squeeze into his tiny hole now. his trembling tummy squshed him in the exact middle of the dumpster, and the squishy gurgling soon lulled him to sleep. his problems will be solved tomorrow
131112112212.title: the long year

choices: After a while, he awakens, only to be discovered.
1311121122121.content: In the morning, he awoke, and saw that the fair had still lots more to eat. "Hilp!" He muttered. "That goose was right." He said. The blob of a rat went around the junk yard area to see if there was more, and there was. There was another ice cream container, only, it was of sandwich-type, as well as bowl-type, as well as that-on-a-stick. He climbed on top of it, opened the door on it, and jumped into it. He gobbled it all up, and his belly grew larger. Templeton was fat, lazy, but yet, he was willing to do whatever was necessary to do what he enjoyed. He went to the fair, with a little difficulty-as he was waddling, and saw some burgers, dogs, potato chip bags, fries, and onion rings. Six "large-orders" types of each. The rat ate them all, and, got fatter after that. His belly now looked like a large balloon, yet felt as heavy as a small, spheral boulder than usual types. After hiccuping, he noticed an ice cream machine. He drooled, and came to it. He ate the toppings from each container, from m&m to fudge brownie.0 The rat, then pulled the lever of the machine, after putting his mouth close enough to it, leaving it open, then, after grinning from it, he broke the lever, and the ice cream machine filled him up. After it was done, his belly grew larger than ever. Now he was a quivering, fat glob, that looked like a rat equivalent to a character fatter and bigger even than X-Men's Fred Dukes/The Blob, in fact, he was a rat equivalent to a "fat glob". Also, as luckily as there was no one around, he, having eaten a lot, had fainted with his belly covering him while he was down on his back.
1311121122121.title: he wakes up tomorrow

choices: Go back to Wilbur and Charlotte
Hide somewhere to sleep it off
13113.content:
Resting against the half-eaten pumpkin as he was, Templeton knew he couldn't leave without finishing it. The half already in his belly would get lonely, he reasoned. Besides, he'd come to this fair specifically to gorge with reckless abandon, and he wasn't one to give up on a challenge, especially when it involved eating as much as his stomach could hold.

With some difficulty he turned around and sank his teeth into the pumpkin's exposed flesh, tearing off a large chunk and forcing it down his throat without chewing at all. It landed in his belly with a satisfying plop. Templeton waited for a moment to see if his stomach would burst, and when it didn't, he resumed eating the pumpkin with greater enthusiasm. He moaned with delight as the juicy pumpkin squeezed its fluids down his throat. He swallowed the chewy seeds by the handful. Within the hour, he was flopped down on the inside of an empty pumpkin rind, groaning as he gave his stomach a chance to adjust to the sudden influx of food.

All that was left was the rind.

Templeton went to work on devouring the pumpkin rind from the inside out. If anyone had been watching, it would've been an amazing sight. The pumpkin slowly but surely collapsed inward as Templeton ate, tearing off chunk after chunk and shoving them into his greedy mouth. He ate relentlessly, ignoring his enormous stomach's moans of protest, oblivious to the fact that he was ballooning up to nearly the size that the pumpkin had been before it had had the misfortune of encountering him. Sticky pumpkin juices coated his fur. As he ate the last chunk of pumpkin skin, he used his fat to roll himself into a more-or-less upright position.

Seated as he was where the blue-ribbon pumpkin had been, the vegetable stand almost looked like it had been set up for him. Empty and half-empty baskets of vegetables were scattered all around him. His proud belly swayed to and fro as it churned its ridiculously large contents. One of Templeton's paws was resting on top of his enormous stomach. The other one was clutching the pumpkin's stem.

"Seems wrong to- hiiiiiccc- just leave the stem," he slurred out loud, followed by another loud and near-painful hiccup. He opened his mouth wide and shoved the large piece of vine inside. His stomach hurt at first at the introduction of something so inflexible, but with help from Templeton's throat and also his paws, the whole thing got shoved inside with a noisy squelch.

The pumpkin was gone.

Templeton let out a triumphant belch.

"My sto- hiiic- stomach can- hic- can- handle- hiiiicc- 'nything," he moaned, barely able to speak since his throat was so exhausted from the gorge. "Take- urrrrp." He was cut off from his gloating by a belch and another hiccup. "Take that, Wilbur. Stupid- hic- Charlotte."

His stomach gurgled appreciatively, as if offering its own congratulations. Bleary-eyed, Templeton stared down at the word he picked- "humble." Would he even be able to make it back to Wilbur's pen in this state?

Well, regardless, he couldn't stay here.
13113.title: Eat now

choices: Charlotte and Wilbur find more food for Templeton
131131.content:
Unable to move properly, Templeton did the only thing he knew how to: he rolled. With the help of the momentum built up from his stomach's rhythmic swaying, he used his weight to drag himself off of the table. He landed on the ground with a loud belch and rolled a few feet, ending up on his back with his massive stomach up in the air.

He was pinned under his own gorge.

His decision to eat the entire blue-ribbon pumpkin suddenly seemed not so great, as he realized that his stomach was now so heavy he wasn't quite able to move it on his own. When he pushed at it with his paws, it grumbled and pushed back. His belly was exhausted, and it had apparently decided that the middle of the vegetable judging stand was as good a place as any to take nap.

"Come on," he groaned, and he shoved at it some more, to no avail. Well, there was nothing for it- he'd just have to sleep some of the meal off, and hope he wasn't discovered. With his limbs spread out and his belly stretched upwards, Templeton fell into an uneasy sleep.

As he slept, he felt his stomach attack the enormous meal. His belly groaned and sloshed as it slowly liquified the many large chunks of food Templeton had greedily swallowed whole, without concern for how it would affect his body. Even so, his stomach fought valiantly, and in time, even the pumpkin stem had been melted into a thick mush. His stomach changed shape as it digested, from the impossibly taut bulge of being completely stuffed to layers of soft fat. It shrank in size, too, allowing the food to be absorbed into his body.

The rat belched himself awake a few hours later, still in the same spot, and unmolested by humans or other vermin. The sun hadn't risen yet, but he could sense it was close. The word humble was still clutched in his chubby paw. With his smaller, albeit fatter, body, he was sure he'd be able to move.

"Let's go, stomach," he grunted, and with minimal effort, he rolled over onto his belly, allowing all four legs to touch the ground. He scurried away from the vegetable stand at a slow but comfortable pace, headed straight for Wilbur's pen.

That didn't mean he couldn't stop for a snack here and there, of course.

The third time he stopped, he inhaled a two sodas followed by some leftover fries and two cheeseburgers in large, greedy bites, letting out a loud hiccup when he finished. By that point, he was well aware that his stomach was bulging outwards again and it was slowing him down. He dragged himself a little further towards the pen before his weight forced him to stop for a break. Next to some more food, of course.

"It's just too much," he said with a grin and a burp, petting his rounded belly. "Too much- hic- delicious, grimy food. I just can't let any go to- hiiiiicc- waste." He inhaled a hotdog and smacked his lips before letting out a loud belch. He looked around for his next destination, and a slow smile spread across his fat face. Turning himself slightly off-course, he dragged himself over to a large pile where a trashcan had been overturned, and began shoving food into his mouth relentlessly. Pizza, chicken, pickles, candy, hot dogs, hamburgers, condiments, club sandwiches, apples, popcorn, pretzels- all of these remnants disappeared into the rancid melting pot of Templeton's stomach, forcing him to bloat outwards with over-full belches and moans of delight.

Just as Templeton finished licking the melted ice cream off an ice cream sandwich wrapper, his gluttony was halted by an upsetting sight.

The sun was finally coming up.

The word humble was still clutched in Templeton's tail, and he rushed towards the safety of Wilbur's pen, running on his hind legs with his enormous belly dragging him forward. He made it just in time, but he wasn't able to stop his forward momentum. He crashed into the side of the fence, and instinctively, his tiny claws burrowed into the wood to keep himself upright. His stomach churned wildly from all the excitement.

"I'm back," he slurred. "Hiiiiicc."
131131.title: Go back to Wilbur and Charlotte

choices: Templeton declines, but is force fed by Charlotte and Wilbur
Templeton accepts the challenge, at risk of getting sick, or worse, bursting
1311311.content:
Charlotte and Wilbur both turned to face the drunken voice. There they saw Templeton's head resting on the lowest plank of the fence- his fur disheveled and covered in grime, a dopey smile plastered across his face. He stared right back at them, his senses so dulled from the massive amount of food that all he could make out was a pink blur- Wilbur of course. With some struggling, Templeton hoisted himself up onto the bottom plank of the fence. At this point, his grossly distended belly seeped over the plank like a water balloon and pulled him down face first into the pen. A loud glorping sound echoed throughout the pen as his titanically stuffed belly hit the ground behind him. Charlotte and Wilbur were shocked. Whatever they had been talking about before the rats appearance was completely forgotten about. They glanced at each other in disgust and looked back toward the rat.

"Ooooooh..... HIC! Ooooo... What a night! He looked up toward the big pink blur that was Wilbur. "I think I outdid my-HIC, myself."

Templeton dug his claws into the dirt in front of him and, with all his might, he managed to slowly drag his bloated body forward. His rear legs were completely useless, kicking helplessly in a vain attempt to aid him in moving. His rear end gently bobbed about and jiggled as he inched himself closer to Wilbur. Both the pig and spider could only watch, curious to see the situation the rat had put himself into.

Upon reaching Wilbur's foot, Templeton stopped and attempted to roll over. He pushed himself up from the ground trying to rotate his body onto its back, but his swollen belly and widened hips were not making this maneuver easy for him. His arms gave and his head lazily crashed on the ground.

"HIC-URP!" A particular disgusting burp had snuck its way out with his hiccup. His eyes widened and he quickly covered his mouth, fearful that his belly was going to eject some food. His cheeks puffed out holding the burp in place, and the rat, realizing it was just gas, slowly blew the burp from his mouth. He grinned at himself, amused. At this point, Templeton's eyes returned to their half closed state for a second or two, before closing entirely. His tongue lazily hung from his mouth.

"Hey, are you awake? What happened to you?" asked Wilbur, who gave the rat a gentle nudge, causing his belly to make bubbling sounds.

Templeton remained still, about to fall victim to a well deserved food coma. His tail released the crumpled "humble" piece of paper. Wilbur glanced at it, then at Templeton. The rats motionless stupor panicked the pig.

"I said wake up!" Wilbur shouted, this time nudging the rat a bit harder, rolling him onto his back with some sickly bubbling sounds coming from his towering, swaying belly. While on his back, the rats belly came into full view. It was so swollen that the fur on area around his lower belly was spread thin- Wilbur could see some of the rats pink skin under the fur.

The rats sleepy eyes opened into little slits, "HIP! Ooooooo..... Hey, there Wilbur, whaddya think?" he moaned while patting his jostling belly. Wilbur looked down at Templeton's gravy stained fur and crumb encrusted lips and realized the rat had stuffed himself silly again.

Charlotte chimed in, "I'll tell you what I think! I think you're a disgusting bloated rat who doesn't know when he's had enough! Look at you! You can barely move, barely stay awake.... You keep pushing yourself further and further every time you go out! One day you're going to take one bite too many and it'll be to-"

"HIC-HILP! Charlotte.... You talk to mush (hip)" Templeton slurred. "Beshides, I can eat as mush as I want, this right now was (hip) just the.... Ooooooo.... appetizer", he moaned.

"Really?" Charlotte asked with a raised eyebrow?

"Rr- HILP! Real- HIP! Really," the rat confirmed.

Charlotte prodded the swollen, hiccuping mass further, "So, you're saying you have room for more?"

Templeton's chest heaved, his hands clutched the sides of his belly, and he blew a silent gassy burp from his lips, "Absholutely."

Templeton grinned at her. His food drunk mind felt as though it could eat another whole pumpkin if there was one in reach. But his belly seemed to disagree with him as it constantly churned and bubbled. It moaned from the massive input of food and quivered in its attempts to hold in one piece. He had never abused it as much as he did on this last feast.

"Well, it just so happens Wilbur has a bucket of slop in the corner. Fern left it there for his breakfast. I'm sure Wilbur wouldn't mind if you had some first," Charlotte said. She eyed the rats bloated form. She had always hated Templeton's selfishness, and seeing him like this, at his most selfish, made her want to teach him a lesson.

"HILP! Sorry old girl, but this rat is having shum difficulty moving right HIP now," Templeton responded, starting to realize he may be in over his head.

Charlotte began grinning, "nonsense! We'll have Wilbur pick you up the the tail and drop you in the bucket"

The rat squinted at Charlotte, trying to bring her into focus and gauge her seriousness. She stared down at him. There little staring contest was interrupted by a massive hiccup. Templeton rubbed his bloated water balloon of a stomach and laid back thinking.

He'd show her. He'd take her up on the challenge and lick the bucket of slop clean... Or should he? He felt his trembling belly, swollen to its maximum size. This might not be a good idea....
1311311.title: Charlotte and Wilbur are disgusted

13113112.content:
Templeton lay there for a few moments, listening to the churning of his huge glut, and then perked up, stared at Charlotte intently and thunderously belched while patting his mammoth belly: “HIC UURRRPP...yer on Scchharllottee...muh stumachh...HIC...can handlee ANYTHIN’...HILLP!!!”

Charlotte’s eight eyes blinked with a flicker of worry, having had her bluff called: “You sure about this, right? you don’t HAVE to!” Templeton snorted: “YESHH I do...HIC..nothin’ like RI-ACHH slops...UURP...after a good glutt...HICCCC” Charlotte shrugged and Wilbur grunted with the effort of picking up the supergorged rat, and with effort, dumped him into the slop bucket with a splash. They waited a while, listening disgustedly to the burbles, glorps, hiccups and slurps of the glutting rat, anticipating the outcome...

After some time, slowly, ever so slowly, the pail tipped over and out rolled a supremely satisfied but unbelievably overglutted Templeton. Sloshing and glopping, he rolled around and around until coming to rest on his haunches, leaning against Wilbur’s foot. Templeton was utterly punch-drunk and woozy, having crammed yet anther huge meal, fit for a pig, inside his already monstrous stomach, but he absolutely loved it. snickering at his companions’ dumbfounded silence, he jiggled his huge glopping gut: “hic HIIILLLP...HICCCCC...’M BAAACKKKK...HICCCC...ohhh everythin’...HILLLPP...wassshh well riipennedd...an’ ROTTEN..HIC HILLLP...ooooooohh...HIC itssss just sshooo RIIIIAACHHH...HIC HIC HIIIILLLP.”

Charlotte just blinked with utter shock: “Templeton...how...how have you not exploded? How is this even possible?”

Templeton snickered mirthfully, sending his gargantuan overcrammed gut into paroxysms of sloshing: “HILLP...heheheHICCCC...donn’ worrry ‘bout muh schhttuummickk..HILLP...I can keep eatin...HICCC HILP...and eatin...HICCC HILP...and EATIN...HIIILLPP...thisshhh ishh...HILP...muh paradischhh...HIILLP.” He slapped his groaning gut eagerly and faded into an catatonic, self-contented stupor, but not before spying a pile of trashy food just outside the pen gate.

Wilbur lightly jostled Templeton with his foot, sending his stupidly overstuffed gut into ectsasies (for Templeton) of burbling and sloshing “Now look what you’ve done to yourself, Templeton. How can you even be CONSCIOUS! You’re truly the biggest glutton there ever was.” Wilbur snorted and stamped his back foot to make his point.

Belching, the dumbfounded rat nevertheless giggled at the pig’s incredulity: “HILLLLPP...hehe...UURRRRPPP...muh schtommachhh c’n handlee ANYTHIN...HILLPP” he repeated stupidly: “Ooooo...HLLPP, shoo muchh lefttt ta’ GLUT. Ooooh mann didja..HILLP...knooww I atee a full pumpHILLPPkinnn?” He grinned at the widening of Charlotte’s eight eyes and slapped his groaning gut: “yuppp, itschh ALL In here...HICCC...Well...this HASHH been an nighttt...HIIILLLP.” With that, Templeton desperately tried to roll himself onto his front, his vast gorge churning stupidly and making all sorts of noises. Finally, and with a little kick from Wilbur to get him going, Templeton collapsed on his overblown gut and ever so slowly dragged his stupidly bloated body away from the other two animals.

“Where do you think you’re going?” Charlotte called out.

“HILLPP...ta GLUT...HILLP...I didd myy dutyy...HIC HILLP!!!
