Noww ‘m gonna REALLY enjoy...HICCC..m’selfff..URRRP...Ooooo this’ll be RII-AACCHHH...HIIIILLLLPPP” Ignoring the spider’s desperate protestations, Templeton drunkenly hauled himself over the board and out into the early morning light, his dazed eyes fixed on that pile of trashy food...
13113112.title: Templeton accepts the challenge, at risk of get...

131131121.content:
Even in his drunken state, even when it is daytime, even when he was glut himself so much that his stomach should have hit max capacity hours ago, Templeton to wanted to eat.

He saw a few mor half eaten hot dogs, burgers, and other things. Having a habit of not letting things go to waste, Templeton at all of it. He forcefully stuffing the hot dogs in his gullet. About five of them. He then went for the burgers, which toke a couple of bites. His stomach groaned more and more in protest of eating so much. But Templeton didn't listen to it. He then ate a couple of donuts, cookies, and a chicken leg. Templeton was now getting more and more massive. But was really getting drowsy. That what to expect when you spend most of the night eating.

"HILLLLP!!!! Gettin...HIIILPP... sleepy." Templeton said in his drunken state.

Templeton wanted to glut more. But he was not only sleepy, it was still daybreak. If people saw a giant blob rat, it may not end well for him. So he had to decide to keeping eating or hide for a bit, sleep and digest, and wait for everyone to leave?
131131121.title: Yet more glutting

1311311212.content:
Templeton wobbled forward, shifting his belly as it gurgled. He had to find some cover before the humans saw him as they came to eat their measly amount of fair at the fair. None of them could eat as much as Templeton. *hic* His belly rolled forward, sloshing and shuddering as it moved. The force of his hiccups, kept his belly pulling him toward one of the tents. *hic-cup* He groaned at the force of that one, causing his belly to ache a little. He couldn't be full? Nope. It was just the pressure of the pumpkin stem against the side of his belly. Guess it wasn't quite all the way soft or digested. Templeton shook his head and slunk into the tent, listening to the gurgle of his stomach.

It was an empty tent, other than several large boxes, which were empty. It appeared to be a storage tent for some of the equipment to set up/take down the fair. Perfect. Templeton slowly rolled himself across the floor. Twice, his feet tried to get ahead of his belly and he rolled onto himself, letting out another loud hiccup. Oops. He squished himself down between two boxes, leaving plenty of room for his blubbery stomach to spread out when he dropped to his butt. He leaned back against the crate, noting he could see the door if anyone came in, but they couldn't see him.

Templeton patted the top of his extremely round belly. A low rumbling came from the bottom of his stomach. He frowned. A hiccup startled him slightly, but that wasn't it. There was something else. A loud burp pushed out of his mouth. He covered his mouth, fearing that the force would push up some of his meal, but nothing came up. Several softer burps came up after that. He kept his hand there, fearing one small burp would bring up his feast at this point. *hic hic* Two quick hiccups brought up more burps. His belly sloshed back and forth as his hiccups caused the movement to jolt hard. Oo. This didn't feel the best, but it also felt really good. The burps were making his stomach have more room for the next glut. After a few minutes, the hiccups slowed down and he relaxed against the crate, rubbing his stomach in small circles.

His meal seemed to have settled, finding home in all of his soft curves and finally his stomach went to work. The crazy amount of sounds almost calmed him. Templeton tried to think of everything he'd eaten that night, but he couldn't. His favorite thing had to be the pumpkin. Maybe he'd look for more pumpkins tomorrow. It was a fair; there had to be more pumpkins.

*Hic*
*HIC-CUP*

His belly agreed with him. More pumpkin and more to drink. He could have really used a drink to settle his stomach a little, but he dared not risk going outside his hiding place until nightfall again.

Templeton rested his hands on his belly, feeling the rumbling beneath his hands and drifted to sleep, still hiccuping and burping in his sleep.
1311311212.title: Rest and Digest.

choices: Templeton eats whatever he can get his hands on.
Same as above, but with more detail.
132.content:
Deciding that if he was quick, he could find a word and be back in time to eat. He spent a good fifteen minutes searching for one. Finally, he came across a newspaper with lots of boldly printed words on it, and underneath it was a ham sandwich and a rotting apple.

So, good things *did* comes to those who wait, Templeton sneered.

Being quick, he quickly gulped down the food, and found a suitable word in the newspaper and tore it out. As quick as he could, he returned to the spider to hand it in.

It was late at night when he made it back. Once he had shown the spider the word and she had approved, she told him he could go off and enjoy the fair.

Templeton, glad he had gotten *that* over with, scurried out of the pigpen and out into the night. As he left, he found the mountains of food.
132.title: Good Things Come to Those Who Wait

1321.content:
Templeton, free of his duties, proceeded to do what he came to do; binge without end. Scrambling about the fair, he began to eat anything he could lay his hands on, leftover hotdogs, burgers, cotton candy, popcorn and many other discarded treasures. As he ate, his belly began to swell and bloat, but he paid no heed to this, and would continue to gorge himself until made immoblie.

It was only after an hour or so of eating, that Templeton found himself to engorged to carry on, and thusly, he lay atop mounds of food and other trash, licking his sticky paws. A laid back and belched, patting his enormously swollen gut, letting it quiver and slosh as it attempted to digest its contents.

Belching again, Templeton collapsed onto his back, belly groaning in frustration, distending high into the air and blocking his vision. For a while, he stroked his overfull stomch, moaning with the pleasure of being so stuffed. But it wasn't long after this that he began to feel tired, and so he closed his eyes and began to rest.
1321.title: A veritable smorgasbord

choices: Eat the food and *then* go home.
13211.content:
Templeton fell fast asleep, his stomach gurgling and burbling...

When he woke up, it was close to morning. Nothing had reopened, so he still had time to get back to the pen before people showed up. He looked at his gigantic stomach. It was gigantic and wobbling like jelly everytime he breathed.

Struggling, Templeton had to get going fast. Huh, that was a laugh. He managed to roll over, hoping to get on all fours, but his now massive stomach brushed against the ground. Moaning and complaining uncomfortably, he began to drag his bloated body across the fair towards the pen. He was in a bit of a drunken-like stupor as he went.

Finally, the pen was in sight. He was almost there. He needed to get there before people showed up and tried to get him. He probably had a half hour. But then he saw another pile of food nearby. It wasn't too big, but maybe he could get to it and eat it all before everyone came back.
13211.title: Fattening Fate

choices: Can't Reach the Pen; Plan B
Rest, Relax, Eat More the Next Night!
132112.content:
Templeton looked at the pen, and back at the food...his stomach began to growl louder than before, he slapped at his over-indulged swell and spat "Oh quiet! I'm the one making the decisions here..." and he tapped his chin and stared at the pile with greedy eyes.

Without another moment's hesitation Templeton worked his heavy body forward, heaving his girth before him and sloshing closer to the pile of food. His mouth began drooling again, leftover peels, a half of a very large sadwich, some varying candy bits and a few more treats, oh what a glorious day for this rat, he thought. Templeton tried to hasten himself, his feet working to rise above his plump body, but he managed only to trip up his pace and he quickly found himself rolled forward twice, landing rump-side up. The ball of fur and bulk wobbled and he finally turned himself upright, facing the pile of delectable food.

He gulped, at first his belly groaned as he had not realized just how large the pile now was up close...but he grinned slyly and shoved his greedy, greedy face into the mess and began forcing large mouthfuls of the food into his throat and further-engorging his body. His fat little tail waved wildly as he ate and ate, his rear end and middle growing steadily larger with every swallow, every quiver.

Several moments had gone by, and Templeton sat amongst shredded paper and crumbs, a large gray orb. His head surrounded in his bulk on the very top, almost sunken in, he hiccupped and smiled toothily, patting proudly at whatever sides he could feel, his arms had such trouble reaching much of anything now. He'd not felt like he could explode before, but Templeton decided that this was as close to what it must feel like as he'd experienced. An answer of quick relief to that sensation came in a sudden passing of gas. A shiver down the blubbery rat's body and a mental laugh at his state of being...he had nothing to worry about...

He hiccupped again and went wide-eyed, the pen! He still had to get back! He looked over his bulk, barely seeing much else than himself, and so he oozed forward to get a better view...oh that pen...it looked so much farther away now...how much time had gone by? He didn't want it to stop, he was so bloated right now, but there was surely more food. He was THE rat, he could take it down...a hefty belch left his lips and he moaned, rocking in his spot and rolling forward towards the pen. There'll be more...
132112.title: Nothing Left to Waste

choices: Templeton eats until daybreak without stop
1321122.content:
Templeton struggled and wobbled and waddled until he finally reached the pen. It had taken fifteen minutes, but he finally was able to reach the pen. He poked his head up and over the edge of it.

He saw the pig and the spider looking at something.

He belched rudely. "I'm back," he said.

The pig and spider saw him, and they went to greet him.

Templeton was just barely able to hoist himself up and over the pen wall. "What a night," he moaned. He landed on his belly, which sloshed inside him. "Never have I seen such leavings." He began to roll and waddle his way over to them. "Everything well ripened, seasoned with the passage of time and the heat of the day... Oh, it was just rich, my friends, *rich*!" he said cheerfully. He reached the pig and rolled over onto his back, leaning against the pig's leg and finally resting.

"You ought to be ashamed of yourself," the spider scolded. "It would serve you right if you had an acute attack of indigestion."

Templeton held down a belch and started patting whatever he could get to. "My stomach can handle anything," he said cheerfully.

"Templeton," the pig stated. "If you weren't so dopey, you'd have noticed that Charlotte has made an egg sac."

Templeton looked lazily up into the corner of the pen. He squinted until he saw the egg sac. He simply belched. "Hurray for Charlotte," he murmured, trying to get to sleep.

The pig wouldn't have it. "She's going to become a mother! For you information, there are five hundred and fourteen eggs in that peachy little sac."

"This *has* been a night," Templeton sighed. Deciding all they wanted to do was talk, he rolled back onto his stomach and dragged and rolled himself across the ground towards the crate. Once he got there, he buried himself in the straw and went to sleep...

When he woke up, it was nighttime again. Templeton moaned. Everyone had gone to sleep. And not surprisingly, he was starved. His stomach had stopped swelling up, and so it was a little easier to move.

Shifting his girth, Templeton waddled out of the crate and back into the nighttime of the fair. Sure enough, the place was loaded with more food. Even more than before.

Quickly as he could, Templeton dove into the meals that awaited him.

Edit: This whole scene can be depicted here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qxO9_CQTE...
1321122.title: Egg Sac

choices: Templeton heads back to the pen where a surprise awaits him...
13211221.content:
Templeton was just about to go where he had gone last night, over by the rides, when an idea struck him. The midway was where all the food stands were, right? He began to drool. To the midway it was!

When he got there, he stopped for a moment and stood looking at the stands. It was all so good, he couldn't stand it. He chuckled to himself and sneered, "If only that stupid spider and dumb pig could see me now! This rat's day has finally come! What a feast I see before me! This fair is a treasure trove of hidden wonders for a rat! Tonight I make history for all of ratdom!"

At his feet was a rotting banana, which the greedy rat shoved into his mouth even though it was still in the peel. He saw, not far away, an untouched candy apple drenched in sticky caramel that some careless kid must have dropped. He leaped over to it and within seconds, devoured the whole thing. Pausing for a second, Templeton decided that he would climb up the stand next to him to get a better view of the area around him.

As he was climbing the stand, he smelled something. He began to drool as he neared the top. When he had reached the top, he saw what the source of the smell was, and his eyes bulged in disbelief. Laying in front of him was the biggest watermelon he'd ever seen in his life. He ran up to it and with his sharp claws, he cut a hole in the melon's rind just large enough for him to fit through. Diving into the soft, juicy inside of the watermelon, he quickly ate the entire melon, including the rind from the inside out.

Once the entire watermelon was in his belly, Templeton patted it and smiled, slowly bringing himself to his feet. He was a bit top-heavy as his stomach had gained a bit of size, and he stumbled, falling into the cotton candy maker that was behind the stall. Templeton rolled around in the machine until he'd eaten every last bit of cotton candy and then slowly climbed out and back onto the stall. By now, Templeton was feeling quite thirsty.

He saw at the end of the stand, a pitcher of lemonade. Templeton crawled up the sign for the stand, and when he was high enough, jumped into the pitcher. Swimming around in the juice, which was sour from having been left out all day, he toook big gulps, drinking every last drop that he could, and then using his now considerable bulk, tipped the pitcher over.

The pitcher tipped over the side, spilling him in a bag of stale popcorn. Templeton grinned happily while filling his belly with the salty treats. Once the bag was empty, he crawled out. He attempted to stand, but again, his hugely swollen belly sent him lurching forward as he fell head first into a wedge of moldy cheese which was gone in a few seconds.

Templeton sat up and rubbed his belly grinning happily. He hiccuped twice, causing him to roll over onto his back, and his engorged belly to slosh back and forth. He hiccuped again. He really thought that he ought to be getting back to the pen now, but then... He couldn't see the sun rising just yet, so maybe he still had time to do some more exploring. He reached beside him and picked up a monstrous chicken breast lying on the ground next to him. Stripping all of the meat from the bone, he smiled happily again after eating it, and he patted his belly. Slowly he stood up, careful not to fall over this time. He had to do something at any rate...
13211221.title: Templeton eats until daybreak without stop

132112211.content:
Templeton promptly began waddling further into the midway, grabbing bits of food as he went. Bits of cookies, hot dogs, pies, and much more artery-clogging goodness.

Then he saw a stand that had a triple-layer cake on top of it. He immediately started climbing up. He started eating through it, and within minutes, the entire cake was gone, and he was licking the plate it was on for icing. Then he turned and found a bunch of cupcakes under a glass dome. He removed the dome and started eating the cupcakes as fast as he could, tossing the paper aside as he went.

Then he saw the ice cream stand. It had an ice cream machine in the back. Eagerly, Templeton hauled his body over towards it. Soon he had positioned his mouth under the nozzle of the machine, and he pulled down the handle that opened it. Soon, cold vanilla ice cream was pouring down into his mouth. Grinning happily, he snapped the lever, allowing all the contents of the machine to pour inside him...

Fifteen minutes later, Templeton had emptied the ice cream machine. Now he was a quivering blob. His stomach had now stretched out beyond expectations. With his entire night's gluttony packed inside of him, he was now an almost gelatonous mass, rippling everytime his tried to move. Lying on his back, his legs and arms had been absorbed into his body, so he found himself struggling to move for a long time. Finally, however, he was able to roll over onto stomach, the contents inside of it gurgling as he went. He reached out ahead of himself and dragged himself across the table and down on to the ground.

For the first time in his life, he felt full.
132112211.title: Ice Cream

1321122112.content:
Templeton may have felt full, but he was no longer controlled by his brain, all of his thoughts were on his stomach. He had to feed it, he had to give it more, for it demanded more. It deserved to be fed everything it could possibly fit inside of it, and there was still room to grow. So as such it would still grow.

Templeton rolled towards a funnel cake even though his arms and legs were tucked under his stomachs mass as if his stomach itself were moving him towards it. He opened his mouth as he came close, soon his face was embedded in the sweet fried cake and it made its way into his stomach which stretched larger with it. Then he began to roll towards a whole bushel of bananas perfectly ripe for his mouth to consume. He rolled on top of them forcing them from their skins and one after another into his mouth expanding himself more and more with each one. He hiccuped and smiled, drunk from the feast, but it was not yet done. Secretly a small piece of him wished the feast were done, the sensations running through his stomach were overwhelming, still he would have more.

One morsel after another as if his stomach sensed more to consume, he made his way over to, and then devoured with his insatiable appetite. He grew and grew with every swallow, an orb pushing in all directions. Hours of this passed, and as the sun began to crack over the horizon it illuminated an unimaginable sight, Templeton loomed over the fair a massive orb of gluttony with a tiny head in the center unable to even see over its own stomach except straight up. He hiccuped again, and suddenly he noticed a crowd had gathered around.
1321122112.title: Keep eating.

132112212.content: well, is it good or bad?
132112212.title: Surprise?

choices: Knock over the can, go on glutting (or back to pen)
Rest in the can for now, get out later.
1321122121.content:
As he waddled back to the pen, rubbing and patting his soft burbling belly along the way, the bubbly rat greedily looked about for anymore traces of food. Even after glutting an untold amount of goodies, Templeton didn't want it to end right away. Eating was the passion of his life, and this fair was a dream come true. Sadly, much of what he passed by were hunting grounds which he already cleared. Looking down at his enormous belly, he wore a mirthful smile as he patted it tenderly; sloshing it's rich contents about.

"We've certainly done a lot of work haven't we?"

His stomach bubbled in reply. Much of his waddle back to the pen consisted of cheerful patting and belly rubs to sooth his, minuscule boredom. Finally, his shifting eyes spotted something he had missed earlier. Like most of the fair, it was yet another trash can sitting there unattended. Though the thought of climbing didn't suit him, it was a chance for a final glut before returning to the pen. So, sticking his belly out, he heartily played it like a drum before going over to a nearby table.

And as if things couldn't get any better, the table was filled with all types of goodies. So without hesitation, Templeton dived into his latest meal. Gathering up all the french fries scattered around the table, he poured around the enormous stack some ketchup. It was about two heads taller than him, and wider than two of his own body. He didn't even bother to grab the fries, but tackled the mountain and did what he does best. Ketchup messily splattered all over his already sticky and grease/condiment colored fur, which he licked clean off. Mouthfull after mouthfull he felt his feast cram deeper into his awaiting stomach; the pressure building up at his sides, back and middle. Furiously, the rat's bubbling swell groaned in displeasure, but under the will of a voracious rodent, what choice did it have. Dwindling down the stack, he picked up the final batch of fries, and stuffed them in his mouth; both paws literally shoving it down his throat.

Licking his lips, the rat moved on to a bucket of fried chicken legs, possibly shared by a family; a rich family who didn't seem to care about leaving it seemingly untouched. Oh well, more for me, thought the rat. Dumping the bucket over, he began to rip meat from bone, then tossing what was left over aside. This went on for a good 15 minutes until he came to the last chicken breast. Hiccuping loudly, he rested the breast on his obscenely bloated belly while he ate. Groaning fiercely, the rat didn't care for it's complaints, only that it had to hold more. With how incredibly packed it felt from the inside, he had more than reached his capacity. But still he ate on, going around physical boundaries.

Finally finishing his feast, the over gorged rat, plopped his back on the table. Running his paws through his furry bulk, he squeezed at it; enjoying every inch. "That'll do stomach, Hic, that'll do." Overwhelmed by how much he had eaten, his stomach sloshed on top of him, allowing him to softly nuzzle it, along with licking some of the flavors that splashed on it. Never in his life had he seen his furry coat so filthy, and yet, so abundant; a true symbol of his gluttony, and certainly a trophy to bring back to the farm.

Suddenly, it struck him. "The trash can." He had forgotten his whole reason for climbing up the table. Rumbling so ferociously his own body trembled, Templeton's belly knew what the rat was thinking. "Be quiet. This was the whole reason we climbed up here. You're my stomach and you stop when I say you stop!"

Dragging himself over the edge, his eyes sparkled as he gazed over what was inside. If the table was a feast, this was that multiplied by 3. It must have all belonged to rich people, almost all of what was inside wasn't even touched. Corn dogs, popcorn, soda, fries, ribs, all of it seemingly unfinished. Unable to wait any longer, he dropped down, hitting the surface with a massive squelch, sending ripples throughout his body. Having landed directly on his middle, the rat grunted in pain for a bit. Too much of his undigested materials crashed into the more smaller organs of the body. But he allowed it to pass him by, as he stuffed himself further; getting absolutely more fatter, and more delighted.

An hour passed, and moans could be heard (if there was other life at the fair) coming directly from the trash can. An hour straight of nothing but over eating had certainly done a number on Templeton. His stomach was so incredibly over satiated, it touched the edge of the trash. Not for one second did it cease burbling and gurgling, trying at any rate to free up space, only for it's master to put it through more torment; or pleasure. And after all this, Templeton still ate the little that remained, but slowly of course. Having enjoyed such a heavy meal, the rat felt drowsy. Too drowsy to finish the remaining piece of funnel cake, or even to move around. Yawning and creasing a sloppy smile over his chubby face, he rubbed a single paw over the wide expanse of his own body.

"Oooooohh, I look forward to such gluttonous abandon the next time we come. My stomach can handle anything." At this he lazily dropped his paw three times, sending undulating waves about and sloshing it mightily, Without a second thought, he stuffed what remained of the funnel cake down his throat, and smiled widely. The sugary treat pleasurably sliding down his large throat and joining the entire colony of food inside his ungodly visage. Resting both paws to his soft stomach, massaging it tenderly, he looked up. It was still quite dark out, and, as insane as it was, he thought about further eating. Now, he was unbelievably full, and would love nothing more than to finally rest with the amazing achievement that was his bulky burbling swell. But his last words gave him some inspiration to continue. On the other paw, he was quite tired, and the thought of tossing over the trash can didn't quite please him. So, he closed his eyes. Thinking about the decision he should make.
1321122121.title: A Real Good Surprise

choices: Check back to see if Wilbur and Charlotte are still here
13211221212.content:
Comfortably dozing off, Templeton enjoyed the most peaceful sleep he ever had in his rattie life. He dreamt of how he started the whole experience, from the moment he left the pen. Eyes shut, his tiny footpaws scampered around, and his mouth licked up the imaginary food. It was such a pleasant dream, one which brought out mirthful giggles, which bounced his large belly around.

Suddenly, he was awakened by a loud bang. Looking up, he noticed the sun had came up long ago, and he heard the voice of humans moving around. Templeton began to panic. Though his stomach had digested most of his nights gluttony, it had actually gained in size from digesting most of it’s contents into fat. Though the softness would’ve pleased him under different circumstances, he was too frightened to think of an escape attempt.

“Uuuggh, look at all this garbage,” spoke a male voice, “these country folk never clean up after themselves do they?”

“Quit complainin’ and do your job,” spoke another man.

“Yeah yeah, sorry ma.”

Templeton’s grew so frightened he was able to hear his heart beat, which caused him to clutch his plush chest in an attempt to make it stop. As if it couldn’t of gotten worse, his stomach began groaning in hunger, which caused him to slap it. “Ssshh, they’ll hear you.”

“Hmm, hey Chuck?”

“Yeah?”

“What do we do with the empty trash cans?”

“Oh no,” panicked Templeton, “what’re they going to do to me?” Terrible thoughts rampaged through his mind like a hornets nest. Nobody liked rats, especially ones as big as himself (which would be a first). He’d probably be, stepped on, or kicked in the face, or crushed or bruised, or lacerated or scared or biffed. But more important, all he had worked for the past nights would go to waste. So, he patted his stomach for what might be the last time, and began to sob.

“Eh, if there’s nothing in them just dump what garbage you find in them. No point in emptying what’s already empty.”

Suddenly, as he looked up, Templeton say a large bag opening up like the mouth of a frightening beast, only a blessing had happened. Before he could comprehend what was going on, he was buried (and nearly crushed) by a ton of smelly, rotten, sour food and drinks. It was so cramped, that the minute he noticed what had fallen on top of him, he ate for breathing room. Moldy cheese, banana peels, rotten apples, peanuts, and sour butter dripping off half nibbled corn cobs, were devoured silently but quickly, until he had just enough room to feel comfortable and see the sky from under the papers, wrappers, and bags.

“Should we take the trash can’s out of here? You know, replace them?”

“Nah, leave em, the crowds are gunna use them right away anyways. See, here they come now.”

Still rather nervous, Templeton remained hidden under the trash. Fortune had favor his bold journey of feasting on this trash rather than go back to the pen last night, and who knows, perhaps this would be a good thing. And boy it was indeed. As time passed, more people gathered, and as more people gathered, they were lured by the aromas of food, and after consuming said food (or consuming half of it), they would throw it away. Which needless to say, made Templeton one big fat happy rat. Family after family would come to his part of the fair. The rich families, who would throw away food in excess and not care about how much they would spend, which gave Templeton lots to gorge on while he stayed hidden. Corn dog after hot dog after burger after corn cob after pop corn bag after sloppy joe after soda pop after funnel cake, whatever was thrown away, under the wrappers, Templeton plucked up and feasted on it merrily. It was a never ending supply of food being hurled away without any regard of being wasteful. But hey, if it went to feeding this rat, it went to a good cause, Templeton thought.

Since the rat never gave the trash can time to get full, nobody ever came to empty it. Hour after hour continued to pass, and Templeton went on glutting; resting a certain intervals, but never allowing the trash to become full. It was a risky and yet glorious game, which the rat considered himself a pro at. Needless to say, he grew incredibly fatter as time passed on, with his stomach uncomfortably squeezing against the trash can edges. But it didn’t stop him.

Instead he gave it a few congratulatory pats, “Hic-this fair is rat heaven. Hic-I don’t know how long this’ll last but I don’t want to stop.”

Growling loudly, like a lion, his stomach sent ripples throughout his body. Squeezing a large mound of his bulk, Templeton merely stuffed his face with another chunk of cake to spite it. “You don’t like it, too bad. I’m-Hic-enjoying myself.”

As sunset came, Templeton busied himself on two barely nibbled on apples, while listening to the festivities outside. He had heard all kinds of things from these humans. Gossip, fights, merriment, laughter, and even challenges such as eating contests. At this he scoffed. “I’d wipe the floor with ten of you humans combined.”

“Ladies and gentlemen,” shouted a loud voice. “It is my pleasure to announce, Zukerman’s famous pig!”

There was a loud cheering, and at this Templeton nearly dropped the apples and perked up his ears. The loud voice spoke about Wilbur’s ordeal and the miracle that happened at the farm. The a song was sung, and a medal was awarded. The fairground was alive with cheering and shouting, which really annoyed Templeton, but nothing more than all the glorifying Wilbur and Charlotte got. Never once was everyone’s favorite rat included in the glorifying. No, thank you Templeton for fetching words, which without you Charlotte would never have her words, and the junk yard a few miles away was more than enough to keep you alive until another pig came to the farm.

Templeton scoffed, and then giggled. It was all a big joke, but not as big as his titanic body. This whole fair experience was more rewarding than a thousand medals, and Templeton would wear it (or carry it) with pride.

Night had finally come, and the crowds had ceased. Finishing off what remained in the trash, Templeton rocked it back and forth, until it was finally knocked over, and he struggled to pull himself out. Having been scrunched up for so long, he didn’t realize how big he had gotten until he used some left over butter to rub himself out. The farther he reached the edge, the more impressed he was with his growth. Even at the edge he could still feel his waist touching the rim. It was incredible, ungodly. The massive amount of food he had eaten throughout the day, from hours and hours of eating just until nightfall. Templeton had grown (to his knowledge) as large as any blue ribbon winning pig. Or maybe as big as a dog; an incredibly obese dog.

Groaning and moaning, Templeton’s limbs were too numb to crawl just yet. His tail was just like a little piece of string attached to his enormous rump. His back as soft and plushy as a pillow. And his belly, too massively swollen for words too describe. Coming out of the trash can certainly allowed it to flow, and caused Templeton to sigh in euphoric pleasure; like unbuttoning after a huge meal. Stroking his massive amount of sloshing blubber and fur, his face scrunched up against the dirt floor, he peeked at the sight before him.

Too content to drool over it, he estimated that there was more food now than the night before. But should he really eat more, after what he thought was a 14 hour binge? Rolling over on his back, his gurgling, lard filled stomach rolled over him in pleasing-undulating waves. Not once did he drop his smile, and not once did he regret having eaten so much. Instead he played with his corpulent mass, tossing it about and rolling around. Having such a plentiful amount of body also slightly increased his height, which now enabled him to knock over trash cans with his sheer weight.

His chubby face, sunken into most of his body, erupted in a large grin as his body merrily jiggled and bounced around.

“That was just lunch,” said the enormous rat, “Time for dinner.”
13211221212.title: 14 hours of gluttony

133.content:
Gazing out at the wondrous goodies they passed as Wilbur's crate was carted to his stall had tempted Templeton all day, as he sat waiting in the pen. And now it was time. 'Screw the Pig,' He thought, and his stomach angrily growled an agreement, and this thought was quickly followed by another,'It's time for Templeton to glot.'
And so without further contemplation, both Wilbur and Charlotte were abandoned to the nights promise of a glorious feast.
Templeton found half of a hotdog, and shoved down his waiting gullet, and then he spotted the first stop on his wild gorging frenzy.
Lying on the ground were a few half-eaten pretzels, as well as about thirty-eight strawberries, two bananas, four pears, and three apples, all ripe and just waiting for a certain ratty someone to gobble them down.
Lurching forward, Templeton sat down in the middle of the feast.
Greedy claws grabbed and dragged a pear closer to him, while his tail, almost with a mind of it's own, snaked around the stem of a strawberry. Templeton took a chunk out of the pear, revelling in the sweet juices it provided, and then swallowed it greedily, already shoving more pear in his face. That, too quickly vanished, and Templeton's tail snaked forward, to shove the whole strawberry into his mouth, which was gasping for air. This cycle continued for a while, untill Templeton had eaten all of the pears and apples, and half of the strawberries. Then, hind legs sliding a bit wider, to accomidate for his growing girth, Templeton slid as many of the strawberries as he could in his maw with one arm, while the other shoved them down his gullet. Berries gone, Templeton laboriously dragged his hiccuping mass to the pretzels, decimating them three at a time, each claw clutching one, and his tail wielded the third. Six pretzels later, the enormous rat collapsed on his bulge, heaving belly sloshing indignantly.
Food drunk, Templeton mistook this for something else, and slapped his gargantuous gut mightily,
"HILP! good i-HILP!-dea. let's UUUURRRP!! more."
The woozy rat struggled to stand upright, but his overhanging belly pulled him back down, falling dirctly on the tiny bunch that consisted of two and a half-eaten bananas.
they flew out of their peels, except for the half-one, which simply smeared on his mighty tummy.
Swiftly, Templeton rolled onto his back, pushing away the rolling mass that threatened to stifle him. He only had one chance to make this, and already his vision was fuzzy.
the bananas flew to earth, and seemed to hurtle themselves into his awaiting gullet. The first got stuck halfway through, but the other flew down, straight into his heaving gut.
Struggling, Templeton rolled back onto his expansive stomach, nd began to massage it soothingly, feeling the chunks of his feast that he hadn't bothered to chew, letting out rich belches and an increasing number of hiccups. Dazed, Templeton could actually feel the massive gorge digesting, covering him in flab.
half an hour later, enough paunch had collected on his back and rear that he could pull himself up and waddle on, exploring his growing self. his legs had plumped up enough that he could carry his still sloshing belly, which carried most of the buttery-soft fat, and his arms had swelled equally. A second chin had formed, and the belching rat's doughy, once-slender tail, now three-times as thick, swayed to and fro, snagging goodies he himself hadn't seen.
Finally, the fat rat came to a halt, his almost-bowling ball belly bouncing wildly.
Templeton stared up at the table for a moment, before trying to climb it.
chubby claws dug fiercly into the wood, as his weight gave him leverage to claw painstakingly upward.
many minutes later, Templeton wound up on the table, breathing laboriously.
Then a delectable scent floated towards him, and he stared, momentarily in awe at the feast that spread out before him, dwarfing his previous 'snack' greatly.
133.title: Pigging out

1331.content:
Apparently a birthday party had ended early because there was a huge chocolate cake spread out across the table, along with half-melted ice cream, soda pop, potato chips and egg salad.

"Ohhh," Templeton grinned, rubbing his swell with anticipation. "It's somebody's birthday alright!"

And he dove in, Kamikaze style, his mouth wide open and his teeth bared. He landed in the cake face first, covering himself in the icing. He munched and slurped messily and loudly, unable to contain his joy at the euphoria of sugar and starch that he was consuming. He stopped for a moment and looked around, considering something, and then he grinned when he had an idea. He got up, waddled over to an ice cream container and dumped the half-melted contents all over the cake. He did the same with the other two ice cream containers, followed by the chips and egg salad, until he had one great big rancid concoction.

"I have my best ideas when I'm hungry," he grinned.

And he dove back in, slurping and munching and crunching and literally swimming. "A fair is a verrrrrrritable smorgasbord - orgasbord - orgasbord! Now I shall stuff my gut!" he sang between bites. "All this food that the folks have left shall go inside - make me wide - let them slide - down my throat as my mouth shuts!"

Soon, he had nearly demolished the entire thing, and he was covered in ice cream and icing. He cleaned himself off with a bottle of soda, and then down a few others himself, catapulting his stomach outwards even further. Content to have made short work of the table, he heaved himself over the edge of the table, where he landed on not one - not two - but three bananas, causing all three to burst free of their respective peels and send them rocketing into the air. He leaned back, opened his mouth, and allowed all three to slide down his throat and into his stomach. His stomach stretched even wider, pushing further ahead to make room.

Templeton leaned back, looking at the massive fuzzy balloon that lay before him, giving him a rather heavy feeling. He let out a huge belch and patted it feverishly.

"Birthday cake and melted ice cream. Bananas, chips and...probably something else soon," he sang. He heaved himself to his hind legs and forged onwards, trying to navigate with his new-found gravity. He staggered on towards another picnic table, and with surprising grace, he bounded up to the top and found even more food, which he sang about as he stumbled along.

"Apple pies, and double-Decker sandwiches! Jumbo hotdogs, buttered popcorn, candy, and lots of super-fatt'ning food that can make me rounder still!"

He ate all this and then some, until the table was completely bare. He staggered on ahead, and after looking over each edge of the table for something safe to land on, he was satisfied to find a huge spilled bag of cookies. Despite now having a stomach the size of a watermelon, he did a graceful swan dive into the bag, which he devoured in seconds.

"Ohhhhhhh...," he moaned. "Sooooooooooooooooooooooo... Goooooooooooooooood..."

Letting out a huge belch, he staggered upwards onto his hind legs, leaning back against the table, looking at the huge globe in front of him. He grinned at how far ahead it was stretching.

"I...can...handle...anything...," he panted.

Taking a look around, he was pleased to spy a stall that read "DOUGHNUTS". Licking his lips, he made a run for it, stumbling and tripping a bit, but he made it in one piece.

He went around to the back and found the supply: chocolate iced, glazed, sprinkles, custard filled, jelly filled, creme filled...

"Time for dessert," he snarled, getting a determined glint in his eye.

And he dove straight in, grabbing tray after tray of doughnuts, stuffing them all into his mouth. He got covered in icing all over again, but he didn't care. He'd just lick it all off later on. "More...," he whined, grabbing his tenth tray. "Gotta have more... Getting bigger.... SO full... So heavy.... Stuff.... Stuff... STUFF!!"

And an hour later, he was done.

Twenty trays demolished.

And a rat the size of a beach ball sat in the middle of it, leaning against the pile.

Templeton gasped for breath. "Can't...move...," he moaned. "Can't...breathe... I think...I'll just...HILP! ...stay here... Have a li'l...nappy-nap..."

But then he saw something that scared him - morning!

The people would be coming soon! He couldn't stay here!

Ignoring the protests from his gurgling stomach, Templeton managed to stagger upright. Most of his feast had been digested by now, coating him in a fresh layer of flab. Hiccuping and belching and moaning, the huge rat managed to waddle out of the stall and off to look for a place to hide.
1331.title: An untouched birthday spread

choices: Templeton wakes up when the dumpster is emptied
Templeton wakes up when the dumpster is filled
13311.content:
There was no way he'd be making it back to Wilbur's pen today, not in the state he was in. The errand that had brought him to the fair in the first place had been pushed fully out of his mind, replaced with dreams of gorging himself until he burst. For now, though, he would retreat and recuperate.

The doughnut stand was close to the back of the midway, and Templeton saw- or smelled, rather- a dumpster nearby. He stumbled over towards it, clutching his stomach to stop it from tripping him up. The rat had climbed into many dumpsters in his day, and he scaled this one with ease- well, after his bulk dragged him back to the ground on his first two tries. On the third climb, he pulled himself over the top, and with a sigh of triumph, he dove into the pile of garbage.

A swarm of flies quickly dispersed as the bulging, furry stranger went tumbling into the mound of rotting food. Once his stomach had stopped wailing in protest at the rough treatment, Templeton poked his head out from under the pile. He suddenly realized-

He was neck deep in another glorious meal.

The plan had been to sleep and get ready to go out again at night, but since he'd already digested most of his previous gorge, well, it wasn't like he didn't have room for more. And the delectable mix of tastes and smells inside the dumpster was a whole world different than the leftovers he'd eaten outside. As he contemplated resuming the feast, his belly let out a timid gurgle of protest, as if begging him to stop.

"No," Templeton declared simply, coming to his decision. He reached for the nearest piece of food- a half-eaten, soggy hot dog- and shoved it down his throat whole, as if to punish his stomach for daring to complain at all. Stretching his stubby arms in all directions, he began shoveling edibles towards himself, his greedy mouth agape and waiting to welcome them.

Within minutes, the rat had settled into a comfortable rhythm, establishing a steady flow of food down his throat and into his belly. He gorged so quickly and so efficiently that not even the flies could escape his him, and he giggled whenever he felt them buzzing around helplessly in his gut. Each new bite had a new and exciting flavor, but it didn't matter if it was good or bad. Templeton was a true glutton, and what he was eating didn't matter nearly as much as the very act of eating itself. He swallowed as much as he could reach, groaning with excitement as his stomach filled up and bulged outwards.

By the time he paused for a break, he had put a solid dent in the pile of garbage, and the flies were too afraid to even come near him. He lounged lazily, an air of satisfaction about him, leaning against some as-yet uneaten treats. His enormous, aching belly moaned gratefully at the reprieve, and forced out an enormous belch. The taste was thoroughly rancid.

"Whatever's in there isn't- uurrrrp- mixing well," he said with a grin, and his miserable stomach bobbed its agreement, gurgling with indigestion. Templeton reached down and gave it an affectionate pat. The way his stomach struggled against the onslaught of food was insanely pleasurable. It could have held more, sure, but for now, he was content to relax and enjoy the rewards of his long night of gorging himself. He closed his eyes and fell asleep with a smile on his fat face.
13311.title: He hides in a dumpster.

choices: Templeton is discovered and forced to run for it
13312.content:
Templeton stumbled towards the first stall he saw, his new girth making it a bit hard for him to stay on course. He collapsed from exhaustion the moment he made it. The trek hadn't been long, but the effort made his stomach groan with renewed hunger.

"A little snack before bedtime can't hurt," he mumbled to himself, pushing a paw into his vast flab. He squinted upwards and sniffed the air to determine what food was available.

He'd ended up at a stall that served roasted ears of corn.

Templeton dragged himself over to where the food was stashed. He grabbed the nearest ear, rested it on his fat belly, and nibbled the kernels off one by one. They were rich in flavor, roasted and buttery. In an instant, he was finished, and he reached for another. Three more ears of corn later, and he was still painfully unsatisfied.

"It's not enough," he groaned. The tiny bites of corn were too small, and they disappeared into his body so rapidly that he could barely feel himself eating at all. He was resigned to seeking out his edibles elsewhere when he got a wonderful idea. He lifted a third ear of corn and pulled it close.

"Instead of eating them bit by bit," he crowed, "I can just swallow them whole! Bottoms up!" He tilted the ear upwards and opened his mouth wide. Lowering the tip of the full ear of corn into his mouth, he began to swallow, forcing his throat to expand to accomodate it. Templeton moaned with strain and pleasure as he forced the food into his body, his chubby arms pushing as his throat pulled. His stomach bulged outwards to impossible dimensions as the corn dropped into his stomach with a noisy plop, signaling his triumph over his over-large meal.

Templeton let out a loud hiccup, grunted in satisfaction, and grabbed another. The corn was smooth and buttery, and it slipped down his throat with increasing ease as he settled into a good rhythm. His stomach stretched generously, quivering around the large, oddly-shaped load. Occasionally, an ear of corn would shift, causing part of his stomach to bulge outward strangely, but his belly always got everything back into a place that was comfortable.

As he clutched the very last ear of corn, Templeton paused to give his stomach a pat. It responded by groaning miserably, stretched to the limit and weighed down by an onslaught of far too much big, solid food. Templeton could feel every single heavy ear of corn pressing against his insides, struggling to burst free. This time, it wasn't about gorging himself on mouthful after mouthful of delicious rotten food. This time, he was forcing his body to stretch itself to the limit, all for the pleasure of forcing his throat and stomach to do the impossible.

"One more," he rasped, and he lifted the ear high above his waiting mouth. He swallowed it like he'd swallowed the others, forcing it down with his hands, guiding the massive lump to its place at the peak of a mountain of corn that had settled in his stomach.

Templeton licked his lips and belched.

"Better- uuuurp- find a place to sleep," he moaned, massaging his enormous gorge with both paws. Despite his plan to only eat a snack before going to bed, he was nearly as large as he'd been before, and just as heavy. With a pained groan, he dragged himself under one of the tables and crawled into an empty box to hide. As he went, the ears of corn inside of him shifted and bumped against each other, causing his belly to shiver.

He fell asleep with his face and paws resting on his swollen gut.
13312.title: He hides in another stall.

1332.content:
Apparently, There had been a pie-eating contest planned, but it had not been carried out.
Pies, of all shapes and sizes and with varting amounts of pieces taken from them, stretched out before Templeton.
A banner was draped along the edges of the sides of the table.
"Welcome to our Humble Contest!" It declared in thick red letters.
Immediantly, he stumbled forward, and fell, his bulk pulling him into a Key-lime pie.
Greedily, the rat opened his muzzle, and guzzled the green inside, only pulling his head out occasionally for sweet air.
As before, the rat's now-thickened tail snaked around, and grabbed chunks out of a nearby Apple pie, and shoved them down his gullet as he tried to gasp for air.
Soon, both pies were gone, vanished into Templeton's growing gut.
He took a moment's respite, and half-heartedly slapped his belly and watched, tantalized at the ripples in his blubber.
The skin of his rumbling tummy could stretched further than his fur, and there would have been alot of pink flesh exposed between hairs, but green goop, as well as smeared bits of apple and banana covered most of it.
Attempting to stand, Templeton was rewarded with only a mildly concerning squish, as gravity pushed him right back down again, now with his tremendous bulge on top of him. Templeton used his thick arms to push pack the flab, which threatened to stifle him.
"Oof!" he mumbled to it, as if trying to soothe it. Gases pushed their way up, out of his mouth as he spoke, leaving him with rich belches and hiccups, and slurring his speech a bit, "HILP! your gettin-HIC-HILP!- trickky and-UUUURRRRPP! move. HIC-HIC-HILP!!"
He slapped the gurgling mass again, and watched the violently rippling mass with glee.
Groaning with pleasure, he used his meaty claws to massage his swollen stomach, helping it digest his gorge.
And then it rumbled mightily
"ye-HIC!-ah, yoo sai-UUURRRRPPP!"
Decisively, Templeton managed to pull most of his mass forward, and now lay on it. rocking himself back and forth until he built up enough momentum to travel out of the tin, and on, to more pies.
Unfortunately, Templeton sailed, or rather, rolled, straight past one, and his weight dragged him down, off the table.
Frantically, his claws tried to catch on a strip of paper, aided by his flailing tail.
it did not work.
Templeton splatted on the ground with a groan, but it barely hurt.
His extra-thick layer of flab had protected his organs, and much of his gorge, but not even it had been enough to stop the food from slamming into the ground.
needless to say, Templeton's stomach groaned with him, and he was ready to soothe it agin, but he heard a high pitched squeak.
A sudden burst of adrenaline coursed through Templeton chillingly, as he considered what it might be.
HIs first and only thought was a cat.
managing to wobble himself precariously to a semi-sitting position, Templeton hiccuped nervously, and got a look, and it was........
1332.title: A bit more fuel, and then....

13321.content:
All that stood, err cowered, before Templeton was a small dusty grey She-rat. She was very skinny, so much in fact that her ribs jutted from below her skin her head was bowed in fright, and her bony tail was clutched in her claws.in an instant, she was on her knees, head bowed, as she stammered nervously,
“P-please…D-don’t make it hurt. J-just q-quick”
Quickly, her legs folded below her, and she practically kissed the ground before him, arms and claws coming to lie on the ground not far from him.
Templeton stood there for a moment not sure what to do.
His stomach growled angrily, the very sight of her making him feel like he was starving.
She was tiny, half the size Templeton had been before the fair, but her fur, her fur was lovely. It was like icing on a cupcake, long and thick, and it had a nice sheen.
She was still trying to bury her face into the dirt when Templeton started to shake and wobble with mirth.
He let out a sort series of laughs, interrupted thoroughly with hiccups and rich belches. Finally his outburst came to a halt, although his madly jiggling stomach was still quite active.
Finally, once he had released enough gases to speak, he grunted,
“Too bony. Besides, there’s too much food around here to even share”
Nervously, the She-rat laughed, and then unsteadily climbed to her feet. She fell, and Templeton watched, uncertain if he should help her.
He had never had much luck with females.
Suddenly, something in Templeton’s gut shifted, and he was irrevocably pulled forward. Tiny feet not being sufficient to move him anymore, Templeton rolled twice, and came to a halt beside her. He grabbed her tiny claw, and gently pulled her up to stand, not wanting to hurt her because she was so fragile. Her delicate claws were lost in his flab.
“Names Templeton” he grunted,
“Cyra” she replied, and then looked him in the eyes for the first time.
Every other She-rat Templeton had met had had yellow eyes. Even his mother’s eyes were golden. But yellow was gaudy, and overly much.
Cyra’s eyes were beautiful. Like her, they weren’t too much; they were both vivid and stunning, alluring and bewitching, classy and comely, dazzling and delightful, delicate and divine, elegant and enticing, graceful and grand, ravishing and refined, stunning and sublime.
They were silver.
Then she looked away, and at his massive gut. Then away again, shyly.
Templeton understood.
Carefully, he grabbed her claws again, and pulled them close.
She followed, and spread her arms wide, massaging his innards.
Templeton moaned with pleasure, as she aided his titanic tummy digest what was left of his gorge. The night was theirs.
~
Quite some time later, they wandered out again, in search of food for Templeton.
Cyra had already explained that she had a condition, that if she ate more than enough to keep her alive, she would helplessly regurgitate it.
At first, Templeton insisted that he could make it by himself, but eventually he broke down, letting her simply roll him along, handing him goodies she found. He was surprised at her strength. Nibbling on a pretzel, he smiled in bliss.
The real trouble came when they found a table.
They had a brief light argument, Templeton wanted to get up the table himself, so he could gorge with the full knowledge of what else there was. Cyra countered that it would be more preservative of his calories if he simply let her help him, handing the food down the table.
So…….
13321.title: Meet Cyra

133212.content:
At last, Templeton's opinion won.
So he climbed up the table.
Stretching, he managed to sink the remnants of his claws into the soft wood of the seat. It groaned wearily in protest of his weight. Then suddenly, Cyra was below him, pushing him higher, onto the wooden board.
The struggle repeated, this time onto the top of the table. Finally, breathing laboriously, Templeton lay on his back, resting from the exhaustive expense of energy. Quickly, Cyra was kneeling beside him, pushing him up to his feet.
"Told you" she muttered, but Templeton wasn't listening.
There were two small tables pulled together, each loaded with food.
On the first table, there was a tub of mashed potatoes, a stack of corn on the cobs, a big pan of cornbread, a bucket of fried chicken, a bigger pan of Macaroni and cheese, and a few Pizzas.
The second table had a bunch of burritos, a bucket of chips with a side of cheese, and what appeared to be a large pitcher of lemonade.
Unable to resist, Templeton rolled over to the tub of potatoes, and reached in with his paws, grabbing chunk after chunk of the still-steaming mess, and shoving them down his gullet. It wasn't until he could no longer reach more of the gooey mess that he considered that Cyra was there too. Turning,it he looked at her, white potatoes smeared all over his muzzle and much of his stomach.
Absently nibbling on a kernel of corn, she smiled at him, speaking simply in an awed tone,
"You're amazing"
Smiling toothily, Templeton realized for the first time that there was something wrapped around his thick tail.
Not that he could reach it, but it just felt uncomfortable.
Suddenly, she was there, unwrapping the paper from his pudgy tail.
"Humble" she read aloud.
Suddenly, Templeton remembered, the word! He was supposed to bring back a word. Well, this was a 'perfect' turn of events. He should turn back, and get it back there himself, but then again, he was here, surrounded by this food, he could just send Cyra to do it.
"Mind giving that to -HILP!-someone?" he asked, slurring his speech slightly.
she nodded
"Go to the -HIC!-pig pen's. HIs -HILP!-name is Wilbur"
She took another step towards him, and smiled, "Need some help?" she pushed him up, and into the half empty tub. Hiccuping with glee, Templeton Thanked her in between guzzling as much Potatoes as possible.
Then she was gone.
Templeton glutted in relative silence for a while, amind the gurgling sloshes of his tummy as it digested the meal.Then suddenly, there was no more potatoes. No more food in the tub.
Heaving, Templeton pushed himself up, onto his stomach.
he was able to see over the lip of it, and grabbed the edge with his paws.The distended stomach groaned, and sloshed indignantly, but Templeton quickly hushed it,
"Quiet. I'm-HILP!-getting us more food."
then he strained mightily, and plopped some of his gut out of the tub. another heave got him half out of the tub, and with a rich belch, he slid onto the table. hiccuping, his tail managed to wield a corn, and his paws grasping a second. Templeton devoured them, enjoying the sour flavor of the rancid butter, and when he finished the cob of one, he barely hesitated to stuff the empty cob into his far-from-empty tummy. In this manner, he had seconds. and thirds, and fourths, and fifths.
it wasn't until ten ears of corn filled his round belly that Templeton noticed an odd feeling in it. It felt unusually taunt. shrugging off the feeling, Templeton managed to swivel his gut towards the cornbread. Grabbing chunks and shoving them in his maw. Ignoring the increasing pain he felt in his belly as he shoved more and more down, Templeton glutted himself on the cornbread until it was gone.
Then he rubbed his sore distended mass tenderly, not sure he could swallow another bite. He felt sad, that his stomach had found it's limit, but he also felt a strange sense of peace, and he closed his eyes, a weary smile resting on his lips.
He rested.
Something touched his swolled middle, and Templeton jerked, exclaiming with the pain it caused him. It seemed his food had expanded in his gut, and now he seemed ready to burst. It was only Cyra there, and she quickly flicked away her tail, which had been resting on his distending stomach.
"Sorry" she placidly stated, "I gave that strip to a Spider named Charlotte, are you okay?"
Templeton grunted, and then belched richly,
"Sorry. uuughhhhh, feels like-HIC-HIC-HILP!!-m'gonna egsplode."
The release of gas dislodged some of the food he had eaten, and his belly bounced up and down wildly.
Impulsively, he patted it, and the touch felt good, like it was soothing his aching gut.
soon, bony claws massaged his tummy, and he giggled and beclhed richly with delight as he could literally feel his body changing the stuffed contents of his stomach into buttery blubber. Content, Templeton rested once more.
Before he knew it, hunger gnawed at the bloated rat's titanic tummy.
133212.title: The great Gorge

13322.content:
A big, fat, ugly cat was staring down its nose at him. Templeton swallowed hard. The cat's fur was patchy and ill-kept, but the animal was obviously well-fed. And large. Templeton was painfully aware of the fact that the cat could probably swallow him whole if it wanted to.

"Hello," said the cat conversationally.

"Hello back," said Templeton, clutching his massive belly for comfort.

"You here for the food?" asked the cat.

"Yes," said Templeton. He'd obviously been stuffing himself all night.

"Me too." The cat licked its lips, revealing many large, shiny, pointy teeth. Templeton swallowed hard. His stomach, previously so big and pleasurable, suddenly felt like an enormous anchor weighing him down.

"You don't seem like the type to eat pies," he said nervously.

"I'm not," said the cat.

It pounced.
13322.title: A chubby calico cat

choices: Gorge! Screw the cat, she can't find you!
Maybe you should listen to her. She looks like she won't hesitate to eat you.
133221.content:
Templeton looked away, not wanting to watch himself being eaten alive. Oh, what a horrible way to die! Templeton didn't want it to end this way. He wanted to live longer. He had so many goals in life he wanted to accomplish. He wanted to gorge on more food than what he could ever imagine. And here was this obese cat, coming up to him, about to end it all.
Templeton was too busy thinking about life and food that he didn't notice that the cat wasn't eating him. When he snapped out of his thoughts, he noticed an enormous turkey in front of him that he hadn't noticed before in his fear, and behind that, the even larger feline that had nearly ended his life, gorging herself on the delectable turkey, not paying much attention to Templeton. Templeton wasn't sure if the cat was waiting for him to try and escape before he ate him or if he was going to be eaten right after the turkey. Slowly, he asked, "Are you gonna eat me?"
The cat looked at Templeton for a second and observed him. Truth be told, she hadn't given much thought to the rat. She just wanted the turkey. But looking at Templeton now and taking a good look at him made the cat realize that she wanted the rodent in her belly. She began to salivate. The thought of all of that juicy meat just lying there was too much for her. Surely he would be even tastier than the other rat. Finishing off the last bite of the turkey, the cat walked over to Templeton. "I wasn't going to eat you before," she said. "I just wanted that turkey there." She rubbed her stomach, which grumbled despite it already being filled with an entire turkey and much more. "But now that you mention it, a little more meat couldn't hurt." She stepped forward and picked him up.
"Wait!" Templeton yelled. "Don't eat me! I, uh, have a special condition! If you eat me, you'll get very sick and die!"
"Oh, I just ate a rat minutes before I came upon you," the cat said. "He told me the same thing, but I gulped him up anyway, and he tasted delicious!" She patted her engorged stomach. "You look like you'll be even more delicious." She opened her mouth wide.
"No!" Templeton yelled. "I'll do anything!"
The cat stopped for a second and considered. On one hand, the rat was one big hunk of meat that she could easily gulp down. But then she realized that he said he would do anything. This rat could get her all of the food she wanted! All she needed to do was show off her teeth, make a couple of threats, and he would squeak in fear and get the food! It was perfect!
The cat closed her mouth, smiled, put Templeton down, and walked over the the hot dog stand next to them. She took out a bag of sausages from it and began to swallow them several at a time. "There is one thing you can do for me." She pointed around the fair. "There's so much food left over all around the grounds, all left uneaten by wasteful humans, which I'm sure you know. I want to eat it. All of it. I would go get the food myself, but given my current size, I can't do much." She patted her big belly for emphasis, which had considerably grown from the rat, turkey, and sausages she had just eaten. "Plus, why do it when someone else can do the work for you? So I want you to gather the food from the fair and bring it all to me. Every single morsel." Showing off her claws, she added, "And if you try to escape, or save anything for yourself, I will find you, and I will personally make sure that you add to my waistline." She threw aside the now-empty bag of sausages and took another bag of them from the cart. "Now go!"
Templeton, who had been frightened to death from the monstrous feline in front of him, scampered away. Great. Now he had to get food for the cat. It could've been for him, but noooo. He just happened to be unfortunate enough to run into the cat. As he looked around, he realized that he could make a run for it. After all, how would the cat know if he escaped? On one hand, he felt like she had no way of knowing where he went. However, Templeton got a chilly feeling that if he went there to gorge, the cat would somehow find him, and that would be the end for him. But was it worth the risk?
133221.title: He escapes! Kinda...

choices: He brings it all back to the cat
He can't resist eating it for himself.
1332212.content:
Deciding he liked breathing more than he liked eating - because if he breathed, it meant eating would come later - he went ahead and looked at the fair. The cat had been right. It was a gigantic plethora of abandoned foodstuffs lying all around, ready for the taking. He sighed sadly. So much of it could all go in his belly right now, but if he ate so much as a crumb, the cat would find out. He was sure of it. That big tub of lard would find him somehow. And given his current size, he wouldn't be able to escape forever.

But then, a thought occurred to him. He was too full to run. What if he made the cat too full to chase him? What if he filled her stomach with so much food she simply couldn't do anything? Perhaps he could find some way to fatten her up to the point of immobility. Make that stomach so large she couldn't do anything to stop him. Then he'd have the remainder of the fair for himself. He grinned to himself and prepared to gather the heaviest fattiest food he could find. He was going to have some fun with this.

It took about an hour, but he soon had a gigantic pile of discarded food on an old picnic quilt he'd found. It was a mound of rotting apples, squished bananas, half-eaten hotdogs, hamburgers, melted ice cream, and various other cholesterol-laden treats. Grinning to himself, he grabbed a corner and pulled the giant load to the cat.
1332212.title: Maybe you should listen to her. She looks like ...

13322121.content:
The food tempted Templeton, no doubt. But he knew that the cat would find out if he ate anything at all. He sighed. Looking down at his own body, it was obvious that he had burned some calories. While he was still very plump for a rat, his stomach was noticeably thinner, but still big enough to tempt the cat.
Huffing and puffing, Templeton reluctantly walked back while dragging the food behind him. Upon his arrival, he looked around and saw a couple of empty hot dog carts, a few plastic bags scattered around, a tablecloth with freshly emptied bowls sitting atop it, and an open freezer with numerous empty tubs of ice cream scattered around it. As he approached the freezer, Templeton stepped back as another empty tub of ice cream fell out, followed by an enormous, multicolored ball of fur that rolled out of the fridge. "Mmm," the cat said, licking her lips. "That ice cream was deeeelish." She patted her engorged middle, then looked over at Templeton. "Ah, the main course has arrived," she said. The cat walked, or rather, dragged herself over to Templeton, her monster of a stomach barely keeping her hind legs on the floor. "I trust you have brought me an abundance of food to gorge myself on?" she asked. "I'm starving."
"Of course!" Templeton said, gesturing his hands to the feast while concealing his grin. "Have all you want!"
The cat smiled and dug in. She targeted the apples first and shoved them voraciously into her mouth. Sure, they were rotten, but to her, food was food. In no time at all, all of the apples were gone inside her bottomless stomach. She smacked her stomach. "It's nice to finally have some fruit in here." Craving more fruit, she continued to the bananas. Being too lazy to peel each banana and eating it that way, the cat took each banana and threw it into her mouth whole. Soon the bananas were history. Meat was next on her list. She went over to the hamburger, took the cold meat, swallowed it whole, and proceeded to do the same for the rest. Then she spotted the huge plate of bacon next to her. Taking it, she emptied the entire plate of it into her ever-growing gut, which expanded even more. Noticing an enormous bucket of French fries, she took a bottle of ketchup nearby and squeezed it into her mouth while taking the bucket and putting it over her mouth. The landslide of fries came down to mix with the ketchup. Both landed in her stomach. She continued her rampage on the eggs, fried chicken, ice cream, and everything else that Templeton brought to her. Not a single morsel was spared from her gluttony.
As she finished off the last of her gorge, Templeton watched, hoping that the food he brought was enough to immobilize the cat. She had glutted on more than he could've ever dreamed of eating, so he figured that she was immobile at this point. Sadly for Templeton, he was answered by a yell of "More! Bring me more!" The cat had finished her meal and was now dragging herself over to the pretzel stand, knocking it over with her sheer weight and munching on several cheese-filled pretzels. Her hind legs hovered far above the ground thanks to her stomach.
"You want more?" Templeton asked, becoming a little nervous. "That's not enough for you?"
The cat gave him a look of menace, then dragged herself over to Templeton, her pointy teeth bared. "Remember our deal? I want ALL of the food in the fair. You know what will happen if you fail me, don't you?"
As if on cue, an obese mouse chose this time to come into the scene to look for food. He was as large as Templeton was when he encountered the cat. At the sight of her, the mouse screamed and attempted to run, but his stomach weighed him down and he was helpless as the cat lifted him up by the tail and dangled him over her mouth. "Help! Help me! Somebody!" the mouse yelled to nobody in particular. At the sight of Templeton, he yelled, "Please! Save me! Help me!"
"Not sure how to help you," the cat replied, opening her mouth. "But you can help me." With a laugh, she let go of the mouse's tail. Templeton watched in horror as the mouse fell to his ultimate demise into the cat's mouth, soon to be a part of her blubbery body. The cat's stomach, already enormous, bloated further from the prey she had just eaten. She burped and patted her stomach. "Are you going to get me some food now?" the cat asked with an evil smile as she resumed her attack on the pretzel stand.
13322121.title: He brings it all back to the cat

choices: He lures her into a trap.
He eventually stuffs her too much.
133221211.content:
Templeton nodded nervously. "Yes, yes, I'm going...," he said, trying to mask his irritation. He waddled away, noting how much easier it was getting to move around. If he kept burning calories, hopefully he would slim down enough that he could easily escape the cat. Still, he was determined that she must have some sort of limit to her. Might take some time, but it wasn't impossible. Just stuff her until she can't move an inch on her own. He sighed as he grabbed the blanket and took it back to the fairgrounds. He hadn't put that big of a dent in the food, and considering how much she was putting away, it wouldn't take long before she got to be so big she couldn't move anymore. Her stomach was currently stretching out further and further at a very leisurely pace. He rolled his eyes and walked away.

As he started stacking more and more food onto the blanket, he got very determined. He didn't care how many trips it took. He was going to stop this feline if it was the last thing he did. He just needed to keep at it. At some point, she would have to get too full to move. She simply had to. Unless she had some sort of power he wasn't aware of. Still, until she demonstrated such abilities, he would have to keep going. He piled the food high on the tablecloth, making it twice as big this time, and with all his strength, he dragged it back again.

When he returned, he found her to be lying in a heap against the toppled pretzel stand, an expression of absolute ecstasy on her face. She hiccuped in a surprisingly dainty manner and patted her stomach, which was now the size of a globe. The rat dragged the food towards her, making sure it was close enough to consume without her needing to move. "Good little rat," she purred. "Bring it all over. I want to savor this moment."

Templeton rolled his eyes and leaned against the pretzel stand, waiting for her to start.

At last, she reached over and started her next round. She didn't care what she grabbed as long as she got plenty. She shoveled indiscriminately, swallowing and gulping her food as her stomach inflated even larger, stretching high above them. She crammed everything into her gut with pleasurable moaning.

Templeton watched, quickly getting the impression that she wasn't going to be satisfied with just that lot, and she was already halfway through it. Looking around, he spied a trashcan with lots of half-eaten food poking out. Taking advantage of her brief distraction, he slipped away and started to dig out as much food as he could. She wanted more? He'd give her more. He dug it all out and left it in a pile on the ground, not too far away from where she was already finishing.

When the cat sat up and looked around, she saw him gesturing to the pile of food he'd procured. "Your next meal, madam," he said sarcastically. "I'll prepare the next one." He headed off towards a stall and started to toss another pile of whatever food he could find on the ground, just a few yards away from the first pile.

The cat saw the food and twitched her nose, a little suspicious, but her stomach rumbled and she focused again on the last few scraps of her meal before struggling to roll over onto her stomach. With great effort, she dragged herself across the ground the few feet it was to the first pile. It was a beautiful sight, so she just dove straight in and gorged on it.

Templeton finished with the second pile and poked his head out of the stall. She was already starting. Realizing he was able to get her to move as long as there was food not far away, she began to ponder. Perhaps her singlemindedness for food would work to his advantage...
133221211.title: Yes! (Live)

choices: Fatten her to immobility, if it ever happens.
1332212111.content:
Templeton noted that the fat furball seemed focused on food and food only. Noticing a cat carrier far away, he smiled. All he had to do was bring her into the cage, lock her in, and he could gorge all he wanted. It was perfect! He began his plan.
Making pile after pile of food, the rat inched closer and closer to the cage, the cat eating behind him. After thirty minutes, he got to the foot of the cage and made a pile there. Then he made a pile in the cage. The cat eventually got to the pile right before the cage. Templeton suddenly realized how big she'd become. Her checks were incredibly plump. They looked like they would burst at any minute. Her legs were thicker than a streetlamp light. Even her tail was as thick as her legs. But they were nothing next to her stomach. Wobbling and jiggling with every tiny movement taken, it was truly a sight to behold. Her stomach could truly handle anything thrown at it. Templeton suddenly realized that she was much too big to fit into the cat carrier. Just as he was thinking that, his world went dark.
The cat rolled onto Templeton, covering him with her massive body. She was furious. How dare he try and trap her! Honestly, did he really think she was that dumb? Her two weeks in the world, though short, trained her to notice these things. And here he was, trying to make a fool out of her. She snarled. "Did you really think that would work? After all I did for you, you do that?"
"Wh-what did you do for me?" squeaked Templeton, barely audible from underneath the mass of lard.
"What did I do for you?" yelled the cat. Her stomach wobbled. "I let you live, you ungrateful little rodent! I could've gulped you up any time I wanted to, and this is how you thank me?"
"I-I'm sorry," squeaked Templeton. "It won't happen again."
The cat rolled back. Templeton breathes heavily, having been relieved of the enormous burden. "I'll let you off this once," she said. "Next time, however..." She pointed to her mouth and made a swallowing motion. "Now get me more food!"
Templeton began to make more piles of food for his master. She was ruthless, no doubt. It was time for another plan. But what could he do?
1332212111.title: He lures her into a trap.

13322121111.content:
Templeton was determined. She thought she had control over him? That was ridiculous. Stuffing her to immobility was certainly possible. Templeton worked at lightning speed, making each pile in a matter of seconds. He could do it! He just knew it!

An hour later, Templeton's chubby body came to a rest. He was finished getting all of the food into piles. Looking around, he couldn't see a single morsel of food other than what was in the piles. Sighing, he sat down. Just as he did, Templeton heard a high-pitched shriek right behind him. Turning around, he watched a blubbery paw scoop up the pile of food right behind him. He watched the paw go up to its master's mouth. The mouth opened as food was deposited into it. Templeton looked a little farther up and saw the creatures face. His jaw dropped. He couldn't believe that the cat was so big. It was simply impossible for anyone to be that big and still be able to move. Tree trunks were a joke next to the cat's jiggly legs. Her trunk-sized tail hung uselessly behind her, too heavy for the monstrous feline to hold up. But the true spotlight was on her stomach. Comparing her stomach to a 50 foot drop ride was like comparing a newborn baby to a grown man. And the best (worst?) part was that she was still mobile.

Templeton looked into the other paw and found the source of the yell. A Persian cat, much flabbier than normal, was in the cat's grip, pleading with her. "Please!" she said. "Let me go! I have a husband and kids!"
"I know you do," said the cat, a sly grin on her face. "But let's just say that they've been relocated." The lardball patted her prodigious gut. "Care to join them?" Laughing, she threw the Persian into her greedy gullet.

Templeton froze in place as the cat turned her gaze to him. "Ah," the cat said, picking up Templeton and the pile of food he rested on.
