The cat stared down at him, her hand on her Ferris-wheel sized stomach. She ate the last piece of food and said, "Mmmm. All the food is gone. Every animal in this place now has a new home in here." She patted her impossibly large belly. "Except for one." Smiling, she grabbed Templeton, who flailed in her hand, and threw him into her black hole of death. Her stomach bloated several feet in front of her. She smiled and licked her lips. "Can't wait until the humans come..."
133221212.title: No! (Die)

133222.content:
The cat picked Templeton up by his fat tail. “I prefer something with a bit more…meat” he said with an evil smile, showing all of his sharp teeth. He opened his jaws wide and dangled the rat over his mouth, Templeton squeaked with fear and tried to escape. “Something like you” the cat said and let go of the rat’s tail
.
Templeton’s whole world went dark as he fell into the cat’s jaws. The sharp teeth poked into his stomach as the cat gently chewed on him. The large tongue licked all over his body, feeling and tasting his soft flesh. Templeton tried to grab onto the tongue but it was useless, he felt his whole body being pulled down the cat’s throat and into his stomach.

The cat purred loudly, licking its lips for the last remnants of flavour. “Mmm, delicious” he said and laid down to sleep, his belly gurgling happily as it digested his meal.
133222.title: tables are turned.

1333.content:
Templeton had somehow ended up at a stand that served exclusively beverages, but that was ok with him. He was thirsty after his large meal, and besides that, his fur was covered in sticky fruit juice and other bits of food. A good cleaning was in order. Rows and rows of ice buckets brimming with sodas were waiting for him, almost begging him to drink them. Each individual bottle looked lonely and cold.

Well, Templeton had a solution for that.

He stumbled over to the nearest bucket and pulled out a bottle of coke. After gnawing the cap off, he rested the bottle on his swollen gut and guzzled up the contents, giggling as the fizzy liquid tickled his insides. The sudden influx of fluid forced his belly to swell, and the food from his gorge dislodged ever-so-slightly, sloshing around inside of him. Enjoying the sensation, he gulped down a second soda, and a third, resting a paw on his stomach so he could feel it swell with every swallow. By the time he'd finished everything in the bucket, he was surrounded by empty bottles, he'd developed some severe hiccups, and his belly had bloated to nearly double its previous size.

"Ooo," he said thickly, followed by a loud and near-painful hiccup. "Not- hiiicc- thirsty anymore." He couldn't feel any solid food inside of him at all. The fullness he felt from the liquid was different from what he'd felt after filling himself with food- the food had made him feel stuffed and heavy, while the fluids just made him feel funny all over. The monstrous concoction of sugary drinks that he'd created in his belly almost seemed to have a life of its own, shifting gently back and forth as the liquid struggled to break free. His stomach ached from trying both to contain it and keep it still.

"Hiic." Templeton grunted miserably, patting his stomach. He was able to sink his paws into his belly, causing it to change shape as the liquid shifted. "At this- hic- rate, my stomach will- hiiiicc- run away from me. Hiiic."

He wasn't far off.

Giving into exhaustion, his stomach stopped trying to stop itself from going where it wanted to go. His enormous gut swayed to one side, and this time, it kept going. Even with his new girth, he wasn't heavy enough to stop his latest glut from dragging him off of the table and rolling him away into another part of the fair. He grunted in discomfort as he rolled his way down the midway, unable to grab any foothold, until finally, he crashed into something and righted himself. His belly quivered with triumph. Templeton groaned.

"Finally. Hiiic." This time, though, the hiccup stuck in his throat. The long roll had churned his beverage into a frenzy. The carbonation was bubbling furiously. Templeton licked his lips, opened his mouth, and indulged himself a long, throaty belch. The storm quelled, but only slightly. He was desperate to weigh himself down with some solid food.

"Now," he said. "Where are we?" Rubbing his watery eyes to clear them, he looked up.

His jaw dropped.

His mouth watered.
1333.title: A drinks table

choices: Take a quick nap, then eat some more
Honor his promise, find a word for Charlotte
13331.content:
Templeton had arrived at a stand that served barbecue. He could smell mountains of raw meat and sugary sweet sauce, but the thing that had gotten his attention was the stand's main attraction: a massive roasted pig, proudly displayed whole on a spit. Some fresh meat was just what he needed to weigh his bubbling stomach down and get his evening back on track.

"Hic. Come on, stomach. Hiiic." With one mighty shove, Templeton's belly was carrying him towards his next meal. He crashed into the spit, and his weight sent the pig crashing to the ground. His belly's momentum kept him moving. Templeton tumbled forward and crashed into the pig, his stomach erupting in burbles and sloshes. He dug his claws into the meat to stop his stomach from dragging him away again.

Up close, the pig seemed massive, even bigger than Wilbur. It smelled delightful.

"This will be a feast to remember," he sighed happily, and he sank his teeth deep into the pig's belly. His mouth immediately filled with succulent juices, and he groaned with pleasure at the taste. He tore a massive chunk of meat off the carcass and swallowed it whole. It fell into the liquid soup in his stomach with a noisy splash. Templeton grabbed a second mouthful, and a third. Because the chunks of meat were the only solid piece of food in his gut, he could feel them knocking against the walls of his stomach. His belly rumbled happily at the promise of a filling meal.

Templeton attacked the roasted pig with his teeth and claws. Barbecue sauce dribbled over his face and fur. He was forced roll himself forward, on top of his massive gut, so he could better reach inside to the meatier parts of the pig. As he ate and his belly bulged outwards, all four of his feet left the ground, not that Templeton cared. When he'd eaten so much that the pig's belly was a thing of the past, he paused to indulge himself a loud belch. He dug his claws into the pig's thigh, and with a series of noisy sloshes, pulled himself over to the pig's haunches. Even those few inches were almost more than his feeble arms could handle- the meat in his belly had soaked up a good deal of the soda, and he was unbearably heavy.

Templeton gorged himself on the pig for hours, pausing only to shift his body once he'd picked an area clean, or to belch deeply to make room for more meat. So much eating and very little movement caused him to dramatically balloon up in size. He balanced himself precariously atop his churning, sloshing belly as he ate, patting what he could reach and giggling at what little chance he had of touching the ground again. Even so, he kept eating, even as his belly tightened up with fullness and it became harder and harder to swallow. He tore the last bite of spare rib off the pig's skeleton, and was forced to use both his front paws to shove the morsel down his throat.His gorge shifted to make room for it with a sickly squelch. Templeton woozily looked back and forth for where his gorge would take him next, only to be pleasantly surprised.

There was no meat left. He'd already eaten it all.

Almost the entire pig had vanished into his belly- all that was left was the head, the curly tail, the feet, and a pile of bones, all held together by mere scraps of muscle sinew. The visual evidence of how much he'd eaten was overwhelming. Realizing that it was finally finished, his bloated stomach groaned with relief.

Templeton's mouth opened, and he released a massive, exhausted belch.

"Urrrrrrrrrp. What a night," he moaned, squinting his watery eyes to survey his handiwork.His belly had grown so much that it pushed him more than a foot off the ground. It was packed as full as he could get it and drum tight to the touch, which he verified with a few hearty slaps. He'd also massively bloated out on either side. His fat tail swished uselessly back and forth into the air. With a satisfied groan, Templeton dug his claws into the pig's head- the only thing heavy enough to act as a counterweight to his engorged belly- and slowly rotated his massive body to allow him to lie on his back, propped up against the bones. His stomach was finally allowed to expand freely, and it happily did so, bulging outwards another couple of inches. The overstuffed rat moaned happily at the release in pressure. His stomach rewarded his efforts with another heavy belch. Templeton licked his lips and savored the flavor of the roasted pig as it returned to his mouth.

"So...urrrrrp... good," he moaned. His belly was so big that it blocked his view of what was in front of him. A loud hiccup forced its way out of his overfull stomach, causing the whole mass to wobble. "Hiiiic. This fair is the best- hic- thing that's ever- hic- that's ever happened to me." His uncontrollable hiccups made him giggle, and he slapped his belly again. At the spot he'd struck, a low gurgle began that slowly grew and spread up through his overstuffed stomach before it erupted from his mouth as another satisfied belch.

"Urrrrrrrp. I had no idea pigs tasted so- hic- good. No wonder- hic- Zuckerman wants to eat- hic- hiiiic! No wonder he wants to- hic- eat Wilbur. Hic! Hiiic! Urrrrrp." Templeton licked his lips again. As he spoke aloud of Wilbur's predicament, he remembered why he was here- to find a word for Charlotte. Now that he'd eaten his fill, should he fulfill his promise?

"Hic. Well, anyway, I won't be- hiiiic- leaving this spot for a while," Templeton giggled, patting the swollen gray sphere that he'd turned himself into. "Hic. Hic. Hiiiilp."
13331.title: A roasted pig

choices: Templeton loses the contest to a stronger contender
133311.content:
Templeton was so stuffed and bloated that he didn't even notice that he'd fallen asleep until he was rudely awakened again. His belly had gotten to work digesting his massive gorge, but it wasn't anywhere near finished yet. Even so, a thick layer of fat had settled over his entire body, and doubly so on his stomach. Templeton delighted in the soft, squishy feel as he gave his fatty stomach an affectionate squeeze.

Then his brain caught up, and realized why he'd been woken up.

"EVERYBODY COME LOOK AT THIS RAT!"

A crowd of humans had gathered, and they were all staring. At him. He faintly saw flashes of light going off on the other side of his fat belly, and he realized they were cameras, just like the ones he'd seen humans use to take pictures of Charlotte's web. Templeton did not care for being the center of attention- he found he could get more eating done when he was alone. He was ready to clap his paws over his ears and go back to sleep when he realized what they were saying.

"Can you believe it?"

"He ate that whole pig!"

"Did you get a picture?"

Templeton took an interest. He perked up his ears.

"They should make this rat the fair mascot."

"Look how big he is!"

"I mean, seriously, isn't that what you feel like when you eat the food here?"

One voice, however, stood out from the crowd:

"We should enter him in the hot dog eating contest!"

Templeton really took an interest at the word "eating." He figured it had been at least a couple hours since he ate last, and he had room in his stomach now. The man who was talking was nibbling on a corn dog. His friend was skeptical.

"How would a rat know what to do in a contest?"

"All he has to do is eat. He's obviously good at it." Templeton silently agreed. "I'm sure if you put some food next to him, he'd eat it. Look, he's awake." As if to demonstrate Templeton's eating prowess, the man handed Templeton his half-eaten corn dog. The rat gobbled it up without missing a beat.

"See?"

"Oh, I don't know, Hank. People hate rats."

"What's the point of going to a state fair if you don't see crazy shit like this? Don't you want to see how many hot dogs this fat rat can eat?"

Templeton's mouth watered, and his belly growled. Yes, he did want to see how many hot dogs this fat rat could eat. Why waste precious calories looking for food if the humans would just give it to him? They obviously had more than enough of it.

"I don't know, Hank," the second man repeated, shaking his head. As more people arrived at the fair, an even bigger crowd gathered. Hank clapped his hands to get their attention.

"WHO WANTS TO SEE THIS RAT ENTER A HOT DOG EATING CONTEST?" he shouted. The crowd erupted in cheers. Hank scooped up Templeton and his bowling ball sized stomach and began walking him to the midway. The crowd followed.

Templeton grinned greedily. He'd been expecting to have to wait until nightfall. Who knew he'd get to gorge himself again so soon?
133311.title: The hot dog eating contest

1333111.content:
Templeton was carried a few hundred yards before reaching a picnic table with a few human men seated around it. A massive banner over the proceedings proclaimed that Templeton had arrived at "HUMBLE HANK'S HOT DOG EATING CONTEST!"

"Hank, what the heck is that?" one of the other participants asked. Hank plopped Templeton down on his belly at the end of the table. He was happy to be lying on his stomach- this was the best position for keeping food within reach of his mouth and paws. His hind legs, however, were back to hanging uselessly in the air.

"This rat ate a whole pig this morning," Hank said, poking Templeton's jiggling, sloshing belly. "I decided to enter him in the eating contest with you guys."

"That's a rat? I thought it was a really fat woodchuck!"

"No, that's a rat. See its tail?"

"Who wants to watch a rat eat?"

"All these people," Hank said, and he gestured at the crowd that was arriving to fill the seats. He once again clapped his hands to draw their attention.

"Welcome to Humble Hank's humble hot dog eating contest!" he shouted, to cheers and applause. "We all know the rules. Last one to stop eating wins. If you throw up, you lose. The winner gets bragging rights and a coupon. Now, bring out the dogs!"

Templeton turned his head the best he could to watch as some of the hot dog stand's employees began to bring out the hot dogs for the hot dog eating contest. His eyes glazed over in sheer ecstasy as a towering platter of hot dogs was placed in front of him, each one grilled to perfection and dripping with ketchup and mustard. Never could he have dreamed that the humans would up and give him such a bounty. He reached out his flabby arms, grabbed the closest hot dog he could reach, and pulled it into his mouth.

"The rat says it's time to go," Hank laughed, "so LET'S GO!"

All sounds around Templeton faded away as he settled into the gorging of a lifetime. He swallowed the hot dogs in two or three bites at a time, massive gulps sending each mouthful into his hungry stomach. He demolished the first tray, and was immediately presented with a second one.

This fair was a rat's paradise, indeed.

"The rat seems to be keeping up with all of you," Hank chided the other contestants. The hot dogs churned inside Templeton's belly. His face was coated with mustard and grease. There was no end to the eating in sight. The second tray was finished, and a third was deposited in front of him. He was dimly aware that the crowd was cheering for him as another contestant dropped out. He didn't care about that, of course- he only cared about eating. He gave his stomach a reassuring pat as it filled back up and began to bloat outwards.

Two more men dropped out of the contest as Templeton inhaled his fourth tray of hot dogs. He heard Hank whisper to one of the employees that they were going to need to bring bigger trays of hot dogs to satisfy his appetite. He grinned wolfishly and continued to eat. His belly had long since lost its squishy softness and was now a taut orb once more, growing bigger by the second and lifting him higher and higher off the table. He wasn't yet feeling the uncomfortable tightness he'd had after his gorge of the night before, however. His stomach had gotten accustomed to larger meals.

"Have you ever seen a creature eat like this!?" Hank shouted, and the crowd went wild. An employee staggered over to Templeton with a tray of hot dogs three times taller than the others. Templeton reached for a hot dog, yanked it out of the stack, and kept gorging. Each swallow made his belly quiver and expand. He was now as big as he'd been when he'd finished up last night, and he had every intention of pushing his limits even further.

The last human contestant, a younger man who'd held out as long as he could, finally surrendered, and rushed to a nearby garbage can to throw up. Templeton felt a twinge of regret that the man had ruined what could have been enough food to stuff ten Templetons, but hey, he had all he needed right here.

"We have a winner! But the fat rat shows no sign of slowing down!" Hank showed no sign of slowing down Templeton's supply of hot dogs, either.

Damn straight, Templeton thought as he continued to stuff food down his throat. As if any of these stupid humans could out-eat me. I'll be bigger than Wilbur at this rate.

Hank muttered a few words to another employee, and another tray of hot dogs emerged, piled even higher than the last one. At the same time, the employees were cleaning up the other contestants' areas, and bringing those leftovers to Templeton as well. He ate voraciously, his stomach bubbling and glorping and bulging with each new addition. Even though the contest was over, the crowd lingered, as if to see just how much this rat could eat.

Unfortunately, the employees were ready to be done with the whole spectacle, and they hadn't used much care in stacking all of the food. As Templeton ate, the tower of hot dogs began to lean precariously towards him. Stuffed and woozy as he was, he didn't notice the trouble he was in, before the tower finally collapsed on top of him.

With a happy groan, Templeton welcomed the rain of hot dogs, catching one in his mouth and swallowing it whole in one massive gulp. The avalanche knocked him backwards, rolling him into an upright position. He realized that his belly had bloated outwards so much that he was a little bit taller than before, though that was the least of his concerns. He belched loudly to make room- much to the delight of the crowd- and went back to gorging himself on everything he could reach. When he could no longer reach any food past his massive stomach, he kicked his fatty hind legs against the table until he rolled back forward onto his belly to resume the gorge. Templeton's stomach was bottomless. He would eat until someone made him stop.

Hank's earlier enthusiasm for the spectacle the rat had created was diminishing.

"So, uh, Tom," he said. "How many hot dogs do we have left?"

"That was it, boss," Tom said with a shrug. "You said to keep feeding him."

Templeton gobbled up everything on the table until there was nothing left but himself, a massive, groaning gray orb surrounded by crumbs and grease stains. He dragged the last hot dog to his mouth and licked his lips. He was about to take a huge bite out of it when he was rudely interrupted.

"TEMPLETON!? What did you do to yourself!?"

He squinted his eyes at the interruption, and saw...
1333111.title: Templeton wins the contest easily

choices: Templeton wakes up when night falls and goes to eat some more
Wilbur wakes Templeton up because he needs his help
13331111.content:
Templeton squinted his eyes. He'd overstuffed himself so dramatically that his eyes were watering and his vision was blurry. It was Fern, the little girl who was Wilbur's friend at the farm.

"Is this your rat, missy?" Hank asked.

"No, sir!" said Fern. "I mean, well, sort of. He lives on my uncle's farm."

"Do you mind getting him out of here before he eats me out of business?" Templeton snickered and set to work eating Hank's last hot dog. When he'd swallowed the last bite, he licked his lips and let out a truly colossal belch. When he'd finished expelling the air from his bloated belly, he settled into a series of woozy hiccups.

"Of course, sir. Sorry, sir!" She grabbed a boy who Templeton didn't recognize, and begged him for help getting Templeton back to Wilbur's pen. Templeton couldn't ask for a better deal- the humans stuffed him to the brim with food, and now the humans were going to carry him back to Wilbur's pen so he could nap. This was shaping up to be the best day of his life. Hic. Hic. Hiiiilp.

"Oh- and take your prize, too," Hank snapped, and he threw a piece of paper at Templeton. It smacked him right in the face, and he peeled it off before looking at it. A coupon for "Humble Hank's Hot Dog Stand." A slow, lazy grin spread across his fat face. He'd found some words for Charlotte, too.

Fern's friend came back to the hot dog stand pushing a wheelbarrow. Templeton giggled. Laying on his stomach as he was, he didn't have much idea yet of how bloated he'd become. Apparently he was so massive now, they were going to have to wheel him back to the pen. Won't the pig and spider be surprised to see how much he'd accomplished in less than twenty four hours! Hic!

Together, Fern and her friend rolled Templeton into the wheelbarrow. He ended up on his back with his belly bulging upwards, and oh my, was it huge. He was as big as a beach ball, and stretched just as tight. Every ounce of food in his belly was fighting for space. He patted his taut stomach and belched again, so deeply and loudly that the wheelbarrow rattled.

"Do you have anything you can cover him up with?" Fern's friend hissed. "People are going to ask questions." Fern quickly took off her sweater and put it over top of the wheelbarrow, shielding Templeton from prying eyes. He hiccuped and the sweater bounced.

"Let's just get this over with," Fern sighed. They crossed the fairgrounds as quickly as they could, punctuated by noisy hiccups. Whenever the wheelbarrow hit an obstacle and jostled Templeton's engorged stomach, he'd let out a throaty belch. Templeton patted his massive stomach affectionately with one paw. The other was still clutching his prize coupon.

Before long, Templeton heard the familiar creaking of the gate to Wilbur's pen being opened. Fern snatched her sweater back, and her friend tipped the wheelbarrow forward, sending Templeton rolling across the pen. The contents of his belly swirled around inside of him, massaging his overextended insides. He crashed into the corner of the pen, luckily propped upright, with his massive stomach groaning and bulging out in front of him. The two kids quickly took the wheelbarrow, closed the gate, and disappeared. Templeton peered around the pen through squinty, watery eyes. Wilbur was napping in his crate. At least, he was, until Templeton's massive gorge shifted, and he startled everyone awake with a raucous belch.

"Hiiiic. I'm back," he slurred, licking his lips.

"Templeton!? Is that you!?" Wilbur gasped. It wasn't a surprise that Templeton was unrecognizable in his current state.

"Hic. D'you mish me? Hic. Hilp." He'd eaten so much that his jaw and throat were exhausted, and he could barely speak properly. Charlotte peered over the edge of the rafters, and audibly gasped when she saw the sorry state that Templeton had gorged himself into.

"This is why you couldn't bring me back a word to save Wilbur's life?"

"Hic. Relaaax, mishy. Hic. Brought a word. Hic! Hiiiilp!" Templeton released his grip, and dropped the Humble Hank's coupon into the dirt. With both paws free, he set about contentedly patting his taut belly anywhere he could reach. His whole body quivered and bounced with every hiccup.

"What on earth did you eat?" Wilbur asked. Templeton sighed with pleasure as he remembered the roasted pig he'd devoured. Now that he had Wilbur in front of him to compare, it was decided- the one he'd eaten was definitely bigger.

"You- pig- dun' wanna know," he slurred. Charlotte wrinkled her nose.

"Humble- that should work. Thank you, Templeton." Templeton let out another nasty belch in reply. Wilbur wrinkled his nose.

"Not that it matters to you, but Charlotte made an egg sac last night." Templeton paused, considering this new information, then patted his stomach and let out an even nastier belch in reply. Charlotte looked at Wilbur and shrugged, as if to say, what did you expect?

"So Templeton," she said diplomatically. "What are your plans for this afternoon?"

"Nap," said Templeton, with a wide yawn. "Then- hic- gonna eat more. Hic. Hiiiiilp." Wilbur's eyes widened.

"You can't be serious. You're going to eat yourself to death." Templeton giggled at that, and gave his fat stomach some rough pats. Already, he could feel the soft gurgles and groans of digestion taking hold on his hot dog feast. He'd rest and digest, then awaken even fatter and be ready to gorge some more. The fair was three days long, after all. There had to be mountains of food he hadn't explored.

Templeton leaned back against the wall of the pen and passed into a deep, satisfied sleep.
13331111.title: Fern

choices: Find the word now while it was dark
Rest and get it in the morning
134.content:
Templeton headed out, promising to return with a word. Of course, that wasn't going to happen he thought, at least not right away.

And so Templeton spent his time, scrounging for food and avoiding people, and his efforts were quite fruitfull. He dug in garbage cans and found half eaten hot dogs, or bags full of popcorn. He greedily ate anything and everything he found, and spent all his time doing so. His hunger was insacable, and it wasn't long before it was nightfall.

By this time, Templeton lay beside a food stand, licking grease and all maner of sticky foods of his claws. With a belch, he placed both paws on an enormously bloated belly, and grinned. The engorged rat moaned with pleasure, never before in his life had he ever been so stuffed, and it felt to good to believe. He gave his large stomach one experimental slap, causing it to slosh and groan.

But Templeton was not yet finished. He would go out as much as he could, eating until his mouth could no longer hold any more food. He belched one last time before beginning to drift into a deep sleep. But just as he shut his eyes, he remembered; the word.

He had not yet completeted his task that had been so graciosly handed to him. Templeton was not completely selfish, but it seemed to him it was not in his best interest at the moment to do the task. However, a small pang of guilt managed to reside in the very dark recesses of his mind. Acting on his strongest emotions, Templeton decided to...
134.title: The first binge

choices: Head Back, Turn in the Word, Eat from Wilbur's Slop...
1341.content:
Templeton groaned and shook his head, he wobbled on all fours off thinking about where to find a WORD...of all things... He'd get it over with, how hard could it be to find something like that anyhow? He looked side to side for inspiration, past litter and dirt, and up into the dark night sky...even that vast blue and it's twinkling lights made his fat stomach growl with hunger. "Patience now..." he spoke to his body.

Finally he spotted a rather tall, cylindrical trash bin in the distance, and his sneaky self began to justify his next thought. He SHOULD be thorough in his search, should he not? That word could be at the bottom of such a bin, and he would be careless to pass it up! Excitedly he scurried to the closest ledge to the bin he could find, a large wooden food stand. He groaned and moaned hefting his increased weight up and up, bouncing his furry belly as he landed atop the counter. His mid-section bulged from side to side as he scurried across it and looked down at the loaded goldmine.

He stuck his nose in the air and inhaled the rotting filth inside and grinned wide and wider. "Here I come, little word! Templeton, to the rescue!" he pointed to the sky, then cannonballed right into the trash, landing on a fat, barely nibbled on sandwich. "No use letting all this waste away...after all, it might get in the way later on!" Templton's eye glinted with cleverness, he'd fooled the guilt out of his own self.

A little under an hour later, the trash bin wobbled to and fro before toppling over with a loud thud. Litter of all sorts billowed out onto the ground, followed by a gray bowling ball, rolling forward once, twice and finally coming to a rest. Templeton lay on his grotesquely swollen body looking as content as ever. He licked his mouth for any escaping flavors in his fur, and squeezed at his bulk below him with his digits, a audible gurgling followed and Templeton erupted in a gasious belch. The near blob of a rat had not entirely lied, however, he had found a word, or words. He held in one hand badly nibbled cuttings with the phrases "Salty" and "Delectable."

Templeton looked down at the words and hiccupped, they were good words! His ears twitched and he spewed forth another powerful belch into the night. He'd done his duty, Charlotte never said WHAT words to find...she trusted Templeton enough to pick the right ones, right? Templeton's mind began turning again, as he nuzzled into his fat flesh below him, he SHOULD think about looking for more words...just in case...right?
1341.title: Getting Over the Guilt

choices: Waits untill his feet touch the ground
get's burried by a whole bin of rotten produce
13411.content:
Templeton wobbled over to another garbage bin, he didn't want Charlotte to get mad at him and for Wilbur to get sold and the slop be empty for the rest of the rat's life. The fat rat was able to find an easy to reach elevated platform and dived into the fully loaded trash bin.

A half an hour later a large burp erupted from the garbage can as Templeton lied on his back with his sides buldging out wider than him and his stuffed belly rising high enough to block Templeton's entire view of the other side of the trash can. With an almost intoxicated sounding groan of fullness, Templeton tried to roll over, but only got half way as his little feet were risen off the ground by his titanic stoumach.
"Oh *hic* great" Templeton moaned as his large belly sloshed a bit as it started digesting the food.

He then
13411.title: Continue "Looking" in More Trash Bins...

choices: Templeton returns with the word, then goes back to finish what he started
134111.content:
Templeton knew that if he were to find a word in time, he would have to act fast. Waiting around was only going to get him in bigger trouble. Then he head an idea.

"BELCH!"

He let out a hearty burp, releaving the some of the gas in his body. This made his stomach shrink a bit, but it still wasn't enough.

"HYOOP! *BURP*!!"

Templeton's stomach shrunk some more. One more ought to do it...

"BELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLCH!"

Templeton's stomach was emptied of gas, and soon, his paws were touching the ground. He promptly struggled to hoist his body out of the trashcan. When he reached the top, he looked around. He could see a newspaper sitting in the corner. Working quickly, he slid down from the trashcan and waddled over to it. He immediately opened it and scanned the pages, looking for another word. For a while, he couldn't find anything, until he stumbled upon a word: HUMBLE. Deciding it could work, he tore it out with his sharp teeth and started to go.

Then, of course, he saw another pile of food. Since it was still very dark and the moon was still high in the sky, he hurried over to it. Quickly, he devoured chicken legs, mashed potatoes, moldy cheese, and to top it all off, a gallon of half-melted ice cream.

As he climbed out of the remains, the word safely wrapped inside his tail, Templeton began to drag his gigantic swollen bloated body back towards the pen.
134111.title: Waits untill his feet touch the ground

1341111.content:
"Here" sneered the bloated rat, "It says 'humble'".

Charlotte thought about this for a moment, but apparently finding this acceptable said "Thank you Templeton, you've been very helpful". The rat merely belched in reply.

"You might not be seeing old Templeton much longer" he muttered to himself. The bloated rat made his way to the top of the pen, and looking out he began to salivate at all the wondrous treats to be found in the night. Patting his already fattened belly, Templeton scurried out for a feast.
1341111.title: Templeton returns with the word, then goes back...

13411111.content:
With difficulty, Templeton hauled his bloated body up to the top of the gate of Wilbur’s pen. Surveying the empty fair before him, Templeton’s quick nose caught the innumerable scents of thrown away food and rotting garbage. Despite his huge stomach bubbling ominously beneath him, Templeton started to salivate at the thought of gorging himself yet again. Giving his burbling belly a hearty smack, Templeton looked in wonder, ‘The goose was right. This fair IS a rat’s paradise…HILP!!...’ He patted his bloated gut expectantly and began to lose himself in sheer anticipation. Pushing out his belly and massively hiccupping again, he continued, ‘ by-by my humble Wilbur…fare thee well Charlotte, you old schemer…THIS will…HILP!!... be a night to remember!
Smacking his bubbling swell once again, Templeton jumped (or more appropriately, fell) down into a pile of rotting trash. Landing hard on his big belly with a squelch, Templeton lay dazed for a moment and then hauled himself to the pile of food that lay nearby. Taking handfuls of crumbs, seeds and filth as he went along, he stuffed all and sundry into his giant stomach. Finally reaching the pile of food, he began his work. Stuffing a whole wedge of swiss cheese down into his mouth, he chewed for a moment, put his hands on his belly, and swallowed. With a glop the cheese entered his stuffed stomach. Resting only a moment, Templeton pounced on all sorts of rotten goodies, his stomach growing larger and more bloated with every massive swallow. Finally, the large pile was no more and Templeton lay licking his paws and rested them on his gorged gut. Ignoring his stomach’s vociferous groaning, Templeton spied an even larger pile of food ahead. Shaking his burbling belly, Templeton rolled over onto it and slowly dragged himself to it.
The pile included a large bunch of half rotten grapes and whole hamburger soaked in grime. Templeton gulped, not realizing how massive the task was before him. Taking two of the oozing grapes in each hand, Templeton experimentally stuffed them into his mouth. His stomach bloated larger, burbled, and held. Delighted, Templeton crazedly dove into the massive pile. After finishing the Grapes he moved on to the cupcakes, mammoth breakfast specimens. Expecting them to be hard and stale, Templeton bit through the wrapper, only to find that the muffins were soaked through with grime and were as soft and tender as ever. Eagerly, Templeton attempted to haul his entire body within the cupcake and eat it from the inside out. However, his gigantically bloated belly prevented him. It was of no matter, for Templeton simply ripped large chunks from within the chocolate cupcake and stuffed them into his mouth. Amazingly, within a minute, the entire cupcake had disappeared within Templeton’s cavernous stomach. Hiccuping contentedly, he took the cupcake wrapper and disposed of that as well. He repeated the practice on the remaining three cupcakes. His burbling, bubbling stomach was now nearly the size of a bowling ball. Templeton hiccupped massively and richly and looked greedily toward the burger. Taking a massive exploratory bite, he reveled in its grimy succulence. Hiccupping massively again he quickly polished off what remained of the burger. To his gluttonous delight, he found two more huge burgers, each one grimier and larger than the last. Templeton eagerly grabbed both burgers and glutted his huge stomach with abandon. Chunks of grime landed in his belly with sickening splashes until both had disappeared. Templeton’s stomach paused and then started to churn fiercely, burbling and bubbling more audibly. He placed both hands on his stomach and grinned sloppily as his belly wobbled and bloated with what sounded like indigestion. With a loud glop, his stomach spilled gelatinously outward in a gargantuan, bubbling, quivering spare tire. He patted his gargantuan gut contentedly and rolled on his back, his stomach sloshing fluid-like on top of him. Rolling onto his stomach, Templeton dragged himself to three smaller piles and completed his ‘treatment’, the only sound louder than his munching was the progressively more insistent groaning, bubbling and glopping of his huge stomach. Finding himself next to a huge trash can, Templeton took a moment and rested against it’s side. His burbling belly was sloshing his glut around. He had never eaten nearly as much as he had tonight…he wearily gave his belly a contented slap, and thought of all he had eaten: ‘hic…HILP!!! What a feast, a real glut! I have never felt so…hic…HILP!! Bloated in my life!...hic…HILP!!’
Templeton looked around him and found he was in the center of a veritable gold mine of trash and food. Not wasting another moment, Templeton groaned with expectant pleasure, despite his massively swollen state, and grabbed anything he could possibly reach and began to gorge his already overfull stomach again. Sausages, pieces of bread, cheese, disgarded hot-dogs, funnel cakes, melted ice cream all were quickly devoured by the insatiable Templeton. Gorging and glutting, more and more rotten food, filth and garbage was crammed into his titanically swollen and bloated belly. Finally, he had glutted himself to a nearly unopened box of munchkins. Quickly gnawing a hole through the paper box, Templeton hauled himself into the box and let himself truly go. Stuffing his stomach and glutting himself with increasing rapidity, he soon tumbled out clutching his massive gurgling belly with a conceited grin. He rolled into the large trash can and hit it hard straight on the center of his stomach with a squelch and glop. A large banana, some hotdogs and a large amount of other goodies wobbled and plummeted toward the overgorged rat. Templeton looked up, hesitated for a moment, and then slapped his impressive girth, held as much of his belly as he could, eagerly opened his mouth and let the banana enter him whole. The violent expansion of Templeton’s already massive belly blasted his protective hands away as the Banana found its home with a titanic squelch.
Templeton was momentarily stunned. This was by far the largest thing he had ever attempted to ingest, he had vastly underestimated the banana’s size, and now, he thought, was ‘paying’ the price. As the banana continued to settle, his belly expanded more and he hiccupped the most massive hiccup in his life. Nearly catatonic with his gorge, Templeton could only smile weakly and place his hands daintily on the sensitive, quivering, titanic mass of his stomach, which deafeningly gurgled and bubbled with every slight movement. Templeton rolled on his back, and his entire stomach sloshed and slopped on top of him, the full weight of his massive glutting nearly crushing him. His huge overgorged stomach, sloshed his night’s gluttony sickeningly as it attempted to digest this massive over input of richness. Templeton’s gurgling gut then sloshed away from him and pulled him in an upright position. Templeton struggled to hold this position, but was forced down upon his own overinflated mass. Despite all he had stuffed himself with, Templeton still saw more gorging around him. He managed to slosh himself upright and run on his hind legs for a short distance, where he collapsed on another large pile of rotten food and sundry trash. Not thinking another minute, Templeton lost himself again in glutting and gorging. He stuffed in his mouth anything he could get his hands on, even a whole apple, one of the largest Templeton had ever seen. He pulled it onto his massive swell and just ate and ate until nothing but a thin core remained. Templeton’s Stomach was now truly gargantuan, becoming nearly liquidlike in consistency and burbling mightily. Having been glutted and over filled, overgorged and overfed many times over, Templeton’s great bloated belly still called for more gorging and further overfeeding, and doubtless, Templeton eagerly acquiesced to its requests. The more he stuffed into his belly, the more he glutted himself, the more woozy and drunken he became, hiccupping massively and uncontrollably, and the more he thought his overfull stomach needed. After much more gluttony, Templeton finally rested again against the huge trash can: ‘hic…hic…HILP!!! What a night…never have I come close…hic..hic…HILP to glutting so much…hic…HILP…a rea gorge…hic…hic…HILP…everything is SO RICH...HILP!!!!!’ Templeton stuffed some more food into his blob of a belly and looked up greedily at the Trash Can…should he stuff himself and perhaps not get out for a long time? His stomach was already vastly over gorged and dangerously overglutted, but this seemed not to disturb Templeton, who casually stuffed a large hotdog down his throat. Slamming his hands into his gargantuan, bubbling, burbling corpulent mass of semi-indigested gorge that sloshed in his stomach. He decided to…
13411111.title: Later that night...

choices: Templeton's belly moves along like a slug.
134111111.content:
It took a decent amount of time trying to get into the trash can. Had he not been able to sink his claws into the cloth of the tent next to it, he would never have been able to scale it. Even so, it was quite a feat as his massive stomach bobbed below him, sloshing loudly as it shook. Finally, Templeton released the tent, and the rat dropped into his new feast with a loud "GLORCH-gurgle." His gut released a long, low moan of discomfort, but it was cut short as Templeton sunk his paws into it, shaking it around noisily until it began to grumble. Deciding it was a hungry growl, the rat tilted a large cup upwards, downing the warm, rich contents of an unappreciated milkshake. It gurgled around as Templeton reached for a bunch of five old bananas. He squished the contents into his awaiting mouth, swelling his gigantic belly many times further and causing thick glopping noises to issue from his already-loud burbling belly.

The contents of this trash can were almost entirely food, and what wasn't were mere paper wrappers already soaked in grease. And as such, Templeton shoveled food into his maw as fast as he could, causing his gut to groan even louder. The rat burrowed into the pile, submerging himself in food. When he reached the bottom of the can, he looked up, seeing the hole he'd made as a tunnel with a tiny light at the end. And now, the only way to see that light again was to eat his way out. His gorged belly bubbled in warning, indigestion already taking hold. Still, soggy french fries, remnants of ice cream delicacies and all matter of unknown fried foods slid down his throat. Occasionally he literally stuffed his hands in his mouth to force his feast into his protesting stomach. His complaining gut felt ready to burst, but the rat made no efforts to stop, so intoxicated in his gluttony he thought every noise of indigestion was a demand for more food. Templeton instead enjoyed the food rushing into his gut, bloating him further and further and his belly rumbled ready to rupture!

About an hour later, strange noises could be heard from the trash can. Multiple moans layered themselves over burbles, and a slow, rhythmic sloshing made itself known. A gurgling groan squeezed itself from the blob of furry lard filling the trash can, before the face of Templeton moaned himself in blubbery bliss. His grumbling, bubbling belly shifted continuously inside. Templeton could feel his intestines sliding unhappily and his stomach twisted and whined deeply. All the while his gut glorped away, swirling and sloshing his impending obesity around. Templeton would have continued his feast, but his sheer weight rendered him immobile. "Hic... Hic... HIIIILP!!! Ohhhhhhh... Hic-HILP! I feel like I might explode... hic... hic... HILP! But-HIC-HIIILP there’s still so much more I have to eat... HIIIILP!!!” Still, digestion took a lot of energy, and it wasn’t long before he found himself drifting into an intoxicated slumber.

Since it was at the edge of the fair, Templeton was amazingly able to rest in the can, undisturbed as his belly tried to tackle his meal. When the rat woke, he was only slightly able to move more, the liquid contents of his belly transformed into jiggling adipose. His gut had barely shrunken at all with digestion, almost all of it depositing itself around his body, particularly his stomach. With a great deal of effort, the rat was able to tip the can, leaving him and his belly to spill out across the ground in a symphony of blurps and sloshes. With his flabby arms he rubbed what belly he could reach, giving it a squeze that resulted in a torrent of gurgles and grumbles.. And then it happened: a real rumble of hunger. Despite hours before being on the brink of bursting, his stomach was demanding more food, ready to grow even larger. The colossal gorge had left his stomach conditioned to being titanically overstuffed, and Templeton grinned. Every night forth would be one to remember. His gut grumbled and growled at the idea.

But now, however, he was faced with a new problem. With his belly this huge, yet so hungry, how could he move to feed it?
134111111.title: Can of Rat

13411112.content:
A pile of wrappers and half-eaten rotting food and stuff piled into mountains across the midway at the fair. A munching sound could be heard from beneath it all. Suddenly, an apple core flew through the air and landed in the pile with a dull thunk.

Templeton had been eating and drinking for a solid six hours. His stomach was growing larger and rounder as time went on. It was aching slightly, but he was oblivious to the pain.

Templeton was still munching on whatever he could get. During the night, he had prepared a humongous pile of the food he could find, and when he'd gathered it all, he sat back and ate it all as quickly as he could, and he wasn't done yet. He now moved on to a giant banana, which he pealed deftly, and he tossed it in the air, tossing the peel aside. Clutching his belly, he let the banana land in his wide open mouth, allowing it to slide down his throat whole, catapulting his belly out a few more inches.

Still not satiated, he picked up a doughnut and ate it as fast as he could, swallowing the chocolate-coated pastry, adding two more inches to his stomach. Then he grabbed a small bottle of juice. He popped the top off and down the whole thing. His stomach gurlged as grape juice splashed on him. He tossed the bottle away.

Finally, Templeton decided to grab a giant pan of apple pie. He hauled the whole thing over to him, and he began to pull slice after slice out of the pan, shoving the slabs down his throat until the entire pie was down his gullet.

Moaning with pleasure, Templeton found he'd eaten his entire feast, and his stomach was practically a bowling ball.
13411112.title: That Morning

choices: He feels a little more room. There's more food out here
He feels full. Show off his stomach to the others
134111121.content:
Templeton's fuzzy gray gut wobbled with it's attempts at digestion, quivering as the flesh inside rolled around its contents. The rat placed a paw at the tense balloon that swelled out from his gut, and gave a quick belch to the sky.

He felt his stomach give somewhat, and as long as he had room, he felt he hungry. At this point even the gluttonous rat was astonished at the powers of his stomach, and only felt a twinge of fear in the pit of his stomach that he might never be full.

Of course, being in the pit of his stomach, it was drowned out by a great feast of food inside of his belly.

Resolve, however, is one thing. Physics is quite another. His stomach, an immobile mass, now outnumbered him probably by a factor of three to one. But such was the factor of a true glutton; nothing would stand in his way even if a morsel of food could be crammed down his gullet.

As his haunches were still in contact with the ground, he made a first attempt at lifting himself up and standing like he was pregnant with a baby cow, leaning back and straining as much as his rat legs would. All the muscles tensed, and he even managed to lift himself up an inch, before crashing down with a jelly-like noise and much content shifting of his bloated stomach.

Templeton looked woozy with the pressure to his body and burped a few times, before being lifted by the momentum in a rolling motion. He stopped at the top of his stomach, using it like a bed for a moment, cluthing it before getting an idea.

He rocked himself back and forth before toppling forward, getting squished by his belly for a second before righting up again, and, in doing so, managed a sort of rolling motion.

Maybe it was destiny, as it certainly wasn't skill, because he rolled forward without any means or plans on getting to anywhere. So it must have been destiny, then, that he landed at the watermelon vendor at the far end of the row of food vendors. Having stuck to the places where the humans ate (the picnic areas and such) he hadn't even collected the garbage from the vendors, much of which wasn't packed away and simply left to rot.

He slammed into a leg of the watermelon cart, and the whole table came crashing down, and before he knew what was going on he had rolled and sunk his teeth directly into the rind of a fat, juicy, partially rotten watermelon. It was big even by watermelon's standards, making it almost twice even the bloated rat's size.

What could he do? One doesn't turn away such fortune. He bit into the rind, only tasting a bit of the pink flesh on the other side in his mouthful, and swallowed it. His stomach got almost imperceptibly smaller from this bite. It would take a lot of eating to get it down.

He chewed a hole in the green rind knowing there was no way to get inside. He swallowed the seeds, trusting the power of his rat stomach to digest them. Or let them grow in the compost in his stomach; it didn't really matter.

Every swallow bloated him more, and every swallow was bigger than the least. He chewed through the rind to get the watery flesh underneath, and practically flowed through his gullet into his awaiting hungry disposal.

And then he was done. He had eaten the whole watermelon, and was resting on top of a bloated light gray stomach now the size of three bowling balls, churning beneath him. He smiled conceitedly, burping up great quantites of gas from his stomach, and patted it in a congratulatory way.

He felt at his stomach, same as before.
134111121.title: Templeton finds more food.

choices: He shows off to Wilbur and Charlotte.
He gets wedged between the boards.
1341111212.content:
As much as it pained him, Templeton knew it was getting late, and he knew the sun would be up soon. He'd have to get back to pen and save the rest for tomorrow. He would allow the fair to replinish itself during the day.

This was easier said that done. Templeton spent several minutes trying to gain some traction, but he'd gained so much more tummy, he could move.

Finally, Templeton started to sniff for pen. He could smell the right scent, and soon he was shifting and turning and twisting around his stomach. Turning until he was now facing away from the pen, he began to pull. He was trying to walk backwards and pull his stomach along with him, dragging it on the ground.

Templeton walked backwards towards the pen, hoping he'd get there in time. Besides, he'd eaten so much, he'd have to show this thing off. He could only imagine what they'd have to say.

Unfortunately, Templeton was never one to stick to a diet. As full as he was feeling, he couldn't resist it when he saw a discarded hotdog he'd somehow overlooked. He grabbed as he went by and swallowed it whole, stretching his waist out another inch. After walking a few more feet, he grabbed some discarded cotton candy and gobbled it up. Soon he was almost at the pen, and he just before he got there, he found a hot pretzel that had long since gone cold. He gobbled it up under a minute.

Now he was right next to the pen, and seeing as how there was no more food within reach, he turned himself around until he behind his stomach yet again. This time he jumped up and rolled up onto his stomach, listening to it as it burbled under him. Now he was able to reach the top of the wooden bar, and he promptly began to climb through...
1341111212.title: Heading Home

choices: Night has come, time to eat, and come back
Night comes, eat and never come back
13411112121.content:
Pulling himself over the fence was a laborious task for one so big. His muscles burned as he pulled his bulk with all his strength, and when he reached the top, he allowed momentum to pull him down in a moaning and burbling symphony of sloshes. His belly smacked the ground, and his blubbery hide quarters wobbled in the air. Some of the fat on his back sinked down to the back of his neck, but as Templeton pulled himself, it soon was evenly distributed.

Hearing the loud glop from the rat's impact, the pig and the spider turned to the fence to find their incredibly over weight friend. Both at a loss for words, they could only stare at the giant rat in shock.

"Happy to see me," Templeton woozily said, hiccuping afterwards.

"Goodness, what have you done to yourself," said Charlotte.

"What every rat's dreamed of doing. I just got to be the first. To gorge without stop." The fat rat lied his back on the fence, allowing his strength to return and his enormous belly to freely slosh and relax in peace. "Oh if only you'd been there. Such feasting and coursing should never go unnoticed. I'm a champion among rats, and this awesome stomach is my reward."

"Reward," snorted Charlotte as she flew over to the bloated rat, using a string of web and a small breeze to take her over. "It's a reward for your gluttony and lack of self control. You should be ashamed."

Templeton hiccuped, and grinned sloppily through half closed eyes at the spider atop of his large swell. Patting it, it sloshed and jiggled about. "I knew you'd like it. You don't need to hide the fact you're proud of me."

"You're too bloated to know what you're talking about."

"Oh c'mon, admit it, you like the new Templeton. I'm three times the rat I'd used to be, and tomorrow night I'll double, no, triple my size. I'd be the envy of rats everywhere." Templeton let out a pleasurable sigh as he squeezed his bulk through shut eyes. "My stomach can handle anything."

"You disgust me. You do nothing with your life but eat. It's a pretty pathetic existence."

"Trust me toots," Templeton sneered, "when you're a rat its the only existence, and the greatest. Can you say for yourself you do what you love for a living...I don't think so. Now if you excuse me," the rat grunted as he groaned and pulled himself forward, then pulled himself to the crate, "I have to get ready for tonight."

Charlotte shook her head in disappointment, while Wilbur still remained silent. With his back to the crate, Templeton rested his paws on his cavernous stomach, his body nearly taking up the whole crate. He massaged and ran his paws through the soft furry mass; feeling at all he had gorged, and licking his lips at all he would gorge tonight, and the next night, probably for the rest of his life in the wonderful place. This was the life for him, a life filled with endless happiness.
13411112121.title: Ratty Rat Rat

134111121211.content:
Night came once again as well as the riches that came with it. A loud bubbling gurgle suddenly erupted from Templeton’s immense stomach, causing his whiskers to twitch and eyes to blurrily return to the waking world. Taking notice at the lack of light surrounding him and the snoozing of his two companions, he yawned and stretched his limbs as much as his fat immeasurable body would allow him.

“Another perfect night to glut with abandon, right stomach,” he said patting his now blob like expanse of blubbery fur. Much like earlier this day, his sleeping allowed all the food in his gut to convert into fat, giving him much more belly to lug around and admire. But more importantly, his now semi emptied stomach (which had been widely stretched out) would be able to hold more food than when he started. Lifting his head and sniffing the mouth watering aroma’s that trickled the fresh air, the obese rat licked his lips and rubbed his belly.

“Lets see how much fatter we can make you tonight.”

Kicking and pushing himself forward, gut sloshing vociferously, he made his way to the wooden gate, struggling to lift himself over. He giggled at all the noise his stomach made getting to the other side. The pig and spider certainly deserved as much. Even at his current size, being a pest to the two entertained him. He was vermin for a reason.

The rat licked his lips, “This fair is a rat’s paradise,” he said in ecstasy upon viewing all the food just directly to the stands in front of him. Patting his stomach, he immediately went to work.

Climbing onto a table, he dispensed of a few pies scattered about. The tin pans easily bent under the sheer weight of his belly, allowing what remained of a pie to slide directly down his gullet. Blueberry, rhubarb, coconut, and banana cream began filling him, adding to his belly's soft jello like manner. Once finishing the last pie, he licked some cream from a paw while placing the second on the vast tub of lard covered in fur.

Beside him was an unopened box of popsicles. Probably for some children earlier in the day but left behind. Pulling it toward his gut, he opened the box, revealing the treasure trove of frozen goodness. Each was about his height, and no wider than his chubby arms. Taking one, he shoved it down his mouth whole, along with the stick itself. Continuing to do this with the others, his stomach was unable to adjust to a long solid object entering it, and so kept the popsicles shape, creating small bulges around his body. It entertained Templeton to try and push them in, but he wasn’t concerned. As time continued, they would melt, and he’d become fatter.

Next to the table was a large cart which carried hot dogs and corndogs, with a couple packs of buns and pickles on top of it. Waddling over, he shoved the buns within the cart, and opened the jar of pickles. Sticking his chubby face within the hole of the jar, he chewed on the tips of the pickles. Greedy in his gluttonous pursuit, he then tilted the jar upward, causing it to slip down his head and wedge against his body. Disoriented, he ended up falling within the cart, landing softly on a bunch of franks. Drinking the juice and polishing off the remainder of the pickles, he lifted the jar off him and began work on the dogs.

One by one, hot dogs and corndogs were fed to him. It seemed he swallowed quicker than he could breathe. But still, Templeton didn’t let up. Not even the ketchup and mustard bottles had the pleasure of his mercy. After a mirthful twenty minutes, the side door of the cart opened up.

“*Hic* What a glut,” *squelch*. The weight of his stomach was too much to keep himself from falling, but enough to cushion his decent. “*Hic* I’ve gorged so much already, but haven’t even made a dent in the feast this fair offers.”

Having grown larger and wider than ever, Templeton was still determined to gorge further. His stomach had expanded as wide as a watermelon, perhaps more so. This only continued to fuel his apatite. The fatter he got, the fatter he wanted to become. So, continuingly moving forward, he searched for the next big thing. He drank from a spoiled carton of milk, to an old milk shake, and even a picture of what he thought was lemonade, which had a little more tang than he bargained for. In his attempts to stand in order to get a better view of his surroundings, he lost his balance and knocked over garbage cans, unloading a treasure of goodies for him to further gorge upon. Sweet succulent grease passed his lips as soaked chewed hamburgers glazed his tongue. The sweet cinnamon of churros delighted his belly, and corncobs sprinkled with spice caused pleasurable churning that made his belly slosh and burble blithely. Donuts, boiled eggs, cheese cake, cotton candy, cream, rotten vegetables, banana peels, anything and everything Templeton was able to lay his paws on, was shoved down his gullet.

Having no sense of time while delighting himself on the riches of nightly glutting, Templeton chose to rest for a couple minutes…near something to chew over of course. Resting his plump back against a pile of cups and wrappers, which crinkled and cracked under his immense weight, he gently chewed on a hefty portion of a banana. His eyes were half closed, and expression still as exuberant as before. Lazily he wrapped an arm around the banana while still chewing away at it, and plopped a paw atop of his incalculable, otherworldly stomach, moaning in pleasure.

"*Hic* What glorious gorging," he spoke with his mouth full.

Stuffing the rest of the banana along with the peel within his gaping maw, he tapped the gelatinous sloshing ocean of fat with both pairs of digits. “*Hic* I never believed I’d *Hic* become this fat, and I have you to *Hic* thank for it.” He gave his stomach a series of slaps, causing his whole body to tremble, mainly his mid section…which was comprised of 90% of his physical being. “As fat as I *Hic*have become, there’s still more to glut myself with.”

The thought of further engorging caused his belly to tremble in a cacophony of bubbling sloshes. Templeton shook his head, “You’ll get fatter *Hic* because I say you will. Now here, have some *Hic* more.”

Pulling toward him the rest of the banana rind he took the first from, he relaxed as he comfortably began inserting whole each banana down his gullet effortlessly; continuing to gain in size. Never in texts books or the history of the world was a rat meant to become as incredibly overweight as Templeton, but the rat’s insatiable swell was unlike the world ever knew. Drunk and oblivious to his own health, the rat only cared about how much more he could fill into his overburdened stomach.

Shoveling the final banana into him, the overfed rat smacked his lips, as the delicious morsel expanded him out further. Wearing a sloppy grin, he pulled up some of the blubber atop of his legs, setting them free, then stroke at his corpulent gut. “See, that wasn’t *Hic* so bad was it? Well, *Hic* break time is*Hic* over. Now,” Templeton placed a paw on his chubby cheek, the other resting on his immensely plush chest, “*Hic* were to glut next.”
134111121211.title: Gluttonous Zeal

134112.content:
As Templeton lay there, struggling to move, his hiding place suddenly became dark. He craned his head around and saw an entire bucket of rotten scraps being dumped into the trash can!

He wiggled enough to move his head into the perfect position, leaving his mouth open to eat the delicious trash being practically fed right to him! Fruit peels, bread crusts, and everything Templeton could ever dream of were being poured in his waiting mouth! The bucket was emptied and the person walked off, apparently not noticing the engorged rat in the trash can. Templeton ate and ate, his swollen belly not done digesting his earlier gluttony. Finally, that treasure trove was also gone, and Templeton lay at the bottom of the trash can, hiccupping and moaning.

As he sat there, his sloshing belly wobbling from side to side, Templeton the rat...
134112.title: Treasure  of Trash

1341121.content:
Templeton closed his eyes and drifted into a restful sleep. His dreams were vague, but in them he felt a smug sense of conquest. Of victory.

He awoke a few hours later to cold wet drops splashing into his furry belly. Opening his eyes, he saw that the sky had filled with dark clouds. There was a mild commotion just outside the trash can as a group of humans was walking by.

“Come on kids,” came a voice, “The fair’s closing for the rest of the day.”

“Aw…” whined a smaller voice.

“Don’t worry, it’ll be open again tomorrow. But we gotta get out now,” replied the first voice as the group of humans moved away.

Curious, Templeton rubbed the sleep from his eyes and moved to get a better view of what was happening. He shifted his great bulk forward and, with great labor and careful not to tip the trash can over, climbed up the side to peer out.

From where the trash can was, Templeton could see much of the fairgrounds. Sure enough, a steady stream of humans was making its way for the exits.

A crack of thunder from the sky behind him made Templeton turn his head around. There, he saw a dark thundercloud rolling across the sky, heading straight for the fairgrounds. It seemed the coming storm had forced the fair to close for the day.

Unable to hold his size up much longer, Templeton let go, dropping into the trash with a plop. He was surprised by the sensation of his new bulk wobbling after landing. After a moment, his belly stopped sloshing, but the raindrops kept beating down on his pelt. It was raining harder now.

A thought popped into his head that curled the corners of his mouth into a smirk. “Fair closing means no humans,” he said to no one in particular. “No humans means no hiding. I can eat whatever I want, wherever I want. And another whole day before Charlotte needs words. Why this whole stinking fairground is mine for the taking.”

He laughed as he began rocking the can over. It was easier to knock over than the first one, because of his added mass. A few rocks and the whole can dumped its contents, rat and all onto the dirt path. Giggling, he righted himself and brought a clawed finger to his second chin as he contemplated where he would go first.
1341121.title: Storm's Coming

13411211.content:
Templeton looked over to a row of temporary buildings down the path. Surely there was something in there he could eat, and besides, he could use the shelter from the rain. He glanced all around one more time to make sure the coast was clear, then began making his way toward them.

His belly was still too immense for him to easily crawl on all fours. But Templeton quickly discovered that if he walked on his two hind legs and arched his back a bit, he could move along more quickly. It was still difficult, slow going with his distended gut stretched before him, wobbling just above the ground as it pulled him forward. His tail swished behind him in a fruitless effort to counterbalance the rocking movements of his off-center mass. And every few steps his balance would fail him and he’d stumble forward into the muddy, rain-soaked path. But the discomfort and inconvenience of toppling into his belly would always quickly give way to a fit of giggles as Templeton marveled at how impressively he’d grown in so short a time.

“My my,” he laughed to himself after falling forward yet again, his hind legs bicycling in the air, knees kneading into his soft sides as he tried to rock himself backward. “This is going to take some getting used to.”

Hind feet finally back on the ground, he straightened his knees, hefted his belly off the ground with a grunt, bent his back, waited a moment to ensure his balance was right, then began making his way forward again. He moved more deliberately now, his gait a slow waddle.

He was glad to have checked for all the humans to have left, because reaching the first building took much longer than expected. Once there, his ratty instincts took over and he slid under the floorboards, looking for a way inside.

He didn’t know it, but the building he had chosen was a….
13411211.title: Learning to Walk Again

134112111.content:
The air was cold around Templeton’s snout as he pushed it out through a gap in the floorboards. Much colder than it was outside. He peeked his head out and tried to get a look around, but the room was dark, and much of his view was blocked by boxes. There was no sound except the constant hum of an air conditioner and the patter of the rain on the roof. There were no sounds of humans though, and although he couldn’t place a finger on what exactly, he knew he smelled some kind of food.

The gap in floorboards was large, and would have more than allowed him to pass through just a day before, but now he wasn’t so sure. It certainly wouldn’t be easy. He put his front paws at the openings of the hole on either side of himself and began to push down into his paws to lift himself through.

His enormous width almost immediately filled the gap. He pushed and strained, forcing more and more of his belly up over the lip of the floorboard. But before even his widest point could clear the hole, he could push himself no further.

His feet kicked helplessly at the air in the gap between the building and the ground outside, but found nothing to push off of. Deciding to give up and turn back, he tried to force his front paws back through the gap to try to pull himself back down, but could find no space that hadn’t already been filled by his bulk. He could shove his fingers between his body and the wood, but not far enough to get a grip on anything. He was stuck right where he was.

Templeton began to panic. This was bad. Desperately, he reached out for a nearby box that had earlier blocked his vision, hoping to find something inside to help. His claw caught a corner of the box, shearing it off. He tried to toss the scrap away, but it stuck to his paw. He looked at his paw and saw that the inside of the scrap was a glob of a yellowish creamy substance, mostly solid in the frigid air but melting around his fingers.

He sniffed it. It couldn’t be. Could it? He shoved his paw into his mouth and devoured the substance, scrap and all.
It was! Butter!

Templeton looked at the box and saw that where his claw had torn open the box it had exposed a huge slab of butter. He lurched forward, swiping his claws at it, getting them covered in the stuff, making them incredibly slippery, then began massaging the space where his belly met the floorboard, smearing it with the butter.

He then put his paws at either side of the gap and pushed once again. And slowly, but surely, more of him slid through.

“Oh, ho! This is incredible!” he laughed. He repeated the process over the next few minutes, grabbing chunks of butter, spreading them over his belly, and sliding out a fraction of an inch at a time. More and more of the rat spilled out over the floor around the hole, like a too-large muffin baking in a tiny tin. His gray coat was dripping with butter.

As he got further, he was able to reach more butter from the box, popping large chunks of it into his own mouth between rubbing it over his fur. “One good turn deserves another,” he laughed as he sucked a hunk of butter half the size of his head off his paw. “I helped myself, so now I just have to help myself.”

After a long struggle, prolonged by his snacking, he finally popped free after one final push, sliding across the floor on his butter-slick gut.

But when he stopped sliding, his face froze into a look of terror. There, looming before him was a human.

Or was it? It was shaped exactly like a human, but was standing perfectly motionless. And its skin, it’s hair, it’s clothes, it’s shoes were all the same creamy beige color. Templeton’s fear melted away into curiosity: it couldn’t be, could it?

He rocked backwards, planted his feet and hefted his belly off the ground. Its slippery surface popped off the floor with a wet “thock!” He rocked back on his hips and waddled around to the front of the figure. He burst into a wide grin when we realized what he was looking at.

“What will you humans think of next?”

It was a statue of a farmer, carved entirely out of butter. Standing beside it that was a sculpture of a dairy cow, also made of butter. There were other objects in the room, glass milk bottles, tin pails, a short three-legged stool, all arranged in a nearly-finished tableau facing a floor-to-ceiling glass panel that split the room in half so that spectators could see. On the opposite wall, behind the statue, was a large slab of butter with the words, “Thank You, Dairy Farmers” carved into it.

On the floor among the bottles were sculptors’ tools and dozens and dozens of boxes of butter just like the one Templeton had torn into.

Little drips slid between his fingers as Templeton rubbed his paws together and looked around the room.

“Let’s see, which of you should I eat first?”
134112111.title: The Butter Sculptures

choices: Templeton catches the statue in his mouth
Templeton hides inside the cow sculpture
1341121111.content:
Templeton waddled over to the farmer statue. The statue held a real pitchfork in one hand, and had the other resting on the back of the cow sculpture. Templeton looked up at the farmer statue’s face, chiseled into a rather serious, proud, almost heroic stare, as if looking out over some very important work.

“Pfft. Doesn’t look like any farmer I know,” he said. “Not nearly dopey enough.”

He stepped forward and touched the booted foot with an extended claw. The surface of the sculpture was extremely slippery, but the refrigerated air in the room kept the butter quite solid. Still, with his new weight, he was sure it wouldn’t hold him if he tried to climb it. He would have to eat from the bottom up.

He took a few steps backwards toward the three-legged stool and wrapped his tail around one of its legs. He dragged it right next to the statue’s leg then released his tail

“I don’t want to have to stop once I get going, I’ll just climb right up.”

He wasn’t quite sure he meant that, as surveyed the statue one last time. It was quite enormous, easily too big to eat all at once. “Still, it’s good to have goals,” he said, he patting his stomach and smiling. And with that, he lunged into the foot of the statue.

It was a ravenous attack, no plan, no logic, no strategy, just trying to get as much of the butter into himself as he could. Templeton was a whirlwind of eating, biting directly into the statue while simultaneously shearing off chunks with his claws and shoving them into his mouth. A near constant spray of butter chunks flew out of his ever working mouth, coating what little of his fuzzy belly wasn’t already soaked.

He soon settled into a rhythm, finding that he could get larger and larger chunks down his throat if he first bit off a piece from the statue and worked it over with his teeth and tongue until it was practically liquid. He would gulp, coating his throat in the slippery butter. Then the big chunks he pushed in with his hands would slide right down with one gulp.
He found himself challenging himself, straining his jaw open wider and wider than ever before as he tore off larger and larger wads of the statue and hurled them down his throat. It was like a game. And he was always winning.

His stomach groaned and he pulled his head back to look at how far he had gotten on statue. Most of one booted foot was gone, from ankle to toe. The space where the statue’s boot had been just moments ago was larger than Templeton himself had been before arriving at the fair. He looked forward at his gut and was shocked by how much larger it was.

He sat down with a weighty thud. Even with his hind legs splayed out at a slight angle, the belly now nearly came all the way to the claws on his hind paws. It looked indeed like he had swallowed a whole average sized rat just since coming into the room. was an amazing sight.

“If I could get that big old sign back there to Charlotte, I would,” said Templeton, scooping flecks of butter off his furry chest with his greasy fingers and shoving them into his mouth. “The four best words I could ever hope to find are ‘Thank You Dairy Farmers.’”

With that he reached out with his claws and popped off the entire heel and much of the shin of the statue – a chunk far larger than any he had swallowed before. He took a deep breath, and crammed the entire thing into his throat.

“WHAM!”

Templeton’s head whipped around at the sudden sound, the statue’s pitchfork had come loose and slammed into the ground. He looked up and saw the statue teetering slightly.

“Oh no!” He realized he had gotten greedy – breaking off the rest of the foot had made the statue unstable. It was rocking slightly and could fall at any moment. With all these bottles and pails around, if it fell, someone would surely hear the sound, even with the fairgrounds nearly empty.

What could Templeton do?
1341121111.title: Eating the Sculpture

choices: Templeton tries to find out how big he is
13411211111.content:
The sculpture teetered more wildly, about to fall over at any moment. Templeton gasped and staggered backwards behind the wooden stool in a panic. He had to stop it, but he didn’t know how.

The sculpture finally lost its balance completely and began falling toward the bloated rat. Templeton leapt backwards with surprising speed given his bulk. The statue crashed into the stool just below hip level and flipped upside down, and Templeton’s eyes widened as he saw the statue was now falling directly toward him, head first.

For a moment, the world seemed to go into slow motion and the butter sculpture seemed to hang in midair. Had any other creature found themselves in Templeton’s position, they would have run to get out of the way. But Templeton wasn’t like any other creature. A different instinct took over as Templeton realized that there was one thing that he alone could do to prevent disaster.

Templeton threw himself onto his rump, splayed his front paws to his sides to brace himself, and at precisely the right moment, opened his jaw wide.

The impact of the statue into Templeton’s mouth sent the rat sliding across the floor and into the wall, and the second impact into the wall forced his head to buck forward, sending even more of the slippery statue into it.
With a muffled gasp, Templeton realized he had done exactly what he intended: caught the falling statue in his mouth. It had happened so fast he could barely believe it had happened. But there he was, the whole statue sticking out of his mouth with nowhere to go but in.

With his tongue, he felt the lump that was the statue’s nose. His cheeks bulged enormously to match his incredible gut. His eyes were bulging too as he strained to control what was happening. He had quite literally bitten off more than he could chew. The statue was stuck in his throat good.

He lifted his chin toward the ceiling so that gravity could help pull the rest of the head into his butter-slick throat. He watched as a few inches of the statue slid in slowly, revealing slightly more of the ceiling beyond it. After a moment, the rat’s jaw could relax somewhat as it narrowed around the statue’s neck. His snout, lips and cheeks rested against the shoulders of the farmer.

Templeton took his first easy – well, easier – breaths since the statue began to fall. This wasn’t comfortable, and what would come next would be even harder still. He could work his jaws through where they were now, basically biting off what was already in his mouth and throat. But he wouldn’t be able to control the remainder of the statue with his arms once he bit through, and it would just come crashing down again.

No, he realized, the most powerful tools at his disposal were his mouth, throat and gut.
