There was no turning back now. The only safe thing to do was to swallow it.

Templeton took another deep breath, then widened his jaw and began sucking the statue down. With one gulping inhalation, he drew the shoulders down into his maw. He shuddered as his own body heat softened what of the statue was already in his stomach, making room for what was to come. He hoped.

He kept his back and legs perfectly still, afraid that any motion besides the rhythmic gulping and slurping would cause the statue to topple over. And him with it, because after all, at this point, he was rather at its mercy.

“No,” he thought, “it’s at mine.”

Further and further, the statue slid out of Templeton’s vision and into his mouth. Things slowed for a moment as his jaw widened over the farmer’s paunch. Templeton’s front paws reached up and sunk into the butter, forcing it down into his body.

A quick snort of relief forced its way out of Templeton’s nose as he felt his lips curl around the narrower waist of the sculpture. He was now over the hump. For his jaw, at least. His stomach still had to keep going.

He had no idea how his belly was handling all of this mass. He could feel it straining as it filled with the semisolid butter and splaying out over more and more of the floor, but he couldn’t see it over the statue legs that still filled much of his vision. Though he couldn’t see it, he began working over the expanse of his belly – well, what he could reach of it – with his slippery front paws, trying to further soften the butter that was filling him like a balloon. He didn’t know if it was working, but it certainly felt good feeling his fingers sink into his greasy, furry mass then having the skin pop back out tight as he released his hands. The sensation was enough to briefly distract his mind from the exhausting work of gulping, sucking, slurping away at the butter sculpture as his body drew it further and further in.

As the width of the statue’s midriff disappeared into him and all he was left with was the statue’s legs, it briefly occurred to Templeton that he could now easily break off the legs and toss them aside without risk of making much noise. Somewhere deep within his aching, straining belly came a rumble, almost like agreement. Like his body was warning him not to continue.

But just as the gag reflex that would have prevented him from starting on this journey had been obliterated, so too had whatever base instinct keeps a creature from eating beyond its belly’s ability.

“Besides,” he thought, “why let this go to waste?”

He relaxed his throat, thinking that gravity would do the trick. But there wasn’t enough statue left and there was too much inside of him pushing back. He reached above his head and plunged his paws up to their wrists into the legs of the statue. With his throat as relaxed as possible, pulled his arms downward, into his mouth, shoving ounce after ounce of creamy butter through his slickened throat into his straining belly.

He plucked his arms out, reached up again, and – ignoring the incredible strain from his abdomen – shoved the buttery mass in one more time, this time so far that his jaw was able to close around the stump of the foot he’d eaten off earlier.

With just a single butter shoe sticking out of his mouth, he rolled his head forward and was surprised to find resistance from the shoe as it bumped against something. My belly, he realized. It now towered over him. With a smile at the corner of his stretched mouth, he leaned his head further forward. Pushing off his belly, the shoe slid into Templeton’s throat, and he swallowed it whole with one final “gulp.”

His throat finally clear for the first time since the statue fell into his mouth, Templeton let out a strained gasp. He wasn’t sure how long it had taken – a few dozen seconds, maybe just over a minute. But to his aching body, it felt like it had taken an hour to consume the statue. Every fiber of every inch of his body was sore and strained from what had just happened.

But he had done it. And it felt incredible.

He kept his eyes shut for a moment, breathing shallowly. Every breath, every tiny twitch of a muscle sent ripples across his enormously swollen body. He felt straining sensations, not just across the furry surface of his body, but throughout the entire enormous volume that was him. The slow, dull churning of his abdomen, the almost creaking tightness of his skin – for a moment he felt every part of himself. A buttery froth coated his muzzle, face and chin, and little flecks and chunks littered the floor about him, but for the time being he was too exhausted to even lick it off, much less grab those pieces off the ground.

He opened his eyes. His vision now clear without the statue in the way, he tried to regard his body. But he couldn’t because of, well, his body.

From his position seated against the wall, his belly bulged out titanically before him. It arced upward above his head, where the boot had briefly rested before, but extended up beyond that as well. He had no idea how far forward it must extend, but when he wiggled his toes, he felt his claws scritching into a point not even a fraction of the way down it’s length.

He was enormous. Larger than any rat had ever been or hoped to be. Bigger than most humans, even. And certainly bigger than any creature he’d met before.

“Well,” he thought glancing over to the other sculpture. “Except maybe the cows.”
13411211111.title: Templeton catches the statue in his mouth

choices: Ignore them and try to get out the door.
134112111111.content: As much as he wanted to see how huge and bloated he was, Templeton decided to eat the cow statue. Unable to speak in the thrill of eating such a large target, he advanced upon the poor, innocent, buttery bovine. Remembering what happened last time, he decided to eat in significantly smaller chunks. And so it went on, with Templeton taking off small(but still rather large) chunks and shoving them down his throat. Putting an ear to his stomach each time he swallowed, he could hear the resounding GLORP of the butter as it found a new home within his already occupied belly. Finally, after an indeterminate amount of time, Templeton finished eating the statue. "Aaaa..." Templeton sighed as he rubbed his swollen gut. "Mmmm... that hit the spot." Suddenly, Templeton heard clanging from the tent next door. "Should I check them out?" He thought to himself.
134112111111.title: Templeton eats the cow sculpture

1341121111111.content:
"Yeah alright, I'll check it out," said Templeton, as he cautiously poked his head around the corner. What he saw next couldn't have surprised him more than an entire planet somehow entering his belly. It was a female rat, just as fat, if not fatter than he. There was something about her, Templeton noticed, that made her seem more... well, even he didn't know. But maybe then, he just made a little sound, since she turned around and looked a him with an amused expression on her face. "Well, I can see that I'm not the only one who looks to indulge in the finer points of life." Templeton grinned and replied,"I'm just glad you're not wanting to add me to your corpulence." The lady rat chuckled, her stomach bouncing and sloshing about. "Well, my name is Charlene, what about you?" "I'm Templeton." "Well then, Templeton, would you care to join me in an epic quest to stuff ourselves to the point of immobility?"

"Well, this is a hard decision... What should I do?"
1341121111111.title: Check out the noises.

134112111112.content:
Templeton patted the slope of gut that rose up on front of him. With each pat his hand sunk in briefly, but then was bounced back by a rippling beneath the taut skin.

“Mmf,” he grunted. “I simply have to know.”

With energy he shored up from he knew not where, Templeton began shimmying his legs out from under the mountain of gut that buried them. He yelped and moaned as a few times as he moved faster than his body was ready to accommodate, but eventually brought his legs up near his body to begin pressing into a squatting position.

He then leaned into his gut, then reached out with his front paws, grasped onto the wobbling gray expanse in front of him. For a moment he just held this position, enjoying the incredible sensation of embracing this enormous mass that laid out in front of him – that was him. But he soon got back to work, sinking his clawed fingers into his gut, then, with a quick, whip-like motion, pulling the belly down and back toward him.

The expanse that was Templeton’s belly lurched back toward him just a fraction of an inch in a jerky, wavelike motion.

As it jerked back, the slippery surface of his buttery fur caused his gut to rotate under him ever so slightly, allowing Templeton the room to put his hind legs up against the wall.

He braced himself, then repeated the motion. With another jerk, the belly shifted and rotated again, and Templeton’s feet were able to climb higher up the wall.

Slowly, incrementally, Templeton was pulling his belly underneath himself and keeping his legs against the wall to keep his balance. In this way, he was basically climbing onto his own belly. And he was getting a sense of just how much belly there was as each mini rotation caused more belly to come up beneath him exposed to the cool air, and more on the other side to press into the ground.

He had closed his eyes for a moment, enjoying the feeling of his slippery fur dragging across the floor under the weight of his enormous bulk as it rotated with each jerk.

Eyes still closed, he shifted himself one last time, and moved his feet to continue climbing the wall when his feet suddenly found nothing but air. He opened his eyes and could not believe what he saw – he was laying on top of his gigantic belly, and it was even greater than he had imagined.

His head, arms, legs and tail and a few rolls of back flab were the only way you could tell what part you were seeing of what was otherwise a nearly-spherical rat. Here on the top of his belly, his eye-level was about three times what it used to be when he stood on his hind legs. And that entire expanse below him, and expanding out to the sides as well was all him. His fantastic belly.

Templeton began to smile at this, but a sudden realization wiped the smile from his face. That slippery sensation of his gut rotating along the floor hadn’t stopped. Templeton was rotating forward.

“Oh no!” he gasped. He reached out to find something to brace himself, but his claws found only the belly that he was about to be rolled under. And even though he was attached to it, he held on for dear life.

His body rolled forward like a furry, overinflated water balloon, only much larger. Templeton took a long breath and held it just before his head rolled into the ground. It was a good thing to, because for a moment, his face was completely smothered by his own bulk.

Eventually, his shoulders, back, and hind legs met the ground too and his body, finding its only non-spherical surface splayed out beneath it, stopped rolling.

His belly lurched forward, letting Templeton breath, then came to rest wobbling in the air beyond his reach, it’s incredible weight pinning him down.

He breathed a sigh of satisfaction and, finally, licked the last of the butter off his lips. He swallowed with a gulp, then let out an incredible belch that made his gigantic, butter-slick furry beachball of a gut quiver and ripple. Even when that stopped, Templeton could still feel it churning, slowly digesting the incredible volume of fat that now filled it.
He tapped the sides of it and it made a satisfying, squishy, almost drum-like sound.

“Like I said, it’s good to have goals.”

And with that, he passed out into a deep, richly-deserved sleep.

* * *


When Templeton awoke, the sounds of the rain had stopped. How many hours had passed, he didn’t know. But he did know that it was quite a few.

He looked around him to discover that his body had processed most of the butter he had eaten the day before, leaving him with a fatter body all around, with a pronounced
134112111112.title: Rolling Up

1341121111121.content:
"Hmph," grunted Templeton, trying to get up. After a couple minutes of thrashing around, and plenty of moaning and groaning, the rat had finally managed to pick himself up. Waddling over to a mirror conveniently placed in the corner, Templeton chuckled softly to himself. "Heh, looks like I've digested everything."
Pretty much anyone who looked at the rat would've thought he'd just eaten at least 5 pumpkins. His stomach itself was about 15 feet around. That wasn't the only thing that had grown. His chest had also obtained a new found plushness, giving the rat a rather pleasant neck rest. Templeton's lower half had not been left out of the festivities either. His backside was rather huge, providing a convenient counterweight to the rodent's titanic gut. His legs had also plumped up, forcing to waddle even more obviously. The only hint that the rat wasn't full was that his stomach didn't feel tight when he rubbed it. Rather, it felt soft and pillowy.
Of course, now that Templeton's stomach was empty, the only sensible thing to do was to go and stuff it again. But the question remained, where should he go?
1341121111121.title: Rounded out.

choices: Eat the cow, you'll be fine
Find an exit, it might not be safe here for long
1341121111122.content:
Templeton opened his eyes to the sight of his massive belly, still arching high above him. Rubbing it, he found that its drum-like tightness was replaced with soft and yielding fat. He pushed a paw into his belly and felt it sink deep into his new gut. Looking up toward the ceiling, , he saw that his gut had shrunk somewhat since before he fell asleep, though it was still several feet tall.

Templeton maneuvered himself out from under his belly. A task that would normally be difficult was made much easier by the fact that Templeton was still coated in butter. After getting himself into a sitting position, Templeton looked around to get his bearings. He found that nothing noticeable had changed in the room, but when he looked behind him he was shocked to find that his rear had grown considerably from his last meal. each cheek was bigger than his entire body was before entering the fair. He tried to wrap his tail around one of the cheeks and found it could only reach halfway around one.

"Huh." he thought aloud, "I've never gained weight in my butt before." He smiled. "Though, I also haven't eaten so much in one sitting before either."

Suddenly, Templeton heard his stomach growl. He remembered where he was. He had no idea how many hours he was asleep, and a human could walk into the room any time now.

"I could barely fit through the hole I used to get in here before eating a human-sized chuck of butter." Templeton said to himself while rubbing his girth, "Theres no way I'm getting out that way now..." He thought for a moment and remembered the cow sculpture, "...do I even want to leave yet?"

He realized he had a choice to make: take on the cow, or try to find a way to leave now and gorge somewhere safer.
1341121111122.title: Meal Aftermath

13411211111221.content:
Templeton's belly growled louder than ever before. It seems that, after digesting the farmer statue, it expected another meal just as large. "Alright, alright, we'll stay," he said to his stomach. He turned his sights toward the cow.

The cow was huge, even bigger than the farmer. It was so big that even Templeton's large gut couldn't block his view of the entire sculpture; looking up past his belly, all he could see was the ceiling, some of the opposite wall and the head of the cow.

Templeton stood up. While he was able to life his large butt of the ground, his belly was still a massive obstacle to movement. There was no way he was going to be able to lift its mass off the floor. Luckily the bottom of his belly was still slippery from the butter and he found it was possible to walk in reverse, sliding his belly across the floor. Slowly but surely, Templeton turned so his back was facing the cow and began shuffling backwards. It felt like hours before he made it to the cow, even though it was no more than a few minutes.

Arriving at the cow's back right leg, Templeton looked up at his next meal. His stomach growled loudly as he thought of how to approach it. Remembering what caused the farmer sculpture to fall, Templeton decided to eat the buttery animal's two right hooves first. This would cause it to fall, allowing Templeton to access the entire meal. It would probably be loud, but Templeton assumed it was night after his sleep. It was unlikely that anyone was around to hear it.

Templeton started his plan. Positioning himself so that the cow's back right hoof was beside him, he turned his head sideways and began gnawing on the butter. Like before, he gulped down larger and larger chunks. Despite their similar size, the first hoof took nowhere near as long as the farmer's boot did to eat and it wasn't long before he found himself walking backwards toward the other right hoof. He grunted form the weight added by the first hoof, its addition already impacting the size of his belly.

He reached the other hoof and began again. This hoof disappeared even quicker than the last. Lost in his gluttony, Templeton was shocked when the cow statue suddenly toppled over. Remembering that this was his plan the whole time, he dragged himself toward the udder of the fallen cow. He found that with two hooves worth of butter in him, dragging himself had become almost too difficult.

Templeton looked backwards at the cow. "Hmmm. How to do this..." he mumbled in between burps. He needed a new plan of attack. Wanting the most efficient gorging method possible, Templeton turned so the front of his belly was pressing into the cow's chest. He grabbed his belly with his front paws and kicked off the ground as hard as he could his his back paws. Just as he planed, his butter-slick belly rolled forward, sending the rest of him up, then into the sculpture. Templeton dug his claws into the sculpture and began digging in, allowing his gut to flow out behind him. Templeton excitedly tore into the torso of the cow.

His belly growled for more as he gorged, as if it was pretending to be empty. His eating was a lot faster now, but the cow was huge. As he ate, he would occasionally need to allow himself to slide further down his belly to reach more of the butter. He ate with so much vigor that his gut constantly wobbled and sloshed. Every once in awhile he would stop to let out a belch before immediately returning to his binge.

Eventually, he found himself at the floor, having eaten a large hole in the cow's chest. With his stomach yelling for more, he pulled himself closer to the sculpture and continued. Hours passed; Movement was becoming very difficult, but Templeton always found a way to position himself so he could reach more of the butter. Sometimes he found himself sitting on his large butt, grabbing butter with one paw while the front of his belly pressed against another part of the sculpture several feet away. Sometimes he lied on his side with his belly ballooning away from him, freeing up both of is paws. Sometimes he even lied on his back, reaching for butter above his head while admiring the size of his gut. However he sat, he never stopped gorging, and his belly distended as he stuffed himself to more and more ridiculous levels.

Templeton saved the sculpture's head for last. He sat in a sitting position in the middle of the room, his gut spilling out in all directions. He sat there with the head beside him, belching and hiccuping for a few moments before hefting the head up with both his paws and shoving it into his mouth whole. With a massive swallow, Templeton's eyes widened as he felt his gut simultaneously press into the ceiling and the glass panel dividing the room. Templeton reeled at the realization of how big the statures had made him. Looking to his left and right, he saw that his gut was about as wide as it was tall. Happy beyond belief, he sank himself into his belly. He rubbed his tiny paws all over as much of it as he could - which was barely any of it. There was no way Templeton was going to be able to move at this size, but he didn't care. He had done it.
13411211111221.title: The Second Sculpture

choices: Plays and looks at his ass
134112111112211.content:
Templeton decided that he needed to sleep, besides, he wasn't hungry right now so there was really no point in going anywhere.
After a few hours Templeton woke up and moved around, the latter getting a bit difficult considering his weight. Templeton's body was filled with more fat, his stomach looking like a small balloon now, but his backside eclipsed everything, his rump was much bigger then his stomach, at least 3 times as big. "Geez." Templeton said to himself. "How am I gonna eat more food if I have to carry this wide load!?" He said, wiggling his bottom have a bit.
He then...
134112111112211.title: Sleep and digest

1341122.content:
After giving a giant belch, Templeton began slowly rocking from side to side, clutching his sloshing tummy. It only took a few minutes before the trash can tipped over onto one side and an extremely swollen rat wobbled out. He hiccupped proudly and began to roll home, for in addition to the first few words, he also had obtained three more-"Amazing", "Magnificent", and "New". One of these must be a good word for that pig, he thought as he slowly wobbled to the barn.

Templeton arrived, handed Charlotte the five words, and staggered over to his bed for a nice nap-then maybe a nice overnight trip to the junkyard! But right now, even Templeton was overfull, and honestly didn't want another bite, his full belly rising up almost as far as he was tall. He moaned softly as he drifted off to sleep...
1341122.title: Victory at last!

choices: Arrive at the Junkyard - Eat, Eat, Eat!
13411221.content:
Templeton awoke, opening his eyes slowly...he belched loudly and wrinkled his nose at the various tastes in his mouth. He smacked his lips and attempted to get on his four feet, realizing the difficulty he was having, he looked at his body with surprise. "Well hello new friend..." Rather than digesting itself completely away, Templeton's belly had certainly grown from all the gorging he'd been doing. He ran his fingers along his gray fur and felt the soft layer of fat within. "This calls for a celebration, moreso than any pig!" He spat, and with a quick flick of his tail, wobbled his bulk in the direction of the junkyard.

Templeton's body swayed from side to side as he trekked towards the junkyard...already he could smell the foul treats that it hid, and it made his mouth water and his plump belly growl with a fantastic anticipation. The plump rat was hoping that there was more than enough fresh tash waiting for him, he imagined himself, a monsterous ball, having to roll his way home, surprising Wilbur and Charlotte, and the other animals alike. "They couldn't come up with a word for me, that's for sure Charlotte!" he spoke into the air, his snout accompanying his words.
13411221.title: go to the junkyard

134112211.content:
The junkyard had a special section for dumped food. Templeton was able to sniff it out in seconds. He waddled over towards the piles of rotting food. His mouth watered. he could see stacks and piles and mountains of moldy goodies. Opening his mouth wide, he immeidately approached a package of cookies. He began snacking down on them.

Then he ate a moldy banana, a half-eaten cupcake, a rotten tomato, a mound of cold spaghetti, and he managed to scrape up the remnants of an old birthday cake.

Templeton ate and ate, and he became fatter and fatter. This continued for about thirty minutes before he began to feel a little tired. He'd been eating so fast he had to stop for a bit. He paused to look at his big stomach, which had grown even bigger to the point that he was a virtual appendage to his gigantic belly. He patted it, and it gurgled loudly.

He belched loudly and looked around. There wasn't much food in the area, so maybe he should go back to the fair and find some more. Then again, it was almost morning. He would have to get going back to the pen to let Charlotte and Wilbur where he was. That, and he could use a nap in a safe place.
134112211.title: Arrive at the Junkyard - Eat, Eat, Eat!

choices: Continue to glut, then show off to the spider and pig
Glut without stop, the fair is closed.
1341122111.content:
Templeton groaned and grunted all the way back to the fair; his heavy stomach pulling him back like an anchor dragging across the floor. But he managed without much trouble. It felt pleasurable for his whole belly to pull across the ground, massaging across the dirt and sloshing his contents about. As he entered further into the fair he ate bits and pieces of food he had neglected to eat last night. With each new mouthful he grew happier and fuller, but it was just the beginning.

He pulled himself beside a table and pulled on a hanging clothe to help him stand up. His weight however pulled the entire cloth down from the table and rained down a shmorgishborg of banana's, pie, burgers, fries, and corn dogs; along with a few vegetables in the mix. Before he could get into the right position and open his mouth, all of it had dropped on top of the rat; burring him in a pile of goodies. Voraciously, he ate without stop; quickly devouring the fries, and the burgers. His stomach glorped and gurgled with each new slab of meat, or bunch of fries that slid down his gaping maw. He placed a dainty paw on his large belly. Giving it a few congratulatory pats at enjoying the feast.

All of it was devoured in minutes, until the fat rat now moved on to the bunch of bananas. There must've been at least five in the bunch. Rubbing the large expanse of his stomach, he thought about how he should tackle this challenge. "You think you could handle this," he asked his stomach, which gurgled in reply. All right then, time for the stuffing of a lifetime.

Attempting to stand, Templeton's legs strained to lift his entire body up. Now on two paws, he struggled for balance. Craning his head back all of his weight caused momentum to stumble backwards. His robust blubbery back cushioned his crash on the table leg, causing him to giggle at his clumsiness. Having so much belly to lug around was an amusing task. Then, walking toward the banana's with each careful step, he positioned his bottom over them, and brought down his massive rump on the edge of the peels. Five bananas flew directly into the air, just as the rat planed, and quickly began to rain downward. He would only have one chance to do this right, least the bananas be mushed into tiny pieces. Placing his paws around as much of his belly as he could, he moved his neck around, mouth open, to catch each flying morsel. 1, he caught, sliding down his throat and greatly expanding his stomach. It was too fast and too quick for his arms to hold onto and catapulted away. 2, the force of this second one threw him off guard, since his stomach was still comprehending the entrance of the first. 3, he felt his whole anatomy continue to balloon outward with each massive swallow. 4, his eyes were nearly shut at the gluttonous pain of having swallowed whole objects about the same height as him. And 5, finally, with the last banana swallowed, he allowed his entire body to rest, and what a body that would be resting. Templeton looked downward at his stomach, sides, everything. It was so large, so glorious, he was practically a watermelon of fur. A butterball of delight. Patting all he could, a symphony of sloshing and burbles erupted. The entire fair experience brought with it more and more delights, and this was one of them. He had truly grown to a admirable size, with a belly all rats would envy. But it wasn't over yet.

Letting out a large burp, and catatonic hiccups, he rolled his way to the next feast.
1341122111.title: A Veritable Shmorgishborg

13411221111.content:
Attempting to stand, Templeton teetered slightly until his bubbling body stabilized. Being very heavy around the mid section, his body leaned forward and rump stuck out behind. The obese rat jiggled his massive belly with both paws. Sending pleasuring ripples that massaged his tender insides.

“I’ve already eaten over thirty lunches, but there’s just so much more glutting to be done. I don’t know if my stomach could take anymore.”

At the sound of this, his belly rumbled loudly. Squeezing and patting his large bulk, the reassurance lead him to continue on. Each step he took was followed by a slosh, proceeded by his gut wobbling up and down. The feeling of being so overly fed was intoxicating, and never in all his life did he think to have a belly of such grand size. He continued to caress it while picking up scraps of food along the way with his large tail and popping them effortlessly into his gapping maw.

Soon, he found a small building which read “Cafeteria” and licked the drool seeping from his lips. Running over, he was greeted with tables upon tables, and open windows at the far end, where they served the food. Smelling all of the left out rotten goodies, he stuck out his plentiful stomach and smacked it heartedly.

“What a blessing. Lets see if I could still moved after such glutting.”

Accidentally falling over onto his massive belly, Templeton dragged himself to the nearest table. Thankfully, there was a convenient step ladder to help him scale the tables faster, and with less effort than he would pulling himself up. The rewards were great as he reached the top. Pizza, burgers, corn and hotdogs, pie, and other goodies, were quickly wolfed down into the rats bottomless chasm. Already full from before, Templeton’s stomach continuingly grew tighter and rounder, and sang in a symphony of gurgles.

It continued like this for almost an hour with each table, which numbered about fifty. With each new mouthful, Templeton would grunt at the pain of having to make room for yet another morsel. He was growing more belly then anything, enough to hold a few grape fruits. He even took little time to breath in between meals, and was left panting after swallowing whole anything he could get his paws on.

On the tenth table or so, the rat had been so careless as to attempt to shove down his throat a whole kiwi. His head having sunk and merge into his body, made it easy to swallow faster, but the sheer size of this thing made it troubling without chewing. Still, he shoved on, until the massive swallow let out a large gasp of air, and sent Templeton crashing down on the table, gasping for air. It was the only time he relaxed and didn’t immediately move on to the next pawful of food. But the reward was great. Rolling onto his back, the tower of fur and bubbling fat rolled over onto his muzzle, which he nuzzled his belly before pushing it back. Stroking the tight expanse with his paws, he giggled and smiled happily.

“Now this is a stomach worthy of first prize.”

“I’ll say.”

Shocked, Templeton looked around but saw no one. Then, furiously rotating his body, causing it to erupt in a torrent of sloshes and groans, he saw what was behind his belly. A female ferret of tremendous size, almost as big as him, for a rat.

“Hi there,” she said happily while stuffing her face with a few baked potatoes she gathered. “Never seen you around here before.”

Panicking at coming in contact with another predator, Templeton attempted to drag himself away. Unfortunately, his stomach was too heavy for him to leave fast enough, and before he knew it, he felt a paw patting his body.

“Never knew you rats could put so much away. This was a belly if I’d ever seen one. So soft and plushy, hehe, and loud. Does it ever stop bubbling.” She patted it a few times more. “What’s your name?”

Templeton being too frightened to answer, merely shivered. “Just make it quick.”

“Make what quick?”

“Killing me.”

Suddenly, the ferret burst out in laughter, and rolled him on his back so that they made eye contact. “I’m not going to kill you silly,” she scratched his belly with a paw, which felt really relaxing to Templeton who was unable to reach as much as she was. “There’s so much food here why would I need to. Besides, I’m not a fan of eating living prey. Which is why I came here, it’s a paradise, and by the looks of you I’d say you think so too. My name is Pip, what’s yours?”

“Templeton,” the rat whispered, relaxing as she scratched his belly.

“Templeton, great name.”

“Gee thanks,” the rat giggled.

At the bobbing of his stomach, Pip giggled as well. “Well Templeton, this your first time here?”

“Yes,” he said, resting his paws on his belly and sinking deeper into his large body. “There’s so much glutting to be had here, and I’m not even done yet. My stomach can handle anything.”

“Hehehe, I’ll say it can. Having grown this much and still able to handle more. Hmhmhm, a stomach like this shouldn’t have to be lugged around everywhere. Just wait here Templeton,” she patted his belly, “I’ll bring you some more food.”

Hearing her own large belly slosh as she waddled away, Templeton blew a content sigh whilst rubbing his soft fur. “Well she’s nice, and she’s bringing us more food. What do you think of that?” His belly gave a large bubbly reply, which tickled Templeton who patted it merrily. “Yes I like her too.”

“Okay, open wide you fat rat.”

Looking to his side, Templeton eyes grew wide at the large pile of food she had gathered extremely quickly. “How did you do that so fast, you‘re so big?”

“If you come to the fair as much as me, you get used to being so big and kinda speed up,” she smiled while holding a banana over his head. “Now come on, bottoms up.”

Opening his mouth wide, the banana quickly shot down his throat and nestled in his stomach with a glop; finding a home with the rest of the days gluttony. “You like that big fella,” she asked Templeton’s stomach as she patted it, jiggling and sloshing it about, “Well there’s plenty more where that came from.”

As time passed, Templeton continuingly grew fatter and fatter as all he did was lye down and having food being brought to his awaiting mouth. The more he grew, the happier he became, and more bubbly Pip was about his size. Templeton was happy to be with someone he could relate to. Never did they reach a dull moment as she kept bringing him more and more food from the other tables.

An hour passed and all the tables were finished. Templeton continued to rest peacefully, while squeezing, nuzzling, and patting his globe like belly, which was so big he was able to rest his chin on it. Gelatinously it swayed from side to side and gurgled loudly. It was two heads taller than Pip, who stood beside it. Rubbing it while curling her whiskers.

“Goodness, your stomach really can handle anything. It’s huge.”

“Told-HIC-ya.”

“I bet you’ve lived every rats dream today. To have a stomach this grand certainly is a tough job but you’ve managed in one day. Hehehe, I we could fill it up more; what do you say?”

“Hic-Hilp. I don’t know, I’m getting kinda tired. All this-HIC-gorging has made me sleepy. Plus, my stomach has never felt more full than it-HIC HILP-does now. I should give it time to rest. It’s done a good-HIC HILP-job today.” At these last words, he lifted his heft arms and gave himself a pat, which sunk his whole paw into his fleshy body.

Pip giggled, "Well it certainly gave you this cute little hiccups mr fat rat. It’s your call. We’ve yet to go behind the windows, which has all the food used to make everything out here. We could find more in there than we did out here. But if not, I know a place where you could rest. Hehehe, when I’m half as big as you, I would always go there. Humans don’t know about, so we’ll be safe until nightfall.”

It was a tough decision. Though he was already an ungodly size, further eating excited him, and with the help of his new friend all he’d have to do was lye down and have food brought to him; just how he’d like it. But, he had already eaten so much, over gorged many times over and unable to see anything in front of him. Who knows, he might fall asleep in the middle of eating anyway. With a paw scratching his belly and another scratching his chubby face, he contemplated.
13411221111.title: Meet Pip the Ferret

134112211111.content:
Looking at Pip, then back to his mammoth sized stomach Templeton gave it a series of pats, sloshing and undulating the tub of lard about. "Lets go to the kitchens, I'm sure my stomach can handle it."

As if protesting, the rat's stomach gave a bubbling groan at his comment. Seeing it differently though, Pip patted it herself. "To the kitchen's it is then. This is going to be fun," she giggled.

Though, it wasn't quite fun getting there. Having glutted to the size of a watermelon, Templeton's limbs did little activity while Pip rolled him over to the door. The rat's fat face seemed content reveling in his sloshing countenance as all his gorge shifted around like a washing machine, giving him quite the inner belly massage. Pip on the other paw, didn't seem as content, but pressed on. Thankfully, the cafeteria door was merely a pushable one with no lock or latch. Using Templeton's superior weight, she was able to move the door with ease, with the rat's stomach releasing a grotesque squelch as it slid off his belly and closed.

The tantalizing aroma's made the obese rat let out a mirthful sigh, rubbing his blubbery expanse at the though of once again stuffing his already over cumbered belly. "This really is a fair where a rat can glut."

"And a ferret," replied Pip. "Don't think I just brought you in here for yourself Templeton, I'm hungry too."

Templeton smiled back at his gluttonous new friend. "I know, thanks for bringing me in here still."

"No trouble at all," she tried putting on a fake smile, "now, lets see how much your stomach could handle after eating everything in here."

Templeton wobbled his stomach in anticipation. "It can take whatever you could dish out," he sneered.

Up to the challenge, Pip immediately set off gathering everything edible. To Templeton's surprise, Pip also turned on some stoves, placing some of the frozen foods inside boiling pots to defrost.

"Open wide," said the ferret, holding a large burrito over his mouth.

Doing as she asked, Templeton placed his paws on his over gorged gut, while allowing the burrito to travel down his throat, so the contents within it wouldn't spill all over his face if he bit it. As the hefty specimen slithered it's way into Templeton's stomach, it slowly began bloating further outward, even causing his chin resting on his fattened chest to rise. Upon completion, the rat licked his mouth and patted his stomach daintily while it growled.

"What's that," Pip put an ear to Templeton's belly, "you want more? Well, why didn't you say so."

Pulling a few funnel cakes to Templeton's side, she allowed the rat to eat by himself while she looked after defrosting some more food. She had enough time to get things done before the rat wolfed down each sugary desert in a pinch. For the next meal, Pip opened up a nearby fridge, which was filled with ice creams and popsicles. Bringing over a box of ice cream sandwiches, she placed one by one on Templeton's obese bosom, smiling at his ravenous apatite. Continuing with the popsicles and bucket of ice cream, she returned to the food on the stoves, letting the rat glut for himself.

An hour passed as the rat's feasting of a lifetime continued. Busily, Pip rotated from checking the frosted food, to feeding Templeton. Having a constant trickle of food being passed to him, the rat continued to bloat, so much tha this stomach became so big it would needlessly slosh over his muzzle without letting up. So to prevent Templeton from suffocating he rested against the side of the kitchen window's counter, allowing his overfull, over gorged, overfed stomach, filled to the brim many times over, to gelatinously spill across the floor and continue to take up space.

Moaning in pleasure, Templeton became a mere appendage to his blob like swollen body. Every slight movement left behind it a minute worth of sloshing and burbles, each hiccup would leave a minute worth of jiggling and undulating, and each slab of food he would continue to consume would only delight him further. His arms grew heavy, his head sinking further into his engulfing fat, his legs virtually non existent at this point, and his stomach, bloating up more than a prize winning pumpkin, and he liked it that much more.

"*Hic-Hilp* Pip."

"What," yawned the tired ferret, "You think we should stop?"

"...Heh...hahahahaha. You tell me Templeton. Your stomach, isn't going to stop."

Standing beside the towering rat, she poked at his belly, "I've never seen an animal get so fat, that it grew to be twice my height in one day."

"*Hic--Hilp* I know what you mean. *Hic--Hilp* It surprised me too. I think you *Hic--Hilp* should enjoy yourself now."

Cocking her eyebrow, she folded her paws and leaned against Templeton's blubbery visage, sinking into his fat almost to the point in being engulfed herself. "Well, that's mighty kind of you. I'm sure I'll find something in here, even after you've eaten everything."

Sensing her disappointment, Templeton gave his stomach a hefty pat. Jiggling it and bobbing Pip about. "*Hic--Hilp* At least we saw how fat it could get"

"True," Pip smiled reluctantly, "and I bet it could get fatter still. Well Templeton, I'm going to go enjoy myself now if you don't mind."

"*Hic--Hilp* Okay, I'll rest here for the time being."

"Hahaha, I don't think you're going anywhere anytime soon."

As true as she was, Templeton wasn't so sure. Where there's a will, there's a way, and when it came to eating Templeton would most assuredly find a way. While Pip waddled out the door in search for her own gluttonous escapade, Templeton nestled deeper into his obscene form. Resting on top of his gigantic stomach was like resting on a pillow, and gently began to lull him to sleep. But, as obscenely full and massive as he's become, the thought of further eating intrigued him. Further patting his bubbling corpulence, the glorping and sloshing further tantalized him. What to do…
134112211111.title: Appendage of gluttony

1341122111111.content:
Giving a mental shrug and realizing that he probably can't maneuver himself much anyway at this point, Templeton lets out a quiet yawn and watches Pip leave before he rests his head on the sloshing mass of his middle, falling asleep quickly.

He dreams of food; of eating and eating and eating until he has to be rolled away, of thick warm ice cream, butter, popsicles, everything sliding down his throat and flowing straight into his filling belly, of growing and growing until he's a huge, completely spherical ball.

When he wakes, Templeton finds himself nestled firmly in a rusty metal base of some fair ride. Stretching,he looks around, finding a slumbering Pip, curled around her own huge belly, nestled beside him. The two are pressed close together, though Templeton quickly rolls a way, feeling hot under the machinery.

Once he's able to sit up, mammoth stomach spread between his thighs, Templeton decides to examine himself, smirking at how he's grown.

Templeton's limbs have grown so plump they now resemble thick sausages with thick claws bursting out of the thick ends, and his head is easily nestled into the thick rolls of his neck, the bottom-most of which always rests squarely on his belly. His rear has plumped up to help balance him out, though is not nearly comparable to his burgeoning belly, which sprawls out before him, resting on the ground and pooling out to his dimples of knees and high enough in the air that he can rest his arms on it comfortably. Even his tail has become sausage-like, though a quick test reveals that it's kept most of it's dexterity.

Pip murmurs something, rolling over onto her other side, towards him, in her sleep, drawing his attention back to her. Faintly, he can smell something sweet stuck to the fur of her belly, making him remember how long it's been since he's eaten anything.

His own belly gives a growl at the thought of food, and Templeton begins to knead his doughy flab in excitement. Unfortunately it's daytime, and there are humans everywhere, so he can't exactly amble out there and glut himself right now.

However, a nearby trash can catches his eye, or more accurately, the frequency of half-eaten food that's tossed in the trash can, as people are eager to get on whatever ride they're beneath, catches his eye, and Templeton finds himself salivating at the thought of it.

There's also an abandoned food stand right next to the ride that would be easy to get to, though he's not too sure what food would be left...
1341122111111.title: A Quick Nap

choices: Gorge and make your way back to the pen?
134112211112.content:
With a gurgle and a slosh, Templeton patted his enormous stomach, understanding it's message. "*Yawn* I think I'll rest for awhile. Such a large feast has left me tired."

"Well that's fine," replied Pip, "I know a great place to rest. People don't know about it, and yet they pass by it everyday. Also, the place where they dump all the left over food isn't very far from it. C'mon, lets go."

At this, the rat's eyes shot up in surprise as she began to leave. Looking at his massive, burbling girth, he attempted to shift it around into a crawling position. The symphony of sloshes was like a bunch of rocks sliding off a cliff. Gurgling and glopping as all his days gluttony shifted around for a more comfortable position. It was a feeling Templeton had grown accustomed as well as fond of, over the past few days, But despite his efforts, he was unable to roll over, and remained in his lying down position, with his blubbery chest huffing and puffing.

At the corner of his eye, Templeton saw the ferret giggling at his failed attempt. "Well someone's grown a little top heavy. Don't worry, with practice, you'd be able to manage your weight well."

Climbing back onto the table, the fat ferret went over to his left side, and slowly pushed his doughy frame off the table; sending the rat tumbling down to the floor. Grunting as he hit both the table seat and the floor, the rat moaned and grasped his stomach, as his delicate bulk churned in frustration.

"Why'd you do that for! You could've seriously hurt me!"

"No I couldn't. I knew your big belly would soften your fall. With time and feeding you'll come to forgive me."

"Uuuggh," Templeton moaned, the churning of his stomach giving him slight discomfort. "My stomach blames you for this."

Pip patted his stomach, "Again, with time and food. I'll roll you to where we need to go."

Not having much of a choice, Templeton allowed himself to be slowly rolled to Pip's hiding place. He was sure to forget about this incident with time and food as she said, and finally when all was said and done, he could show off to the pig and spider. The washing machine like massage the rolling caused comforted the churning somewhat, which allowed the rat to relax on the way. As soon as all he had eaten was digested, he couldn't wait to start gorging again.

===

Templeton rested in Pip's hiding place, which was under the ferris wheel and conveniently near a dozen concession stands. His stomach gurgled slightly at the thought of eating once again, but he was still stuffed from the previous gorging. Pip left to enjoy herself a little more before people started to come while Templeton slept. At first he was worried the fair workers would spot her, but her peppy reassurance convinced him otherwise.

"I've done this millions of times. When I'm back you wont find little ol me so little anymore."

He already didn't, but said nothing. Only an hour passed before Templeton was disturbed by the sound of grunting, complaining, and a cacophony of growling mixed with sloshing. Having slept with his stomach grazing the floor, Templeton shifted around until he was looking in the direction of the noise.

"Uugh, come on you darn thing, we're almost *hilp* there. Uugh, just a little more."

As the draping on the side of the ferris wheel floor was lifted, the enormous figure of Pip bulged it's way through a few bars. "Oh, high Tempy. *hilp* Told you l'd be back bigger than before."

And she was, much bigger. So big it even impressed Templeton, along with urged him to out eat her in means of size. "Good thing you weren't caught."

Pip hefted her massive swell and patted it merrily. "I know my way around. It's gunna take a *hilp* bigger stomach than this to spot me." Resting her back against a flat surface, her belly oozed out like a scoop of melted ice cream. "This fair is great, and this isn't even the biggest I've gotten. *yawn* I'm tired. If you *hilp* go out later on and don't come back I understand. There's so much out there to explore. Well, G'night."

Templeton continued to admire Pip size and fantasized himself being as big, bigger even. But as she said, he might not be able to show her. He hadn't checked back with the two he came with for some time, and didn't want to worry them. Of course, his greed began getting the better of him. If he went back he'd no longer enjoy himself, and the longer he stays with Pip, the more she might be able to help him like in the cafeteria.
134112211112.title: The full, the fat, and the overgorged

choices: Go out to find a different word
Go out to eat more, forget about the word
13412.content:
Templeton dragged himself back towards Wilbur's pen, overwhelmed by his first night of unhindered gorging. He'd stopped a few times on the way to give himself time to digest, and his stomach had gotten somewhat more manageable in size, but that didn't make the trek easy. Too exhausted to attempt to climb over the fence, he flopped down right next to Wilbur's pen, one paw resting on his swollen belly, the other paw clutching the words he'd found.

He was awakened not by the fact that the sun came up, but by a much more familiar sound.

Wilbur was being slopped.

Despite the rat delicacies littered all around him, Templeton couldn't help but perk up at the familiar sound and smell. Well, he was hungry from all that traveling, and he couldn't help it that he liked eating Wilbur's food. He set to work dragging himself over the bottom plank of the pen's fence.

"I'm back," he announced huskily, and he tumbled to the ground with a messy flop. His stomach was still a little more swollen than he thought it would be, but digestion had rendered his whole body soft and squishy. Charlotte barely hid her disgust.

"You ought to be ashamed of yourself."

"Here are your words, madam," he snarled. He tossed the two words aside and dragged himself towards the food. While the pig and the spider were looking at the words he'd found, he managed to clamber up into Wilbur's trough and begin slurping up the satisfying swill.

"These won't do at all," said Charlotte. "We don't want the crowd to be reminded of barbecue!" Templeton ignored her, swallowing down a large chunk of what might have once been bread, or maybe lettuce. He'd already made a nice dent in Wilbur's breakfast, and now he was inclined to swallow the whole thing. He started gulping down huge mouthfuls of liquid, and he grinned inside as his stomach began to bloat.

"Fine," he said, licking his lips, once he'd guzzled down the last of the fluid. "I'll go out again tonight." Wilbur and Charlotte were talking about something that Templeton ignored. He manuevered his swollen body down into the trough and began working on the more solid parts of Wilbur's breakfast. He devoured what had clearly been a donut, along with some vegetables and pasta. The last thing he swallowed was a chicken bone, before stretching out comfortably in the trough. His renewed fullness made him sleepy again, and he let his eyes close.

He was disturbed by a very angry pig.

"Templeton! Did you eat my entire breakfast!?" Wilbur was staring down his snout at him, the way he did when he was being annoying. Sometimes he really hated his dependency on Wilbur's food.

"No," he lied, licking his lips. "Sure, blame the- hic- rat." He gave his swollen stomach an affection pat.

"It would serve you right if you came down with an acute attack of indigestion," Charlotte sniffed.

"My stomach can handle- hic- anything," he replied, with a satisfied burp.

"Well, I hope it can handle finding a better word than 'salty.'"

Templeton waved a paw dismissively and allowed himself to doze off for a second time that morning.

"This has been a night," he mumbled. And there was still more to come.
13412.title: Head Back, Turn in the Word, Eat from Wilbur

choices: Oh, crap- Charlotte still needs a word
Something tasty's on display on the stage above Templeton
1342.content:
"Charlotte can find her own stupid word," he grunted out loud, as if to convince himself. His stomach rumbled in agreement. He couldn't nap here, though, he was far too exposed. He dug his claws into the dirt and began pulling himself towards a nearby event stand. His belly was almost too heavy for his stubby rat arms to handle, but he got into a rhythm, and soon he was sliding along quite nicely. He dragged himself into the comforting darkness underneath the stand, prepared to rest and digest some of his earlier gorge.

Unfortunately, the fair didn't want to give him a break.

"It really is everywhere," Templeton gasped, followed closely by a hungry growl from his already-stuffed stomach. Even underneath a stage, the people at the fair had managed to leave behind more delicious food than Templeton's stomach could possibly hold.

Well- more than he thought he could hold. He was more than willing to put that assumption to the test.

With an excited whoop and renewed determination, Templeton grabbed the closest thing- an upturned ordered of french fries, still half full. He shoved the fries greedily down his throat, barely bothering to chew, ignoring the salt and grease that coated his face and arms. From there he moved onto a half-eaten sandwich. He gnawed every kernel off a rotten ear of corn. He swallowed several chunks of something that was totally unidentifiable, but nonetheless delicious. An upturned bucket of chicken wings got inhaled so fast that he forgot not to eat most of the bones.

Every new mouthful of food squeezed into his stomach with a noisy squelch, forcing the rest of what he'd eaten to shift to make room. The shifting food made his belly sway ever-so-slightly, churning its contents into what must have been a frothy mess. Templeton could feel every barely-chewed chunk of what he had wolfed down, and he moaned with delight as he forced even more food inside.

He could never go back to Wilbur's grimy slops after this.

Templeton gorged himself until his stomach ached and his throat was sore, and still, he wasn't satisfied. His stomach whined and grumbled in protest, but its pleas were ignored. As long as there was food in front of him, he couldn't stop eating. He reached for a mostly-full bottle of soda.

"Mmm," he mumbled, his mouth filled with food. "Thirsty." He swallowed what he'd been eating and tipped the bottle towards his hungry mouth. The fluid flowed freely into his waiting belly, forcing it to bloat outwards while its contents sloshed around helplessly. Soda spilled over his face and his swollen belly as he guzzled. His poor, over-full stomach groaned miserably at the horrible treatment. When he finished, he swatted the bottle away and gave his angry stomach a pat, looking around for his next meal. He caught a glimpse of something that looked tasty a few feet away, and tried to move.

A sharp pain and a dangerous gurgle passed through his stomach.

"Come on," Templeton groaned, and he tried to move again. This time, his belly groaned loader. The noises coming from his digestive tract didn't settle- instead they grew louder and more insistent. He winced at the pain.

This was it. He ate too much.

Templeton winced as his stomach shook with fullness. He could feel his gorge shifting upwards. He'd overdone it- he was going to barf. So much delicious food gone to waste- he'd have to start over from scratch- well, that wasn't such an unappetizing idea-

He instinctively clapped a paw over his mouth as he felt himself get ready to erupt. The other paw clutched his belly, as if to will it to calm down. He couldn't hold it all in. He was going to burst.

Templeton opened his mouth and let out an enormous belch.

His stomach calmed down immediately.

"Is that what you wanted?" he mumbled thickly before belching a second time. A third belch ended in a noisy hiccup. Templeton flopped down on his back with a satisfied groan, patting his impossibly round belly with both hands. His stomach gurgled in a way that almost sounded hopeful.

"Ok," he grunted, with another loud hiccup. "Ugh, what a- hic!- night. Just a little break. Then- hic!- back to the gorge. Urrrrrp."

He was asleep within seconds.
1342.title: Rest and get it in the morning

14.content:
When after the fair?

(Remeber, for retreiveing Charlotte's egg sack, Wilbur promised Templeton first pick of slops for every meal)
14.title: More setting crap

142.content:
Templeton hadn't said a word to Wilbur since they had returned home from the fair. Mostly because he had fallen asleep, but also because he knew Wilbur wouldn't want to speak since Charlotte's death.

Templeton looked down at his stomach. It was as large as it had been when he had been at the fair, but it was still somewhat swollen from being stretched so far. But now it was time for Wilbur to go in on his end of the deal. Templeton had done his bit. Now it was payoff time.

Templeton left the barn and saw that Lurvey was emptying the slop bucket for Wilbur to eat. As he left, Templeton glanced over at Wilbur. Wilbur simply nodded for him to go ahead.

Grinning like it was Christmas, Templeton scurried over to the trough. Excitment was overwhelming, and it added to the motivation as he jumped up onto the side and dove into the slops with a SPLAT! Eating as if he hadn't in days, Templeton quickly began devouring noodles, corn, milk, eggs, bread crusts and bagels for a long time.

A half hour later, Templeton was finally full. Well, not really. He could've eaten LOTS more, but he decided since he'd eaten half, he'd better leave some for Wilbur. With a hefty belch, Templeton hoisted his bloated belly out of the trough and headed back towards the barn, leaving the pig to finish up.

Templeton grinned as he went to take a nap. A few more weeks of this, and he'd TRIPLE what he'd gained at the fair.
142.title: Templeton's (Well Wilbur's) first meal

choices: Templeton manages to be discovered by Zuckerman
1422.content:
Days passed for Templeton, and each day was a feast. Never had he been given such an ample supply of food, and Templeton gladly indugled himself.

Each day Templeton gorged himself. He would eat in great excess, making no attempts at stopping; he was a true glutton. Of course such an overabundance of food did not go without consequence, and in one short week Templeton had indeed grown swollen and fat.

Templeton had at the very least doubled his size, all of it pure fat. His neck rolled onto a pair of prominent breasts, which sat lazily on his large belly. Rolls developed on his sidea and his limbs and even his tail had gained a newfound thickness.

Currently, Templeton was enjoying the last meal of the week. We lay in the trough, covered in food and stuffing his face. His bloated belly bulged out from underneath the slop, while the rest of his body save his head remained under the filth.

Belching rudly and finishing the remanants of a donut, Templeton patted his well fed middle and began to make his way out. With difficulty, he plopped onto the ground, his stomach sloshing and groaning as he did so. He crawled over to the edge of the trough and lay contently on his back, massaging his belly, paws sinking into fat. He grinned at Wilbur who now began to eat the remanants.

It seemed as if Templeton could eat more and more each day. But perhaps his overindulgance would not go unnoticed
1422.title: A week long feast

14223.content:
A few days later, Templeton was waiting for the slop to arrive. As he leaned against the side of the fencepost, he noticed that a pickup truck was pulling up. It was loaded with barrels of apples. As it was going by, the back end burst open, and a full barrel of apples tumbled out and crashed into the ditch near the fence. The driver didn't notice and drove away.

Templeton heard his gigantic belly grumble. As large as it was, he had emptied it long ago. Licking his limits, Templeton waddled and rolled and crawled as best he could over towards the broken barrel. He reached it in a forty seconds. He rolled into a sitting position in the apples.

Somehow, he managed to hoist one up. They were pretty big apples. Each was roughly the size of him. He opened his mouth and chowed down...

...An hour later, Templeton had devoured half the apples, and he was sitting amongst a pile of cores. With his stomach finally a bit more full, he decided to save the rest for later, and turned and went to leave. Of course, he coudn't do it right that second. His now full stomach was stretched out a bit more. After he adjusted, he made his way over towards the pigpen as he saw Lurvey approaching it with the pail. He quickened his pace.

As Lurvey finished and walked away, Templeton finally arrived and struggled up onto the trough, his stomach gurgling. He stared at the slop and patted his stomach. Could he really eat that after that large meal of apples? Of course he could! A true glutton doesn't eat to get full. He just eats for the sake of eating! He slid down onto the on his belly and landed with a splash in the slops, his mouth wide open so that he could eat the second he landed.

Templeton began swimming across the slops, eating as he went. He began to grow a bit larger. However, as he swam, he slowly ground to a halt. He stopped eating and looked up. His stomach had swelled up so much that he was jammed in tight between the sides of the trough.

Deciding that that was enough for one day, he managed to unstick himself, and he crawled out and slid out and landed on his back. He moaned slightly as he enormous belly almost crushed him. Feeling a bit uncomfortable, he waddled and jiggled back over towards to the barn to sleep in the haybales. He found that he wasn't going very fast. His gut swung from side to side, sweeping the ground, and his entire body jiggled as he went like Jell-O.
14223.title: More time passes

choices: A challenger approaches.  An even bigger rat?
142232.content:
As much time passed, Templeton was about the size of a dog, as his body expanded with with fat. He seemed to have almost like a growth spurt, but it was the fat on him that truely added to his girth. He ate through the slop now, like it was nothing, sparing only scraps for Wilbur who was thinning out as the days went by. To counter this Lurvey came back two or three times a day to refill the slop noticing Wilbur's loss of weight. Wilbur was able to get a decent meal now, and Templeton got to fill his face a lot more. He must've weight well over 100 lbs. by now and he couldn't fit in his rat hole anymore. It wasn't easy for him to hide either, cause this was the day he was discovered. At first thinking him as some sort of other creature Lurvery moved in with care. When he saw it was a massive rat he finally figured out why Wilbur was becomming so thin.
Within days people came from miles to see the newest attraction. The world's biggest rat. Templeton no longer needed to hide. He was given his own pen by Wilburs and his own pail of food. A garbage trick stopped by once a day to drop off his meal, that seemed to grow larger and larger by that day. He soon became so obese he could hardly move. His body seemed to be covering itself with roll after roll of fat and he loved each moment of it.
142232.title: Zuckerman's famous Rat

1422321.content:
Templeton's indulgance never seemed to cease. He had become the pure appitomy of gluttony at its finest.

Never in his lifetime had he dreamed of such a glorious fate. But he was simply in it of course, for the food.

In fact watching him eat had become quite a spectacle. Templeton had all but lost his mobility, his feet covered in layers of doughy flab, and would be far to weak to carry his bulk anyway. Lurvey now simply placed food by him and people would come to watch him eat.

Templeton would slurp up ropes of sausages, guzzle down thick, gooey lard and gobble down pretty much anything set in front of him. In any meal, Templeton could often times devour twice his body weight. After he would simply moan in esctasy, and massage his endless flab. His stomach would groan, far overfed and overindulged, but that was something Templeton would take great pride in.

Currently Templeton was finishing the last of a meal, lying on his back as he greedily stuffed his mouth. Swallowing one las mouthful, Templeton collapsed backwards, belching uproarasly and sinking his claws into his soft fleshy body. A groan escaped as he felt his fat, his fingers sinking inbetween rolls of softness, his tiny legs kicking up and down with pleasure.

This was the life
1422321.title: True Gluttony

choices: As Predicted, Templeton Simply Gets Bigger and Bigger!
14223211.content:
Time passed on the farm, and the Wonderous Rat never ceased to amaze the occasional crowds, tourists, and morbidly curious onlookers. Templeton had continued to balloon in his time in the spotlight, his backlegs were non-existant at this point, long since retracted into his extensive flesh. He'd grown very ball-like, though the weight of his flesh oozed and folded out giving him a mishapen appearance. His actual size was beginning to rival the sheep in the pens surrounding him. They, as well as the other animals, were beginning to loathe the attention Templeton's disgusting habit was bringing to the barn. The humans, however, were enthralled by the sight of something once so small, so ready to glut for their amusement.

Templeton, any mobilty now much more than a chore, felt almost obligated to "perform" for these delightful meals now, and he was soaking up every bit of it. "Go on!" he squeaked, "Love me! There's OH so much of me to love!" he dug his sausage-like fingers into his fatty flesh and wobbled it around, forcing a healthy belch out from his fat face into the air...an uproar of laughter and applause was the response, not to mention a few crumbs of food to further prod the rat into his "act." Templeton's eyes glinted from behind his thick and puffy cheeks as he grabbed at any food that landed closest to his bulky arms reach, this couldn't get any better...he simply admired his size, he FELT big, he knew there was no sleeping any of this off, he was simply going to get larger, and larger still, truly things were going all too well for the scruffy rat.
14223211.title: More time passes

142232111.content:
More days went by and templetons appetite grew along with his considerable bulk. It took one hundred pounds of food to satisfy his cravings. He was now bigger than the sheep in the opposite pens and quite frankly it was starting to look a little scary.

one night templeton was sitting in his pen when his stomach growled. " I seem to have gotten early cravings" he smirked, "oh well bring out my breakfast." But of course everyone was asleep. Templeton could have forgiven this little oversight but his stomach could not. "Feed me!!" he roared but no one answered. His stomach growled louder and templeton looked for a way to cease his cravings. Some scrap of garbage a crumb of bagel but nothing was in sight. Finally, with not other alternative he began to roll back an forth on his flab. Back and forth, back and forth, until finally inertia toppled his massive weight over the pen crushing the fence and outside into open air.

" More..." He moaned, insane with gluttoney. " If I can't count on zuckerman to cater to me then I'll find my own meals."
142232111.title: Midnight binge

choices: the zuckermans wake up and encounter templeton
templeton spends the next two weeks forging for himself
1422321111.content:
Templeton moved sluggeshly forward, his massive weight rolling around with every step. he smashed down the dor and squeezed his way through to the kitchen. Drooling and moaning with hunger templeton started with pantry engolfing three sacks of potatoes like they were nothing. He then grabbed can after can in the larder emptying the preserves into his massive gut. Crackers, jars of fruit, even the sugar and flour bags were empteyed. he let out an enourmose belch and tore the door of the fridge of and began to eat the contents of that as well, and all the while his massive stomach continued to grow. By the time the fridge was laid bare templetons stomach had grown anouther two inches in diameter. licking his lips the greedy rat said. " that's enough for now. but I'm never going to be able to fit in my pen again. I guess now's the time to go find someplace that can fit me better though I will miss being waited on hand and foot by these stupid humans."

He chuckled and burped...
1422321111.title: rat problem

choices: the towns people band together and seek out to destroy templeton
templeton's appetite is to big to satisfy and begins to eat everything!!
14223211112.content:
The zuckermans came down the next mourning to witness the destruction of there kitchen. They were curiouse as to what had happened but one look at templetons pen and they were able to draw there own conclusions. Meanwhile templeton had managed to waddle down the road to town and just on the outside of town was an abandoned house that he managed to squeeze his way into. There he went to sleep.

The next forteen days a strange epidemic gripped the town. an epidemic called templeton. Grocery stores, candy store, even fruit stands where cleaned out during the night as the greedy rat ate and gorged and devored every manner of food he could find. It was like the fair except back then half a watermelon was considered a meal. Now templeton ate tewenty watermelons, but that was just after the first five days. Time passed, and templetons massive stomach grew and grew and grew bigger and bigger and bigger and so did his appetite. By the end of the second week he was eating sixty watermelons and still had room for a whole cow from the buchers shop. He was now twelve feet tall and thanks to a massive hole he had made at the back of the house (a hole that you could find only if you were looking for it) templeton was able to remain undiscovered. But with food int he town growing short and templetons appetite growing uncrontrollable by the day something was bound to give...
14223211112.title: the legend of the bottomless rat

choices: templeton wants some sweet corn and peas
to the butchers shop, the rat craves meat!
142232111122.content:
Templeton awoke one morning to a familier growl...except it was louder than normal. There was something inside his enormouse stomach, something dark and limitless. It grew and swarmed templetons body until his entire concousness became envlouped with one thing...FOOD! His eyes opened, his mouth let out a geyser of drool and he set to work eating whatever he could find.

He started with the house, wooden plank by wooden plank, the staircase, the broken lightbulbs, the forgotten furniture...He just ate and ate and ate until the house fell apart at the foundations and crumbled to splinters. Templeton was now 15ft tall and his stomache spread out around him like a blob of fur and appetite. next on the menu...
142232111122.title: out of house and home

choices: The Butcher's shop wasn't enough, it's time to eat the town!
Somebody tries to stop this gluttunous monster
1422321111222.content:
The light, wet-cloud gray of his swollen stomach was craddled in the stormy dark grey of his arms, as within that flesh wood, stone, metal and glass were crunched and dissolved with a rat-stomach approaching deific powers of digestion. It growled with a force that shook the ground surrounding him, most of which he covered. He drooled further, nothing would be enough for him, or his stomach! Tons upon tons of gluttonous rat moved as though gelatinous through the empty field and down the streets.

The quiet little town from which his feedings came may have been slow, but it wasn't dead; a single motorcar came up the road, driven straight into his stomach and sinking a surprising difference into his stomach, still swollen as it was from eating a house.

The car was a very nice h'ors douevre, Templeton's teeth shearing the metal and engine and swallowing down the huge chunks of it, stretching out his growling, rumbling stomach. There may have been humans inside the car, Templeton reasoned. That would explain the slight increase in the movement he felt inside that gargantuan gut.

Down to the edge of town, the butcher's the first on city block that lead into town, Templeton found it more than fully stocked; He chewed a hole through the cement. It didn't need to be large to fit his head in, and that was all he needed to suck the beef and chicken and various meats through his gullet, only stopping to eat some of the concrete to widen the whole. The equivalent of an entire farmyard of stock came into his stomach, followed soon by the refrigerators, the registers, the cieling, walls, and floors, until all that was left was an empty hole where the building once was.

But an extra treat lay in store; it seemed the store was just getting in a morning shipment of meat, and a shipping truck as large as trucks get was pulled around back, long as two butcher's shops and so stock full of meat it must have taken several herds of cows to fill it.

The hunger inside the rat was raging so that a single growl was now causing a small earthquake. Well, he had moved from eating two cows to eating hundreds. He grabbed the end of the truck in his still-tiny rat claws, and using his weight as a counter-lever, Lifted it up and opened his mouth so that each beef carcass fell into his gaping mouth, and all of them swallowed down into his stomach. He bit at the back of the truck, and shoved it all down his mouth as well, rending the metal and tires as it all swelled out his throat before aiding his stomach in its quest for size.

Templeton ate the camper of the truck, and was finished eating the entirety of the meat that could feed thousands. He was now twenty five feet tall at least, and his stomach, swollen and round, jutted out and up greater than any land mammal had ever grown before. Grinning that solipsist rat grin of his, he rubbed the still soft fur of his belly, and hiccuped so large and deep that his head and arms lifted up two dozen feet into the air before returning him back down to his stomach to pat it more.
1422321111222.title: to the butchers shop, the rat craves meat!

choices: The military shows up with a plan
the animals of Zuckermans farm show up to reason
14223211112221.content:
A thunderouse roar erupted from templetons stomach, the townspeople heard the sound and began to flee their homes as fast as they possibly could without even stopping to think about their own personal effects.

"FEEEEED", Cried templeton, "FEEEEED MEEEEE! I'M HUNGRYYYYYYYY."

With one massive claw he tore open the building next to the butchers shop. Whatever was inside it was no longer a concern for templeton, In his mind it was all edible. He devoured the roof like a crunchy pizza, then stuck his head into the building and sucked up everything inside. He then picked up the building off of it's foundations and ate that as well.

Then he moved on to the next building, and the next, and the next....Some unfortunate people didn't make it out of the post office in time...two more were in the local pub...the supermarket was full of people and food...the black smith tasted terrible...the school was abandoned in time...

Within one hour, the town was gone, nothing more than a space of empty land and some minor debris. And templton was even bigger...His circumference was incredible, his mass must have been in the eight or nine digits by now. The Titanic rat smacked his lips and patted his belly, "That was the most filling meal I've had in a long time. I think I'll take a nap here and think about what to do later on."

And so at last Templeton was satisfied...for the moment....
14223211112221.title: a smorgasbord, morgasbord, morgasbord...
