the pills don't work, templeton is still hungry!
142232111122211.content:
The enormous blob that was templeton slept for a few hours only to be awoken by a sound looming over the countryside. He opened his narrow eyes and gazed down below to see tanks and jeeps heading towards him at full tilt. Inside each jeep there was a large grey tarp with something underneath.

"Finally, I was waiting for them to apologize for letting me starve. They've come back to feed me, and just in time I'm beginning to get a rumble in my belly." Templeteton said as he licked his greedy snout.

But what awaited templeton was not food. Inside each jeep was a gigantic capsle made of rat poisen. Behind the jeeps came dumptrucks full of garbage. The plan, insert the poisen capsles in the garbage and get templeton to swallow them. The garbage and poisen had to be carried seperatly because the shape of the capsle did not fit in the trucks.

The garbage began to get dumped in front of templeton. Hundreds of tons of garbage. The stench was unimaginable.
"Hurry up!" he cried "I'm getting hungry! there better be enough to fill me up because I'm not waiting for you to go and get more."

When the garbage was dropped the military popped the pills inside the garbage. Templeton was so large he could not make out what it was that the military had done. He simply leaned his massive head down towards the ground and began to feast.
142232111122211.title: A gamble

1422321111222111.content:
As Templeton shoved pawful after pawful of garbage into his mountainous belly, the army stood by with their tanks pointing their barrels and soldiers holding their guns high for any sudden movements from the monster rat. Templeton was too occupied with his food to care about what they were doing. Each pawful of garbage that slid down his gullet tickled his inside. As the garbage mixed with the concrete of buildings and oil from cars, Templeton's stomach began to rumble. The enormous rat just kept eating, ignoring his stomachs warning. As soon as he came to the third to last pawful of garbage, the rumbling got louder and created a small earth quake. The soldiers used their jeeps and takes for balance as the rat put both paws on his stomach which now created a slight pain.

"Its working," shouted one of the soldiers.

Whats working, thought Templeton, what have they done to me. As the rat rolled his massive bulk over with his back to the sky, he dug his head into his body. The pain in his massive belly grew immensely until he gave out a small burp and relaxed on the pavement of the street.

"He just had indigestion," shouted the same soldier from earlier.

"Shut up private," shouted the colonel from atop of his tanks. "This was the dumbest idea the general has ever had than the Bay of Pigs invasion. Tanks, fire!"

A barrage of fire and sulfur came out of every tanks gun barrels. Templeton didn't have time to at least eat one of them by the time their projectiles reached him. Little did the fat rat know while he was eating soldiers had placed C4 charges under his belly from different angles. They were like ants, crawling around him but he didn't feel it. The amount of lard and fat he had accumulated around his bulk had covered his nerve endings all around his body. So he felt no pain as the mountain of fat that was Templeton blew up like an atom bomb on the fourth of July. Debris and flesh had flown everywhere, killing the soldiers that stood near it.

A few miles away back on the farm Wilbur and the other animals looked in aw at the raining mass of blood and debris. It was the end of Templeton. Going out doing what he loved, which became his end. The town was never the same again, it never reconstructed or cleaned up because of the horrid smell from Templeton's insides perfuming the air. The smell that was Templeton's type of radiation spread across the land choking up everything that smelled it. The poison was mixed with the smell and ended up killing millions of birds in the area, and tens of thousands of livestock and farmers in the rural territory. Templeton's name would go down in history not only as the worlds fattest rat like he always dreamed of, but also as the worlds deadliest weapon.
1422321111222111.title: The end of Templeton, the fattest rat in the world

Soon, templeton finished off the garbage and swallowed the pills. After a few moments nothing happens and then templeton roared

"MORE FOOD!" and before the militarty could react templeton bowed down and ate a tank, then anouther, and then the jeeps and trucks were plucked off the ground and swallowed like little candies.

As templeton sat back and licked his chops something happened. The pills in the rat poisen had a completly different effect than what was anticipated.

Templeton became even hungrier.

More Food. MORE FOOD! MOOOORE!!! roared the thousand ton rat. His globe like belly shifted and templeton somehow lifted himself onto his legs.

Templeton meets another rat as big as him!
14223211112221121.content:
Templeton walks to the next city, his huge belly sloshing around as it digests the massive meal within it. He could feel the struggles of the humans he had eaten and found that he liked the feeling. His belly demanded more food and Templeton was going to satisfy his great hunger no matter what. He walked down the highway to the next city, plucking up cars and trucks and swallowing them down whole as he went. He didn't even chew what came into his mouth anymore. The next city that Templeton came to was a small one and he polished off the city in no time flat before heading to the next city. Templeton was in pure bliss and he wondered how much bigger he could possibly get.
The next few cities the titanic rat came to were all small cities that Templeton quickly ate. Then he came to a big city....a much bigger city. He started with all the food stores, then he moved to the movie theater. Humans were running away from the ravenous rat, but many were plucked up and swallowed down like a pill. He then swallowed a small skyscaper whole and yet he still ate more. He ate and ate,,,,and ate some more until there was nothing left of the city but the rat who ate it. Now he was the size of Godzilla and his great stomach was at least twice that big. It was amazing that the titanic rat could still walk with all that weight.
14223211112221121.title: Templeton eats and eats AND EATS AND EATS!!!!!!!!

14223211112221122.content:
With the contents of several landfills and now half the remaining army finally within the rat’s belly, Templeton belched so loud the men had to cover heir ears and the windows of the dumptrucks shattered. His gut began to gurgle with the sounds of digestion, and Templeton waited, just to see if his stomach would be appeased.

Just then, a strange shutter rippled through the fat of his belly. “...Wooooaaahhh...” Unusual groans and grumbles filled he air as his stomach wobbled, somehow struggling to digest. Though the poison had indeed made him hungrier, that didn't mean it was the only effect. And yet the rat wore a large grin on his face as he rubbed his complaining corpulence. He was <i>enjoying</i> it. His gut shook and quivered, continuously adding more and louder sloshes and gurgles to the symphony of what should be indigestion. The entirety of his body seemed to tense up and for a brief second, and stopped both its trembling and moaning.

As if his own stomach had been holding its breath, Templeton’s gut relaxed and rolled around noisily. In the process, actually, his belly literally rolled right over a couple leftover jeeps. Every lump of garbage and tank had been smoothed out into pure fat. However, the sloshing didn’t last long, as it was replaced by an ominous rumble.

Templeton’s stomach really could handle anything.

“That REALLY wasn’t enough.” Impatiently Templeton tried to reach for the last truck, but his own flab was too much. Instead, as a testament to his own gut, a massive roll of fat surrounded the dumptruck and lifted it to his mouth. And when even that wasn’t quick enough for his own hunger, the rat discovered he could lunge, mouth open, and eat vehicle, grass and ground all in a single pleasing bite. In this way, Templeton made short work of the military.

His stomach back to gurgling yet far from gorged, Templeton looked around to decide what to fill his hungry gut with.
14223211112221122.title: A Minor Side Effect

choices: nothing can, the giant monster eats America
142232111122211222.content: Darkness loomed over the countryside as templeton desended upon it. His head lunged downward and swallowed up a neighboring farm. Then he lunged a gain and swallowed a town whole. Templeton had never EVER been this hungry before in his life. He simply had to eat everything!!! Grass and tree's and houses and cows and horses. He eventually came to the carnival that he and wilbur had gone to together. He picked up the ferris wheel like a doughnut, dunked it in the dunk tank and munched it happily, He then ate the tents and all of the carnival booths. The big fat pig that won the contest before was gobbled up like nothing. Evreything was falling fast before the enourmouse rat that was stretching across the countryside like a blob. Templeton was growing bigger. BIGGER. BIGGER!!! Can anything stop him?
142232111122211222.title: Templeton eats the countryside

1422321111222112222.content:
From far away a sound not unlike rolling thunder echoed across countryside and cities. The sound was so intense it rattled window panes and shook the leaves of the trees. But if one traced it to its source, they'd find not lightning, but the true incarnation of gluttony. Templeton's stomach growled with unparalleled fervor and greed, never satisfied yet increasingly fuller with every titanic swallow the rat continuously provided. Had his gut not specialized in localized rapid digestion, the cacophony of moans, gurgles, groans and sloshes would have sounded not unlike the waves of the ocean during a storm.

The wobbling rat bore down on anything within sight with a mouth comically stretched to accommodate any gulp he could imagine. Forests became stumps if they were lucky and pits of soil and rock if not. Lakes, cities, and landscapes were thrown together into his stewpot of a belly, which crunched them around loudly and powerfully. Within a mere minute a square-mile of land had been transformed into fat around his gut, deepening his bellybutton to a full mile itself.

Templeton truly was living to eat, and every portion of him reflected it. He'd lost feeling in his legs and tail long ago, as they became indifferent from the rest of the sea of flesh. His thick face was so flabby it threatened to bulge over his eyes. His ears were long-gone in-between rolls, but he could hear quite well through vibrations in his gut, despite the continuous digestion. Despite his cheeks his mouth was unthreatened by his impossibly-increasing obesity. Fat had nearly enveloped his arms, but he still tried to rub his belly when he could. Nowadays, the best way for him to massage his gut was to slide his way over mountains before eating them. Occasionally, the forming of rolls, the ripple of violent hiccups, or a particular combination of digestive gurgles was as pleasurable as a true rub. Of course, depending on where he was, an earthquake provided him with great delight.

And then, to his great surprise, Templeton felt something cold on his lower belly. Instinctively he tried to look back, but even if he properly could have, the distance was too far. He was able to see a large body of water immediately in front of him, and the waves crashing up against the portion of his gut in front of him felt similar to the coldness behind him. With a wide and proud grin, Templeton hiccuped and made an attempt to rub his belly. His sides rumbled in victory and to urge the gourmand along in his gluttony. His growling gut wasn't finished and was as voracious as ever.
1422321111222112222.title: A Stomach That Can Handle Anything

14223211112221122222.content:
Templeton's head oozed foreward down his stomach to the ocean. his lips touched the cool liquid and with a mere three slurps the planets water drained into the titanic rat. his stomach stretched again and he groaned and sloshed his massive stomach to and fro.

Then he looked down and noticed something.

"What else is there to eat?" he thought. Sure enough with the ocean gone all that was left was dry land. "There must be something. I'm still hungry. I've got to eat something! I must have more! MOOOOORE!!!"

He shook and sloshed as his stomach rumblings echoed throughout the world. "Feed my stomach! FEED IT! FEED ME EVERYTHING, I DON'T CARE WHAT! JUST PUT IT IN MY MOUTH NOW!!!! I'M HUUUUUUUUNGRYYYYYYYY!!!"

with nothing and no one to hear him and his hunger growing by the second...

How will this end?
14223211112221122222.title: Just a little more...

142232111122211222221.content:
But no one heeded Templeton's demands. Even if anyone could, Templeton's head was so high above the ground he wouldn't be able to see anyone. By this point he'd let his head sink into his corpulence a bit more, and not even vibrations through his body were enough to allow him to hear someone's calls. Instead, all Templeton could hear was the rhythmic series of gargantuan gurgles that was his digestion and the roars of his ravenous belly. With a stomach that large, his gut growls layered on top of each other for a truly terrifying din. Long, high-pitched whines squeezed themselves from the tummy of the starving rat.

"I'm getting us food, I promise!" He tried ineffectually to rub his belly, but the blob of his arms that amazingly remained could barely move enough to get to his gut, let alone do a thing to comfort anything that large.

Out of sheer desperation, the rat plunged his head down to the ground. Second by second, he worked on stretching his mouth wider and wider, putting to shame even the very existence of snakes. The corners of his mouth slid over rocks and trees, even the few cities that remained. Hours past, and his stomach protested more every second. Every growl spurred him on.

Within the day, however, Templeton swallowed. For a brief moment, his stunned stomach was silenced. He hovered in the depths of space, too stuffed to even wonder why he could survive in that vacuum. But with his ears underneath so much fat, the rat could hear anything that went on in his body. And from the deepest regions of his global gut came an overindulged groan of contentment that lasted a few minutes. After that he could feel his belly settle into work and began to churn pleasurably. A happy moan escaped Templeton's face as fat layered itself onto his body.

A few days later, the rat opened his eyes and realized the moon was hovering right in front of him. His talkative belly was still loudly telling him about how difficult and wonderful digesting a planet was, but Templeton smiled mischievously. What a pleasant surprise it would be for his gut, and it was so easily reached. As the true incarnation of gluttony, it didn't matter how stuffed he was. He idly snaked his head closer and closer to the satellite and opened his mouth wide. With the moon in his mouth, he let his gut pull his head back and he swallowed. Templeton could feel the moon slide down and settle in the front of his belly, which again, paused its digestion in shock. After ten minutes, a series of massive moans, sloshes and a gurgling cheer began his stomach's excited and noisy return to digestion.

Templeton smiled and moaned himself. The many remnants of earth rubbing against the moon and the churning of his gut created the best massage he ever had. Never had he imagined an internal stomach massage like this, especially one this grand.

Perhaps he'd surprise his stomach with something else tomorrow.
142232111122211222221.title: The Global Gut

choices: Uranus seems closest given the orbits
1422321111222112222212.content:
Templeton waited a long few weeks, enjoying the peace of being so stuffed and the delight of digestion on such a scale. He spent his time often being lulled to sleep by the rhythmic groans and sloshes of his happy belly. Otherwise he'd occasionally add to his bulk by grabbing some bit of passing space debris and feel it roll around in his gut a while.

Eventually, however, he felt his stomach twist itself into a knot, rumbling through every roll of his body. Templeton moaned in hunger and disappointment that his laziness had to come to an end. Looking around, he found the closest heavenly body besides his own was little Mercury. As in the past he snaked his head out, unable to propel himself anywhere. Working his jaws he got the planet in his mouth and began to bring it back. Ready to settle into blissful contentment again, he gulped. His belly, however, was only quieted for a couple seconds before digestion began to grumble to a start. He knew this wouldn't last long, so he waited for another planet to orbit into reach: Mars and its moons. The rat again stretched to bring back his meal. When he swallowed this time, the digestive pause was much longer than Mercury's, and his belly then gladly burbled along in its work. Templeton grinned as wide as his massive cheeks permitted, but the last solid planet caught his eye. Venus was orbiting within view.

The planet was as big as earth was and he remembered that meal well. His stomach was quite contented with what it had at the moment, however. Still, the glutton smiled and reached for the planet. His gut had learned what the strain of a stretch meant, and suddenly began to quiver and ripple in excitement. To encourage him, despite its impossible fullness it mustered a deep series of growls and rumbles, all muffled by the meal he'd already consumed. Templeton swallowed and his belly received an even greater gift than it could even imagine. Though, lacking a brain, any imagination a stomach could conjure up would have been fantastic regardless.

His belly remained silent for a full day, "speechless" in containing three planets and having already digested a fourth. During that day, he snaked his way over to Ceres and the Asteroid Belt and opened wide. The rock orbited its way straight into his gut, extending the silence. Eventually, a hesitant few gurgles seemed to test if digestion was even still a viable option. A few sloshes joined in before the torrent of digestive noises finally resumed. His stomach made a number of delighted sounds that wove their way in and out of the sounds of work, praising him for the gifts. Templeton, however, was done with work, and settled into his fat to rest.

Strangely he'd learned to identify where his fat was being distributed. Much of the moon had settled into his chins. Mars was going to his rear, and mercury padded the joke that was his arms. Venus began to make a home in his lower gut. The Earth, however, had deposited itself immediately above his navel. It rested there heavily, rubbing against his churning innards pleasantly.
1422321111222112222212.title: Returning Hunger

choices: There's one last thing to eat...
14223211112221122222122.content:
Days passed, then weeks. Templeton basked in the warmth of the massive sun, feeling the heat on his belly improve digestion. Strange phenomenon began to occur in his belly, but it didn't bother the rat in the least. Bizarre noises would sometimes bubble their way through his body as if the sounds themselves were moving. Sometimes a few would join up, grow in size and volume, and roar until either meeting with more or they simply faded away. On occasion, however, his gut would clench in conjunction to such meet-ups. Some grew so intense his entire body shook and rippled violently and it would feel like his digestive system did somersaults. There was no pain in these "stomachquakes," however, just increased pressure that would eventually dissipate. His groaning girth simply rolled around in contagious ecstasy.

With half a planet still to go, Templeton's eyes shot open at a familiar feeling. Even with indigestion incomplete, his belly was beginning to demand more. The closest thing to him was a gas planet, and he worried about how filling simple air would be. But his guts rumbled longer and louder with every passing moment, and his only option was to give it a try. The rat made his way over, biting into and swallowing Uranus's gases and its moons in the process. His belly seemed confused as it became bloated, not sure what to make of such a strange meal, but still growled for more. Upon finishing the gas giant off, Templeton's belly only made odd little noises. Despite a meal that so seemingly so unsubstantial, he felt full. With his bloated stomach trying to figure out what to do with this unusual belly load, Templeton decided to take preemptive measures.

As Neptune passed, the rat descended upon it. It effectively silenced his stomach completely as it bloated further. Picking off the two moons, Templeton knew his stomach would be appeased for a long time. However, given that it recently surprised him by complaining with nearly half a planet sitting in his gut, he didn't stop there. He opened wide and let Saturn's rings flow into his belly, along with its moons. Titan was a delicious bite, and he herded the other moons into his mouth. Saturn was a massive feast indeed, and he could feel his fat fret over the size. Despite the incredible desire to bask in his new definition of obesity, he wasn't going to leave off there.

Templeton never imagined what eating a storm would be like, especially one so much larger than Earth. It was the first bite of Jupiter, and it entered his belly with great protest. He could feel its power trying to batter his stomach and swollen intestines and his guts began to protest. Despite the fact his stomach was actually telling him to stop, it didn't deter him. Bite after bite Jupiter swelled Templeton to even grander scales until the entire planet and its massive moons had a new home. The rat floated there, dumbstruck as his belly at the feeling. Deep inside he could feel the gas giants in his belly mingle like the ingredients of a mixing bowl. They created new currents that swirled and churned his belly all by themselves.

A long series of uncomfortable whines and groans were the complaints of his intestines. Grumbles issued from his stomach for an hour until both fell quite. His innards didn't know what to do, especially with the number and severity of the storms that raged inside of him. Aside from the volatility of his meal, his belly remained silent for a long time. After a few days, Templeton snapped out of his stupor and began to wonder if his stomach would start digesting at all. Still, there was nothing that could be done other than feel how the swirls of gasses worked the inside of his stomach.

After about a week, his guts twisted and began to slide around. Long moans issued from him and loud, gassy bubbling sounds met his submerged ears. Slowly, he began to digest. Gurgles and sloshes joined in as his digestion slowly churned the gas into fatty liquids. His entire body wobbled as massive amounts of fat began to spread lazily around his belly. And then, after a few days, digestion finally settled into its own pace, burbling and groaning along happily and sloshing in a congratulatory way to Templeton's appetite. Stomachquakes became a near-constant occurrence and frequently several would happen at once. Sometimes they grew so great in number his digestion would pause so both he and his belly could relish the intensity of the internal stomach massage. All the while, storms continued to rumble through his gut and give him great delight.

Sometimes the rat would still mull over the concept of his home planet and feel for it. The fat from Earth, despite the amount of new lard pouring in, still sat right above his navel.
14223211112221122222122.title: Gas Giant

142232111122211222221222.content:
As in the past, Templeton enjoyed his time to digest. In fact, for a week he'd fallen into an overindulged stupor, the pressure on his intestines and the vibrations of his stomach immensely pleasurable. That week his belly groaned with countless "stomachquakes" that were more intense than usual. But as digestion continued, the rat began to muse over his future appetite. Even weeks later he still felt stuffed far beyond his limits, but then again, he found long ago that those limits were more optional than anything else. The idea of feeling even fuller was always and appealing one. He gazed off at the sun and wondered if his belly could handle it. Then again, he'd been digesting poisonous gases and liquids with little problem.

And then there was the size. It was hundreds of times bigger than his current mass. Sure, the swollen rat was astronomically pushed beyond any size his body should ever attain, but he'd never tried to swallow anything that large before, and taking bites out of a flaming sun didn't sound like a good idea. Still, he tried to get his gut used to the idea, talking to it and attempting to shift his belly in pleasurable ways to encourage it. After a few days, it seemed to work. Though still in the midst of digestion and far from hungry, he felt his stomach clench a little and release a long, muffled growl of approval. As he continued talking to it Templeton's gut grew louder until it did something unexpected. His belly stretched towards the sun until he could feel his flesh press against something warm. Thanks to gravity, he felt the rest of his body follow. He blinked as a dark spot began to grow over the surface of the sun, which began to slowly sink into his navel. After a day, his own stomach had swallowed the sun, which glowed through the fat.

Both rat and stomach moaned at the enormous bellyload. His guts burbled, musing over how to digest a sun. There was no period of silence. His belly had anticipated the feast. However, the sun did ignite the remaining gasses, sending a shock through rolls of fat. This, in turn, caused an onslaught of stomachquakes. First one, then a few shook his innards. The few became hundreds, and the hundreds to thousands, then millions all occurring at once. Templeton groaned contentedly as every portion of his body jiggled and rumbled, and each at different paces. His stomach felt like it was ballooning and his intestines felt like spaghetti being tossed in a bowl. The two rubbed up against each other, massaging and contributing to the stomachquakes.

Eventually the shakings began to subside, replaced with digestive gurgles that were even more complex than normal. Templeton listened carefully, shifting his belly around to try to feel. As he felt food shift from one organ to another, he realized he had many more than he did before his belly ate the sun. Somehow, amidst the stomachquakes, his stomach had split into several, and Templeton imagined himself as a cosmic cow for a moment. His intestines snaked their way even longer, and something else seemed to have formed past them. But as that organ began to fill with well-digested fat, the rat grinned at the sensation. It churned just like his stomachs did. This one however, was much larger than his stomach ever was. The fact that even that new huge stomach was swelling proved just how much he'd just eaten.

Templeton grinned, listening to the sloshes of the digesting sun and taking pride in his belly. His guts had adapted to this lifestyle and could act on their own, giving him the unique opportunity to eat with his mouth and his navel. He looked forward to how fast he'd be gaining once he reached another solar system. But for now, it was time to delight in digestion.
142232111122211222221222.title: Solar Sloshes

142232111122211222222.content: Templeton ate and ate and ate and ate untill the entire planet was inside his belly of indescribable size. He then floated through space, eating everything that crossed his path, growing fatter and fatter, for all eternity.
142232111122211222222.title: Planet FatRattus(I got no better title ideas)

choices: "Put him over there until the doctor's ready."
142232112.content:
Templeton was waiting impatiently for his pre-breakfast snack. It was already half an hour late, and his bloated stomach gurgled with hunger. Templeton couldn't help smiling: he had trained his stomach to crave food as much as he did, attempting to grasp the ever elusive feeling of fullness that came at rare moments.

At long last, Lurvy came out of the house - and walked right past his pen. He slopped Wilbur, but headed towards the portion of the barn where he kept all the tools. Soon the sound of a saw and hammer could be heard, but Templeton was far too fat to move in order to see what was being built.

Several hours passed, and the noise ceased. It was nearly noon, and Templeton had still received no food. None of the usual gathering of gawkers had come to give him any scraps either, which made him more curious than angry. What could possibly be more important than his feeding?

Finally some people began to arrive; but they looked as if they hadn't come to give the tubby rat any treats. Mr. Zuckerman jumped into his truck and backed it up toward Templeton's pen, and everyone gathered around him. Lurvy brought out a large crate, and the pieces fell together. "They're taking me away!" thought Templeton. "But why did they not feed me?"

All the men grabbed onto the rat and hoisted him into the crate, and then lifted the crate into the truck. It took a lot of working and sweating, which would have made Templeton proud, if he wasn't so worried.

"Finally listening to that doctor, eh Zuckerman?" said one of the men.

Zuckerman climbed up into the driver's seat of his truck. "Well, it has more to do with the mobs of animal rights activists the vet threatened to bring here."

Animal rights? What about the right to engorge himself? Templeton wished he could lodge a complaint with these people. Most barn animals didn't understand threats or deceit, but Templeton was a rat, and rats knew all about those sorts of things. Zuckerman was obviously forced into doing whatever the veterinarian had asked of him.

Soon they were off, bouncing along country roads as they neared the city. After a while, they entered the town and pulled up to a huge veterinarian facility. The building was obviously designed for the care of large animals with their means of transportation in mind, due to the loading dock that allowed the workers to move Templeton from the truck bed onto a wheeled pallet. Zuckerman walked into an office and left the rat there in his crate. His stomach complained loudly, now that it was three o'clock and he still hadn't received any food.

After waiting a while, a man with a clipboard approached the worker in charge of moving animals around.
142232112.title: Things Start to Sour

choices: She tells him about a circus, with lots of leftovers to eat
She tells him about a local restaurant that has plenty of leftovers
144.content:
It had been two months since that fateful visit to the fair.

Templeton continued to visit Wilbur every day at mealtime for his share of the food.

At first, Wilbur had been content to let the rat eat first. It had been the deal – Templeton saves Charlotte’s children, he gets first dibs. Unfortunately, Templeton’s insatiable hunger often left the poor pig with not much to eat. The rat rarely ate more than half of the slops, but that still wasn’t much for poor Wilbur, who was much bigger than Templeton and thus needed more than him. But Templeton was a heavy eater, and eating in vast quantities was a delight for him. Convincing him to eat less was easier said than done.

The other animals noticed that while Templeton was steadily gaining weight, Wilbur was starting to lose weight. This caused some worry amongst them. Even if the Zuckermans didn’t kill Wilbur, he’d probably still die of starvation in a few months. Plus, he’d hardly survive the harsh winter ahead if he didn’t have more meat on his bones.

Templeton didn’t seem to care. He just wanted food. Lots of food. Enough food to fill him until he simply couldn’t anymore.

The animals watched him one day as he crawled out from his hidey-hole under the trough. The rat was getting a little too big to squeeze through it. He’d tried making it bigger, but the structural integrity of the ground under it made him worry it’d collapse and ruin his home. So he was squeezing himself through every day.

Everyone watched in judgmental disgust as he dove into the trough and gobbled up whatever he could. He moaned with pleasure as he did so, enjoying every last bite. It was fifteen minutes before he was done, and he heaved himself up and out of the trough, licking the slop off his fur. His belly was swollen, sloshing with his latest meal, and he patted it proudly.

Wilbur peered into the trough. Still half left, but that wasn’t much to satisfy him. He sighed sadly and tucked in.

The other animals watched Templeton settle in against a fencepost to digest for a while. The fat rat was getting fatter, and he was pleased as punch about it. They’d all been pondering what to do about him. If he ate Wilbur out of house and home, all of Charlotte’s hard work would be in vain. They’d discussed it while he slept, and they’d made a plan.

The goose fluttered down next to the engorged rodent and tutted. “Goodness-oodness me,” she murmured. “Looks like you enjoyed your latest conquest.”

Templeton opened a sleepy eye. He was annoyed at being awoken, but he couldn’t help but smirk. “Indeed,” he said, licking his lips. “You don’t know the orgasmic pleasure that comes from stuffing oneself ‘til utter satiation.” He patted his belly with fondness, and it jiggled like jelly.

The goose smirked back. “A pity the fair has come and gone until next year. It’ll be a long wait before you enjoy its bounties again…”

“Don’t remind me,” the rat snarled. “I hate having to leave food uneaten for Wilbur. I don’t get to enjoy it to its fullest extent.”

The goose tried to hide the look of surprise. The rat had been holding back all this time? “So you’re saying-aying-aying you could eat more in one sitting?”

“But of course. Sadly, I have to wait many months until I can enjoy such a repast again…”

The goose decided it was time to unleash the plan.
144.title: The Animals Hatch a Plan

choices: He hides out in the big top
He hides in the animals' tent
1441.content:
“Perhaps you have never heard of the circus-ircus-ircus?”

Templeton raised an eyebrow. “A what? What’s a circus?”

“A travelling spectacle,” she explained. “Animals perform stunts and tricks for people. It’s a sort of place for misfits and the like to belong.”

“Good for them…”

“And… it’s a place for lots and lots of food to be eaten…”

The rat’s ears perked up. “Oh, is it, now?”

“Oh yes. Lots of food. Popcorn, candy floss, caramel apples, candy, hot dogs, sandwiches…”

“Sounds heavenly! Is there one near here?”

“Indeed. I heard mention of the Zuckerman family heading to one tonight. They’ll be travelling in the pickup in a few hours. Perhaps if you’re quick and sneaky, you can join in the fun.”

Templeton’s mouth was watering, his nap now forgotten. “Yes...,” he murmured. “Time I had a proper feast…”

“A nightly feast,” the goose added hastily. “After all, the circus doesn’t just stop – it travels. Every night, you’ll have a fresh feast awaiting so long as you stay with them. Doesn’t that sound marvelous?”

“Oh, it does… it does… It sounds… excellent! I must be off! Tell Wilbur that if I’m not back tonight, he’s free to eat his slops forever! This circus will be like heaven on Earth!”

Templeton rolled himself over until he was on his feet. His hind legs dangled helplessly as his belly had grown to the point they didn’t reach the ground anymore. Struggling, he rolled back until he was up on his hind legs. He grabbed hold of his stomach with his front legs and carried it awkwardly, waddling to the fence and heaving himself over it. He didn’t bother with the goodbyes. He knew he wasn’t well-liked by his fellow farm animals. Time to leave their judgement behind and have a good old fashioned free-for-all.

He found the pickup truck and saw some trash to hide under. It was a very long wait. He listened to the farmer and his wife board the truck and drive off down the road. He listened to the irritating chatter of the family and children as they climbed into the flatbed. He listened to the drive there, and then he felt the truck stop as it parked. He waited until he was certain everyone had disembarked and poked his head out over the side.

It was amazing. There was a large colorful tent with searchlights waving back and forth. He could hear loud voices and lots of racket and music coming from within the structure. He also saw lots of people still walking around outside. Scowling, he clambered down and scurried his way over to the nearest smaller tent. There had to be a place he could hide until the lights went low.
1441.title: She tells him about a circus, with lots of left...

choices: Templeton goes out for a feast
14412.content:
Scurrying this way and that, he hurried under the tent flap, finding the place dimly lit. He couldn’t really make out anything around him, but he smelled other animals. None of the predatory variety, at least not in this tent. Also – tons of sawdust. Might make a nice place to rest until it was safe to venture out.

Looking around, he took in the occupants of the tent. Some large animals he’d never seen before towered over him
.
“Well, well, well,” said a female voice. “What’ve we here?”

He looked up and saw a massive hippopotamus peering down at him curiously. “I’m Templeton,” he replied.

“Hello, Templeton,” the hippo said in a big jovial voice. “Need directions? This here’s the animal tent. One of several, actually. Don’t worry. We don’t keep the tigers and lions in here.”

“What’re tigers and lions?”

“Very tall kitties,” said a giraffe. “Terribly grumpy as well. And fond of eating small animals.”

Templeton gulped. He hadn’t counted on that.

“Not to worry,” the hippo chuckled. “No carnivores in here. We are strictly vegetarian.”

“Who’s everyone talking to?” another voice called from the far side of tent.

“No one,” the giraffe sighed. “Don’t panic.”

“But you’re talking to someone! Who is it?”

“It’s… a rat.”

“A rat?!? No! Keep it away! Keep it away!”

“Who’s that?” Templeton asked warily.

“Don’t mind him,” sighed the hippo. “That’s the elephant. Elephants are deathly afraid of mice and rats.”

“There’s just so small!” the elephant wailed. “They can get anywhere!”

Templeton looked perplexed. “Such a large creature terrified of me?”

“Yes, don’t get too close,” the hippo advised. “She’s liable to step on you.”

“Nothing personal,” the giraffe added. “Just a reflex.”

“Anyway,” the hippo continued. “What brings you through here?”

Templeton remembered his mission. “I’m hoping to join you all on your travels,” he said boldly.

“Oh, really?” the giraffe remarked. “Do you have an act?”

“Only if devouring massive quantities of food counts as an act.”

“Ahhh,” the hippo murmured. “Not so much joining the show as joining the cleanup committee.”

“Yes, I intend to make a feast of the food left behind out there. Is it true? There’s lots for a rat to eat out there, yes?”

“Oh, indeed,” said the giraffe. “Plenty to eat. There’s enough leftover food to feed an army of rats.”

“Excellent,” Templeton said, his mouth watering. “How long before it’s safe for me to venture out?”

“Possibly hours,” the hippo replied. “After that, everyone goes home. My advice – get some sleep. You’ll have your pick of the place before too long.”

Templeton agreed, and he found some sweet-smelling straw in a corner near the hippo’s quarters. He buried himself underneath it, just in case some people came by and possibly saw him. He worried he’d be too excited to sleep properly, but it wasn’t long before he relaxed and dozed off into dream land.
14412.title: He hides in the animals' tent

choices: Templeton makes it back to the tent
144121.content:
When Templeton next awoke, it was dark out. The animals in the tent were mostly asleep. Everything had gone quiet. He cautiously crawled out of the straw. Listening to the snores of the large animals around him, he found the tent flap and crawled out. He saw the big tents had all gone dark, and there was not a soul to be seen, save for some night watchmen wandering up and down, but he figured they’d not cause him much bother.

His stomach was empty, and that was good. It meant he had plenty of room for whatever lay before him. And a lot lay before him. Loads of food, rotting and decaying on the ground, awaited him. His mouth watered in amazement.

“The goose was right again!” he murmured. “She sure knows how to find a feast! Farewell, Wilbur! Good riddance, judgmental farm animals! Enjoy life behind bars! This rat’s going to have the meal of a lifetime!”

With his announcement made, Templeton dove headfirst into a discarded bag of buttery popcorn. He ate the entire contents and moved onto some sandwiches long since abandoned. He found everything to be to his liking – nicely aged and rotten to the core.

Cotton candy, melted ice cream, hunks of cheese, doughy pretzels – it all went into his gullet. It was amazing. It seemed to stretch for acres. He ate as much as he could fit in his mouth, not even bothering to chew. He swallowed everything he came across.

“Oh, what feasting!” he cried. “This place is marvelous! Better than the fair! So much variety! Must have more! Must have more!”

He devoured an entire slice of watermelon, spitting out the seeds. He ate two more boxes of popcorn and the remnants of a dropped ice cream cone. He found a trashcan and dove inside, finding so much discarded food. So many half-eaten hotdogs. So many half-finished fries. So many much ketchup and mustard. So many half-completed apples. He heaved himself out and waddled eagerly to the nearest stand. He found it to have caramel apples. He ate three in rapid succession, and then found the container with the caramel. He pulled on the nozzle and put his mouth on it, guzzling as much as he could stand.

Then he found another stand, this one full of peanuts and pretzels. He swarmed the trashcan and found so many remnants of unfinished orders. He ate and ate until his mouth felt too salty. He needed something to wash it down. He found a few discarded drinks and guzzled them down.

Hours later, it was finally done. Templeton was laid out flat on his back, panting from sheer exhaustion.

His stomach was enormous. Big and round like a bowling ball, and about the size and weight of one. His tiny little rat body was almost being crushed beneath it. He hiccupped heavily and patted it happily.

“Ohhhhhh…,” he moaned. “So much…”

He looked around the circus grounds around him.

“And still so much left!” he sighed sadly. “I barely put a dent in it!”
He hiccupped again.

“Oh well…,” he sighed. “I guess I’ll just have to try again tomorrow night… Oh, but it will fill up again! Then I’ll – HIC! Ohhhhhhhhh… I mustn’t think much more on it, or I’ll lose all I worked for…”

He laid there for an hour, groaning in pain. His stomach sloshed and gurgled above him like a mighty tower.

However, he soon saw the sun coming up, and he needed to make tracks. He rolled over onto his hind legs and determinedly waddled off towards the animal tent.
144121.title: Templeton goes out for a feast

choices: The circus soon has to travel
Some animals don't care for Templeton
1441211.content:
The hippo was just waking up when she heard a grunting coming from nearby. She turned and almost fainted at the sight.

Waddling very slowly towards her was Templeton – enormous, bloated, overstuffed, overfed and looking a little ill. He struggled over towards her stall, panting and moaning the whole way.

“Goodness gracious,” she exclaimed. “Look at you!”

Templeton nodded, feeling proud of her shocked reaction. “Indeed,” he grunted, settling down against the pile of sawdust and patting his stomach gently. “Such a feast. I’ve never been so thoroughly challenged before. It was heavenly. Such gluttony the likes of which even I’ve never experienced. All that food. And after all I crammed into my belly, there’s still a whole field left. I hardly put a dent in it.”

The hippo chuckled in amusement. “Well, there’ll be plenty again tomorrow…”

Templeton hiccupped again. “Ugh… Don’t talk about it just now. Goodness me… I don’t think I’ve ever had a stomachache before…”

“Still think you can travel with us?”

“And do that every night? I would love such an opportunity.”

“You would?”

“I’m not going to let a little indigestion get me down,” Templeton sneered. “I’m a naturally heavy eater, and the feast alone pleasures me to no end. I’ll gorge and gobble and stuff myself every night, and come home in this exact condition every time. I’ll feast until I can’t hold another mouthful. And it will be marvelous.”

The hippo stared in amazement. “You’re not the first rat to come through here looking for free food, but bless me if you aren’t the most gluttonous. I think you’ll fit in just fine around here.”

Templeton smiled. He’d never been complimented for his gluttony before. He hiccupped and rubbed his enormous belly, listening to it churn.

“Now listen,” the hippo continued. “You need to find a place to hide. The people will be here within a few hours to prepare. Might be nice if you found a nice place to rest until nightfall again.”

“Agreed. I’ll just… oof… find myself a spot… Going to need a lot more straw…”

Templeton heaved himself up and waddled off towards the nearest pile of straw he could find. He covered as much of himself as he could before settling in for a long day’s sleep.

The hippo shook her head in amazement. This rat was just astounding. She watched his massive belly rise and fall as he dozed off.
1441211.title: Templeton makes it back to the tent

choices: The circus arrives in its new town
14412111.content:
Templeton thoroughly enjoyed his time with the circus. It was about a week since he'd joined up, acting as a one-rat cleanup crew for his new friends. Every night, when the lights were off and the people had gone home, he'd go running out into the night and eat his fill. Heck, sometimes he'd eat more than his fill. He'd eat until he had to cram stuff into his stomach. And every night, he'd haul his bloated body all the way back to the animal tent next to the hippo.

Templeton had grown fond of the hippo. The other animals didn't particularly care for him, but she was always friendly and complimentary of his accomplishments. She was clearly a big eater, too, but she was so large already that she couldn't really enjoy the benefits that came from an enormous stuffing. Sometimes, he had to physically roll back to the tent because he was so perfectly round. He didn't mind - it was great fun.

At the end of the week, though, Templeton peered out one morning and saw there were fewer multi-colored tents than there had been yesterday. "What's going on out there?" he asked.

"We're packing up," the giraffe replied. "Time to move on to a new town. New prospects. New horizons."

Templeton looked around curiously. "So what happens to you all?"

"We get loaded into trucks and ride to the next destination," replied the rhino. "All very exciting."

"I'm sure... So where will I be going?"

There was a long silence as the other animals considered that question.

Thankfully, the hippo spoke up. "Well... that all depends on you."

"What do you mean?"

"Will you be staying with us? Or will you be going back to your farm?"

Templeton stared at her for a long moment as if she were an idiot. "Why on Earth would I want to go back to the farm?" he cried. "A farm full of pious animals who look down on me, barely enough food to keep me bloated, and nothing interesting to look forward to? I'm staying with you guys. Never have I seen such a wide variety of treats and goodies! I've been in hog's heaven all week, and I'm hardly going to let it end now!"

The hippo smiled slightly. "Very well then. I would advise you to keep your head down and time your moves perfectly. The people will hardly allow you to climb aboard yourself, so try to stay near me. I'll share my pen with you as long as you keep out of sight when they're around."

"Excellent," Templeton said gratefully. "I look forward to the journey."

It was a long day as Templeton waited for them to come for the animals. And even then, it took a long time for them to get to the hippo. The lions, tigers, zebras, monkeys, and even some sea lions were going before they finally got around to her. The hippo sent him a subtle wink, signalling for him to make himself scarce.

It was a long time before the hippo was even at her wagon, but thankfully, once they had the door open, she put up a slight fuss about moving so that all eyes would be on her. She watched craftily as the rat hefted his hefty body inside her sanctuary, vanishing into its shadows. Content that he was safe for now, she stopped struggling and allowed herself to be guided into the truck. The door was shut behind her, and she got nice and comfortable.

Templeton poked his head out of the straw. "Phew!" he said, waving a paw in front of his long nose. "It really stinks in here!"

"Well, I tend to be in here for quite some time," she replied. "It serves multiple purposes, if you get my meaning..."

"Lovely. It's like I'm living with the horses again."

"Hey, it's transport to free food. Take it or leave it."

Templeton grunted and hauled himself up to a small window in the truck to take in the world outside. He watched as the old circus site faded into the distance. He took in the fresh air gratefully, dangling from the window.

After a few minutes, they passed a familiar site. The Zuccerman farm. He gazed at it for a long time, knowing that it would probably be the last time he ever saw it. He supposed he should be feeling some level of fondness or sadness, but in truth, he really didn't. Barely a thing to eat, animals that barely trusted him and constantly being pushed around. What kind of life was that? How was he supposed to live like that? With this circus, he could eat constantly and enjoy himself. He had an actual friend here. He glanced back down at the hippo, who'd gone to sleep already during the ride.

He hoisted himself up a little higher so he could rest his belly on the ledge instead of having to hold it up. He marveled at how far it bulged out in front of him. It was truly astounding. He loved how big he was getting.

Smiling to himself, he slid down back into the straw for a nap. It was going to be a long trip.
14412111.title: The circus soon has to travel

144121111.content:
Templeton awoke to the sound of the truck door being opened. With an undignified yelp, he sleepily dove under the straw just as the men were coming in to help the hippo down to the ground. It was a long time, but eventually, when the coast was clear, the fat rat was able to poke his head out and check around. He scurried to the open hatch and saw everyone was focused on getting the various animals safely to the tents that were still being assembled. Grumbling at having to move about during the day, he discreetly made his way down the tent and towards some shrubbery so he could watch from a safe distance and then join the animals when the sun went down.

He awoke hours later. The sun was setting, giving him plenty of shadows to maneuver around in until he found the right tent. He scurried around until he found the hippo's pen and joined her inside.

"There you are!" said the hippo. "Was wondering where you'd disappeared to!"

"Had to lie low," Templeton replied. "Is there no show tonight?"

"Not tonight, no. Basic assembly and so forth. It'll take most of the night."

"Drat... That means no scraps of food on the ground."

"Afraid not. But if you desperately need food..."

"Which I always do."

"... you could try the town outside and find someplace to look for leftovers. There's bound to be some restaurants that have thrown out food for you to pilfer."

Templeton considered this. He'd had plenty of sleep all day, so he wasn't interested in just sitting around until sun up. Not to mention that he was absolutely starving at this point.

"Why not?" he said at last. "Travel broadens the mind. Among other things...," he added, patting his stomach. "Very well. I'll try to be back before sun up."

With that, the rat scurried back out of the tent and looked around. He gave the air a quick sniff, ascertaining which way the town was. As he got closer, he made his way to the road, making sure it was safe. This late at night, there wasn't much traffic. Listening carefully for any possible threats, he sniffed the air once more, and he detected a rather nice smell in the air that seemed inviting.

Scurrying down the street, he found himself face to face with a building where the lights were all turned off. He looked up at the sign over the door, and he saw it was a bakery. Finding this very promising, he disappeared around the corner. To his joy, he found what he was looking for. A large dumpster. He scurried up the back of it and peered down inside, enjoying the rotting smells inside.

There was so much bread. Bread in all kinds of shapes and sizes. All gone stale and brittle from being out in the sun. Obviously leftovers. Licking his lips, he did a perfect swan dive into the pile and ate. He chomped and munched and swallowed his way through the pile of old bread like it was nothing. He ate all the biscuits, muffins, loaves, baguettes, bagels, croissants, teacakes, crumpets, potato cakes and hot-cross buns he came across.

It was an hour before he'd finally polished all that he could. He was still gnawing on some old pumpernickel when he realized how full he'd gotten. He rolled over onto his back and peered down at his stomach. What was once a flabby blob was now a taught sphere. It gurgled and moaned from all the carbs it had just had crammed inside it.

Templeton was in a daze, but he smiled all the same. A modest meal, he thought. Good enough for now. He ought to be going, though. It was a bit of a walk back to the circus, and he wanted to get back before the sun came up again.

With a hefty grunt, he made his way up and over the side of the dumpster, slowly lowering himself to the ground. He sniffed the air for any danger, but there were no predators roaming this particular street, so he awkwardly waddled along the sidewalk he'd come down, looking for the hedge he'd slipped through.

It took a very long time. His belly was dragging along the pavement, scratching him a little. He was tempted to stop and rest, but he was determined to finish the slog. He had to keep going before it was too late.

At last, he saw the hedge. He looked around and saw the opening between the branches he'd used earlier. He hauled himself up and through it.

Except he got stuck.

"Ooof!" he cried. "What...?!"

His enormous belly had gotten wedged in the opening. He pushed against the branches, but they weren't bending anytime soon. He was wedged in tightly. Groaning angrily to himself, he tried to force himself out, but it was no good. He wasn't going anywhere.

"Curse my glorious appetite," he muttered, letting his front legs droop disappointingly from where he stuck.

Then, he heard something behind him.
144121111.title: The circus arrives in its new town

choices: The following night, Templeton must share his feast.
1441211111.content:
Templeton twisted and squirmed with all his might, but he couldn't budge his bloated self free from the tight branches. He couldn't even turn to see what needed to be done to free himself. He tried going backwards, but that didn't work either. He was well and truly stuck. He was just reflecting on how this couldn't get any worse when...

"Well, well, well...," said a gruff female voice. "What have we here?"

Templeton tried twisted around again, but he couldn't really see who it was. He heard a rustling in the bushes, and to his surprise, another rat slunk easily through the branches and looked him over. She had a lighter shade of grey fur than him, but it was messier and dirtier. She was also way skinnier than him. Any rat compared to Templeton was going to be skinny, but this rat was almost skin and bones.

"Looks like someone's, shall we say, bitten off more than he can chew?" she continued, laughing uproariously at her own wit.

Templeton blinked in bewilderment. Was this really happening?

The lady rat regained her composure and looked him over. "Looks like you've gone and gotten yourself stuck, fat boy," she said with a smirk. "Care to explain yourself?"

"... What?"

She rolled her eyes disparagingly. "Tell me where you found food," she said slowly.

Templeton glared at her, about ready to tell her to bug off. But then he remembered his predicament and thought of something. "Get me out of here and I'll tell you," he replied.

She gave him a long look, like she really didn't want to. But she peered down at her lack-of-belly and grimaced. She didn't seem to think she had much choice. "Oh, very well," she grumbled.

She scurried over to the branches and gave them a look. Once ascertaining the problem, she pulled aside the two upper branches that held him in place, and once they were free, she gave him a quick kick in the rump that sent him tumbling end over end until he landed in a heap in the dirt. Chuckling to herself, she slipped through the branches and found him lying on his back, his massive stomach sticking straight up in the air. She took a moment to marvel at how huge it was before leaning against it casually.

"So...," she drawled. "Deal's a deal! How'd you get this gut, guy?"

Templeton sneered. "Wouldn't you like to know?"

"Yes, I would, actually," she sneered back, drumming her fingers impatiently on his taut stomach. "Feels pretty packed in there."

"Oh please. A mild repast. Nothing compared to what I'll have tomorrow night."

"And what's tomorrow night?"

"Why, haven't you noticed?" he asked, making a grand gesture at the tents looming not too far away. "The circus is in town."

She took a glance at the brightly-colored tents. "What of it?"

"Well, if you happen to know when to venture out, it's a unadulterated hedonistic paradise for a glutton such as myself."

"Is that right?"

"Yes. I was simply getting something to satisfy my hunger until the feast tomorrow. Stuffed myself enough that I'll be able to sleep through most of the show tomorrow, and then, a huge field of spilled food, just for me."

The lady rat looked impressed. "I see..."

Templeton began to wonder if maybe he had said too much. "Yes, well... thanks for unsticking me. Must be off. Toodles!" He tried to get up and run, but his stomach was still too heavy, and he fell on his back once again.

She chuckled and patted his swell. "My, my, quite a belly you got goin' on here... A lady rat such as myself might be intrigued as to how to grow one for herself..."

Templeton scowled. "Get your own circus. This one's mine."

She leaned down to glare at him straight in the eye. "Now, now, big guy. Let's be rational about this. Allow me to join you in your feast tonight, and this secret stays with me. If you can't be a good boy and share your bounty, I'll alert every single rat in town about this. You think you're the only gluttonous rodent around? I can think of fifteen rats off the top of my head who'd be all over this. Think you can take them all on en mass?"

There was a long silence as he regarded her. His eyes were a mixture of shock, horror, anger and impressed.

"... Be back tomorrow," he said at last. "Once the sun is down and all the cars are gone."

"I'll be here."

She finally released his stomach and walked off, pleased with herself.

Templeton knew he shouldn't ask, but he felt he had to at this point. "What's your name?"

She looked back at him with a confident smile. "Gula," she replied swiftly.

And with that, Gula disappeared back into the shrubbery.

Templeton stared. "... What a stupid name...," he muttered before waddling back to the tent.
1441211111.title: It's a female rat!

14412111111.content:
All the next day, Templeton slept in the straw of the animal tent, enjoying the peace from all the animals being elsewhere for a while. He could hear the distant sounds of music, laughter, honking, squeaking and explosions. Goodness, circuses were strange. If not for the food, he didn't see much appeal in them.

But the day finally gave way to night, and soon, the animals were being returned to the tent. He was awoken by the heavy stomps of an elephant's feet, and he looked on as all the animals took to their stalls and quarters for the night.

Curious, he looked up and saw the hippo was settling into her straw.

"Dearie me, looks like you had a long show," he said.

"Even the monkeys are exhausted," said the hippo. "And they're a hearty bunch."

"Fascinating, I'm sure... How long before I can venture out? I'm desperate for some dinner!"

"Growing that stomach of yours?" sneered a lion from his cage. "That's right. That's just what I like to see."

"How about you leave the poor thing alone?" sighed the giraffe. "For heaven's sake, you get fed plenty around here."

"I always welcome a little something extra, you know..."

"Just zip it," grumbled the hippo, before readdressing Templeton. "Ignore him. And also stay far from his cage."

Knowing full well the dangers, Templeton shrank back. He was glad the hippo was a vegetarian. "So how much longer shall I wait?"

"Let the people depart, first," the hippo advised. "Then it'll be safe to venture out. Once the headlights all disappear, you're safe to eat to your heart's content."

"Mmmmmm, I shall... was it a large crowd?"

"Noisy one, too...," grumbled a rhino distastefully. "But don't worry. Plenty of spilled treats out there, waiting for you."

"Oh, I like the sound of that," said Templeton, rubbing his stomach. His mind still thought back to that annoying rat who would be returning to join him. He hated the idea, but maybe the field was large enough that they could be on opposite sides and have zero interaction.

Perhaps she'll get eaten by the lion, he thought hopefully.

Quite soon, however, the last of the cars departed, and the animals were mostly asleep. Relieved, Templeton scurried out from under the tent and peered outside. He took a good whiff of the night air, and he smelled the salty sweet rotting smell of the spilled junk food of the circus grounds.

"Right on time!" said a voice.

Startled, he turned around and saw Gula had appeared in the yard not far from him. She walked up to him with a smirk on her face.

"Time for a nice round of unadulterated gluttony, isn't it?" she said.

"Unadulterated, indeed," Templeton replied flatly. "Perhaps you'd best... stick to that side over there?" he suggested, pointing in the distance. "Cover more ground that way."

"Very good," she agreed, turning her nose up at him. "Enjoy your gorge, as I shall surely enjoy mine. The best I'll have eaten in many years. See you later."

Walking off, she flicked her tail at him, making him jump back slightly. He scowled at her retreating form, hoping that maybe something awful would happen, and she'd never be seen again. In fact, it'd be great if all other rats were destroyed in some way to prevent them from potentially taking what was rightfully his away from him.

Xenophobic thoughts were never pleasant at the beginning of a feast, so he put them out of his head. Took a deep breath. Looked out over the food before him.

Yards of discarded candy, popcorn, ice cream, hot dogs... His mouth watered at the sight. Forget the stupid other rats. This was his. Everything laid before him. His belly rumbled. It was time to start.

"Zillions of calorific foods just waiting for me to devour them!" he exclaimed. "Let me at 'em!" He dove into a half-finished bag of popcorn and began delightedly devouring the contents therein.
14412111111.title: The following night, Templeton must share his f...

144121111112.content:
The thing about Gula was that she had grown up on the streets. She was a literal street rat. Typically, she lived in the sewers and traveled as far as she need to find food. The problem with this lifestyle, she found, was that it was really difficult to find a decent meal this way. She was constantly running up and down drainpipes, getting chased by cats, getting swatted at by shopkeepers... It was just a mess. Far too many obstacles for far too little food. Such a hectic out-of-control lifestyle simply wasn't cutting it for her anymore. How was a lady rat supposed to enjoy herself with a weary existence such as this?

This was part of the reason why she was so skinny. She absolutely hated it. With so little food to eat, she didn't know how she'd survived for so long. She tried to make the best of what she could find, but it was hardly enough for someone with her insatiability. She yearned for the day when she had an endless feast laid before her that she could gobble down completely.

So when she came across a rat that was the fattest she'd ever seen in her life, she immediately knew she'd found someone who could help her. Someone who could lead her to the feast of a lifetime. Someone who knew a good supply. Templeton clearly knew his way around a good gorge, seeing as how big around he was. She wasn't about to let a possibly literal gravy train escape her so easily. And she could've made good on her threat. She knew plenty of rats that would swarm the circus if word got out.

She ditched the fat rat to scurry to a further part of the field. Right away, she saw the myriad of fattening foods all scattered around, waiting for her to come along and stuff them in her mouth. Licking her lips, she found an old discarded hot dog and bit into it. She was so old and moldy, she couldn't help but swoon. Better than she'd expected. She'd truly found the mother load. She finished it off and rubbed her tiny stomach with glee. How much more could she possibly fit inside herself?

Practically squealing with glee, she ran deeper into the field, looking at all the junk food waiting to be devoured. She found a half-eaten box of malted milk balls and poured them into her mouth, swallowing them whole. Her stomach protruded outwards in a lumpy shape, as if she'd just consumed a bag of marbles. She tossed the box aside and found a box of popcorn that she dove into and ate up every last bit. She found some old sandwiches and boiled eggs, devouring them very messily, getting them all over her.

She was definitely growing. Her once skinny tummy was now a rounded mound, bulging with its contents. She gave it a good rub, feeling pleased with herself. She could've stopped right there. She was nice and full now. But it had only been a few minutes. Surely there was room for more. She grabbed a discarded bag of M&Ms and chomped through every single one, expanding her stomach even further. She let out a belch and patted it. Oh yeah. There was still room for much more in there.

She found more food wherever she went. Wormy apples, half-eaten pizza, spilled mustard, soft-pretzels, gooey cheese, melted ice cream... She ate it all, too. Every last bit of it. Ate whatever was at hand. She grew with every bite. Her stomach went from a mound to a bulge to a ball. It amazed her just how big she was getting. Soon, her stomach was so enormous that she couldn't even walk on all fours without getting stuck. She had to roll herself back onto her hind legs and walk along in short bursts.

She would fall face first into whatever food she'd have next. She found an old doughnut that needed a home. She fell into a few cookies that had been thoughtlessly abandoned. She tripped into some moldy cheese that had been in the sun all day. She ate every last bit. She was slowly approaching the size, shape and weight of an average bowling ball. It felt absolutely incredible. She couldn't stop. She had to have more. Somewhere, there had to be more. Anything. Just something else to eat!

Then, she spotted that "more" she'd been looking for. It was an old pitcher of lemonade, just sitting atop a wooden picnic table. Like a creature possessed, she stumbled and waddled all the way, constantly falling over as her now-massive stomach wobbled back and forth. It took a lot of dedication and patience, but she was determined to consume as much as she could. She struggled her way up, digging her claws into the wood with all her might. She had to make it. She made it onto the bench.

Exhausted, she reached up to the table edge. There was a plaid tablecloth, which gave her an idea. She hooked her claws in and pulled it down, pulling the pitcher towards her. It toppled awkwardly from the movement, tipping in her direction. Bracing herself, she lifted up and caught the edge in her paws, and then she opened her mouth and let the watery contents pour into her stomach. Almost an entire pitcher of warm salty lemonade went cascading down her throat and into her already-stuffed belly.

Gula let out a groan of ecstasy. She was so-o-o-o-o-o full now. And it just kept coming. She had to readjust the pitcher so it would all flow into her stomach. She could feel it growing heavier, swelling like a water balloon, hanging lower and lower, threatening to pull her down in the process. She chugged it all down, faster and faster, enjoying just how utterly huge she was. She had never felt this full before. This was above and beyond what she could've ever hoped for. This was a rat's dream come true.

At last, the lemonade was spent. She dizzily pushed the pitcher away and leaned against the table edge while her belly sloshed and churned, swaying gently. She gave herself a push in the opposite direction before pivoting on her hind legs to get herself facing ninety degrees to the right. She attempted to walk towards the edge so she could climb down, but her stomach was so utterly enormous that the weight was too much, and she fell instead. She landed on the ground with a loud slosh.

Gula bounced briefly before settling. She let out a moan of pain. From atop her belly, she was at least a good two feet off the ground. She was so stuffed. She rubbed her swell with orgasmic delight, rubbing her fullness. She gave it a gentle slap that caused her to gasp in pain again. She let out a belch or two before trying to move again. But she couldn't. There was simply no way she was going anywhere. She moaned under her breath, feeling such joy at her accomplishment. She felt amazing.

Then, she heard movement, and she realized that Templeton was coming.
144121111112.title: Follow Gula's feast

1441211111121.content:
A large shadow fell over the female rat as she looked up at the massive grey orb shuffling over towards her.

Templeton was enormous. He was so huge that he looked like a slightly-misshapen planet. His little ratty head peered down at her from above, a sleepy yet smug grin on his face.

Gula looked him up and down in silent reverence.

At last, he spoke. "Well...," he said in a husky tired voice. "I believe... I've had... just about... enough... Mainly because... there's... no food left... over there..."

Gula swallowed, marveling at the size of the other rat. "How...? How did you...? How are you even...?"

Templeton smirked. "My... stomach... can handle... anything..." He slapped it a few times, but had to stop from the pain it caused him. "Ohhhhh, what a feast... I can... barely move..."

Gula was still watching him. "Absolutely incredible...," she murmured. "I've never seen anyone with an appetite like yours."

Templeton shrugged modestly. "Well... I see no reason... to stop eating... just because... I'm getting full... Just gotta... keep at it... until it's all... gone..."

Gula licked her lips, but she was still too full to eat another bite. She looked up and saw the moon in the sky, and a thought struck her. "So... how do we get away before the sun comes up and the people come back?"

Templeton chuckled. "Well... I'm off... back to the tent... to hide under some straw... You'll have to go... wherever you came from..."

"Oh, come on!" she complained. "I need a place to lie low for the day!"

"Hey... you wanted a... good gorge... and you... got one! This was a... one time deal! You're not getting... anymore!"

Gula glared at him. "Try and stop me!"

"I shall!"

Templeton heaved himself in her direction, but he found in his engorged state that he couldn't move all that fast. His stomach gurgled and sloshed, and he let out a loud hiccup.

"HEEYOOP!!"

Gula was startled by the noise, and she couldn't laughing. She leaned forward and gave his jiggling belly a pat. "Awww, poor fella," she teased. "Did someone have too much to eat?"

Templeton growled. "No... such... thing...," he gasped. "... HEEYOOP!"

She patted him again. "Good lord, what a stomach... We ought to stick you on the helium tank and see how long it takes you burst."

"You... wish... you could be... this fat..."

Gula looked him up and down, feeling the giant swell under her paws, enjoying how it was simultaneously taut and squishy.

"Well... yes...," she admitted, "I suppose I do a bit..."

Templeton stopped struggling - partly because he was out of breath at this point - and regarded her quietly.

"... HEEYOOP!"

Gula snickered at his unique style of hiccup. "I can only imagine how full I'd have to be before I make that noise."

Templeton rubbed whatever he could of his massive stomach. "You... desire to be fat?"

"Oh, it's a dream... To eat until I'm so fat I can't even move. That's the best way to go, isn't it? Gluttony finally satiated, enormous stomach, so utterly and completely fat... But a girl can dream, can't she?"

"Indeed..."

They sat in silence, listening to their bellies rumble.

Finally, Templeton gave a weary sigh. "Oh... very well. Let's get to the tent before the sun comes up."

Gula perked up. "Oh? Changed your mind, have you?"

"Yeah... Don't get used to it, though. Not likely to happen very often."

"I feel so honored."

"You better. Come on."

Heaving and grunting, the two fat rats struggled to get themselves moving. It took a very long time to drag themselves across the deserted circus ground. They'd be frequently tempted along the way by some food they'd missed, but they knew it was too much work to go and get it. Eventually, they settled for rolling, which allowed them to cover some distance. It was a long bumpy ride, and they felt a tad ill along the way.

But at last, they came to a bumpy stop just outside the tent. Grunting and heaving, they got the flap open and rolled inside.

Gula froze when she saw all the sleeping animals. "What on earth...?!"

"Shhhh," hissed Templeton. "Don't wake them."

"Why? Will they eat us?"

"No, they're just really grouchy when they're woken up. Bunch of whiners. Come on. The hippo's a vegetarian. She won't cause us any grief."

They waddled, rolled and dragged themselves over to the hippo's spot, sleeping in her straw. They made sure to hide out of view of any potential humans coming around. Of course, they'd become so large that they couldn't hide under the straw completely - their enormous bellies stuck straight up in the air. It took a very long time to cover themselves up completely.

When they finally did, they were so exhausted that they passed out. Time to digest.

In the morning...
1441211111121.title: Templeton is bigger than her

14412111111211.content:
The two rats slept comfortably all night, but they were startled awake by some commotion in the outside world.

"Oh, good lord!" groaned the lion. "Don't tell me there's another one!"

"Looks like he made a new friend," sighed the giraffe.

"Eek! No! They're multiplying! Keep away!" wailed the elephant pitifully.

The two rats popped up in the straw in surprise. Even more surprising was that they had fallen asleep in very close proximity together. They struggled to get away from each other, but it was a bit difficult, seeing as how they were both still enormous from the previous night's gorge.

The hippo tutted at the sight. "Well, well, well...," she drawled. "Seems someone bit off a bit more than they could chew, eh, Templeton?"

Templeton floundered until he landed a respectable distance from Gula. "She's just passing through," he grumbled.

"You wish!" Gula replied hotly. "This circus is the best meal I've had in my entire life! Never have I enjoyed such a repast before! There's just so much of it, and there was still so much left!"

The giraffe rolled his eyes. "Good lord, there's two of them."

The hippo chuckled. "Well, if you two stick together, you'll save the clean up crew a great deal of time and labor. No doubt they'll appreciate that."

Templeton glared. 'We are not sticking together."

Gula glared back. "Hmph! You keep to your side of the meal, and I'll keep to mine," she replied.

"Sounds like a match made in heaven," yawned the lion.

The two rats glared at each other again and moved to opposing sides of the straw, with Templeton burying himself back under the straw.

Gula continued to glare at him until she felt the hippo's eyes on her. "What do you want?" she snarled.

"Maybe stop watching him so much. Makes the attraction all the more obvious."

The female rat's eyes bugged out in alarm. "What?! I wasn't...! I have standards, I'll have you know!"

The hippo smiled. "So what brought you two together?"

"Nothing! I mean... There's no 'together'! I helped him when he got his fat self stuck, and he repaid me by hooking me up with an endless buffet outside. That is it."

"So you don't think he's cute?"

"What?! No! He is not cute! He's rude and selfish and pushy..."

"And you're still looking at him."

Gula realized she was and looked back again. "Okay, so I can't take my eyes off the fact that he's enormous. You have to respect a rat who can eat that much."

"You like big rats, do ya?"

"Yes, I -- what? No, stop it! I don't... He's just... He's so... utterly..."

She trailed off when she saw Templeton was once again asleep in the straw, his stuffed belly rising and falling with every snore.

"... big," she finished, a little breathless.

The hippo chuckled. This should be interesting.
14412111111211.title: ... they're found by the animals

choices: A new year for the fair.
Templeton gaining a plumper figure over time.
Templeton being a father and teaching his children about gluttony.
Templeton leaving the farm to find more new ways to glut himself.
15.content: What should be the starting point?
15.title: After the story ends

info.brief_description: Templeton the rat from Charlotte's web has an adventure of his own.
info.description:
Templeton, the loveable, gluttonous rat from Charlotte's Web goes on a little adventure of his own. Incorporating parts of the story including characters and plot is fine, but just remember who the main focus of the story is.

Additions are always welcome.
